bar bsdu ba'i dus su lag pa'i rdo rje dag gis rang gi lus la sa bon gzhug par bya/ /'di dang dang po ru yang ri mor bris ba'i thang sku rnams kyi me long la ni khrus su 'gyur/ /phyi nas dri dang sbos dang shin
tu dri bzang me tog rnams dang glu dang rol mo dag dang ni/ /gar dang rnam mang mchog gi gos dang rnga yab dang ni gdugs rnams dag gis lha la mchod par bya/ /de ltar rab gnas byas nas rnam mang
mchog gi ro rnams dag gis dge 'dun mchog ston rab tu sbyin/ /khron pa rdzing dang mtshe 'ur phyogs dang phyogs bral du ni klu yi rgyal po nor rnams dgod par bya/ /chu gter bdun po rang gi sa

bon gyis te sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa'i dri lnga gzhug par bya/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing bu la sogs dag la chu lha dkar po phyag na zhags pa bsgom par bya/ /skyed mos tshal du shing gcig dpag bsam
ljon pa mtha' dag shing la gnas par dbang ni bskur nas so/ /cod pan dar dpyangs dag dang do shal gdu bu dang ni de bzhin rna cha ska rags la sogs pa/ /slob dpon la ni rab tu sbyin byar
'gyur te mi yi bdag po yon yang bdag nyid nus pas so/ /sbyin bdag gis ni bsod nams slad du mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs la gzhan don don du gnyer bya ste/ /bsod nams 'di yis
rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub thob par shog /ji srid phyogs kyi lo ni gcig phu rnam ba bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang ni
reg par bya/ /de nas 'khyud par bya ste ro dang bcas pa'i chu gter g.yo ba la sogs rnams ni bsten par bya/ /lo ni nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo
'byung po lha min cha/ /dbang gi don du drug dang bzhi ste bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o/ /dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yang dang por reg pa gang yin
bum pa'i dbang ni de nyid do/ /gsang ba dag las ri bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni blta ba dag gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur/ /shes rab ye shes dbang la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i
rigs kyi yan lag zhal gyis sbyang ba byas nas ni/ /rgyal ba dag kyang 'dir ni bla mas dbang por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan zhun
ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis lo lon mdzes pa'i bu me ni/ /khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid dag gis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'dod spyad nas/ /sa bon dang
bcas rdo rje dag kyang slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru 'phang pa byas nas ni/ /phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya de nas slar yang gzhan ni du ba'i lam sogs ldan pa'o/ /skrag dang rnam
bar 'khrul pa'i sems ldan g.yo sgyu gzhan dbang 'gro ma nad dang ldan dang bu skyes ma/ /khro khengs nor la sred dang mi bden rtsod pa la dga' rang gi yan lag dman dang rnam dag min/ /shes rab
'di dag dbang la shin tu mkhas pa'i bla ma dag gis spang bar bya 'o mi yi dbang / /sngar brjod sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam tshig 'dzin ma rnams ni phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya/ /
'dod pa skyod par byed pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la 'o gang ba dag ni gang ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gang ba yan lag mchog dag las ni ri bong 'dzin pa khu bar byas nas thig le bzang po 'dzag /oD+Das
bkug pa mchog gi bde ba rang bzhin gyis ster thig le grol ba dag ni gsum gyi mthar/ /blta dang reg dang 'grogs la 'dzag pa'i bde ba 'di dag dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs dag gis
so| |'dod pa dga' bar byed de dang po dag kyang mi rnams kyi ni mig gis blta ba dag la 'o/ /phyi nas gang ba rab tu sbyar ba la ste slar yang mchog gi dga' ba nyid do rang lus la/ /'bar ba thig le
'dzag pa dang ni dga' ba yang ste khyad par dga' ba rdo rje pad+ma la/ /oD+Da thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru 'gyur ba la gnas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rdo rje byed/ /'dod dang dga' ba dang ni 'dar
dang 'gyur med dag dang bzhi po yis ni sbyor ba de gcig ste/ /gang ba dang ni nus dang skye ba dag dang mchog gi dga' ba nyid ni gnyis par nges par 'gyur/ /'bar ba dang ni thig le brgyal ba dag
dang slar yang khyad par dga' ba nyid ni gsum pa 'o/ /oD+Da dang ni nA da dag dang gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid ni bzhi par 'gyur/ /sems kyi bsam
pa yis ni ma ru 'gyur te reg pa dang ni blta ba dag gis srid me 'o/ /rdo rje zhugs pas bu mo byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bas tsha mo dag ni de bzhin nyid/ /thig le lhung na chung ma
gzhan gyi regs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma ni 'dod chags nyams las so/ /'di dag rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste sa chu bsreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnams so/ /chu skyes
la ni rdo rje rab zhugs rtse mo can la rlung dang thig le lhung gsum pa'o/ /'di dag rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab tu gsal zhing nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya ste/ /chags
dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog 'di'i gter ni rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa 'o/ /phyag rgya rnams las de ni legs pa'i ma ru 'gyur te rnam bcu dpal ldan bla ma'i
zhal 'di 'o/ /shes rab yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid gsum skyed ma spyan la sogs pa rnams ni sring mo 'o/ /rdo rje drug ni tsha mo rnams te phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsa rtsi ka sogs
yang tsha mo/ /'khor lo la gnas dus kun du ni rang rigs sa la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsten par bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par nam
yang dor bar mi bya 'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad ming po 'o/ /spyan la sogs pa ming po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnams mang yang tsha
rnams dang yang tsha'i bu rnams so/ /'khor lo la gnas rang rigs sar gnas rab dga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gis bsten par bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo
dang bcas skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang ut+pal mig can mchog gi dri yis rjes su byugs pa gang su dag /bsod nams dag gi rgyu ru dag
pa gsum gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje mchod pa 'bul byed na/ /sa gzhi sbyin dang glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang / /bsod nams de dag thams
cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su 'o/ /sgrol ma dmangs mo rnam pa bzhi ru sa yi steng du 'gyur te gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs ma/ /sa ni rje'u
rigs ma rnams rnam gsum mA ma kI ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnam bdun 'gyur/ /sgra zhes bya ba 'khar ba mkhan mo nges par ro yi rdo rje chang tshong gzugs kyi rdo rje ma/ /yang
dag nges par gser mkhan mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dzin ma dag la dri yi rdo rje ni/ /phreng ba mkhan du rab tu grags te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis reg bya rdo rje thag mkhan ma//
rdo rje'i mtha' can chos kyi dbyings ni nor bu mkhan mor 'gyur bar 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags/ /tsA muN+Di ni sha tshong mar 'gyur rang bzhin yon tan
dbang gis khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma/ /phag mo 'khur ba mkhan du nges 'gyur gdong drug ma ni smad tshong ma ste dbang mo tshe ma bu ma/ /tshangs me nya pa mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i
gnas dag tu yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur/ /dpal mo zla ba gang ba'i zhal ni brgyad ba tshos mkhan mar yang 'gyur te 'byung po'i skye gnas so/ /rmugs byed ma
ni rgya skyegs mkhan mor 'gyur te mi bdag rengs byed ma ni srin pa la mkhan mo'o/ /khengs ma zhes bya til mar 'tshir ma rab phye shin tu stobs ni lcags mkhan mo ste bzhi
pa'o| |'od zer can ni ko lpags mkhan mar rab 'gyur khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid/ /dpal ldan tsun+da 'breg mkhan ma ste sa yi srid pa gsum lcags
sgrog ma smyug ma mkhan/ /drag spyan ma ni khron pa byed mar 'gyur te bcu pa 'od ma'i gar ma shin tu sngon mo'o/ /khro bo'i cha shas khro bo las skyes bud med bcu bo rnams
ni rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/ /dpal ldan khyi gdong ma ni kla klo mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po phag gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo/ /lce spyang gdong ma gtum mo dag dang sa yi
gzhi mi stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma/ /bya rog gdong ma bsnyon thams ma ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par bya rgod gdong ma ro sreg ma/ /mkha' lding gdong ma dpal ldan b+hi l+lIr 'gyur
te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i gdong ma dag kyang ri khrod ma/ /sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs rnams te/ /zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i
gnas dang yul dang grong mchog dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas pa ni/ /rmongs rnams 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor ba rnams dag la dngos grub ster/ /
bzhi dang drug dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang bcas pa'i nor dang gcig bu gcig ni rim pas so/ /bzhi ni sangs rgyas dbye ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu
dbye ba rnams/ /khro bo rnams ni phyogs kyi rab dbye sa steng gnas su yi dwags dbye ba rnams ni de bzhin brgyad/ /lha min dag kyang brgyad kyi dbye ba gdengs can srid par gnas rnams rnal
'byor ba yis rig par bya/ /gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs gtso bo srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams dag gi khyab byed do/ /sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad ste mi yi
'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes gnas/ /yi dwags zhes bya yi dwags 'jig rten du ste lha mchog gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug /tshangs pa'i yul sar dpal
ldan bzhi ste rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dag gi yum gcig ma/ /rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams sna tshogs yang dag sdung byed dgyes pa rnams
ni skyong bar byed pa nyid/ /bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs mo/ /rje'u mo dmangs mo mthar skyes rnams sam mig dang lag pa dang
brel rna mchu sna ni chad ma rnams/ /mtha' dag byang chub rgyu ru shes rab thabs kyis mchod bar bya ste rgyal bo slob dpon snying rje dang / /bcas pa'i thugs ldan dri ma dag dang rnam
par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su zhon pas so/ /dang bor bud med gsang ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te dam tshig la ni dbal ldan skyes pa mchog phyag rgya/ /rtsed mo'i yan lag las
kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te dbang po gnyis kyi bde mnyam dag gis chos phyag rgya/ /pho nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga lus dang pad+ma la gnas de dag rnams kyi rigs lnga ste/ /rang bzhin yon
tan dbang gis gla rtsi dang ni pad+ma gcin dang sha dang rul ba'i dri rnams so/ /dpal ldan bzang mo pad+ma can du nges 'gyur chu la rgyu ma sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma/ /dpal ldan sgrol
ma gos dkar zhes byar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis mA ma kI dang spyan ma yang / /rnal 'byor pa ni seng+ge ri dwags rta ru 'gyur te khyu mchog glang po rigs kyi dbye ba las/ /mi
bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa dri med nor bu'i phyag dang phyag na pad+ma 'khor lo can/ /yan lag phra ldan skra rnams phra zhing rkang lag 'jam la mnyes gshin dpal ldan shin tu bzang mo'o/ /cung zad

phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g.yo ba med la skra ni 'khyog pa pad+ma can/ /ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la rtsod mang la dga' skra ni shin tu chung ba dung can ma/ /ring zhing yan lag thams cad
rdzogs la des par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma/ /sbom zhing thung la yan lag shin tu sra ba'i yul dang skra ni sbom pa glang chen ma/ /pho nya mo rnams dag pa'i rigs ni
'ga' zhig dag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun du ni 'dres pa'i rigs/ /seng+ge ngag kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/ /ri dwags mgyogs
'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang ba'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o/ /rta ni des par 'dod la srid par 'gyur te gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan don gter ba'o/ /khyu
mchog rengs pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur/ /glang chen 'dod ldan des par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul ba'i dri dang shin tu rmongs/
pa'o| |sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba sa yi steng gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang bzhin no/ /mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig
par bya| |shin tu dga' ba byas kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis ma tshim dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur/ /mdzes ma lha mo dang ni sha za mo dang mi mo dang ni srin
mo klu mo dag tu 'gyur/ /mdzes ma dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma/ /sha za mo ni dri yi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma
yi dbang / /gdug pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par ro yi rdo rje klu mo reg bya rdo rje ma/ /mdzes ma sems can phan pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan dang
tshul can/ /lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha za mo/ /mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems
ma ste| |klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/ /de bzhin gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dpang gis rnal 'byor pa
yis rig par bya/ /sa yi steng gi gnas su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye bas phye ba'o/ /chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sprang rtsi dang bcas bu ram las skyes
'bras las skyes sam shing skyes te/ /phyag rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed de na yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/ /de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri ma
phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub spyin par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya/ /rgyal bo ri bong mtshan ma gcig pu
thams cad dus su bsten pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog byed na/ /shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni smos ci dgos/ /mi bskyod
don yod grub pa rgyal ba mchog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa/ /nyon mongs rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs spyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag/ khyi

rta ba lang glang po lug dang ra dang ri dwags bong bu phag dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs/ /kuM b+hI ra dang 'gron bu ku li ra dang nya dang ma ka ra dang sbal pa rus sbal dung / /bse ru stag dang dom dang

ne'u le bcas 'bri dang lce spyang dang ni sram dang byi la dang / /'brog dgon khyi dang seng+ge dang bcas nor dang bcu ste 'di ni 'byung po skyes dang khro bo skyes/ /go d+hA byi ba shA la dzI ta spre'u dang ni ri
bong gzungs mo i shu rtsangs pa brgyad/ /khengs ldan 'dab chags dang ni ne tso khu byug dag dang ri skyegs rab tu gsal bar chu yi gter/ /lA ba phug ron gzhan ni bya dkar zhes bya

ca Ta ga dang dur ba dang ni ngang pa dang / /dpal ldan khrung khrung khu byug mig dang ra dza ga dang b+ha ga ba tI ti ti ri dang bzhad/ /chu la 'jug ba dang ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i nor rnams rim pa
mis ni rig par bya/ /bya rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dwags dgra dang gcig phud can dang bya gag b+h+re dra g+hA ra dang / /hor pa ljon shing dgra ni gzhan te bcu pa
khro bo las skyes khro bo yi ni rigs su 'gyur/ /mig sngon dpal ldan tsa ko ra dang a ni la dang gu de mu kha bug gi rkang steng nyal/ /b+he ruN+Da dang aM ba rI ka brgyad pa mchog gi 'dab
chags su 'gyur mi yi bdag po kye/ /sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa lag nas sa spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyis/ /rigs su gyur pa'i dam tshig mtha' dag
rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bza' par bya/ /rmongs pas gti mug dag las gal te spangs na mi yi bdag po myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur/ /so dang skra dang
pags pa la sogs sha bcas chu rgyus dang bcas rus pa snying dang pad+ma dang / /shig dang ba spu srin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bdag po glo ba rgyu mchu so dang / /bad ka na mkhris pa
chu dang chug dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa khrag dang rdul dang tshil bu dang / /mchi ma dag dang mchil ma snabs dang dri chu chu ser zhag dang kha dog dri dang bshad ba dang / /lce dang mig
dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed rnams kyis lha rnams mchod par bya/ /sum cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams na rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang / /
sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang mtshan ma phyag rgya dang / /sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni sa gzhi dag la gnas rnams 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma
rnams kyi/ /chu dang mchod yon dri dang spos dang me teg dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar me dang / /lha bshos dag dang 'dir ni na bzar 'gyur te bcu po rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus pa
dag la yang / /khu ba gcin dang rkang dang bshad ba dag dang sha dang mchen ba dag dang mkhris pa khrag dang ni/ /rgyu ma pags pa rnams ni rgyal po rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te 'khor lo 'dus
pa dag la yang / /rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste/ /rgyud mang dang ni me long snod du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po me tog phreng ba dag dang gos/ /
drug pa chos 'byung nges par lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma'o/ /de bzhin gri gug la sogs bum pa zhes dang de bzhin du ni bcu gzar gos ni ser po dang / /khab
pa ma yang na tho ba rab tu gsal zhing nges pa dag tu nya yi rgya dang rtse gsum ste/ /dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyad pa rdo bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o/ /rmugs byed la
sogs rnams kyi dmar snod nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang / /chu sri dang ni mthil lham dag dang spu gri zhes bya de bzhin shing lha ma dag dang gdugs dang ni/ /tog
tse dang ni 'od ma'i dbyug pa khro skyes rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru rab tu 'gyur/ /ba lang ra dang kham phor rgyud ldan 'phangs dang sha yi gsal shing
lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba ste/ /rgyud mang nye ba'i yan lag dang ni mda' dang gtsug phud can gyi mjug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchog
sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/ /slar yang dmangs rigs la sogs mtshan mar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis ut+pal 'am thong gshol lo/ /rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar
dpyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po smyug gu rin chen phreng ba ni/ /rje rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu ba dang bcas zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i/ /yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa

bzhi sde DA ma ru dang rnga chen cod pa na nyid dang bgrang phreng ngo / /bshang ba gcig ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams ni bzhi por 'gyur pa ste/ /rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang
bshad lam dang ni b+ha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug /rnag dang bad kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang ba sbu skra dang brgyad po yang / /sgyu ma mkhris pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs
lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang / /rtsa dang pags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro mi yi dbang / /rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang kha dang bshad
lam dbus dang b+ha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs/ /lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur/ /sen me dang bcas so dang yan lag bcu
gnyis thod pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur/ /bshad ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi/ /rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang
bshang lam dag dang b+ha ga'i zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnas su tshan+do ha yi dbye ba brgyad/ /rgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni phyogs zhes bya
ba mi bdag 'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams/ /rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams/ /dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal
zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi/ /sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa pa sangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa
skyes rlung las skyes pa dag /brgyad ni tshan+do ha yi dbye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang / /reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye
ba rnams/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag kyang mdun dang g.yon dang g.yas dang rgyab tu ste/ kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye
ba rnams/ /gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste gsal bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod/ /tshan+do ha ni tsa rtsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te
me bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs/ /dud khrod kyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni/ /yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de deg rab tu
gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma/ /gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i pad+mar rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas/ /zhing dang tshan+do ha dang 'dus pa dag
dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go /gnas ni g.yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g.yas pa dag kyang nye ba'i gnas/ /de ltar zhing la sogs pa
thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha mo chu gter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags/ /shes rab
byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan ba dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug /chu gcan yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur/ /khro bo
lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do/ /yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur/
sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te/ /de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor ba yis rig
par bya| |de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas pa dang zhib pa'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin
gtsang gnas bram ze'am/ /thod pa can dang skra 'bal dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang / /smyon pa'i gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan
mkhas pa dang ni grags ba nyid 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor ba ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter na dai nyid thob pa mi yi dbang / /mthe bong dag ni mdzub mo dag dang slar
yang de bzhin du ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang / /de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya/ /phyag rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon

tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so/ /bcing ba brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no/ /khu tshur bral yi stang du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal bzhi
bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /skyil krung la ni lag pa g.yon bar 'gyur te g.yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa la son gyur pa/ /sa la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g.yas
pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyis/ /g.yon gyi steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na pad+ma dag gir 'gyur/ /g.yon pa skyil krung stong
du gzhan pa lag pa'i mthil ni 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi/ /g.yas kyi khu tshur g.yas min la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa la/ /gsal bar snying
khar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni/ /mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur ba dang ni gud mo la sogs brkyang ba'o/ /lag pa g.yon la

shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtsa mo lnga pa ni/ /bsgoms nas yan lag la ni reg bya cod pan dang
bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang ba'i mtha' nyid du'o/ /'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o/ /gang zhig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i
dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang / /bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par bya/ /gang gang bya ba nye bar
sbyar bar 'gyur ba yon tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya/ /sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya/ /lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings
ba yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /mtshan ma'i rnams
pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o/ /lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g.yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /mthe bong dag

dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dag ni brkyang ba dang / /mdzub mo gnyis ni zla ba phyed pa ming med 'og tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje
can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya pa'o/ /rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du mthe bong la sogs mtha' dag rnams/ /lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings pa
rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur dag gis dril bur bcas/ /khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mda' dang mtshungs pa dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur/ /mdzub mo la sogs rtse gsum slar yang
bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum la/ /dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings shing dpal ldan mthe chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur/ /rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings
shing mthe bong gung mo'i steng du 'gyur te mda' yi mchog la'o/ /khu tshur bcings shing mdzub mo shin tu 'khyog por 'gyur ro mi bdag de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o/ /rtsa bar mdzub mo ming
med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang ni mdung la ste/ /thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa la 'o lag mthil shin tu mnyam la mthe bong brkyang ba
dgra sta la/ /steng du khu tshur gnyis ngang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha min bdag po glang chen bags pa dag la'o/ /mche ba la ni lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u
chung zla ba phyed pa'o/ /khe Ta ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son par 'gyur/ /kha TAM ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyid du phrag par
mthe'u chung brkyang ba 'o/ /sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu steng du byas ba dpal ldan thod pa la/ /gzhu la lag pa gan rkyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung ba g.yon
pa rab tu brkyang ba'o/ /gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun tu brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhags pa la/ /rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur te mi bdag de dag rnam par phye ba
pad+ma la| |chu na rgyu ba la ni mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og tu khu tshur ro/ /me long la ni shin tu mnyam pa'i lag mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs
par 'gyur/ /mthe bong la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog por mi par yongs su bkod pa lcags sgrog la'o/ /mgo bo la ni mthe bong la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og
tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o/ /cod pan la ni lag pa dag gis dung gis phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur/ /lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig tu sbyar ba
dag kyang rna rgyan la/ /lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul ba'i rgyan la ste/ /lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbyar cing thog mtha'i
bskum pa dag ni ske rags la/ /khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta bur byas pa rkang gdub la/ /de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan zung dang gdu bu la yang mdzub mo phan
tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur/ /mthe bong mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis mchog gi rigs su 'gyur te mdzub mo gsang ba pa rnams kyi/ /dri za rnams dang gdengs can rnams kyi gung mo ming med dag ni
rim par yongs su bkod pa'o/ /'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil ni srin po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur/ /grub ba rnams kyi khu tshur bcings pa mchog gi rigs
te tshigs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams dag gi 'o/ /lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi/ /khu tshur bcings las mdzub mo gnyis po phyed
'khyog nges par mgo bor son pa na can rnams kyi'o/ /mi mnyam lag ba'i mthil la mthe chung phan tshun bcings shing gshog pa sbyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste/ /sor mo lnga po rtse mo 'khyog pa
gdengs can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/ /nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni mdzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan pa'o 'og
tu sbyar byas pa/ /'bar ba dag la mthe bong sbyar te mchog gi lag mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba gzhan pa'o/ /mdzub mo bstan ni legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod
par 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa la yang / /gnyis kyis shin tu legs par 'ongs dang skal bzang dge ba mthe bong bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur/ /sor mo'i se gol rdeb pa khyod ni
'di ru sngags pa mchog ces par ni brjod par 'gyur ba ste/ /mthe bong dang ni ming med dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni tshim bar byed pa'o/ /sor mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang
pas skal bzang legs par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la yang / /g.yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed/ /skye gnas
dag la reg pas gtso bo mchu dang nu ma zung dang nges par sen mo 'debs pas kyang / /sor mo sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo dang ni mthe bong brkyang pas dam tshig brjod par byed pa
yin| |mchu dang smin ma mig dag yo zhing mgo la 'phrug par byed na shin tu rmongs pa rjod par byed/ /mche ba'i dbus su mthe chung dang ni snying ga kha ru mdzub mos 'jigs pa rab tu
gsal bar byed/ /mthe bong khu tshur bcings pa dang ni lag pa rkang ba sa la rdeb na da yis bza' bar bya/ /lce la reg na zos pa dang ni lto dang so dang bsnun pa dag gis ma zos pa nyid do/ /lag pa'i

rgyab kyis song zhig nges par rab tu brjod de mngon du phyogs pas 'dug cig 'dug cig go /byin pa bral la nyed na skal bzang khyod ni de ring kho na ngal bso des par rjod par byed/ /rkang ba rab tu skyod
bas gnyid dang pus mo zung dag skyong ba bdag la bdag la shin tu dga' ba gyis/ /yan lag kun la reg par byed cing kha ru lag pa gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o/ /phan tshun lag ba bcings
pas bdag gi khyim du de ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni rjod par byed/ /mthe bong ming med rtse mo dag gis rnam mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya/ /rkang ba la ni 'phrug par

byed na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang / /mdzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni de ring 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o/ /skra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yi phyugs

khyod 'dir ni ltung bar bya brjod par byed/ /so ni phan tshun 'da' bar byed na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis de ring bza' bar bya/ /lce mchu g.yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'o
nges par brjod par byed/ /mchu la so ni 'debs par byed na khyod kyi sgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag gis bza' bar bya/ /sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgeg par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad pa'i
sbyor bas bzhad pa'o/ /gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du 'gyur te rnam ba mang bo'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o/ /klu yi sbyor ba mis ni glu ste mchog gi yon tan
rnam mang dri yi sbyor ba dag gis dri/ /phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sbos kyi sbyor ba dag gis spos/ /mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges par mun pa bcom pa
dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga yi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste/ /gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag
lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang phyag rgya rnams/ /pho nya mo ni 'phreng la blta bas khyod ni
gang zhig nas 'ongs skal pa bzang la rjod par byed/ /mgo bor lag bzhag de yi phyogs su nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lan ni smras par 'gyur/ /steng du blta bas khyod ni dge
'am sa yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so cig /yon bor blta bas khyod song chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin tu dga' brjod par byed/ /zhi ba'i lta bas bdag gi grog
po khro gnyer khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed/ /skra la blta bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod skal bzang la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyis so/ /mdzod spur blta bas bdag
mchog rnal 'byor ma ni snal blta bas yon tan rab tu gsal bar byed/ /mchu la blta bas skal pa bzang ste nu ma zung la blta na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mor brjod/ /snying gar blta bas bsgoms
pa'i bdag nyid lag ba zung la blta na bdag ni rab tu gtum mor brjod/ /phrag par blta bas bdag ni nus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la blta na srin mo 'o/ /rgyab tu blta na lag 'gro
ma ste lte bar blta bas mi yi dbang po bdag ni dam tshig can/ /gsang bar blta bas bdag ni dag pa brla la blta bas bdag ni shin tu dga' la gdul bar dka'/ /pus mor blta bas bdag ni grub pa

nges par rjod byed rkang bar blta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo/ /rkang pa'i mthe bong nges par blta na bdag ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpa' mo gcig pu dang / /sor mo kun gyi rtse mor blta bas srid pa gsum
gyi gnas su kun tu 'gro ma sna tshogs yum/ /pho nya mo rnams lta stangs nyid ni sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus dag gi ni
yan lag mchog kyang spyin pa ste/ /las kyi dbang po rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang bcas yid dag kyang / /khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang
phyugs kyi tshogs kyi de nyid cha yis gzhan/ /mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su rig pa slob dpon la ni rab tu phul na bde ba'i gnas su 'gro/ /sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas
rnams 'jig rten khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje
yi| |bdud rtsi mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa/ /dri ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas rnams rang gi gnas su gtang bar
bya| |rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya/ /de bzhin du ba la sogs lam dang mtha' dag yon tan gter ni
rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste/ /bsten pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po yum
gyi mchod pa rnams dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya/ /dbang gi mthar ni dpal ldan bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bde stor stod mi dgos zung dag /dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag
la sbyin bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang ni gos zung dag /sgo na gnas pa rnams la rab sbyin mtha' dag yon tan rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan/ /mthar ni sbyin
sreg byas nas rang gi snying ga'i pad+mar ye shes sems dpa' rab tu gzhug bya ste/ /'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag rdul tshon dag kyang dag pa'i klung la spyan drang bya/ /tAM bu
la dang dri sbos me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ras yug dag ni gzhon nu ma rnams la/ /byin nas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar 'dod par mchod byas
te| |slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /dgra dang seng+ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags
pas 'ching ba dang / /chu gter 'khrugs pa dang ni sha za 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe pa dang / /dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa
dang ni rdo rje ltung dang don nyams pa/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni nyin zhag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal
dus kyi 'khor lo las/ mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //rgyal ba skyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i
dbang dag dang / /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi ba thob/ /slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i

sgrub thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhu'o/ /zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs/ /zla ba'i sku dang zung gi zhabs te me yi mgrin pa chu gter
dpal ldan zhal ni sna tshogs mdog /phra ga pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung ba rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma stong pa drug dang me yi tshigs/ /zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyi ma
bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa/ /rol pas mnan pa'i srid med srid pa mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu de ni bsgrub par bya/ /skyed mos tshal lam ri bo
dang ni rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni stong pa dang / /grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas dang de bzhin nyid du sbas pa'i sa/ /gang du sems ni rab tu
tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub par bya 'o mi yi bdag po ste/ /nges par 'jam pa'i mal stan dag dang gdan la nye bar 'dug nas sngar brjod srung ba byas nas ni/ /dang por snying gar zla ba'i
dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna tshogs rnams ni phyogs bcur bsgom par bya/ /kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar yang nam mkha' dag la spros pa'i rgyal ba rnams la ni/ /mchod pa rnam
pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po bsags pa dag ni bshags byas te/ /sgrub pa po yis lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bya/ /
rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa/ /de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam bral byang chub spyod la rjes su
gnas pa rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag gyur cig ces 'dir ni
smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do/ /stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman/ /de bas sangs rgyas byang chub
med cing gzhan phan snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste/ /mtha' dag de ltar shes nas de lta na yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /dpag med yon tan dkyil
'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ /chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya/ /phyi nas
'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshwa bzhin du chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs/ /rlung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas nam mkha' la ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sems ni me dang mun

pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis la gzhag par bya/ /stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me rnams ni/ /khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro
ba'am ni rdo rje las skyes gur dag go /de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sa la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba ste/ /oM yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba dang ni
nyi ma dag gi gdan/ /phyi rol tu ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor nor gyi pad+ma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman/ /phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni nyin mor byed pa'i pad+ma
sgo yi dbus su shing rta rnams/ /nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams dang dur khrod dang / /snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin shin tu
longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal pa yi/ /zla ba nyi ma la yang a sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis/ /'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma
med pa'i zer 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma nyi ma'i dpung ba dus kyi zhal/ /mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i spyan te rnam
par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa'o/ /dpal ldan oM yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+mar zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du ni/ /drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying gar rgyal
ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang stabs/ /g.yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud sde dkar po g.yon par yang ni drag po'o/ /dbus dang g.yas dang
g.yas min mgrin pa dag kyang bung ba nyi ma dang mtshungs zla ba dag gi mdog /phrag pa sngon po dang ni dmar dang ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dgar g.yas pa dang ni g.yon du yang / /g.yas dang g.yas
min dpung pa gnyis gnyis dag ni nag dang nyi ma'i lus dang zla ba'i mdog rnams te/ /de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dag dang bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyi ni rim pas so/ /
phyag gi pad+ma ri bong can la tshigs gsum sor mo lnga po rnams ni kha dog lnga rnams 'phro/ /nag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang dag gnas pa
yang / /rdo rje ral gri dag dang rtse gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang ni me yi mda'/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i DA ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid/ /mdung

dang dbyug pa dgra sta rnams ni rdo rje can gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi pad+ma g.yas la'o/ /dril bu phub dang kha T+wAM ga ni rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /gzhu dang zhags pa rin

chen pad+ma chu na rgyu pa dag dang me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang / /tshangs pa'i mgo bo pad+mas brgyan pa rig byed gdong ldan gang yin rgyal ba'i g.yon gyi phyag na'o/ /bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag ni
zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed/ /gser mdog rig byed zhal ldan nor gyi phyag gis pad+mas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs yum yin te/ /g.yas na gri gug
lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i DA ma ru dang bgrang phreng rim pas so/ /g.yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgyad pa'i pad+ma mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid/ /g.yon brkyang nyi ma'i
spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'o/ /'dab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma rig byed zhal dang nyi

ma'i spyan/ /de dag rnams las bzhi ni sprul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te zur du rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye bas so/ /dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse mo can dang rlung gi zur du chos kyi dung dang gaN+Di dang / /
de bzhin yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur te nges par de bzhin du ni bdag bsam shing du rim pas 'gyur/ /nag mo yi ni dang po'i phyag gi mthil na spos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag na bsil
ba'i snod/ /dmar po sbyar ba gsum pa na ste myos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phyag bzhin/ /g.yon na dril bu pad+ma lha yi shing gi me tog dang ni me tog phreng ba rim pas
so| |dmar mo'i g.yas na mar me do shal dag dang cod pan dang bcas gdu bu rnams te phyag g.yon na/ /gos dang ska rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub
bo| |ser mo'i g.yas kyi phyag na dung dang gling bu nor bu dang bcas DA ma ru ni rim pas te/ /g.yon na rgyud mang dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu sgrog pa'i mkhar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo / /'o
ma chu dang sman dang chang dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod ni dkar mo yi/ /phyogs kyi pad+ma ra chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu ma yi zhal dang dus kyi phyag /zur du
sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad/ /lha dang lha mo nag dang dmar dang ser ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ste/ /nag po dkar po zla
ba'i steng du yang na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nyi ma'i steng / /mkha' snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg bya rdo rje ma la sogs/ /shar dang phyogs
gzhan gyi na g.yas dang g.yas min pad+ma dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid/ /dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas so/ /rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dag ste

shin tu stobs shes gang yin sgo skyong de ni shar du'o/ /shes rab phang par thabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma la ste lha rnams kyi yang lha mo'o/ /gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu skyes rang rang
mtshan mas mtshan ma dag gis phan tshun 'khyud/ /mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na ste de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman/ /shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde
bar gnas pa pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan gyis bzhugs/ /nag po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri gri gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum ste/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang

thod pa dag dang kha T+wAM ga ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur/ /mda' dang rdo rje lcags kyu sgra dang bcas pa'i DA ma ru ni g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa yis/ /gzhu dang zhags pa dag dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu
dmar po rnams kyi g.yon na de bzhin nyid/ /ser po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo 'byug pa dang ni 'jigs byed rdo rje rim pas te/ /g.yon du dpal
ldan dung dang lcags sgrog dang ni nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bur 'gyur/ /ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba rnams kyi g.yas na dpal ldan tho ba mdung dang rtse gsum ste/ /
g.yon na pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag dang me lang dang ni bgrang phreng ngo / /ljang khu rnams kyi g.yas su rdo rje gri gug dang ni dgra star rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba ste/ /
g.yon du dril bu dang ni thod pa mtha' dag yon tan gter dang tshangs pa'i gdong pa de nyid do/ /lha mo sngon mo rnams dag gi ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de bzhin du ni rig par
bya| |nag dang dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sa la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ /du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dor nas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma
dag la res 'ga' ni/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur/ /rang gi sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di yang
rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya/ /dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi dkyil 'khor rab tu dman par 'gyur/ /phyi rol tu ni brgyad pa brgyad
kyis pad 'dab brgyad po rnams la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni/ /tsa rtsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma/ /shar gyi pad+ma tsa rtsi ka ste
mer ni mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma/ /gshin rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chur bcas rlung du rdo rje lag dang chu gter gdong ma'o/ /drag mo dpal mo byang dang dbang
ldan du ste mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi sku la 'khyud pa'o/ /brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang pad+ma'i 'dab ma la gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so/ /shar la sogs par dang po'i

phyag gi mthil na gri gug dang ni rtse gsum 'khor lo be con dang / /dbyug ba ral gri dang ni mdung thung lcags kyu dag ni g.yas kyi phyag gi pad+ma thung la'o/ /rdo rje mda' dang pad+ma dang ni dri med glog

mtshungs tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang / /sna tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i DA ma ru dang pad+ma nyid dang bgrang phreng ste/ /g.yon na thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM dang pad+ma

dung dang lcags sgrog drag dang phub dang ni/ /nges par rin po che dang zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrog pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang / /spyi lugs snod dang kha T+wAM ga dang sbrul dang de nas chu las skyes dang
rin po che nyid de/ /pad+ma nor 'dab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma yi phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no/ /'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi mche ba me 'bar gdong ma rlung gi shugs ma dang ni rab gtum
ma| |drag spyan ma dang sna chen ma rnams tsa rtsi ka yi pad+ma nor 'dab la ni phyogs rnams su/ /g.yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan
rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal byed ma/ /brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor 'dab pad+ma la ni khyab 'jug ma yi phyogs kyi char/ /keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i
gdong ma dus kyi lce dang gtsigs ma dang / /nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs can ma rnams nor 'dab pad+ma la ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo la'o/ /pad+ma lus med gzhon nu ma dang ri
dgas bdag pos 'gro ma rin chen phreng ba mig bzang ma/ /rul ma phag mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes 'dab la rgyal po kye/ /rdo rje 'od dang rdo rje lus dang mchog
gi gser ldan ur ba sI dang bkra ba'am ri mo dang / /ri b+hA zug med shin tu sgrol ma pad+ma nor 'dab rdo rje lag ma lhag ba'i lha can la'o/ /sA ba tri dang pad+ma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes

can ma blo dang dag gi dbang phyug ma/ /gA ya trI dang glog nyid dran ma dag kyang pad+ma rig byed gdeng ni lhag pa'i lha can la/ /gau rI gang+gA dang ni rtag ma shin tu mchog tu myur ma to tA lA dang
mtshon byed ma/ /dmar ser nag mo brgyad ni de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o/ /dpal ldan dbang mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma ngang pa'i mdog

dang 'dzin ma dang / /pad+ma'i dbang mo skar mig dri med ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan pad+ma dag la mtshan mar bcas/ /de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i pad+ma la ni lha min g.yo dang gshin rje me dang gdong drug
dang / /gnod sbyin brgya byin chu gter gdong dang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang po khyab 'jug go /ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha yi shing gi me tog dbyug pa ral gri
shag ti dang / /dbyug pa shag ti dag dang mdung dang nor bu dang ni be con rdo rje nyid dang me yi mda'/ khab dang bgrang phreng dag ni phyag gi mthil du 'gyur te rtse gsum pa dang mda' dang zhags

pa dang / /rin chen dgra sta rdo rje dang ni 'khor lo dbyug pa 'phrog byed dag gi g.yas kyi phyag tu 'gyur/ /g.yon du phub dang thod pa dkar po min pa'i nor bu dang ni ut+pa la dang lcags sgrog dang //
zhags pa chu skyes spyi lugs dag ni nges par g.yon gyi phyag tu rim pas 'gyur ro mi yi bdag /rin chen me long dang ni de bzhin ne'u le dang bcas chu skyes rdo rje dril bu gzhu dang ni/ /pad+ma

dang ni spyi blugs sbrul dang gzhu dang de bzhin klu yi zhags pa dag dang rin chen dang / /zhags pa rin po che dang pad+ma skye ba lnga pa'i dung ni lha min dgra bo dag gir 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag la
nag pa sogs kyi nor lag chos rnams lte ba la ni rdzogs pa gnyis/ /mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong dus 'jig rten dag tu lo yi sbyor bas rig par bya/ /sgor ni lha mo shing rta la
gnas ral gri rdo rje 'dzin dang lcags kyu dang bcas mda' yi phyag /dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug pa'i phyag dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang ni mdung
gi phyag /dpal ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phyag na dgra sta phyag na rtse gsum g.yas na ste/ /g.yon gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhags pa de
ni gzhu yi phyag /dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang pad+ma ri bong 'dzin pa me long phyag kyang de bzhin no/ /dpal ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges par phyag na lag 'gro nyid dang kha TAM
g.yo phyag /'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams ni rim pas rig par bya/ /ka ba'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'i phyag dang pad+ma nor bu
dag gi phyag /rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni pad+ma ka rko Ta sogs dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams/ /khyi gdong phag gdong ma dang lce spyang gdong ma nges par g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor
la ni phyogs rnams su/ /stag gdong ma ni byang du gnas te dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas gri gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag /bya rog gdong dang bya rgod gdong dang mkha' 'gro bdag po'i
gdeng dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du'o/ /rdo rje mig dang shin tu sngon mo sa 'og nam mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i skye gnas g.yo ba'i mthar/ /yi drags dmar dang mkha' 'gro'i dbang po

ma he rma bya glang po ba glang dang ni gdong lnga pa/ /rim pas tsA muN+DI la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su 'o/ /lha min la sogs rnams kyi de bzhin nor bdag rtse mo

can dang chu gter rlung dang tshogs kyi ni/ /glang po'i dbang po dang ni lug dang chu srin zhes dang ri dwags dang ni byi ba rim pas so/ /b+he ruN+Da dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang lam gdong ni bya rog gdong la
sogs pa'i zung du ste/ /bse dang dom dang seng+ge g.yag ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogs su rab tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje mig gi rkang pa brgyad pa sa yi shing rta la gnas mkha' la sngon mo'i shing
rta yi| |mkha' ba grong khro ba dang bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa a ni la zhes pa/ /'od zer can dang tsun+dA lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rta rnams la phag dang ni/

rta dang glang po seng+ge bdun gyi grangs su 'gyur te lha dang gshin rje chu dang byang du'o/ /shar du dri dang phreng ba ma ste gshin rje chu la gnas pa spos ma mar me sgeg mo dang / /bzhad ma'o gar ma rol mo
ma ni nor spyi nas gzhi la ste mkha' la glu ma 'dod ma'o/ /snying por brgyad ni kha khyer la ste mkha' dang 'og na gnas pa rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar/ /gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste
gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams ba khyer la/ /dbye ba dang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin rgyas par rengs 'dod ma/ /lha mo sgrol ma la sogs
dag pa yis te srid gsum skyed ma gsod pa dang ni skyed 'dod ma/ /rol mo 'dod ma dang ni rgyan 'dod mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po zas 'dod ma dang de bzhin nyid/
dri 'dod ma dang gos ni 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig pa 'dod ma dag gi drug pa'o/ /lus la 'phrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'dor dang lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang / /gar
'dod ma dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal stan dag la rkyal dang bsnyes par 'dod ma dang / /tsa muN+DI sogs brgyad kyi bya ba rnams te de bzhin sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod ma yang / /kun
gdung dang 'ching 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang skrod 'dod ma/ /reg dang dgug pa dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po phur bu 'debs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar
'gyur| |yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang / /sems can rnams la slu 'dod ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga
pa lhag ma za ba dang / /g.yul 'dod ma dang sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min rigs la 'gyur/ /sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod ma rnams slar yang de nas phyi rol dkyil
'khor dag gi kha khyer la/ /nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems can bya ba rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba 'dir/ /zhes pa de ltar rdor je can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang
dkyil 'khor rnam bar gsungs/ /phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ni spro dang sdud pa dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas/ /de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi
rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mig 'khrul ji bzhin nyid du'o/ /rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems
ni dag pa'i don slad du/ /sgrub thabs dag ni brjod bar bya ste snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub bar bya ba med/ /gang zhig bsgrub bya sgrub pa bo de 'khrul ba zhes pa rdo rje can gyi
sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang / /de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag ni dkyil 'khor dbang po rab tu bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil
'khor sku yi rdo rje'o/ /lha rnams 'khor lo A li kA li'i rigs skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng du'o/ /rtsa ba sdong bu dag ni a yig 'dab ma dag ni de bzhin ge sar rnams kyang u yig

go| |dbus su dpal ldan lte ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnam gnyis rkang pa'i gnas dag ma yig go/ /ho yig thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /de ni shes
rab chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas na/ /lha mo rnams kyis glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po/ /bdag
cag srungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod/ /rdo rje can des glu dag gsan nas srid ba gsum po mtha' dag rnams
kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni/ /gzigs nas skyed pa mdzad de dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang gi mtshan ma spros byas nas/ /rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod
pan shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang | /shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba dag kyang ngo / /'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku ste
rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa dang / /sgra drag sgrog byed nyi ma'i spyan dang gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa/ /shes rab
thabs la rab byung mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas/ /rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa rdo rje shugs te ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du
bskul bar bya/ /dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte bar lcags kyus bsnun byas shing / /phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdengs can dag gi de bzhin rab
bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te/ /mtha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'di ni slar yang 'gro ba ste/ /gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes
pa dang ni ro mnyam byed sa dag ni rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyis byed/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag la sems ni nam mkha' dang bcas snying po'i pad+mar me yi steng du 'gyur/ /shar
du dpal ldan nag mo 'bar ma mchog gi pad+ma la ni lho ru dmar mo 'bar ma ste/ /byang du dpal ldan dkar mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o/ /mer

ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogs su smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan phyogs su mkha' snang ma/ /rlung du dpal ldan mar me ma ste nor bu dang ni shing dang chos kyi gaN+Di dag dang dung / /me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni

'phrog byed phyogs su de bzhin bar gyi zur gyi cha la 'o/ /shar du 'du byed dang ni sa bdag nges par pad+ma la gnas lho ru tshor ba chu dag go/ /byang du 'du shes dang ni me ru 'gyur te nub tu yang ni
rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid do/ /me yi phyogs su rlung dang gzugs su 'gyur te lha min bdag por me dang 'du shes gnyis pa'o/ /dbang ldan du ni chu dang tshor ba dag ste rlung du 'dzin ma
'du byed phung por ldan pa'o/ /lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams su ni le tsha brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro yi bum pa rnams/ /slar yang 'phar ma phyi ma la ni shar du sna dang dri ste lho ru mig dang
gzugs dag 'gro/ /byang du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te chur ni de bzhin nyid du lus dang reg bya dag tu 'gyur/ /sa 'og tu ni rna ba sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lho yi sgo yi g.yon du 'o/ /nam
mkha' la ni nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo yi g.yon du'o/ /dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi
ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur/ /phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ni rab tu gsal bar bdag po rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la'o/ /shar gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te de
yi phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o/ /g.yas su rmugs byed dang ni nga rgyal mar 'gyur nor sbyin du yang khengs byed dang ni rmugs byed ma/ /chu ru rengs byed dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur
sgo yi dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma la'o/ /dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma/ /'dod pa tsun+dA shing rta la gnas
lha dang nor sbyin gzhan dang lho yi sgo yi dbus su ste/ /gnod mdzes drag spyan ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la gtsug tor dang ni shin tu sngon mo nyid/ /shar gyi sgo yi steng dang
gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang / /gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur/ /shar du tsa
muN+DI dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong / /gshin rje phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po 'o/ /nub tu
dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par dus kyi gdod ma dag ni khyab 'jug nyid/ /gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa/ /phyi rol gyi
ni dbang po'i sgo yi g.yas su lha min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur/ /mer ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste me dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g.yas su 'o/ /lha min bdag por dpal ldan

gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha yi/ /rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo 'o/ /dbang ldan du ni tshogs kyi dbang po
gzhon nu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g.yon gyi char/ /drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g.yon du'o/ /de dag rnams kyi phyag rgyar rab grags ri
sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur/ /phyi rol du ni lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste/ /pad+ma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu dag g.yo ba'i
dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni/ /me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs
kyi dbang gis 'jog po dang ni pad+ma chen por 'gyur/ /de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste/ /de rnams thabs ni pad+ma la sogs gzhan gyi
rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur/ /shar gyi 'khor lor rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas khyi gdong
ma| |gshin rje dag tu nges par ro ni sreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rul pa dang bcas par/ /stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du lce spyang dag gi gdong mar 'gyur/
me dang lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzad g.yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas/ /rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar
ni| |'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya/ /g.yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma dag gi
lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o/ /bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni g.yon brkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang zlum pa'o/ /g.yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
g.yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste/ /sa ga la ni sa ga nyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o/ /dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal
zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste/ /rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang pad+ma zla ba'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan gyis gnas/ /gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang
phyogs kyi gzhom par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas/ /lha rnams 'dab mar lha mo rnams ni rol ba'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid/ /g.yas pa bskum
pa dag kyang sa gzhi las ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang pa dag /phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa ste mi yi bdag po de ni g.yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur/ /g.yon pa'i sbyor
ba yis ni g.yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa dag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs/ /yon tan dbang gi bus mo zung ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang ni zlum por 'gyur/ /cung zad
pus mo phyed ni 'khyog pa rol bar 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid/ /slar yang rnal 'byor pa yis b+ha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o/ /cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo
rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams res 'ga' na/ /gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur/ /rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin
dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag /drug gi cod phan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan/ /sa las 'khor
lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las pad+ma dang ni me las nor bu'o/ /rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go/ /gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du
'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mang dang / /drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' zhi bdag las so//
phub dang mdun dang mda' dang dgra sta dang ni DA ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du/ /dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges pa bde bzhin tho ba dang ni rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur/ /
gzhu dang ut+pal dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha T+wAM ga dang dril bu dang / /de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod pa stag lpags dang ni glang po'i pags pa ste/ /'dir ni lhag
ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sa dang chu dang bsreg zla rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa/ /de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o/ /gang zhig la la
sogs pa sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa/ /thad du ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyi rim pas yongs bkod nges par pad+ma la gnas zla ba dang / /nyi
ma'i gdan la gnas pa de dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags/ /gang zhig kho nar mtshan ma drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du med par
'gyur/ /nA da dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur te mi yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje a yig go/ /i yig thung ngur ral gri ldan par 'gyur te slar yang r-i yig dag ni phyag na rin chen no/ /
u yig thung ngu snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni l-i yig rnam par snang mdzad do/ /bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so/ /
dpal ldan yum ni gzhom du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin a yig las skyes nam mkha' khams/ /rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams la ni I r-I U l-I thams cad rim pas gnas par
'gyur| |mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs yum ni bde ba'i don du phan tshun lus dang bsam pa ste/ /mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam
pa'o| |rin chen dbang po mA ma kI dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste/ /de bzhin 'khor lo can dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis thung dang ring ba'i dbyangs
kyis so| |aM yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis a yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'o/ /e yig thung ngu nam mkha'i snying po ar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying
por 'gyur/ /o yig 'jig rten mgon po a yang de bzhin 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o/ /a yig chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te nges par de bzhin AH yig las skyes sgra
yi rdo rje ma/ /ai yig reg bya rdo rje ma ste lus kyi dbye bas Ar yig las skyes ro yi rdo rje ma/ /o yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par de bzhin a yig las skyes dri yi rdo rje ma/ /dpal
ldan bzang po chos kyi dbyings dang phyag na rdo rje dang ni sgra yi rdo rje ma dag zung / /nam mkha'i snying po dri yi rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma dag zung / /sa
yi snying po gzugs kyi rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sel ba dag ni zung du 'gyur/ /de ltar rigs ni drug po rnams dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par bya/ /hi yig
gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni haHyig shin tu sngon mo'o/ /ha yig thung ngu gnod mdzes su 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes drag po'i mig
ma'o| |yaM lAHrim pa rab tu gsal ba shin tu stobs dang rengs byed ma ste gnyis po dag kyang zung / /raM wAHrmug+sa byed dang rgyal ma ste waM dang rAHzhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed
mar 'gyur ro/ /laM yaH rengs byed shin tu brtson 'grus mar 'gyur ya wa ra la dbyug pa sngon po mi g.yo ba/ /'dod pa dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus su 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo
rnams kyi ring po ste/ /yA wA rA la de bzhin glang po rta dang seng+ge dang ni phag gi shing rta dag la 'gyur/ /dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha'
yas lcags sgrog ma/ /'dod pa tsun+dA zung du 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o/ /a yig dag dang aM dang rnam par bcad pa haM dang haHdang ha hA las skyes

nus ma brgyad/ /bum pa rnams la de bzhin ha yig rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar 'gyur/ /oM hUM ho AHdud dang dri med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi gaN+Di 'o/ /ha yig

tsA muN+DI ste haM dang haH zhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo'o/ /hA dang k+Sha k+ShA k+ShAM k+ShaH dbang mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro mtshangs ma dpal mo gzhon nu ma/ /hI hr-I hU h+l-I rgyab tu pad+ma

mchog gi 'dab ma la ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o/ /k+Shi k+Sh+R-I k+ShU k+Sh+l-I de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams de bzhin no/ /shar dang g.yas dang g.yas min
chu dang me dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung gi pad+ma la/ /'dab ma drug la ya sogs dbyangs drug gis phye thung du ring po rnams ni rim par yongs bkod pa/ /hi k+Shi la sogs la mtha' thams
cad nor ni gdengs can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma la/ /rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs tsa muN+DI la sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so/ /taM naH brgya byin chu

gter gdong ste paM maH zhes pa rgya mtsho dang ni dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang / /TaM NaH me dang gzhon nu dag ste tsaM dang nyaHzhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rlung / /kaM ngaHkhyab 'jug dus te
'phrog byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyang saM dang 'dir ni Th+kaHnyid do/ /tsa sogs sde ba dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams ni lha yi pad+ma'i 'dab mar lha mo rnams kyir 'gyur/ /nag pa'i zla ba sogs
kyi tshes rnams dus kyi nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs/ /de nyid la zhon ha yig rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi//
sde bdun brtsegs pa la gnas k+Sha ya ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha min mo rnams kyi/ /shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pas rigs kyi dbang las 'dir ni gang zhig dbus su mngon phyogs
'gyur| |dpal ldan rdo rje can dang kun bzang rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur/ /don yod grub dang nam mkha'i snying po dri med nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snying po yang
dag go/ /phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag med dang 'jig rten mgon/ /dpal ldan yum dang chos kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje dbyings
kyi dbang phyug ma/ /dpal ldan sgrol ma reg bya rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar ro yi rdo rje ma/ /mA ma kI dang gzugs zhes grags par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis spyan ma dri yi
rdo rje ma| |khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun tu bzang po de nyid do/ /gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs dang don yod grub par
rab tu grags/ /rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang ni 'od dpag med/ /rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na
rdo rje dag dang gnod mdzes so/ /mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o/ /rnam par sel dang shin tu brtson 'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang
gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g.yo ba/ /yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid/ /stong par grags pa shin tu sngon mo rlung me chu dang
sa la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang / /rmugs byed ma dang khengs ma rengs byed mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal zhing nges par rab tu grags/ /drag spyan sgra yi rdo rje mar 'gyur rigs

kyi dbang gis lcags sgrog ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma/ /'od zer can dang dri yi rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang tsun+dAr rab grags pa/ /rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yis rdo rje ma dang gzugs
kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes par bya/ /'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid de slar yang shin tu stobs dang bgegs dgrar rab tu grags/ /rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu rab tu

'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni pad+ma'i dgra/ /rlung me chu sa tsa muN+DI dang phag mo dbang phyug ma dang de bzhin dbang mo bzhi pa ste/ /dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g.yo ba 'phrog byed
lha min mer ni gnas pa yang / /tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpag med/ /me dang dpal ldan phyag ni rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don
yod grub pa dang ni de bzhin nyid/ /mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra bor 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bde byed rab tu grags/ /rnam par sel ba gang de brgya byin du
'gyur 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid/ /sa yi snying po gdong drug par 'gyur dpal ldan mkha' snying da nu'i bdag por rab tu grags pa yin/ /dpal ldan phyag na
rdo rje dus su 'gyur te drug pa kun tu bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o/ /rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag rgya ste/ /phyag rgya rig ma la sogs
nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o/ /de dag rnams kyi pad 'dab la ni nor lag chos te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams/ /zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu
'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang / /klu brgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab bdag pad+ma'i 'dab la nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma/ /dpal ldan du ba bya rog gdong
mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu ma/ /mkha' snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong mar rab tu grags/ /nag mo 'bar
ma khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan phag gdong ma/ /dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma lce spyang ma/ /
de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum ni lhag ma'o/ /lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i

sku| |khro bo 'di dbang po byang chub sems dpa' nges par ro yi rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa/ /klu
ni brgyad po rnams dang rab gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku/ /de bzhin slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nag na yang / /
mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu 'gyur/ /ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o//
sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas/ /
phyi rol du ni tsa muN+DI la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku/ /lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdengs can rigs kyang 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /
gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o/ /sku yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad du'o/ /gsung
gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o/ /thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun gyi
don ni byed pa po/ /ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar ba ster ba nyid/ /shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi
zla a sogs ka sogs dang / /rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /rdo rje swA hA'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin
pa snying ga lte ba gsang ba spyi bor te/ /'di dag gis ni byin rlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya/ /stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum
gyi dus dang ye shes mchod pa rjes su chags pa la/ /skyabs su 'gro ba gsum nas sgrub pa pos yis tad swA b+ha ba At+ma ko haM brjod par bya/ /bum par rnams dang du ba la sogs
brgyad po rnams kyis snying gar chos kyi 'khor lor rab tu 'gyur/ /rigs ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo bor rtsibs bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags/ /byang
chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur/ /'jigs ma la sogs nor ni gdengs can dag gis
bsgyur ba rnams kyis lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur/ /lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la lha rnams kyi ni las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa ste/ /klu dang gtum mo mi yi bdag po
rnams kyis sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur/ /dus kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs dbye bas so/ /thugs kyi rnam pa nyi ma ma
yin nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag /rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs rang gi snying ga'i pad+mar rtsa yi 'khor lo la gnas rnams/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis drag
po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud/ /dung dang gaN+DI ma ni ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis/ /bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan
lag gis te rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis/ /'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te/ /gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri
bong can dang stobs khrag bshang ba gci ba rnam par dag pa'o/ /lha mo drug ni khams rnams kyis te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas/ /khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams
kyis te nges par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis/ /tsa muN+DI sogs thun brgyad kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams nyi ma'i dus spyod chu tshod kyis/ /lha min la sogs nyi ma'i
zla bas pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams chu tshod dbus kyi grangs kyis so/ /gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyis klu rnams dang ni gtum mo rnams
kyang rnam par dag /de bzhin 'dod ma la sogs de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya bas rnam par dag /skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag pa spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa
gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs/ /de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyi phyi yi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla
ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba las/ /dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur
te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o/ /longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po/ /bzhi pa'i gnas skabs
shin tu gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa ste/ /de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas/ /sprul par
yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so/ /longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo / /dag
pa la ni bde bar rang 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar/ /de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bye ste 'gyur med don du'o/ /g.yon
du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g.yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa/ /de ni g.yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g.yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las/ /sa
ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang mchog gi rol ba'i stabs dang pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan/ /nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga/ /gtum mo lte

ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsa rtsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan/ /ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa/ /lte bar rnam par snang mdzad
la sogs sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams/ /thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa gang de rdo rje can/ /shes rab chos 'byung
dag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba/ /'dod pa dang ni gzugs
dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum pe dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te/ /phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya/ /zla ba nyi ma a sogs
rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa/ /so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang pad+ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te//
dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum/ /shes rab pad+mar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom
med 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste/ /so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje pad+ma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub
par 'gyur/ /dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa sgom pa sgrub par 'gyur/ /shes rab sbyar la gang tshe 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par
sgrub pa chen por 'gyur/ /dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin/ /de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis
yi ge bgod pa nyid yin te/ /'di ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring po yang / /'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan bsgrub pa'i yan lag
dag la de bzhin nyid/ /so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid do/ /srog rtsol dag kyang ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag
na rin chen no/ /gdol ba mo la rjes su dran pa pad+ma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can/ /re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye
ba'o| |so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o/ /bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g.yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems pa'o/
srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bskyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur/ /thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa
'dzin pa'o/ /gtum mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang
gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin/ /'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs
gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so/ /so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /
mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o/ /srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
mchod/ /bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so/ /rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa
dri med 'od kyis dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /so sor sdud
pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na/ /nA da goms pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par
bya| |bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyis khro bo'i lta bas so/ /bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la
yan lag drug /shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la/ /bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir ni sgrub pa
