chen po la/ /srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste/ /de las steng du 'dod pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i
rgya| |gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyar bar bya/ /phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa
min| |dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste/ /pad+mar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa/ /
bde ba'i sa bon ma lhung pa la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu
gsang ba'o/ /gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi /rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang
gzhan| |de yi yang na nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro/ /de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i pad+ma'i
khongs su gnas pa'o/ /rnal 'byor ba yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsungs te/ /sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni
brdzun du smra ba nyid/ /gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor ba yi bkru bar gsungs/ /thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min
las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o/ /srog gi rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang gtung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o/ /mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems
'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so/ /gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang
de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba/ /bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog pad+ma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang / /'dar dang smyo dang rab
tu rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag /rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du/ /rab tu gsal
zhing nges par de rnams yid srub gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su/ /nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig mA ma kI ste chang ma yin/ /go ku
la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min/ /rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen
pa ste/ /stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin/ /nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul
khrims te/ /bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid/ /bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems
dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad/ /de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so/ /gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi
shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa/ /bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur/ /rengs ba dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig
pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed/ /'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgom pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa

byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang / /ser bas rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o/ /sgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi
yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni/ /'byung ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya/ /phyogs ni lhag pa las byung pung pa dang ni
gser dang mtshungs pa g.yas dang gcig shos dag dang ni/ /phung po'i bdud la glang chen pags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin/ /lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thong
ba rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag /nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya/ /de la yum ni
zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi pad+ma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste/ /nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis
so| |de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid/ /shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i
rab tu rgyu bas so/ /gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtsa ni
zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las/ /sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong ba gcig bu ste/ /thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med
yul ni sgrub pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ /khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa/ /dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal
ba'i bdag po'i cod pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste/ /sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi phags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon cha'i phyag /spyi bor mtha' dag
rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gi phreng ba nges par bcings/ /dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni/ /zhabs
gnyis dag gis 'byung bo'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g.yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas/ /'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed
cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa/ /bsgom na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya/ /klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang
rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas/ /zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi mjug ma yi/ /rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin
gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu spro byed pa/ /de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya/ /zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams
dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur/ /rengs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang
gzhan nor 'phrog dang bsad ba dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang / /sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis/ /zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag
kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs/ /drag po la yang bsam gtan drag po dang ni sbrin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs/ /dbang du bya ba bsam gtan
chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lha ni chags pa'i gzugs/ /rengs pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs
pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs/ /zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbye dang bskrad pa dag kyang rang bzhin yon
tan dbang gis khro bo las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha min rigs la phur bus gdab pa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis/ /
yum dag gis ni las rnams thams cad gnyi ga'i rdo rje'i rigs la bsad pa dang ni gso ba yang / /dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyed ma 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par
bya| |de nas sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gang zhig zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag kyang bsgrub par bya/ /pha dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun tu ni 'jig rten
grags| |de phyir bde mnyam 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa min/ /gtso bo'i thugs kar pad+ma'i dbus su ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi steng du
rdo rje ni| |hUM yig ye shes las skyes 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rtse lnga 'od zer dang bcas dgod par bya/ /de yi dbus su dzaH yig lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams kyis srid pa gsum
po mtha' dag bkang byas nas/ /rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas rdo rje'i lam du rab tu gzhug bya ste/ /thams cad zla ba bzhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi
pad+mar spro bar bya/ /de ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pa ro mnyam dag tu 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab ldan pa/ /de yi dbus su zhi ba la sogs las kyi ye shes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi
dbang gis so/ /de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo'am ni lha yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu ster ba nyid du 'gyur/ /dzaHhUM baM ho rim pas lcags kyu zhes dang rdo rje dang ni rdo rje zhags pa dril bu ste/ /

oM AHhUM ho de bzhin du gsungs zla ba nyi ma rdo rje de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med do/ /I rI U l-I de bzhin nyid du rab gsal ya ra wa la rlung me chu dang sa rnams so/ /haHhUM ha phreM nyi ma dang ni rdo rje
zla ba dag dang gri gug tu yang de bzhin gsungs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su A li kA li dang bcas chu yi sa bon bdag nyid chu skyes te/ /de las rdzogs pa'i lha mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma
ste zung gi phyag gi pad+ma can/ /glang chen dkar po la zhon phyag na chu skyes dkar dang mi 'jigs pa dang gos ni dkar po dang / /dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal ni bsgoms nas
bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya/ /de nas bsgrub bya bzung nas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /gtso bo'i bka' ni rab tu thob nas spyan ma la sogs
rab dgyes rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis/ /bsgrub bya do ni dkru bar byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi nus ma rnams kyis mchod par byed/ /gzugs
la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rab gsal sgeg mo la sogs bcu yis tshim par byed/ /'byung por grags pa rnams kyi 'jigs pa med byed rab mchog rnam bcu khro skyes
rnams kyis skyong bar byed/ /klu mo rnams kyis 'od dag byed cing 'chi med na chung bcu gnyis rnams kyis 'khyud pa dag tu byed/ /gtum mo rnams kyis srung ba byed de mtha' dag sa gzhi dag la zhi
rgyas don gyi slad du'o/ /de ltar bsgrub bya yi ni mchog gi bde ba byed pa thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hrIHste ut+pal kha ma phye ba'i mda' nyid dang ni
i k+Shu'i gzhu/ /de las rdzogs pa nyi ma ltar gsal phyag ni gnyis kas gzhu dang mda' ni rna ba'i bar du bkang / /pad+ma dang ni ri bong 'dzin par g.yon brkyang rta la zhon pa bsgrub bya'i khyim
du bskul bar bya/ /bsgrub bya yi ni snying ga lte ba gsang ba dag dang mgo dang kha la mda' yis bsnun byas shing / /mgrin par gzhu yis bcings nas de yis bskyod pa dag kyang dkyil
'khor du ni khrid par byed pa ste/ /gtum mo rnams kyis gos dang bral ba byas shing klu mo rnams kyis kyang ni nges par dkri ba byas/ /lha mo rnams kyis spyi bor byed cing khro skyes rnams
kyis gtun shing dbyug par bcas pa dag gis bsnun/ /'byung po rnams kyis 'jig par byed cing sgeg mo la sogs rnams kyis kyang ni sen mo rnon po 'debs/ /rdo rje ma rnams kyis ni blo gros
nyams byas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung rnams dag gis bcings/ /nus ma rnams kyis gos bral rgyags pa mtha' dag bcom zhing gtso bo yi ni zhabs la ltung ba byas/ /de ltar dbang du
byas nas slar yang khyab bdag dag gis tshim par byas te der ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin zhags pa lcags kyu dag gis khams gsum po nas dgug pa'i las ni rnam pa mang por
'gyur| |nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshungs hUM yig ring po las skyes ral gri bsgoms byas nas/ /de las byung ba bung ba'i mdog can phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni sdig mdzub zhags

pa'i phyag /rnga mo'i steng du g.yon pa brkyang zhing rab tu khros pa'i zhal ni bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya/ /bsgrub bya zhags pas bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo
ru khrid byas te/ /yaHyig las skyes rnga mo mgyogs pa rlung ltar bgrod pa de la gtso bo'i gsung gis bsgrub bya ni/ /zhon pa rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyid du rang bzhin gyis
ni bskul bar bya/ /de ltar lha yi bdag po dag kyang nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag ni smos ci dgos/ /dbye ba la yang rnga mos dman zhing rtsod mang byas pa dag ni g.yas dang g.yon
du bkri bar bya/ /nyi zla'i dbus su laHzhes bya ba yongs gyur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas/ /de las byung ba'i zhal gcig pa ste mchog gi
gser dang mtshungs pa phyag na lcags sgrog 'khor lo can/ /rus spal la ni lha min gdan gyis gnas shing shin tu dal 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul par bya/ /bsgrub bya 'khor los
'jigs par byas nas sa la rab tu bskyel te lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcings/ /dkyil 'khor du ni kun tu khrid cing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis 'dzin ma la ni bsgyel byas
nas| |de yi steng du bsgrub bya'i lus la lhun po mchog gis gser gyi rang bzhin dgod bya rengs la ste/ /phur bus gdab pa'i don du tshigs drug la ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin phur bu rnams
kyis gdab par bya/ /rmongs pa la yang sprul rnams kyis ni kun tu za bar byed cing sa la 'gyel bar bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug phreM
gyi rang bzhin bsgoms byas nas/ /de las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa phyag na gri gug thod pa can/ /rta yi dgra yi steng du g.yon pas brkyang zhing gos dang
bral bar bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya/ /bsgrub bya skra rnams dag las myur du bzung zhing de yis dkyil 'khor du ni gos kyis dman pa yang / /kun tu khrid de dpal ldan dur khrod
dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang / /lte spyang rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thung sha dang de bzhin du ni khams kun zos/ /de ltar ma lus pa ni
rab mchog sa yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste bsad pa dag la'o/ /bsam gtan 'di yis brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos/ /zhi dang rgyas
pa la yang regs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur/ /dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po lus ni sreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do/ /dbye ba dang
ni bskrad pa la yang 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do/ /rengs pa dang ni phur bus gdab pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no/ /stong pa'i
sa bon la ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang gur 'gyur te bsad dang gso ba dag la'o/ /sa yi zad par kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni/ /nyams pa'i don te me yi
zod par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don te me dag kyang / /nyams pa'i don du chu yi zad par du 'gyur stong pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min la/ /glang po'i bdag po gzhom
ba la ni me yi sa bon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur/ /klu yi dbang po gzhom pa la ni mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur/ /bse dang seng+ge dag la rkang brgyad
'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can/ /rta yi dgra la bse zhes grags pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro bo skyes/ /
khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya/ /phyi nas nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan dpag tu med
pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub par ni srid gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin/ /de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma
rnam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya/ /dpa' bo g.yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur ba zhes pa'am ni de bzhin chom rkun dbyangs pa dag /brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan
mo mi yi bdag po ro bsreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya/ /dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas/ /mgo dang snying ga dang ni
spyi bo lte ba la sogs su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te/ /thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i pad+ma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang / /'dab mar rgyal rnams
mtshan ma phyogs su phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma/ /phyi rol ra khA gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas//
de yi g.yas min du ni yi dwags lag pad ral gri dkyil 'khor lag na g.yas su rkang pa'o/ /sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid srung ba rab byas
nas| |sngags pas thab kyi g.yas su khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa/ /de yi sngags ni oM hriM phreM hUM phaT kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar
ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo byed/ /sbyin sreg rdzogs na ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po
mig gsum pa/ /gang zhig sgra sgrog sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par byed pa de/ /thab kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka ha ka ha dgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i
lus kyis gar byed de/ /de mthong nas ni 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ro sreg gnas su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni
lha min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /g.yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pas 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis
bdag ni grub bo mtha' dag smos shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi/ /de skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya/ /ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang
po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ril bu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang / /rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod kyis bdag la
stsol| |dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid dang rengs pa dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang / /bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams cad
bdag gis bgyi'o smra/ /'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs nas mi yi bdag po sgrub pa po ni sa 'og dag dang bar snang dang / /lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang
yin der 'gro ste/ /de la zhon pa phyag na ral gri thogs bas sa yi steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed/ /de phyir sems can don gyi slad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po

bsgrub par bya/ /ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o/ /gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yi ge thams cad de las lhag pa dag kyang sku yi rdo rje ste/ /de las yan
lag so so yan lag so so'i sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te bklags pas grub pa brgya lam na/ /bsgom bya mchod bya bzla bya rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku
yi dbye bas so/ /so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o/ /sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis grub par
'gyur ba ji srid nyid/ /phyi nas zhi ba la sogs rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs nges
ldan rnams kyis sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya/ /grub pa lcags gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha yi ril bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ster/ /khyi dang rta la sogs pa'i
sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres skom la sogs nad rnams 'phrog par byed/ /de dag rnams kyi mig dang mkhris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig smen sa ni rab 'phyed dang / /mi
snang ba dang dbang du bya ba na chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur khrod du ni bsgrubs pa'o/ /nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang na ma nu'i nyin zhag la ni dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas//
srung ba dag kyang kun nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi ril bu dag gam mig sman ni/ /byas nas shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod de sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /
ji srid mkha' la nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te de nas blangs la gzung bar bya/ /'tsho bar pho nya de ni 'tsho la nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas na sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur/ /pho
nya'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod/ /pho nya sprul la sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur/ /
gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung pa la ni dge min 'gyur/ /pho nya'i rkang pa g.yon pa mdun nan chung mar brjod g.yas pa mdun
du yin na skyes pa'o/ /lag pas rang gi yan lag la gang du reg pa'i phyogs 'dir mi de so yis zin pa ste/ /mig dang kha ni rab tu gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtsa bar nag po yang
ni 'chi bar brjod/ /gal te snying ga'i pad+ma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur na de ni rab tu bsdu bar bya/ /dang por srung ba'i cho ga so yis zin pa dang ni bdag nyid la yang bde ba byed par 'gyur
sa chu me rlung de bzhin nam mkha' dag kyang mthe bod la sogs la ni nges par sbyar bar bya/ /la la sogs pa ha yi mtha' rnams rim pas brla dang lto ba snying ga kha nang dpral ba la/ /
hUM k+ShU h+ya h+yA la sogs klu bcu mi mnyam mnyam pa thung du ring po'i rab tu dbye ba yis/ /g.yon gyi lus la sa bon thung du rna ba mgrin pa la gnas mchan khung dku dang brla phyogs la/ /
g.yas kyi lus la gdengs can rnams kyi ring po nyid du rab 'gyur spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye bas so/ /rgyal ba zhes grags sor mo shin tu mnyam pa'i 'dam bu sprul gyi sa bon ldan bas
bsrungs byas nas/ /hUM k+ShUM ldan pas snying gar shin tu bsnun na myur du so yis zin pa skyod par byed par 'gyur/ /sa yi sa bon dpral ba la ste mkha' skyes rkang par gnas pas
myur du rengs par byed par 'gyur/ /spyi bor chu dang rtse mo can ni lto bar rab tu bcug na dug ni med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dpral bar rlung gi sa bon dang ni snying gar rtse mo can gyis nges par
dug ni 'pho ba ste/ /spyi bor stong ba rab tu zhugs shing sa ni rkang par gnas la nges par dug ni gcod par byed/ /dpral bar thig le dkar po yis ni rnam pa gsum gyi dug kyang nges
par dug ni med par byed/ /dmar pos bskyod cing nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas 'jug pa dag ni kha dog ser pos rengs par byed/ /tsha ba gsum po sbyar ba'i sdong bu srog ni rab tu 'bab par

dug med byed la sbyar byas te/ /yang na kha ni rnam par phye ba'i lce'u chung la sor mo yis ni TaM ga Na sbyar bya/ /dzA ti badzri gzhon nu tsha ba gsum dang lan tshwa lang+ga lI dang de ba dA li dang / /bra h+mI k+ShU ro a

shwa gan+d+ha nyin mor byed pa dang bcas ban+d+ha ka rko Ta ki dang / /bshad ba sha dang khu ba khrag ni mnyam pa dag kyang mi bskyod pas btags ril bu byas pa ni/ /sna ru bkod pas 'byung po 'am ni 'byung
po'i rims dang brtan dang lto 'gro'i dug ni nges par 'joms/ /nyi ma la sogs gza' bdun dag ni nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus te bdun gyi cha yi mtha' ru ni/ /spen pa nyi ma'i dbus su stong pa rigs
ldan ma dag 'chi gzugs chu tshod phyed ni rab tu rgyu/ /de la klu dang rtse bar mi bya rnam pa gsum po dag gi dug kyang bza' bar mi bya ste/ /de nyid la ni sprul gyis sos zin 'byung pos btab dang
mtshon gyis phug pa gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro/ /nyi ma gung dang mtshon mo phyed la nyin mtshan dus su rtag tu rgyu ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang / /tho rangs dag dang nyi ma nub pa la
yang de bzhin du ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi chu tshod de/ /thun mtshams dbus su stong pa chu gter dag la rigs ldan dus kyis sos zin chu tshod gcig rab rgyu/ /'di dag sgra gcan gdong pa rnams
su nyin zhag so so'i dus su yang dag par ni rig par bya/ /nyi ma la ni mtha' yas longs spyod nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyin mo'i dang po'i cha la'o/ /phyi nas lhag ma can te 'dir ni
lto 'phye rnams dag gza' bdun rab tu dbye bas 'char bar 'gyur/ /mkha' dus mkha' dang bug pa mkha' mda' mkha' dus mkha' nor mkha' ri mkha' me dag gi chu tshod
rnams| |nyi ma la sogs las kyang gdengs can nor rnams dag gi longs spyod longs spyod dbye bas dug tu 'gyur/ /mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa bram ze kha ba'i mdog ste nor
rgyas bu dang dung skyong rgyal rigs dmar/ /pad+ma chen po dang ni de bzhin nyid du 'jog po rje rigs mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dmangs rigs sprin nag dang
mtshungs mthar skyes dag ni kha dog sna tshogs so/ /de dag rnams kyi skye gnas dag kyang chu dang rtse mo can dang 'dzin ma rlung dang nam mkha'i khams/ /mkha' lding zhes pa rkang pa nas ni dbyi
mthar ser po de bzhin lte ba'i mtshams su kha ba'i mdog /mgrin pa'i bar du kha dog dmar po sprin nag dang mtshungs smin ma'i 'khri shing ji srid nyid du ste/ /de phyir nges par kha dog sna tshogs
gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa de nyid lnga yis rgyas btab pa/ /bsgom na de yi phyag rgyas gdengs can dug dang 'byung po'i nad la sogs pa dag kyang nges par 'phrog /rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma
dag la nyi ma'i steng du k+ShiM gi yi ge 'dab chags mgon po ni/ /klu yi rgyan dang ldan zhing mtha' dag rigs kyi dbang gis kha dog lnga rnams 'phro ba bsgom par bya/ /de nas 'dab chags
mgon po'i sngags ni dang por oM yig dag dang pak+Shi swAhA'i mtha' can te/ /de ni bye ba phrag gcig bzlas nas gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i 'dab chags mgon po bsgrub par bya/ /mkha'
lding grub na gdengs can dbang po rnams dang gdengs can bdag po'i bu rnams mngag gzhug nyid du 'gyur/ /rab mchog sa yi steng du 'byung po gnod sbyin gdon rnams dag dang mkha' 'gro
ma dang ma mo rnams/ /sngags kyis dgug par rab tu 'gyur te gdon gyi tshogs pa mtha' dag dus kyi sos zin rjod par byed/ /de phyir sems can don gyi slad du dang por mi rnams kyis
ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya/ /rig byed dang ni 'dab brgyad nyid dang mi yi bdag po so dang chu gter drug dang gnyis skyes la/ /snying por bsgrub bya rang gi phyogs su dang por aM a
zung ste i la sogs pa 'dab brgyad la/ /e ya la sogs bcu drug la ste ka sogs gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu dang ha k+Sha gnyis skyes la/ /thun
mtshams 'dab ma rnams la bsgrub bya tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams/ /A sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu srin bum pa'i dbang las
ring po thung du dag kyang lnga/ /phyi rol 'dab ma sum cu gnyis la bdag gi dang po badzra tIk+Sha la sogs yi ge rnams/ /de dag rnams kyi phyi rol tu yang zhi sogs las la wa ya ral
dkyil 'khor rnams nyid do/ /snying por yi ge yan lag mchog dang rtse mo can dang g.yo bar rkang pa dbang dang dgug pa la/ /zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni me dang rlung du mgo
bo sngags pas bri bar bya/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa srid pa gzhom ba dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang / /rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su 'khor lo
'di ni byed de 'dir/ /sngar brjod bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyi dang por badzra tIk+Sha la sogs sngags chen bsgrub par bya/ /rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bcu gnyis
rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsibs la bar du yang / /bsgrub bya zur rnams su ste dbus su rab 'gyur ya ma rA dzA sa do me ru Na las yo/ /de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyis dbus nas da ni ra ya k+She

ts+tsha de nas mthar ni ni ru 'gyur/ /de yi phyi rol oM hrIM Sh+TIM dang pi kri tA na na las rnam gnyis hUM dang phaT du 'gyur/ /re mig nas ni re mig par la 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsgrub bya'i ming dang sngags

'di'o| |dbye dang bsad dang dbang la ya ma rA ni rab tu 'gyur te k+She da me do sa tsa sogs/ /rengs dang dgug dang rmongs pa dang ni stobs ni byed pa dag dang zhi ba dang ni bskrad pa la/ /der ni snying po
dag nas ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin/ /yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyi 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur/ /yi ge rnams
kyi sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa hAM dang saM du gsungs/ /thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag gis shes rab yi ge u ru 'gyur/ /maM muHhaM

suHmany+dzuHnyid ni pad+ma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la/ /phyi rol tu shrI badzra g+ho ShaHsa dang ldan pa'i man+ta b+ha dra hUM dang phaT du 'gyur/ /bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod
cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul/ /de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnam dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin las rgyal
ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyi sa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgra ni gang zhig snying ga'i phyogs na yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi ni rna ba'i bu gas thos gyur pa/ /de la mi yi sems ni gcig
tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro ni mnyam par 'gyur pa ste/ /'jig rten kun tu sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa da dang de ni de bzhin thos/ /khyab
bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /skyil krung bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis/ /phyi
rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa yis/ /kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag
'gog /dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo / /kha yang bkab ste sna yi bu ga rnam pa gnyi ga dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung
ni ma lus pa/ /srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar byas pa/ /dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su
ro ni mnyam par 'gyur/ /lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster/ /nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyid 'od la gnas rang gi gri ba
ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta/ /phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtag na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la
gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong / /yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i phreng ba bsgoms pas so/ /nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas
gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba/ /de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang / /'khor lo nas
ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsal bskyod/ /ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni pags pa dag la khab bzhin
reg /de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi btsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya/ /zung gi rlung dag 'gag pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi
sna tshogs yum/ /phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te/ /'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i
'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed/ /phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi/ /sems dang sems byung la ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i
gzugs kyi de ni gcig pu'o/ /snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya btang bya ste/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang
chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med/ /rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs
par gnas/ /ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa bsgom par bya/ /srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de
bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de/ /sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'gyur med dang bral
mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa/ /de na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan/ /ba lang bes rta glang po'i
mgon song mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni/ /bde bar gzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'geg pa ste/ /bslab ldan
rnams kyi ba glang pags par so ma ba l+la'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par gyur pa gang / /de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi b+ha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs
tshangs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed ngag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum/ /oM yig de dag yi ge gsum ste zla nyi bsreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan rtse
gsum mo/ /rigs can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon tan la gnas srid srung na da'i gzugs can te/ /de yi dbus su gzhom med gang de yul dang rnam par bral zhing yon
tan med pa'i 'gyur med do/ /rig byed mtha' las gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod de/ /dus kyis shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis
'dir ni srog chags rnams la gsod pa dag kyang bstan/ /mi rnams mtho ris don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur/ /sol ba'o ma'i rgyun gyis
mngon par bkrus pa 'dir ni zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin/ /sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed tshig ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba dag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang / /de rnams
gzhan gyi bu ni mi bskyed don du nyin mtshan dus su rang gi bud med bsrungs byas nas/ /bu yis byin pa dag kyang yi dwags kyi ni 'jig rten du song ba yi sbyin par 'gyur ro la/ /des na bde
mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas/ /gal te rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes bu gzhan du gyur pa na/ /dpal
yang 'di yi mthu las slar yang 'gyur te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma yin/ /gang gis chags pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang rang bud
med dag ni srung bar byed/ /shi bar gyur na khyod su khyod kyi rang gi bud med su ste kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings/ /ba lang sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin pa de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi
'jig rten du ni longs spyod ster/ /sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dang ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog/ /'dod pa'i sbyin pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam
'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /yid 'ong chung ma sring mo skal bzang bu mo rnams kyang gsang ba sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin bya/ /smad tshong dam pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag
rgyar 'gyur zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan gyi bud med dam tshig ste/ /rang dbang chos kyi phyag rgya yul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye shes phyag rgya'o/ /smad tshong dam pa bcu gnyis
lo lon mchog gi bde ba la dga' gzhan gyi bud med bcu drug lo/ /rang dbang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum cu'i lo ru 'gyur/ /sngon che sangs rgyas rnams
kyis 'dzin me dang ni glang chen rta dang shing rta du ma gser gyi khur/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin/ /'di rnams
kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du ma gyur de nas 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rab tu byin/ /gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba skyes byed rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs/ /
zangs ma yis ni gser dang mtshungs shing 'ching bu dum bus lha yi cod pan nor bu dag dang mtshungs/ /smad tshong dam pa'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bum pags pa
dum bu gla rtsi ste/ /bong bu yis ni rigs kyi rta dang ra yis rab mchog glang chen bdag po gal te rnyed pa na/ /chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la lha mo de la 'di ni rnyed pa cis ma
yin| |byams pa'i gnas la sbyin pa dag ni bde mnyam 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshungs pa'i mthu las te/ /ltos pa dang bcas gnas la de bzhin rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs
la sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin phyir/ /snying rje dga' dang bcas pa'i gnas ni zung la gzhan gyi don du bde bar gshegs pa pa rnams kyis/ /rab tu byin na dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid
phyir na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad bde 'bras ster/ /gangs la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi yi bdag po rig byed dag ni tshad mar 'gyur/ /gang la rig byed tshad mar gyur pa
de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas su mchod sbyin tshad ma ste/ /gang la mchod sbyin tshad ma de la rnam mang phyugs dang mi rnams dag la 'tshe ba tshad mar 'gyur/ /gang la 'tshe ba tshad mar gyur
pa de la dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sdig pa tshad ma'o/ /gnas ni 'dzin pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi rab
gnas bzhed par gsungs/ /de la sman dang kha zas sbyin par nad ni zhi bar byed pa sbyin pa po yis sbyin no zer/ /sbyin pa med na gtsug lag khang 'dis yi steng gi gnas su dud 'gro
rnams kyi gnas su ste/ /gang du dge 'dun gcig ni 'dzin par gyur pa de ni mi yi bdag po chos dang sangs rgyas kyang / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i
slad du skyabs su nye bar 'gro ba ste/ /'dir ni sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa 'di dang yi ge bris ba'i glegs bam chos nyid dang / /dge 'dun dur smrig 'dzin pa mchog
gi khyab bdag bde ba skye ba 'bum phrag rnams kyis ster ba min/ /slob dpon dag ni sangs rgyas nyid de rab mchog sa yi gzhi la chos ni de yi bstan pa'o/ /dge 'dun gang zhig
der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang sems can kun la rjes su brtse ba ste/ /de 'dir rnam bzhi rnam pa gnyis gsungs 'dir ni slar yang nyan thos pa dang bla na med pa'o/ /
dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma/ /rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa rnams lhan skyes bde ba la dga' dge bsnyen
ma dang dge bsnyen yang / /bsod nams ye shes don gyi slad du rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /nyan thos rnams la mchod ston la sogs rnal 'byor ba la mchog
gi bde byed 'dod pa'i sbyin pa yang / /sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang dus kun tu ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa/ /de dag bsod nams ye shes rdzogs te
mchog gi bde ba'i gnas su skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /slob dpon dang ni rgyal ba la yang mkhas pa min pa'i nyan thos gang dag gsal bar smod byed pa/ /de dag bgegs kyi mgon po
bsad de mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i mnar med du ni myur du 'gro /gang la rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag pos sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa mdzad/ /mi rnams dag
las dge slong su zhig brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs/ /mchog gi bde ba la dga' dge slong dag gam kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlum ral pa can/ /thos
dang klog pa la dga' mkhas pa la ma nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang / /'dir ni rtag tu rang gzhan bu dang chung mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang /
rigs dang rigs ni min pa la dga' snod dang snod min dag tu zhen pas dga' ba byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde mnyam 'bras ster lus dang ngag dang yid
dang chags pa ste/ /'di dag kun tu bor nas sdig pa'i blo yis khyab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshol byed de/ /zhi dang 'jug ngogs yul gzhan dag
tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgya dang smyang gnas ri las mchong ba dang / /g.yul dang nyi ma gza' yis zin la yul gyi bde 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchong bas so/ /bdud rnams dag
gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bkod pa ste/ /'jug ngogs smyung gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g.yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyi ma ni/ /grol
ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shi ba mtho ris so/ /de yi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin/ /gang
zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang / /slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te/ /
gang na khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun tu rgyu bar byed/ /de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya bar mi
'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang / /bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang
stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi/ /sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste/ /gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching
ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro/ /sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin tu g.yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag /bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo yis dkigs pa'i yan
lag bzhi ldan g.yul du rab tu zhugs pa na/ /glang chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigs pas de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa/ /de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba
ma yin ji ltar de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o/ /sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya/ /rang byin brlabs pas
lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang / /dag pa'i rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis
so| |ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o/ /me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba
med| |ma bcings na ni gser byed med de gser dang bral na smra bo rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid/ /de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sems ni
'ching mi 'gyur/ /bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med de ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min/ /skyed mos tshal lam ri bo dag ni skye bo ri dwags
bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ /drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang / /dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog
gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la/ /gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng
dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni/ /ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa rjod par byed/ /gnas dang
stong pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid/ /rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin/ /
bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang / /sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams
spyan drang bskul ba med par yang / /bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su
rnal 'byor pa yis thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya/ /rang gi sems ni brgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur/ /sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal
bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin/ /dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la bde mnyam ster ba min/ /gang zhig mkha' ye shes
rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster/ /oM AHhUM ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs par bya/ /rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri
bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgoms par byas nas ni/ /snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la/ /phyi rol tu ni zur gsum byas nas de yi
dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o/ /de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas/ /mthe bong dang ni ming med dag
gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya/ /yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te/ /'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis
dang slar yang sngags pas khro bo'i rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o/ /pho nya mo rnams dag la zas kyi phud ni sa steng rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyi sbyin/ /'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma sla
yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklag go/ /mgo dang mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje rnams kyi yan lag dgod/ /
gnyis ka'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la/ /lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa
gnyis su 'gyur ba ste/ /mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin
de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang / /de ni ri me sogs la blta bya yongs su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi sgom pa'i don/ /gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang
por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba dag gi rang sems ma tshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur pa/ /lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges
pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par gyur gyi bar/ /de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad
las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la gsungs/ /byis pa rnams ni smin par byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gi sna tshogs gtso bos sbas/ /de phyir de ni
dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ /dpal dang
po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig
khyod kyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes/ /slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang / /sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma
rnams dag gi rigs drug A li kA li dag la gnas pa nyid/ /zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs/ /
ka ba rnams dang rdo rje phreng bas yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod/ /sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab
pa ste| |mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyi chu skyes rnams/ /rab lnga yi re khA sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis
so| |dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g.yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs pags pa la sogs kyis/ /nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so yi phreng
bas de bzhin nyid/ /dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis/ /ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce
dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral dag la gnas/ /de ltar nges par sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs/ /gsung gi
rdo rje a sogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis/ /stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid/ /de
bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no/ /sde pa ka la sogs pa drug po rim pas yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa
yis| |rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste/ /slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis

dbye/ /so sor yi ge'i dbye ba la sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po dag las so/ /dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba dag kyang nga nya Na ma na dang na \u0f88\u0f90 dang dang po'i dbyangs//

rlung gi dbye ba i yig g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha d+ha sha rnams te me yi dbye ba r-i la sogs/ /chu yi dbye ba u yig \u0f89\u0fa4 kha tsha Tha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba l-i la sogs/ /de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i
rigs ni rnam pa lang yis ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye/ /gtsug tor stong pa la lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje 'o/ /a sogs phyag rgya'i
rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams/ /'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jigs rten 'das pa'o/ /rig sngags
'chang gis dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnams so/ /ka sogs yi ge sum cu ha ya ra wa lar ldan k+Sha dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa drug nyid/ /
dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur/ /sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gis 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab
dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur/ /lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu dag nyid/ /dbyangs kyi grangs kyis bdag nyid bcu gsum
dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum cu rtsa drug bdag nyid de/ /ya la sogs pa rnams kyis sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so/ /khro bo drug
tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis/ /so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal
'byor rgyud/ /de bzhin yi ge so so ra yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste/ /phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas
mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyar bar bya/ /stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams rgya yis gdab pa ste/ /gtsug tor nas ni chu skyes
mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o/ /rdo rje rnams kyi zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis/ /de nyid
rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis/ /sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can/ /yi ge so so'i
ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams dag gi'o/ /sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur/ /phung po rnams
kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang / /bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag
nyid kyang / /de bzhin so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams dag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can/ /dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar pad+ma'i mtshan

ma 'od dpag med/ /nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma snga ma kI dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma/ /drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang
'ug par bcas// 'di dag dpal ldan g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o/ /chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol ma

dang / /mkha' yi snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsa rtsi ka dang lcags sgrog ma/ /bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi gdong ma dang bya rog bcas/ /
de dag nges par byams pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char kha dang mtshungs rin chen 'dzin dang
gos dkar mo/ /sa yi snying po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug me yi lha/ /gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong ma
dang bya rgod bcas/ /'di dag dpal ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o/ /lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i
thub pa phyag na 'khor lo dang / /spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ma rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dri yi rdo rje ma/ /'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje rigs klu
la sogs pa kun/ /gtso bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa'o/ /gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni
phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te nam mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan/ /gsang bar dag
pa las ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang / /steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o/ /phyogs
kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste/ nyi ma'i steng du g.yon brgyad u ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnan zhing 'jig pa'i dus kyi
sprin dang mtshungs/ /thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka /phyag rgya sprul dang stag gi pags pa mi bzad glang po'i bdag po'i pags
pa bshus pa rlon pa 'dzin/ /nag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyi phyi rol tu ni 'khor lo gsum/ /rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de
bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis/ /sgor ni gtum mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje DA ma ru dang

dril bu rdo rje kha T+wAM ga /dpal ldan dang po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te/ /zhing dang tshan+do ha ngang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod sa ni me dang rlung
gi dbus su yang / /de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste/ /shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas sher

gyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ /snying por 'khor lo cha dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi pad+ma la/ /rdo rje ka ba'i phreng ba dag gis spras pa yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen
po| |phyi rol tu ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas/ /sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun nas so/ /'di le
sogs pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste/ /zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can dzaM b+ha la ni phyag na so ba bsnams/ /ngag dang
rkang lag bshang lem b+ha ga nyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyir tsa yi rang bzhin te/ /shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ /snying por
'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil 'khor las ni gsum gyi cha/ /phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad/ /phyi rol
tu gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te/ /der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis snan byang chub
sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las/ /rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blon po'i snying gi
dbang gis g.yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir na nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis/ /'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi
bdag dur khrod sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ /thig ni drug dang bug pa'i cha shas g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab nas/ /snying
po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab ma phyed kyis lte bar ldan pa yang / /gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis/ /nyi ma
rnams kyi sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni do shal sa/ /gsum gyis kyang ni ra ba lnga yi re khA rtse mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar snam bu'o/ /nyi ma rnams kyis
logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so/ /phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o/ /dbus
su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi ma ri bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan/ /'khor lo dang ni phreng ba sngon pos ni ljang gu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser/ /sa bzhi dmar la 'khor
lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang / /sa ni ser po sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang gu'i mdog tu 'gyur/ /cha drug gis ni tshon gyis

skyed byed zhal yig dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no/ /phyi rol tu ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad/ /'dab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang

ldan pa brgyad de 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams/ /phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad/ /de yi phyi rol tu ni sa chu me dang g.yo ba'i dkyil

'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ /ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa Ta tso ka sa sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams/ /rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis ring pos

sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams/ /steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gyis thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi steng du'o/ /sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha k+Sha dang ldan nam mkha'i mthil na
gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po ri bong 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag na gri gug thod pa can/ /g.yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang snod rnams kyis ni lha
min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang bral ba ste/ rkang ba rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g.yer kha sogs dang rus pa'i rgya/ /mgo dang rked pa'i ngos

la thod pa'i du ma bu rgyal po rnams kyi kha dog lnga yi phed ba'o/ /mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje mchog dang DA ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dril bu/ /mgrin pa dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bor
cod pa na yang rdo rje dbyangs dang ni nor bu'o/ /dpal ldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang ni ska rags dag dang rna rgyan te/ /rdzogs pa'i thod pa rnams kyis
phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya/ /gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi phreng ba'o/ /zla phyed rdo rje'i cod
pan la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i bags pa'o/ /zla nyi bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya klu
yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma la 'od dag byed/ /phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa DA ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid de/ /bshad gcog
khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag na'o/ /de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyi ga bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /ser dang
dkar po dam ra po'i mdogs dang nag po ljang gu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su/ /rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi
chogs/ /phan chun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang rang gzhan rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so/ /sbyin pa sogs dang phung po 'byung pa yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa
dang / /phyogs sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya/ /lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyi phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang

nye ba'i gnas kun dang / /zhi dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams su ste/ /'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang / nus

dang gtso bo'i nyin gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las/ /rgyab tu lha mo dbang phyed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te/ /rlung dang dbang ldan lha
min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang / /gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lta ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
'og dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis par/ /gtso bo'i chu skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas pa/ /kun nas dga' ba thams
cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas te dus ni thams cad do/ /zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal te ru ni gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de/ /bdud rnams kyi ni
dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di dag go/ /shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i
ming / /rdo rje gsum pe rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang tha mar phye ba bzlas bya ste/ /srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi
rjes mthun pa'o/ /ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas
ro dang mdar gyur pa/ /de brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams/ /rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag

na gri gug dang ni thod pa can/ /bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ /lnga gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams
chu gter rkang pa las/ /gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams/ /nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan
ni gzhan rnams te/ /'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnams so/ /zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma sgo bzhi zur gyi ro
rnams te/ /slar yang rkang pa nyis 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid/ /rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa
gdan rnams te/ nyi ma 'am ni gang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la/ /rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon tan gzhan gyi dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni
gnyis pa'o/ /rtse me can la gzugs dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gdab zhal ni gsum pa'o/ /chu la zhal yang reg bya dang ni gzugs dang ro yi zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni bzhi

pa'o| |sa la dri la sogs pa rag bya'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni lnga pa'o/ /nam kha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnams la lnga ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o/ /de bzhin du ni ye
shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams so/ /gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga/ /shes rab thabs ni
zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi/ /thun mtshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum/ /dus sbyor phyed
pa phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni/ /thun mtshams cha bshas snga phyi las te zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni 'khyud pa dbu ma'o cha
shas la| |shes rab sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs pa dag kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams la'o/ /shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor
lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug /rdo rje can gyi g.yon mdun yang lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o/ /mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba g.yon
dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /drag po g.yas dang rgya ba kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas bye ba de bzhi nyid/ /shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab
mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kye rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid do/ /g.yas dang g.yas min nyi ma dang ni
bod can gyi sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang / /nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang gu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas/ /dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar mo
dmar po rnams kyi ri bong 'jin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid/ /ser po rnams kyi kha dog nag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o/ /sngon po rnams kyi kha
dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang gu rnams kyi sngon po rnams su de bzhin gsungs/ /de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya/ /shes rab rgyud
ni sha nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon gyi zhal nas sa bya ba la sogs so/ /shar nas
rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dag go //mdo ste pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal nas dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o/ /nub kyi zhal nas
nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i rigs la srid srung shar gyi zhal nas so/ /
shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud/ /g.yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char kha dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab
'jug chos/ /rgyab nas 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba' zhal nas g.yon gyi lta dang rab tu gnas pa ste/ /g.yas nas rig pa drag po min dang slar yang rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs
pa zhi ba dag /stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros/ /rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod dus rgyab kyi zhal la
sogs pa'i dbye ba las/ /de bzhin dpa' bo'i rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i dgrod pa'i dbang gis thu mtshams bzhi po nyid dag dang / /kha zas dag ni g.yas
kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal nas spros pa ste/ /mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrig pa nyid do mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po la rmi lam dag dang gnyid/ /rgyab nas
rje rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i bdag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos
bkur ba'o/ /rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g.yon gyi zhal nas so/ /mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni
nges par spros/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas 'byung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams/ /mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang snying ga'i 'khor lo nas
'gyur rgyab zhal lte ba'i 'khor lo nas/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g.yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas/ /'khor lo rnams kyi zhal gyi dbus
nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid du 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal ba skyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dag go/ dpal ldan zla ba zla ba chu shel
rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba/ /de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la rten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste/ /chu ni sa bon khams la kun tu brten
nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid du chos dag ni/ /sems can rnams kyi ngag pa'i sems kyi rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so/ /srid gsum gnas na sems can don gyi
byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med/ /sems lag nas de mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon

min mi dge ba dang dge pa'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu spyod/ /sems ni dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/ /gang gis myu gu 'di bskyed skyed par

byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur/ /nyas pa de yis skyes pa rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon rgyal po dag gi skyed byed do/ /snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i
tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min/ /gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bde nas bde la rjes chags skad cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po
gzhan la rjes su chags pa min/ /phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste/ /dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang
de las rnam par dag pa'o/ /dag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro
ste phra rab dag ni rnams pa drug /dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing yul dang rnam par bral ba tha ma ye shes blta bya rnams/ /'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang
ri bong can te tha ma chos kyi dbyings/ /rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o/ /slar yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos
po dag la chung ba'i dngos rnams gnas/ /phan tshun phung po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa/ /phan tshun rjes chags ldan ri yi 'gro rnams la
gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gis/ /rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi dga' mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas/ /de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo
rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul la pa'i sku/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa lta min dang ni mi rnams dang / /longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs
can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis/ /stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad bar ste/ /
me yi cha bshas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis/ /'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par chogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang
bzhin kun/ /kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed/ /de ltar sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'chi
bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de gcig pu las rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di/ /rnam par nyi shI rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i
rang gi ngo bo'o/ /de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min/ /'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su
rab tu zhugs pa la'o/ /mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang na mkha' la sogs khams rnams dang / /gnas dang skyes dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes
pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems can kun/ /sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan bya chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te/ /'di dag rnams ni srid pa
gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin no/ /spu dang pags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang ni rkang dang rtsa/ /de dag rnams la srog
sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o/ /zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste//
de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom med do/ /spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhigs bcur
gsungs pa rnams/ /sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster/ /de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ba rnams
kyis ni thar pa'i slad du btsal bar bya/ /lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min/ /sems can rnams ni sangs
rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin/ /de rnams mnyes par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod de rnam par mi rtog pa las so/ /rnal 'byor
pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba du 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de phyir sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o/ /sems
can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs sems su 'gyur/ /mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe sdang chags sogs sems
su 'gyur/ /dus kun tu ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smon pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad
dus su bdud kyi sems/ /srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed/ /bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog tu 'jigs
byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /bdud rnams kyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyo ba pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug /de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni
srid pa gsum po mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin/ /sangs rgyas
rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gis khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med de/ /las kyis ra ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes mthun tshad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar
byed/ /gal te tshad 'di dag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur/ /gang gis rgyal ba'i dbang po bskyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis
mngal nas nges par 'byung / /skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral ba grub cing g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa
gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa/ /de yi bskal pa byed pa du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba dag kyang ring / /nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min
te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pas shing las 'dam skyes dang / /stong pa las ni myang 'das pa des mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams/ /mchod sbyin
dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang dbang po rnams ni 'gog las min/ /rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba
ma dag sems las min/ /sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ /bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde
ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa//
de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su de dag rnams la dum yis ni bgegs rnams byed/ /rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel pa'i don slad dang por las kyi phyag rgya bstan par
bya| |de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dag pa brdzong dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste/ /glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes mthun 'pho med bde ba skyed par byed ma mchan nyid
yan lag rab tu rdzogs/ /rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus chos kyi dbyings ni de nas 'gyur/ /'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams
grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang / /mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang ba thams cad du ni dus kun tu/ /shin tu dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las
rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing / /lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ /rlung ni yang dag phrad pa
rnams kyis glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed/ /thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di las mgrin pa snying ga la son lte ba gsang ba dag la 'gog /thig le las ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo
rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'god pa gang / /de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde ster na'o/ /de phyir g.yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan cig
skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis ster byed do/ /srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas/ /rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid
gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba 'di las te/ /gal te lam du rab zhugs 'chi bar 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan la'o/ /gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chung yul
dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis/ /de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis/ /nag dang
dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon tan la dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te/ /brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi
lo| |rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog skyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya/ /rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil
'khor bzhengs byas nas/ /sangs rgyas byin rlabs sngags rnams kyis ni gsang ba'i pad+mar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste/ /gsang bar srung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor
bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya/ /de la gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal ba skyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig tshe na bu mor 'gyur
te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyis pad+ma dkar 'dzin dzaM b+ha la dang phyag na rdo rje ste/ /me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyogs dang phyogs bral
du gnas rdzu 'phrul che ldan khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/ /zla bde la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu bskyed pa ste/ /lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub

sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste/ /de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed par du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur/ /slar yang lo ni nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing
brtson 'grus chung ba'o/ /de nas skye gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'i de nyams pa las dbang ma yin/ /'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag
po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya/ /de dag rnams kyi sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya/ /byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa

mo ste 'bras bu mang por 'gyur/ /gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste/ /skyug pa snying ga gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes
nang du rab zhugs min/ /bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyug pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste/ /'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gye bla ma yis kyang rgyud
rnams kun tu bstan/ /shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhig lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /de yis sems can gang dag su zhig 'byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la
byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ /de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug /shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar don du
'jug par byed/ /mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya/ /gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs
rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying gar ye shes 'khor lo rab bcug ste/ /'di yi 'od zer rnams kyi gnyi ga'i lus ni
gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed/ /gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya/ /shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag
rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya/ /shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gcig pu la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku/ /gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon
par dga' byed g.yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed/ /srid pa gsum gyis bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang / /de dag
thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed byed srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin no/ /gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byed po g.yul gyi yul la dga' zhing gsod byed gzhan
yang mu stegs pa/ /de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i don du de dag sbyar bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas
pa yis gsol pa gdab mi bya/ /sems can rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste/ /de phyir de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing
sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed/ /bsgrub bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no/ /skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis pran
tshegs rig pa la rjes chags/ /rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o/ /zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam chags sems kyis ye shes sbyin pa
rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug /rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug/ shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan
cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa/ /shes rab tu thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las/ /'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan
lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa po/ /sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i
sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru ka ni byung bar gyur/ /gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don/ /rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de
yang pad 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad/ /bgegs rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub par byung bar gyur//
zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur/ /gti mug dag las spyan ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje mA ma kI ni nga rgyal rgyu
las so| |chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog las/ /sna tshogs can gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag yul dang yul
can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur/ /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis/ /nges pa rnam par ma
bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i don du ste/ /gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams
kyi slad du'o/ /gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog la nges pa can rnams mchog la dgos pa'i don du'o/ /sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye
ba rnams kyis dus kun tu/ /nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur/ /phyi rol sna tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la
srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o/ /khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ /sgra la sogs la gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med pa yang
