gzhan ni da bzhin kho na'o/ /gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o/ /gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams
rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o/ /dus gsum gnas gsum du zhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slad du'o/ /rgyud rnams dag las 'di skad bdag gis thos
zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste/ /rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las rod rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying pa'i chu skyes lte gsar dang / /bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar de ni thig le
grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi pad+ma la gnas pa/ /de 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya/ /skye ba snga ma rang gi snying gis
bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni/ /bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so/ /don gcig du ma'i
skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyis srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug /gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la ni rnam par rgyu ru gshegs/
dud 'gro yi dwags lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden
ba'i chos ni gsung byed cing / /rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po ma tshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa/ /'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i
gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni/ /srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston
par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o/ /sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab bzhugs pa/ /'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la nam
mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o/ /rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgrod bya min pa rnams pa thams cad pa/ /gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams
cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o/ /rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas/ /dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po
rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o/ /sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs/ /de dag rnams kyi thabs ni
dag ba mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams/ /bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams/ /phyag rgyu drug rnams
stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o/ /'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni/ /pad+mo nyon mongs zad
pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o/ /mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa/ /phung po khams dang dbang
po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya/ /gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs/ /gang du
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste/ /gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o/ /gang du 'khor ba
'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje 'du byed kho na'o/ /gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs/ /gang du shes pa min pa'i
dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid/ /'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams/ /gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba
rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams/ /gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o/ /gang du nga
rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa mA ma kI ste de ni chu nyid do/ /gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sogs dkar mo ste de ni me yin no/ /gang du phrag dog mtha' dag
nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo / /gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'/ /gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa
nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do/ /mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig/ ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin

du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o/ /mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po/ /rang gi zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed
pa gang yin de ni lce/ /rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste/ /thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de
ni 'di yi chos/ /dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams/ /gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul
rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni/ /dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste/ /khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang
ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min/ /ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis/ /rengs byed de ni
bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang / /ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo de ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste/ /
de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o/ /srid ba gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos
byed pa ste/ /bcing ba khro bo mi g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab/ /'dod pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la
gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so/ /gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams/ /yi dwags rnams ni
smin pa'i don du de nas tsartsi kA la sogs pa spros par gyur ba ste/ /skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du/ /klu rnams
smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros/ /lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la
sogs rnams kyang spros/ /gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar/ /sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon
tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya/ /de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste/ /'di ni dbang
bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o/ /gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin
dang / /shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang / /de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis
ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o/ /sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las
skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid/ /gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste/ /ye shes
mi lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing / /lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam
ster bar byed/ /shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur/ /dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di
la zhugs pa gang yin pa/ /de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste/ /sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur
pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o/ /nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzum rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis/ /stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med
pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang / /'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyid ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur/ /de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral
ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste/ /re khA nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsal
mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o/ /de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te/ /rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems
ni gzhan ba min pa nyid/ /gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'geg par rab bya ste/ /'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la
yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o/ /zla ba drug gis sdom pa brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur/ /chags dang
chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo/ /oD+DA 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes
dag gi dbus/ /gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang / /de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel
'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med/ /nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o/ /sa yi rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu
lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir/ /me yi rnam pa me min g.yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g.yo ba min pas rlung ma yin/ /stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang
ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min/ /rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so/ /nA da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i
gnas su son pa lu gu rgyun du bcings pa'i rtsa/ /srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid/ /rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su
yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste/ /du ba la sogs ra rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya/ /dbu mar
srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod ba g.yas dang g.yon la bcing / /phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslad
ba yang / /pad+mar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste/ /sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i
zhal| |sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o/ /rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni/ /rnam
pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku/ /ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o//
'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do/ /'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni o T+Ta nyid//
dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni/ /gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes
pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur/ /'dra ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur/ /gnyid
yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o/ /yi ge nyid ni dag ba'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le nA da rim pa
yis| |bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o/ /sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang
bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par spyod cing g.yo med sems la zhen pa ste/ /ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs
las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur/ /sprul pa la sogs pa dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur/ /de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi
srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar
bya| |thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang / /de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus
su dor bar bya/ /gang phyir a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdang min zhing / /hUM yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog
gzugs dag mi 'dod de/ /'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni/ /rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag
po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o/ /l-i sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams/ /phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang
pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste/ /dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams/ /slar yang thun
mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab/ /de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi
dbyangs/ /ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya nyid/ /dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor
gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phye ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /slar yang dbyangs
drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa
gsum la/ /nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab/ /snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod
par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya/ /phyi rol tu ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas/ /de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par
mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste/ /snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o/ /de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal
'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug /zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste/ /thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan
mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis/ /sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la/ /gza' rnams
kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o/ /rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs
gzugs/ /zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab
mar thun tshod longs spyod mtha'/ /lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o/ /spen par bug ba mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha
yis bla ma'i byed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs/ /phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes/ /sa skyes stong pa sprul zla nyi ma gza'
lhag pa sangs mjug ring la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig /mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung / /gang zhig zla
ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung / /mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sprul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshong de bzhin nyid/ /mkha'
'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma/ /de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa byas nas de rnams
bsgrub par bya/ /ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las/ /de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma
gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci/ /pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la/ /sgrib bral rnal 'byor
ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyis ma yin no/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams/ /
yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug ring za/ /thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi
yan lag bcu gnyis rnams/ /dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs/ /yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la
thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par/ /de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so/ /de
ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis dag las 'gyur/ /gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o/ /zla ba
drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyis/ /drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu
zhugs| |reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gis rkang pa de 'dzin no/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin
de dag grub pa ster/ /sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen/ /sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can
rnams te dus kun tu/ /zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang bsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir
ni zhing can gyur na'o/ /zhi la dkar po'i zhal ta dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa la/ /rengs la ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu
gter la ste dgug pa la/ /dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o/ /bsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bong la'o bskrad la nag dang dkar 'dir sbrul
la mtshan mo'i mthar/ /sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min/ /'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni
longs spyod sems par byed/ /sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed/ /gang gi drin
gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no/ /dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gi de yang gsum grangs 'gyur/ /de
yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni/ /'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa
de dag rnams/ /chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so/ /gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams
kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste/ /de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum/ /kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster
ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las/ /ji srid rig byed sbrul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu gyur/ /'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis
sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis/ /gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so/ /de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can
gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o/ /gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan
yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang / /de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so/ /gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams
dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shes la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so/ /gzugs dang sgra
dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni/ /snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra can gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste/ /de dag rnams kyi
dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di/ /brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul/ /dang
po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyams te 'gro ba
drug tu gnas/ /de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku/ /gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal pa'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus
kyi 'khor lo'o/ /dbugs ni chad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /thig le bkag pa 'gyur na kun nas
mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur/ /'khor bdag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /spyod pa
sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no/ /gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba
dag gis thim gyur te/ /dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed/ /lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol tu ni
mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la/ /rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya/ /stong pa la ni spen pa
'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te/ /stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o/ /
rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho mig gi der ni sgra gcan 'jug /rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha'
mkha' dus dus kyis lha yi blon po 'jug /nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste/ /mkha' mkha' nam mkha'
mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug /mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der
'jug ste/ /de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur/ /de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur/ /
gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsi/ /bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o//
de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu 'gyur/ /gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa phyogs te nyi ma'i
rgyu ba dang / /lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsi ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams/ /zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyid rkang bsres pa
yis kyang tha mi dang / /brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams/ /gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang
pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams/ /brgyad cu rtsa gcig tha ma rang gsal rnams bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te/ /de dag rnams
kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing / /gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do/ /
dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur/ /khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po
rnams la mnyam pa ste/ /sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa/ /rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs
la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya/ /gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur/ /de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi
thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyur/ /shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum sred pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi ni gsung gi
mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur/ /shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par
'gyur| |lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong pa dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /lha yi rna bdag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos
par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor bdag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur/ /rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba
bshang ba khu ba 'bab ba rnams/ /srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te tha ma sangs rgyas zhal/ /rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung
ni lce dang bcas pa dang / /thig le gtsug tor pug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes ba min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang / /srog dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod
pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed/ /rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni
ye shes gcig tu 'gyur/ /de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam
yang min pa nyid/ /thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o/ /phyogs zang zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni
mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar/ /srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go /zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams
shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gag /chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs/ /dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur
rnam gsum srid ba la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro/ /khro bo
sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges pa ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs/ /rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum
'gyur| |de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri beng can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur/ /rin po che 'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab
par 'gyur/ /lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur/ /sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing
sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang / /skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste/ /sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang
zhing mi g.yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o/ /sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed/ /chu las sa me rlung phye rtse

mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste/ /rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la/ /rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi
rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro/ /sangs rgyas zhing na ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed par mdzad pa rnam par gzigs nas ni/ /gnyi ga ro mnyam dag
pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste/ /so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor/ /
sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g.yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams/ /de dag rnams dang thabs cig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi
par du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs/ /yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin/ /srub par byed pas tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag
gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste/ /slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so/ /dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag
gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed/ /'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang 'khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so/ /
de yi dbus su las kyi sa ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur/ /lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba
rnams| |mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i in+d+ra ni la lho ni pad+ma rA ga ste/ /nub ni kar te ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla pa chu shel lo/ /dbus ni ljang
gu de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste/ /dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbu ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no/ /de nas gzhan
ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu yis bsgyur ba gyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag go /de yi phyi rol dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /'khor
lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rig byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro/ /brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye
gnas gzugs/ /rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur/ /de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying ga dang ni de nas lte

gsang chu skyes de bzhin no/ /zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang dbyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te/ /brang phyed phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal

po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so/ /nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad/ /rig phyed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas
pa'i rigs byed rig byed kyis/ /gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni/ /shangs kyi 'og tu ko sko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag
ste mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus/ /de nas snying ga lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa
yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid/ /mdzod spu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang / /dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis

sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o/ /phyed bcas nyi ma nyir shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying ga la gnas lhan
skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o/ /gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o/ /'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs
kyi 'khor lo dag ni nyis 'gyur ro/ /lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin lha yi ri po dag ni

lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no/ /de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang me
lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o/ /phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus/ /gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi la 'khor lo rdo rje nor
bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams/ /sgro khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams/ /phyed bcas nyi ma
rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba 'o/ /steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /kun nas rlung gi
bgrod pa'i dbang gis thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis/ /rtsi bas brgyad me tshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis
'khor lor 'gyur/ /sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya/ /steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu
gter ched kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur/ /pad+ma phyed la snying pa'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug /sgo la sogs
ba dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis ngas par rab tu 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shas rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no/
lhun po'i phyi rol tu ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad bo yang dag gnas pa ste/ /shar du ral gra ri 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu mig sman ro tsa na/ /lho
ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du 'o/ /dbus sum chod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do/ /nor bu
gtsug tor dpral bar mgrin pa snying ga'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni/ /gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim pas so/ /

dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyis pa zhi dang drag po la/ /dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs ba lang kha dang pad+ma'i gzugs/ /khyon ni de

yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las/ /rwa ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du ster rwa yi zlum po dag ni zhi cha 'o/ /phyi rol rwa yi su ma cha 'og ste steng du
ba da ri yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o/ /dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo bo lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid/ /gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i
mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad/ /de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams/ /phyed dang
gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o/ /pad+ma'i mtha' las tshad dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste de yi phyogs cha yis kyang
mgrin pa'o/ /gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams/ /gsang pa'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu
mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te/ /gdan nas pad+ma'i sngon mtshams snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o/ /de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter
dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum/ /gdan las rig byed dag gis pad+ma snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te/ /phyed bcas brgyad kyis
gdong pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang / /mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral ba dag dang mgo bos de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di/ /
de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dang bral ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no/ /gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul gyi chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no/ /

lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dang 'dres nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te/ /nag po rlung

po sngon po dang ni ljang gu de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung ba'o/ /lan tshwa sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te/ /skyur dang bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go
slar yang zhing gi rngo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang / /sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams/ /sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag
nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go /sa yis zug gser 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni/ /'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang
gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed/ /ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang / /chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags
dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/ /bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing / /slar yang thams cad
cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag
rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir/ /mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying por dkyil 'khor ro/ /phyi rol tu ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te
las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so/ /longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams/ /rwa la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams
lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung / /gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng dang 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong / /'dir ni chu srin rnam shes
dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung / /nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni/ /gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med
dag dang lhan cig skyes pa karka Ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so/ /'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa Ta pa ta sa ring po thung du lhag pa'i lha/ /lug dang 'khrig pa karka Tar ni zla ba dkar
po nyi ma seng+ge bu mo srang rnams su/ /sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro/ /de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun
zhes phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye/ /'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang / /gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang
mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan/ /mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang
shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnam mthong bar 'gyur/ /yi dags rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so/ /'di rnams
sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te/ /mngal ni rab tu gzung pa mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni/
nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te/ /sbrul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho
na'o| |de phyir rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku ni skyes shing mnyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste/ /bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis
bcings pa ma yin no/ /de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su lus kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye/ /sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jig
'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no/ /gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags/ /zhi bar
gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te/ /mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g.yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jug/
'jug dogs lus po lhung las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin/ /de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma
gang pha ni gang / /mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla tshung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang / /bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir
gang gis thar par 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug par mdzod/ /gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug
bsngal 'gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can/ /dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi/ /'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul
te sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i me yis so/ /de phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsod par 'gyur/ /chags las
sdang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so/ /de ni rtsa nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin//
de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams dag gi tshogs 'di ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dus su skye po rnams kyi dmyal
ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog /chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste/ /sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang
zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster bar byed/ /sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad/ /des na rgyal ba mchog gi
spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar gyur/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni/ /gzugs la sogs dang mig
la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te/ /phyugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang / /mi
bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin/ /bsreg bya sa dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tu t+tha ka ni ma nyid do/ /rlung dang nam
mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g.yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang / /ka k+Shi ka shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldong

ros ba bla ste/ /btsag ni sa 'o lan tshwa gang zhig ze tshwa rgya mtsho skyes dang rgyam tsha nag po thab kyi tshwa/ /'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni nA ba sA ra ya ba k+Sha ra sad dza dang /

tshal kA tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no/ /rdo yi chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me/ /rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag
gi dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no/ /gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te shag tu ka dang ra can nag po chu dang me dang rlung / /nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan
pa nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya/ /rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dug la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug
lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang khab len rnams par bzhi/ /ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min/ /grub pa lcags ni
'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o/ /gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang //
lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nad 'phrog rul pa'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas so/ /dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste ma la gnas shing bskol ba
de ni rim pa yis/ /sgra dang rab tu 'bar ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ /sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma 'bugs byed
'dar dang bcas pa ste/ /'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'dugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sgyur byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o/ /mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyis stobs dang ldan pa
rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu ba'o/ /su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing pa dag ni gang zhig byed/ /bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur
zhing de bzhin zos na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /ye shes med na sa bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ /de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol
mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang 'gog par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin/ /gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de
yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings/ /de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad/ /gang zhig byugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi 'dab ma'i dri ma
'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te/ /mtha' dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyi sa la mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan dag rnams
kyis 'di yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur ba gang de nges par lo dus bar dang ni/ /bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig dbugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro/ /sman rnams
thams cad shin tu tsha ba'i ro rnams dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang skyur ba'i sde rnams dang / /bslang bar gyur ba'i rtsa ba mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste/ /dngul
chu rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o/ /gnyis sbyor tsha la 'ching bu byi ba rta sen dug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid/ /glang
po mi yi chu ni len bdun blugs pa dag gis chu shing rtsi tra la sogs thal ba dang / /'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro yi sbyangs pa de rnams sbru bar bya/ /yang nas
yang du me yi tsha ba dag gis slar yang lan brgyar sbru bar bya zhing bskam par bya/ /de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang / /lcags rnams zhu
bar byed pa'i don du bi Da 'di ni dngul chu dag gis brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur/ /khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying gar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid/ /drag por bskol pas
dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur/ /lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sgyur byed/ /khyab byed
sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye gsha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste/ /de ltar gang zhig dngul chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa na/ /dus
gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu sgrol/ /de yis mchog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog
par byed/ /khA phyed gser gyi pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste/ /lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i in+d+ra nI la pad+ma rA ga chu shel lo/ /nub tu
rin chen kar ka ta ste me dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnon po zangs dang dngul/ /rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag la skyes pa'i gdan ni lta ba la/ /snying por de ster
gser las skyes pa'i dzaM b+ha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa/ /'dab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag /
cod pan sangs rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid/ /ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams
rim pas so/ /dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so sor dus su thun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas/ /oM dzaM swA hA'i mtha' ste dbus su b+ha la dang bcas
dza len+d+ra ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis/ /rgyal po rab dga' yid kyis gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi bsrung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya/ /de ltar srung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon
dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro/ /so phag 'gyur byed skyur ba'i sde rnams dag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro ni mnye zhing bdug par bya/ /de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye
nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o/ /slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro ni 'chi ste de yang de la zhu bar bya/ /dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas
thams cad rab tu za/ /zha nye rnon po ra gan zangs dang lhang tsher skyes sam gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa/ /mnyam pa gcig tu bsreg pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po
las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam/ /dang por drug cu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya/ /rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag pa
rab tu sbyin mi bya/ /phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag/ de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu
pa 'di ni bi Da mchog rnams kyis/ /ma zhu na ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur/ /reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gi me la gnas pa lhang tsher lcags
ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur/ /lhang tsher dag las lcags ni brgyad 'gyur stobs su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na yang brgyad 'gyur ro/ /de yi sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo
rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dang ro rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar/ /me yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs
par rab tu 'gyur/ /reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi Da mnye ba dag dang dug rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur/ /'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab
tu 'gyur/ /slar yang gzhan ni nyis dang sum 'gyur gser zhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chu dag la blugs pas so/ /rdzas kyi don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad nas
blug par bya/ /gser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnon sprul zangs zha nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu zi dag gis dang / /gsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin lhang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni bsreg bya dag gis
bsad byas nas/ /mnyam pa'i 'gyur byed dug dang lan tshwa nye ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcags dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni/ /mkhris pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni
rdo ba'i dbus su blugs byas te/ /sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du me dang bcas pa thams cad dus su bdugs gyur pa/ /dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha yis dbyangs
kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar/ /zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste//
dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs
pa'i gzugs/ /de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya/ /de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tsha la 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis
dag par byas nas ni/ /lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya/ /nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po
ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni/ /smon gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang / /ba yi 'o ma gsar pa rnying pa sA li zan ni lo ma sgyur
pos dman zhing lan tshwa dang / /rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o/ /stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang
bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas/ /nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste nyungs kar cha las tha ma skye tshe cha shas so/ /khang bzang dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang

tshad pa dag dong bral bar rab tu 'gyur/ /'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po skra dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed/ /karko TI dang de ba dA lI tsha gsum bri ha tI dang ni ma pa ki ra tA
tik+ta| |bskol pa 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du smyung bar gnas pa rab tu bya/ /de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+ha lA ta yi chu/ /ngan pa'i
dri dang sa dang rngo pa dug gi sha dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so/ /gang zhig zos na drag tu brgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te/ /phye
mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid/ /gsal ba mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma
yin| |de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /daN+Do t+pa la sA li par+NI chu skyes sA ri dag gi rang lus 'dab ma'i khu ba
yis| |ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du lcags kyis nyin zhag gsum dag tu yang mnyes byas nas/ /gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so so'i dus su TaM ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa/
de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyibs/ /bok+kA Na dang bar snang shak+tu kI ri'i chu yis rab g.yo dngul
chu dag kyang gsad par bya/ /sman gzhan dag gis bsad pa la ni dmar ring lhang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam pa dag /gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul
chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste/ /sngar brjod khab len snod du phyur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog /zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag
dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang / /zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu ngag las ni lus la dngos grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur/ /thun mong pa dang
'bring po 'jigs pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste/ /mchog sman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag las
min| |gang na 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod/ /ral gri dag la pad+ma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni
gsal bar byed/ /der ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la
rdzas kyi dngos grub bo/ /dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skye gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi
la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya/ /klu mo rnams ni sgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub pa byas
nas mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya/ /klu la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya/ /du ba
la sogs sgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /srog la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par
bya| |dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes ba rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya/ /sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o/ /ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje pad+mar
bde bas byin rlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid/ /de lta de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig /sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod de sa
sa chu bsreg za rlung dang stong pa gang / /lnga po dag gi gza' yi tshogs pa gcig shos dag ni drug pa lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su/ /gling rnams dag ni
bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu gsungs/ /snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid//
pad+mar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni/ /gang zhig rus pa la sogs mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste//
lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o/ /de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya/ /sa
'dzin de nyid rnam dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang / /dbye ba drug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug pa drug dang zla ba'i grangs/ /
de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang / /gza' rnams dag gis rgyu ba gang de slar yang gcig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi rgyu
bar brjod/ /ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang / /nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar yang nges par rdzu
'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams dag dang / /mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par/ /bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag
po'i rdo rje rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang / /de bzhin phung po dbang po dran
pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni/ /bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so so'i legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / /bug pa zhes
bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel
dag /skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yi sangs rgyas chos/ /rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams
kyang brgyad cu ste/ /khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yi ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin/ /zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig
ba phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis/ /'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod/ /mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par
lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug /gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no/ /rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang
gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go /nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel/ /nyes pa 'di dag
bco brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de nyid ces grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes zhes pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal
po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs/ /
de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste/ /dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par
brjod pa zla ba bzang / /gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang / /reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing
'ching dang grol dang byed po med/ /sa bon dang ni gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med/ /mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed
pa rnams bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu dpe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med/ /brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang
kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs/ /'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa/ /rig pa la
sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go 'phang dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal/ /spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi gzi
brjid can/ /ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phang bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig
rten spyi bor yang dag gnas/ /bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis
yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te/ /dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad rnams la mi bzad pa/ /gang gis las
gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de bskyed pa/ /'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag
'tshal lo/ /gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon dang mdun dang rgyab/ /steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang
sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ngu ring po dang / /shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min/ /gang
zhig kun gyi rten gcig b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud/ /gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste/ /
de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med/ /de mnyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes
pa chen po'o/ /de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so/ /sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad bzang
po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed/ /mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni maN+Dal mi byed pa/ /myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang yin gang zhig
bde mnyam ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa bo/ /shes rab ye shes thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba/ /nyams pa gang yin gang zhig rtsa gsum
dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o/ /dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la srog dang thur sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o/ /sbyin bdag gang
yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs thams cad ster/ /ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g.yo sgyu
can| |dpal ldan dpal gyi chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhags pas zla ba'i zhu ba
rtogs pa na/ /sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang / /de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams A li kA li nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyi ma kye/
sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis phreng 'dzin sdeb sbyor bcings pas brjod/ /pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan
pa nyid du mdzod/ /ji ltar nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa 'di las byung gyur pa/ /rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi 'khor
lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog /nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur ba'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gcig las ni/ /tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi
bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni/ /dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar can ni yon tan kun gter 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes
mtshan ma can/ /ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos/ /ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji
lta bzhin mthong nas/ /thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni/ /rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa
ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rje yis/ /thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes lam la gzhag par mdzod/ /khyod ni rgan yang
gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog mar dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod/ /bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te
gshin rje'i dgra/ /khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud/ /khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod
ni rab tu 'jug /tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btung bar gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung / /sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo
mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas/ /rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi ma sa bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka lA bar/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag la 'jigs rung
'khor bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi/ /sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin bar rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la/ /thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna
tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob/ /sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin/ /dus kyi 'khor
lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig /sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gis thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas//
sras po pad+ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la snang ba stsal ba nges par ni/ /dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag ma tshang med pa glegs bam dag la gnas pa dang / /de nas
rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen/ /gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub
sems dpa' rnams/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag na phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i rgyal po btsun mor bcas pa rnams/ /gang dag sa 'og dag na gdengs can dbang po gdon tshogs
mi dge thams cad dus su 'ching byed pa/ /de dag thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig /rgyud ni dpal ldan
dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha/ /thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gis de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa/ /sems
can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa gang / /bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar
gyur cig de la 'dud gyur cig /dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //mchog gi dang
po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang bod kyi lo tsA ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags
kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / dpon chen shAkya
bzang po'i gsung bzhin du mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi cha la legs par dpyad
cing bskul te/ /legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la
gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/ /gang gi thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis/ /'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang / /bdag gi 'bad las bsod nams
gang thob des/ /kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsa kra tan+t+ro t+ta ra tan+t+ra hri da ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma
rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di ltar chos dbyings dkyil 'khor dri med sku la 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dang mi dge bas/ /sangs rgyas pa dang
mu stegs pa dag lha rnams dang ni dmyal ba nyid ces gang thob pa/ /rgyal mchog pho brang sham+b+ha lar grags ka lA pa ru ngag gi dbang phyug seng+ge yi/ /gdan la bzhugs nas rgyal pos
rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la gsal bar bstan/ /byung gyur ces sogs bden te lha mchog bla ma khyab 'jug lha yi dbang phyug lha yi dbang po dang / /zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan
ma lha sa steng lha yul nam mkha' bsod nams sdig las 'byung / /mi rnams pha rol srid par yi dwags dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa sha yi dam tshig can/ /rig byed pa dang thod pa
can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ni rdzun pa ste/ /gang du gcan chen bdun la sogs pa dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang der/ /skyes la sngar gyi
lus po spangs nas lus gzhan bsam pas nges par 'dzin par 'gyur pa ni/ /thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsod byed za ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur/ /
sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha las sa steng 'dir lhung de ni bden pa ste/ /bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rig byed zhi chos khyab 'jug ches bla ma/ /sha yi kha
zas bkag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bco lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas byang chub ni/ /
sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gi ba yis rtag tu bsrung mi bya/ /srog chags rnams la srog chags 'du shes gsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas
'di nyams pa/ /yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi nam mkha' tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed po min/ /srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyis rgyu rnams gsum gyis
'grub la de la longs spyod cing / /skyed byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po srog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur/ /seng+ge sprul dang ne la stag dang bya rog skye
gnas yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni skye rgu rnams ni byed dam byed du 'jug dang yi rang gsum gyis 'gyur/ /dge slong snying rje med pas lce la sha yi ro myong ro
la rjes su tshol byed cing / /bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal bar 'gro/ /dge slong nad pa la ni sman pas sha bstan na yang bya khra rnams
kyis bsad pa dang / /pha yi ched du bsad dang mchod sbyin thog dang me dang chu dang ma zhu'i skyon gyis shi ba rnams/ /sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na gang du de tshe bza' bar bya bar gsungs
pa rnams/ /dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcu ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi bslu min/ /sha la sogs pa zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnams su sdug bsngal
'gyur| |srog chags yi dwags la sogs skye gnas dka' thub khyim ba rgyal po nges par rang khyim du/ /gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs dang rang khyim
rnams| |shi ba rnams kyi lus ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang / /'dir ni rdo la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par blta/ /tho yor shes pa yod
la rang gzhan rnam pa bral ba nyid las rdo ba'i tho yor phung por 'gyur/ /sa steng gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid/ /srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni
rang gzhan rnam par bral bar legs par sad las shes/ /shaM b+ha la yi nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'gro ba rnams/ /'gro ba'i gzugs
kyi khams la sogs pa phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te/ /longs spyod byed pa rnam par rig pa tsam ste rang gzhan bral zhing rtog med de rnams kyis/ /longs spyod byed
min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sad par 'gyur/ /zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus kyi me dang mun pa gcig tu snang bar byed pa yang / /sa sogs dri sogs
mig la sogs dang gzhu dang char pa glog dang rlung sogs drug pa gnyis/ /de ni lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug pa gnyis/ /de rnams longs spyod byed po srog
chags phung po gnyid log gyur 'dir snang byed kyis bslang ba/ /phyi yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi pa las rab byung / /sprul sku longs sku dang
ni de bzhin chos kyi sku rnams bzhi po las ni rab tu byung / /khong stong min zhing gcig pu mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyis gsum sogs thim par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gsum
la sogs pa gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su nges par thim par 'gyur/ /phung po khams dang dbang po'i yan lag skye mched mun pa stug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog /rnam par shes
pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar gtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos/ /dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ /gang
phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs pa sangs rgyas sku gsum la sogs pa/ /yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa dang ni sred pa yang / /
las ni 'du byed srid par 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal ni/ /rnam shes la sogs rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa yang
yin| |gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i srid par chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams/ /shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nyon
mongs pa las las/ /de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyu las byung / /chos rnams 'gag pa med pa nam mkha' tsam las 'byung ba'ang
med pa nyid pas de yi phyir/ /srog chags srog gi rdul phran phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min/ /sbyin pa la sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa gtong zhing byang
chub phyogs kyi stong pa nyid/ /gang zhig de dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal mchog sras bcas srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris/ /de las phung po rnams las de las slar yang srid gzhan
'pho min phung po'i mtshams sbyor ni/ /mar me kha ton rgya dang dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma chu shel sa bon skyur/ /gang du rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dkar po'i
chos kyi tshogs las byung ngo zhes bya bden/ /chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te/ /phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu 'gyur
med bde ba chos sku min zhing de yi phyir/ /gang zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'dir ni sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yis gang gsungs pa/ /gang zhig gcig min du ma min la bdag
gzhan la phan phun tshogs chen po'i rten gyur pa/ /dngos med dngos po med min nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rnam par dpyad ka'i rang bzhin nyid/ /gos med rnam par 'gyur med
zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab la spros pa med/ /dpe med so sor rang gis rig bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das
bsam mi khyab pa legs spyad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs/ /blo ldan chen por gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyur gyur 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs gsung mdzad cing / /'jig rten
kun la khyab pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /
gang zhig sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i rgyur gyur la lar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang / /slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba/ /rnam pa
du mar 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi thabs kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms/ /phyogs bcu'i rjes su 'jug pa don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba/ /rtogs
dka' brtag par dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam mnyam par khyab cing mtshan ma med pa nyid/ /mi mnyam bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas
zhing khams mtha' yas rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa steng nam mkha' rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar/ /bud
med skye gnas chos kyi dbyings su bde 'gro ngan 'gro dus kun tu ni rnam par bzhugs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srog chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pa'i
mthus| |khu ba khrag dag rig ma'i b+ha ga'i pad+mar chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung / /de ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can du gyur pa'i skyes bu rig ma yang dag ldan/ /yul
gyi yon tan las byung de long spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yin khams la rab brten nas/ /skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub ba rang las
mthu las byung / /gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'phang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi/ /zhal brgya rig 'dzin dbang po zla ba sa sogs yul dang yul can bdag po
chos kyi dbyings/ /zhal brgya pa de rgyu las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i tshigs rnams la/ /de la tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par 'gyur ba sgra bzhin
myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig lnga dang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams
rnams rgyas btab des/ /gcig gi du ma'i khams las gnyis skyes lag ba rkang pa sor mo'i tshogs rnams gang zhig tu/ /thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab
skyes pa dang ni bud med dag /rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jig med rdul gyi phung po ste/ /srog gi rgyu ni dbyangs yig la sogs rang bzhin yang ni 'jig
pa med pa srog gi khams/ /khu ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni rdul yin las ni srog chags phung po yi/ /de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu las
'bras bu sa gzhan du/ /rang gi las kyi phung po lngar longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du 'ang slar yang yang gsog par byed/ /de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges par brgya yis las kyi
phung po zad pa min/ /gcer bu la ni las kyi phung po rnam par 'jig 'gyur sreg byed ma ni 'ba' zhig gis/ /dkar po'i bsam gtan dgra bcom sngags pa dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag
sems can lus ngag las/ /pad+ma khyab byed snying po'i ze'i 'bru'i dbang phyug dgra bcom thig le bzang po sgom par byed/ /de dbus lus po sbas ba rtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas
gsal bar byed pa can/ /lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod gyur mchog gi go 'phang 'di ni brgya byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa/ /bsam gtan 'di ni sreg blugs za bas ma lus las kyi phung
po sreg par 'gyur ba mthong / /gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur/ /gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog
gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams 'gyur/ /gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel/ /gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan
las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du dre yi sdig pa nyams/ /gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams/ /gang zhig chos kyi bsam
gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel/ /gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi
sdig pa nyams/ /gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'cho ba la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig
pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'phel/ /de bzhin shad nag chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas
log par g.yems pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams dang nges par khro ba nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur/ /gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang
mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig sbyin pa las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang
mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du/ /shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdor je rnams/ /dngos dang dngos med byed po
bsgribs dang nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag /nam mkha' med na byed po gnas min 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig /sems can rnams
kyi byed por ma byas bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel/ /rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma spyad par 'jig pa min/ /so sor
sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid sgom par gsungs/ /mtshan mo du ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyin mo nam mkha' 'bar ba la sogs
pas| |so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong / /bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin tu sems brtan byas pas phyi rol dngos
po rnam par spong / /srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi ma zla ba bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed/ /dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig le
'dzin par byed/ /rjes su dran pas rang gi gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nam mkhar 'od mang 'phro bar byed/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bro dri med bde bas
rab gang 'gyur/ /nam mkhar bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te sna tshogs stong pa nyid mthong bas/ /nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig par
'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag pas so/ /yan lag med par bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba yis/ /sna rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te
gzhom du med pa tshangs pa'i gsung las so/ /srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khro yang dag pa/ /gsal
ba lte ba snying ga mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim bzhin sa bung re/ khu ba gyen du song zhing khrag kyang 'og tu 'gro la tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi
rdo rje dri ma gsum dang bral ba gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid/ khyi la sogs pa'i sha yi mig dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi spyan/ /rang rgyal
nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dri ma bral ba rnams dag bzhin pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan/ /chu mthun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin/ /lus
kyi sa bon khu ba 'pho ste 'khor lo 'dzin pa lte ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang / /mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying ga sgra bcas bde ba mgon po 'khor ba 'jig /gang gis
mgrin pa de rig g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin/ /gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde par shes rab 'dzin/ /gtsug tor tshangs pa'i
