bu gar 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang ba/ /gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'/ /de ni dpag med gang
gis rig pa mgo bor rdor je dang bcas drug pa rdor je sems/ /snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la/ /dri bral sa yi thig le mgo bo'i skyes
bu de ni chu dang nyi ma mgrin par yang / /sgra gcan me dang rnam smin snying ga sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lte ba mjug ring ste/ /gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa
can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams/ /gang zhig mig la sogs pa yul can drug po lha mo rnams las sa snying la sogs gang / /gzugs ni phung po la sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams
kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyi/ /dag pa'i dbang po la sogs yul can drug po gang zhig ga rbod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa/ /de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul drug rnams
kyang sngon mo la sogs de rnams so/ /gang zhig khro bo gshin rje gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa/ /nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang
zhig khro bo pad+ma mthar byed do/ /sgrag can dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom pa gang zhig khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ /mjug ring dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig
khro bo shes rab mthar byed do/ /srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes rdor zhi ba 'dir ni nga rgyal 'joms pa rdo rje sems/ /srog rlung bkag pas phyag
bzhi pa yi dgyes rdor byin za zhe sdang 'joms la byang chub sems/ /dgyes pa'i rdor je 'dod chags 'joms pa zhal gsum phyag drug dbang phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur/ /zhal
brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi gti mjug 'joms pa tshangs pa bde ba dang bcas dam tshigs sems/ /lte bar srog rlung bkag pas dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /
snying gar bkag pas dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /mgrin par nyi ma de ni dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur//
dbral bar rlung gi dbang po 'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras/ /lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa
bzhi dang / /sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan ro la ro yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum/ /lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lag mthil sor tshigs dum
bu rnams/ /'khor lo drug gi rtsa rnams 'dir ni nyis 'gyur bde mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la/ /gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams su 'pho pa rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos
kyi 'khor lor brgyad/ /mgrin par sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i 'khor lo ru/ /gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis gang ba mgo bor dkar po de 'dir gsang bar dkar
po'i cha| |'khor lo'i rtsa rnams kyang ni mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus kyi 'khor lo lag pa'i lha/ /dus ni drug cus lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phyag gsum ste tshig mtshams rnams kyang
rdo rje'i sku/ /rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyug gu nam mkha' lag pa rgyal po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs/ /zla ba'i cha shas sum cu nam mkha' nam mkha' gdengs can zla ba'i rtsa ni zla
bzang po/ /rtsa dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i mang can te/ /rdo rje chu dang bshang pa khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis bldag par 'gyur/ /byams pa 'i
tshems kyis gtong dang lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la/ /mngon shes lnga yi zhal chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas nges na seng+ge ste/ /bsod nams
ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum pa/ /dpal ldan 'dus par sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung / /der
ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud kyi rigs la gsal bar mdzad/ /rtsa dang shad nag rus pa khu ba khrag rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas/ /srog chags so
so'i sangs rgyas lha yul bar snang sa steng rang rang gnas su gtso bo'i gnas/ /mdor byas rdzun gyis rim pas 'gyur la yul dang yul can sgrub byed
rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin/ /rang byin brlab pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhi pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod/ /'dir ni lnga pa zung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan
gsang ba 'dus par yang / /bdud rnams yang dag gzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yi bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs/ /gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu
yi lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs las skyes/ /skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi yid tsam min la btags pa dang ni bdag kyang ngo / /bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi
yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod min lha yul sa steng bsod nams tshul khrims rnam par dman/ /stobs bcu mchog dang
ldan pas rdzogs pa'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dag gnas pa de/ /bsten par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhags pas bsgrub pa yin/ /bkug cing
'dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdung zhing lag pa bcing ba yi/ /bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can kyi gyi don mdzad pa/ /de ni shin tu dri zhi ma me tog dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni lha ba shos dang / /gsang
sangs bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis bsten bya sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nas/ /sa 'og 'jig rten lha yul sa steng bar snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster/ /zla
ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sngags gang zhig ni/ /zla ba gcig la nam mkha' nam mkha' stong pa brang 'gro dus ro mun par dbyer med bzlas//
steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lan gsum bral nas srog rlung gang pas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas/ /grub par 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur nam mkhar 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa
de| |bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong / /ye shes don du dus gsum dngos po stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mi g.yo dri
bral blo byed cing / /tshul khrims don du khu ba rdor je mgo bor khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu ga ru/ /bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnams par bral nas rdo rje sems
dbar 'gyur/ /shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas longs mi spyod/ /yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin kyang gang zhig len
pas longs spyod min/ /sha dag sems kyis byin mang gang zhig sha yi dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spyod min/ /de yis byang chub sems dpa'
gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe dman rigs cis mi 'gyur/ /byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus su chang gi don du chang tshong khyim du 'gro/ /nyin phyed dus su mchog
gi thugs rjes nya yi don du nya pa rnams kyi tshong dus su/ /dgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro/ /chang nya bud med rnams kyi
dri ma gsum bral a ba d+hU ti dmang rigs cis ma yin/ /gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya pa ni gcig pu nyid du dam 'cha' la/ /gang gis bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan
g.yo'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam bca' ba/ /gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min/ /gal te bsgrub bya gzhan la gtan tshigs
kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bca' nyams/ /sgra rnams rtag par dam bca' nam mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus med par grub de bzhin du/ /sgra rnams mi rtag dam bca'
bum pa lta bur byas te shin tu rtsol bas byung ba'i phyir/ /nams mkha' las ni rtag bar grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mi rtag nges par grub/ /gzugs dang reg bya dri dan
ro yi yul rnams bzhin du lnga pa sgra yang cis ma yin/ /de ni gang gis thog mar rtogs pas sa steng bar snang khams su sgra des slar yang ni/ /rna bas don rnams rab tu rtogs par
'gyur ba de ni sgra nams rtag pa nyid yin lo/ /gang gis thog mar don rtogs gyur pas sa steng bar snang khams su slar yang de tshul gyis/ /rna bas don rnams nges par rtogs par
gyur pas de ci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam/ /rtag pa gsal bya gcig pu yon tan ma lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i bug par gnas/ /mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra
yi tshogs rnams slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la/ /gang zhig brjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bu gar sgra yi ku cor 'gyur min nam/ /rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar
'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min/ /dngos po'i byed po'i rgyu ni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni/ /rtag pa mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang
zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byas pas te/ /byas pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin/ /chos mi mthun par de phyir byas ba rnams ni yod par
'gyur la gcig shos de med do/ /gang zhig mngon par gsal bya'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni ci yis rgyu ma yin/ /mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag de yis mngon par
gsal byas de yi 'bras bu cis ma yin/ /sgra dang don dag gal te gcig par gyur na de tshe don nyams pa na sgra nyams 'gyur/ /spyi dang gsal ba'ang de bzhin 'gyur
te nam mkha' tsam dang gzhan pa nyid dang gcig pa nying / /stong ba sgra dang ldan par gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum por rtag tu sgra med 'gyur/ /gang gis nam mkha' yod pa nyid na
brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba des na med pa nyid/ /gal te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos mi mthun las grub gyur na/ /de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges
par sgrub pa po la nges par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' sa steng dag tu gza' dang rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni mi rnams dang / /lha dang srin po dang ni rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig can gyi
yi dwags lha min klu/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi/ /don gcig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig tu yang don rnams mang
po de ni sgra gcig gis/ /dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu rnams las ni grub pas na/ /dpe ni nam mkha'i me tog dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog de der
rang rang grub/ /mo gsham bu mo nam mkha' tsam las skyes pa nam mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las skyes pa/ /bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul phra na phung po'i sa
bon las/ /sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams ni phyi dang tha dad min/ /gal te lhan cig rab tu 'jig par gyur na de tshe tha dad gzugs dang lhan cig tu/ /sa dang chu me
rnams lha yi de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa min/ /srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te/ /sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha'
sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus/ /lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga der ni mthong min yod ces grags/ /srog chags rnams ni sngon gyi lus po spangs
nas slar yang lus gzhan bsam pas 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'jig 'gyur/ /srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi
phreng ba chen po bzhin du rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te/ /sprin bor nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis 'gro/ /srog chags srog dang
lhan cig bem po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la sogs rab ldan pa/ /srid pa sum cu rtsa gcig rnams su dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho nar 'gro/ /gcig min rnam pa lnga po
yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid ni/ /nam mkha' las 'das mi gsal min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min/ /sems las 'dod pas
rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min zhing srog rlung med na sems med la/ /srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel pas
'jug /phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni bem po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag dang / /phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams yongs su gyur par rab tu 'byung bas
na| |ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i chos rnams 'gyur bar nges pa yin/ /thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur yang na gang zhig rtag pa nyid
ni 'gyur ba med/ /ther zug pa dang ther zug dman pa'i skyes bu khyab bdag gis ni srid sgrub la bshad de/ /phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni rig bdag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid
du 'gyur/ /phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur/ /phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag dang byas pa yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur/ /
thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam ste sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams/ /gzugs dang reg bya sgra dang dri dang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phran phung por gyur pa min/ /rnam par shes
las 'bras bu'i dngos po rang byung ba las min zhing med dang 'dren mas min/ /sa bon las ni myu gu la sogs bzhin du 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu med min/ /rkang dang rus pa
chu ba sha dang khu khrag tshil bu pags pa rdul phran phung bo min/ /rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro/ /der ni lus len slar yang srid ba
gzhan du de yang rnam rig tsam pa de nyid de/ /'dod chags gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po rnam par nyams/ /gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du gyur na 'dir ni don
gzhan rnam par rig tsam du/ /de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir/ /gang zhig 'di yi ma rig blo bur ba ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni rnam rig
min| |sngon du rnam par dag pa lhan skyes bem po yang ni rig pa rnam dag 'gyur/ /bem po ma lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'gro bas sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas grub/ /de yi rnam
rig mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs 'gyur/ /bye brag par 'gyur yang na ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu gu sogs/ /gcig phyir
'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te brgya la rtag pa cung zad yod ma yin/ /thog mar phra rab rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i cha med gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' la/ /phra rab rdul rnams 'dus
pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba'i srid pa rdul phran phung po min/ /rdul phran bral te nam mkhar gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min/ /gal te lus po rdul phran
phung por gyur na de tshe su yi lus po 'jig par 'gyur/ /'byung ba brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul phran de rdul kyang / /sdud dang
skyed pa bral bas nam mkha'i dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas/ /phra rab rdul rnams cha shas drug la slar yang cha shas drug ste slar yang gang gi cha shas drug /
de yi cha shas phra rab cha yis nam mkha'i khams 'di gang bar cis mi 'grub/ /dngul chu nor bu'i rdul phran cha bcas cha med tshad ma dag gis bsgrub byar gyur pa min/ /cha dang
bcas na zangs ma 'bigs min rdo yang min la rdul phran phung po cha med min/ /dngul chus zangs ma reg cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi rin po cher 'gyur la/ /rnam par
shes pa rnam rtog drug gi nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur min/ /phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshad mas grub pa min/ /rnam
par shes pa'i bag chags dag las nam mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grags/ /gang phyir dmus long mig med yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yin te
phyir min/ /mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pas phyi rol gzugs las yin gyi bag chags min/ /gang zhig sgra rnams ma lus rna bas thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams
kyis thos pa min/ /sna nad bcas bas gang zhig dri yi rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin/ /lce yi nad can ro mi myong la de nyid la yang nad med lce yis myong bar byed/ /rnam par
shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min/ /rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad ma yis/ /drag po dang ni tshangs
pa'am seng+ges kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas/ /rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par 'gyur/ /skye ba med cing 'gag pa
med la mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung / /'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i chad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang / /rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos lha dang lha min klu
dang bdag lta bu yi rgyal sras rnams/ /gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dang nam mkha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams/ /khro bo rnams dang srin po sha yi dam tshig can gyi stag gzig
byol song dmyal ba rnams/ /gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan rang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngo bo nyid/ /rnam pa thams cad rdul phran gyis stong nam mkha'i dkyil ltar son pa'am
rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin/ /gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin/ /gang gis de rtogs sems la dri med dri ma ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas
te| |gang zhig sbyin pa la sogs lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams dang / /byams pa la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba
stong pa la sogs rnam par thar pa dang / /tshul khrims la sogs phung po gang zhig yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun tu mi rtog pa/ /de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan
nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' min/ /gang zhig gzugs sogs khams drug dang ni yul drug kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur ro/ /phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la
sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang dri la sogs pa drug /stong pa snang dang mun pa sa gsum gnas su rnam pa kun nas rnam par mi rtog pa/ /snang bas rab tu sad pa rab rib rnam
par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags min/ /'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal po bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa po/ /klu sgrub rdo rje can yang srid pa
gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing / /nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste/ /ye shes mtha' can nag po'i ming can gzhan

yang ma d+hu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung / /ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag rdub dag kyang de bzhin thod par chang 'thung zhing / /kha T+wAM ga dang rus pa'i rgyan cha chang snod cang te'u ster ba

nag po'i ming can no/ /slob ma rnams la ges sngon dang ni kun tu rgyu ba ster ba na bza' sngon po can/ /sha yi dam tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje 'o/ /gos sngon
can ni rta mchog bdag po dpal ldan ha la sogs pa'i ming can gyis bsnun 'gyur/ /ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur/ /rab
tu khros pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon nus nag po'i khrag 'thung byed/ /sha yi dam tshig can gyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur/ /mchog gi thugs rje
can gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po la 'doms pa/ /gang gi ming gis rnam rtog yid kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa min/ /de rnams bzang po'i
thabs ni sna tshogs sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni/ /log par g.yem pa dge ba rnam par bral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /skyes bus mtho ris gnyis skyes
'jigs byed la sogs phyugs kyi sha yis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyis/ /de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng+ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs/ /khro bo'i dbang po
srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur/ /gang yang rung pa blo gros dman pa dge ba rnams bral de ni bdud kyis bslu bar 'gyur/ /khro bo'i dbang po srin
po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur/ /mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha dang khrag gis bgos pa'i mgo bo
yis| |nges par mnar med dmyal bar rtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba ba la ster bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par
thon par 'gyur/ /bdud kyis sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dwags mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed par 'gyur/ /sems can bslu phyir kha cig tu ni 'jigs pa min bar bdag nyid gzugs
ni ston par byed/ /lha rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu ma byed/ /sems can rnams ni bskyang phyir kha cig tu yang bdag nyid gzugs ni 'jigs byed
ston par byed/ /long ba brlag phyir 'jig pa'i dus kyi ma lha'i 'jig byed dus ni me lha rab tu byung / /bde byed kyis bsad lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis 'thud bar 'gyur/ /
nya dang rus sbal phag rgod mi yi seng+ge lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes/ /nya dang de bzhin ri dwags la sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon par khyab 'jug gis mi bza'/ /
sa gsum bla mas yi dwags mkha' 'gro rnams ni smin phyir he ru ka yi gzugs su byas/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos rA ma Na yi chud ma dbrog phyir gnas 'jog gzugs su byas/ /
'jigs sde med pas skyabs seng bu rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyi bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings/ /kir mi ri yis sha yi ched du sum cu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs kyi chos byed cing / /
lha dang klu yi dbang po rnams kyi dam tshig 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rig par byos/ /lha bshos 'bras chan khur ba zho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa 'o thug sha khar rnams/ /khro bo rnams dang srin po
rnams la phyugs kyi sha yi gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang chang / /sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang bu ram zhor bcas 'bras chan lhung bzed dka' thub la/ /khrus bcas sbrang rtsi mar
gsar za zhing tsan+dan me tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod/ /gang gis chang sogs mchod pa de dag lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka la min/ /srin po'i dbang po mtshan mo rgyu ba'i

dam tshig dpal ldan rgyal po zla ba seng+ges spyad/ /mdung can ma dang drau ba ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bu bud med min te khyo mo lnga lnga yang / /gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang snod nang gi chu yi gtsang

sbra an+ta la sogs yul/ /sin+d+hu'i yul na ba lang sha za kha ba can ri gnyis skyes rgyal bo'i mi rnams chang 'thung zhing / /gA ri la sogs na ma he d+hu sha ma kha bar mi se re na rta glang sha/ /de dzid stag
dang mi sha za la po kar yul na bong bu rnga mo khyi yi sha/ /bram ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po gar+N+Na ra yi yul/ /nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su mdangs rigs la sogs
khyim du chang 'thung bkag la rigs skyes 'thung / /bud med rnams kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jib par byed cing gnyis skyes kyis bshad pa'i/ /khrus
dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa'i pi ra'i yul la sogs pa rnams/ /pha dag shi na ma dag bu yi chung mar bag ma len pa ngas par go kha'i yul/ /rug mar spun zla'i tsha
mo len la ma khar yang ni spun zla'i bu mo rang gi bus/ /so ra me dang tsam pa ka la sogs par tsha mo'i bu mo dang na tshi mo'ang yin/ /spun zla'i bu mo chung mar len pa'i yul 'khor chen po kar+N+Na
ta la sogs par ro/ /ma ya tshi mo chung mar len la ma la yang ste khol mo len par ra'i yul/ /bod na khrus dang gtsang sbra med la pa ru ku len+ta ra go stan rigs ngan yul/ /skyes pa'i
bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su chu yi char 'bebs byed/ /gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rig byed ngag dag bden pa min/ /sha yi dam
tshig can gyis sha za'i yul can phru gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig rig byed byed pa drang srong mchog gi dka' thub can gyi rig byed ngag de gnyis/ /mtho ris don du mi
dang ba lang gsod cing b+ha gar dkrugs pa zhi ba'i btung / /zhi ba'i rig byed dag de dag gis sems can sun 'byin pa la rab tu mkhas pa rnams/ /ba lang pags pa'i zhi ba'i btung ba b+ha ga
mchog tu dkrugs pa rta yi pho rtags bcad pa la/ /khu ba khrag gis rnams par bgegs pa sbrang dang mar du bcas pa lce yig bldag par byed/ /de lta'i sha za'i spyod bas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed

dag gis gnyis skyes rnams kyi sgrub/ /nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems dang snying rje ldan pa'i daN+Di mtho ris rnam phar nyams/ /pha la sogs pa'i don du 'tsho ba byed cing khyim pa mchod sbyin dus su
phyugs dag gsod/ /dka' thub rnams ni 'tshe ba spong zhing dka' thub nges par gdung zhing gong ma goms sogs yod/ /daN+Di dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gegs par 'gyur
te de yang gang gi phyir/ /shes pas grol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs ngag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni du 'bod 'gro/ /lha la sogs pa mchod pa nyid pas gal te sha zos pa la nyes pa mi
skyes na| |bcu gnyis pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi klu yi tshes dang nyi ma 'pho ba'i dus dag tu/ /khyab 'jug la sogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi ma bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi bza'/ /pha la
gnas su sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster byed mkhas pa rnams/ /'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs rgyud rnam par spangs/ /bsod nams sdig pa'i
mthu yis mtho ris ngan song dag tu rab tu skye la lus bsregs nas/ /gnas dang gnas su rus pa'i dum bu'i 'jog cing chang bu dag kyang ster byed su zhig ni/ /ma yin su zhig pha yin de ni lus
dang bral nas gang zhig skye gnas gzhan bzhugs pa/ /bram ze la sogs mchod pas gal te de yi pha ma mchod par rig byed las grub na/ /bram ze la sogs ma
zhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur/ /gang gi pha dag dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis yi dwags skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong / /nges pa'i bu yis rab tu byin
pa'i chang bu len par 'gyur la chu yang len par byed/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag po nyi ma de ni ci yis bza'/ /sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster ba
'chi ba'i 'jigs skyed lha rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur/ /zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bo sems can dang bcas gtso bo ci zhig zla ba bza' de ni/ /sems can rnams la bde ba ster
zhing mchog tu 'jigs 'joms ci yis lha ma yin rnams skrag /gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang phyugs kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyi mchod bya ba/ /gang zhig yi dwags yi
khor yug gtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yul min/ /sa la sogs pa lha yi de nyid nye bar zhig par gyur ba dbang po'i spyod yul min/ /tshangs gzugs sna tshogs nam
mkha' tsam yang seng+ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid de/ /yi dwags la sogs rlung gi lus po rang bzhin yon tan dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dman/ /sa dang chu dang me yi lus
can sa dang bar snang dag tu kha dog rags sogs ldan/ /rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig gis gzung bya'i kha dog gzugs/ /dri ni sna yis gzung bya 'dir ni lce yis ro
myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so/ /rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog ge'i tshad ma yis/ /gzugs med de yis sa dang bar snang dag tu de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs
rnams bskyod pa min/ /mo gsham bu dang mtshungs pa nam mkha' tsam la nam mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang / /gzhan dag gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin za rlung rnams ro yi dbang
po gnyis/ /bram ze sogs kyis mthong 'gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan mor me med na yang / /byi ba la sogs phyogs dang mtshams su son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar
'gyur| |srin po dang ni yi dwags la sogs tshogs pa mtshan mo'i dus su lha rnams ma lus kyang / /bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar na skar ma ma lus kyang / /bya rog srin

bya lca spyad khyi rnams ma lus 'byung dang 'gyur 'gyur byung ba ma lus ston/ /de bzhin lhag pa'i chang bus bsgrubs pa'i the brang dag gis skyes bu rnams la yang / /byol srong rnams ni gang du rang gi sems
la babs pa'i sa phyogs der ni gnas 'cha' la/ /de dag shes pa bram ze rnams la srid pa gang las mig gis gzung bya'i rgyu gzhan min/ /lha mo gzhon nu ma la zhugs na byung dang 'byung 'gyur
'byung ba ma lus ston par byed/ /bram ze shi nas yi dwags gyur bas rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'don par byed/ /sbyin bdag srin por gyur
na khyim du bong ba so phag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen par byed/ /blo dang ldan pa'i spyod btsan rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur ba'i yi dwags spyod pa ltos/ /mun pa bsal ba min
par gyur la mun las khwa ta de yi bshad pa las byung ba/ /mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jug 'phrog byed skyes byed des na mes po khwa ta mchod par 'os/ /ba lang rgyab dpar yi kha
dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud med b+ha gar phyag byed cing / /khams rnams gtong la gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa balngag pa gang zhig bram ze rnams/ /sgra med yi
ge med las nam mkhar 'gyur te nam mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur pa las/ /rlang las me la me las chu yin chu las sa ste sa las 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams/ /zas dang chu dag
zos dang 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'de dag /bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog chags phun po rab tu 'byung / /
mo gsham bu yi thu bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rtul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar phra/ /nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul dang bral zhing yon tan med pa nam
mkha'i rtags/ /rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam ma ba'i dngos po de rnams so/ /gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing nam mkha'i sa steng rtag tu zhi ba'i grub mthar
ldan| |gang zhig de yi nus pa b+ha ga zhes bya ba rnams gsum lam ldan sgrub mo 'jigs byed ma/ /de ni nam mkha' las 'das nam mkha'i dbang phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtswa bcings 'khyil
ba can| |nam mkha'i mtha' can thig le'i phreng ba mgo nas bshad lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs ma/ /mchu 'phyang skar ma'i mig can gnas dang 'jigs pa skyes byed za byed rnams kyi za byed ma//
gsal dang mi gsal gcig ma rig ma rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma/ /rig ma'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug rigs dang rigs min gyur ba'i thar ba ster ba'i dbang
gis 'bigs/ /mi gsal bya rog ra yi gzhu la 'dir ni rang gi yon tan rus spal sbu yis byas/ /nam mkha'i me tog lcags mda'i mda' gzhus gang dag 'bigs pa des ni rgyal po
dbang bskur 'gyur/ /gal te skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu ru sgyu ma chen mo byed dam he ru kar 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag khyab 'jug gam ni rtag pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar min/ /'di
ni thub pa'i tshig las srog chags srog ni rdul phran byed dam byed du 'jug pa med/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams sdig las bde dang sdug bsngal rnag bzhin 'bras bu byin par
'gyur| |gang zhig srin po yi dwags mkha' 'gro bdud kyi rigs kyi sha yi dam tshigs can gyis bsgrubs/ /grub pa'i tshig gis skye bo gzhan rnams kyis ni
de rnams nges par 'bebs par byed pa ste/ /stag la sogs pa 'ges la chu la me 'bar glang chen rengs byed mtshon bya sogs kyis min/ /sngags kyis tha brang la sogs
rnams kyis sa yi 'khor yug gtogs par rje bo'i bya ba byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs rten dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas pas bsgrubs nas/ /gang
gis grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa yi steng du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bo rnams la ster/ /skal ba ngan dang nad kyis sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa thams cad
'joms par byed/ /seng+ge la sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi ba la sogs byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub don du gcig tu sbyin pa la sogs lam ni dge bcu ldan las
gzhan ma gsungs/ /dbu ma'i dga' ba gcig pu b+ha gar dkrugs pa dang ldan 'grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin/ /bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub
rdo rje'i sa gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du min/ /sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa yi dwags sa gzhir shing gcig las ni gzhan du min/ /bde gshegs dam tshig can gyis
byang chub lha las gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la 'jug /sha yi dam tshig can gyis grub pa'i yi dwags 'jug pas phran tshegs las la rab tu 'jug /sangs rgyas lhas
'jug pa na bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston/ /grub pa'i yi dwags 'jug pa sha yi dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo ston byed/ /sangs rgyas
rnams kyi stobs bcu skyed par mdzad pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la min/ /grub pa rnams kyis ri dwags rigs bskyed ston pa 'jigs byed ri las ri gzhan la ma yin/ /dpal
ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' sangs rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan/ /gang zhig drag po dur khrod dag tu phyugs kyi skye bo stobs can thod pa can rgyud
ston| |rgyal po'i rgyal srid lha khang sa steng las ni 'byung ba de rjes lha yi rgyal srid do/ /gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo legs par bzhag par gyur bas thar pa rab tu 'byung bar
'gyur| |rgyal po srog gcod pa las dmyal bar 'jug par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin/ /rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du
grub pa'i tshig ma yin/ /sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang srid ba gzhan du lha min rigs su skyes/ /sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lha yi
rigs su 'di skye'o/ /mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro/ /mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed
pas slar yang srid gzhan 'jigs byed nyid du 'gro/ /sems can phan pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par bde bar gshegs pas gsungs/ /sems
can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig par nam mkha' tsam pos ston/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jigs byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can rnams
kyis bstan pa lha rten gang / /g.yul du zhugs pa'i stag gzig rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyis de rnams ma lus 'jigs par byed/ /de rnams rigs gzhi gzhan gyi nor mi len
cing bden par smra dang gtsang smra rab tu 'jug /gzhon nu gzhan gyi chung ma spong zhing dka' thub nges pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bsten/ /khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgra gcan
mtshan mo so so'i dus su nyin gung phyed yol dang / /srod dang thun gsum dang dang nyi ma ri la sha ra bar gyur nas lan lngar phyag byed cing / /sa steng lha yul dag tu stag
gzig mu stegs dag la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skyob/ /drag po'i g.yul ngor pha ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la rgyal po ni/ /rgyal po 'thab mo yin
pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis 'jigs byed la sogs mchod nas su/ /sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdung rgyud 'chad pa 'byung / /grub
pa bya Di dbang po sbyin pa mi phyug sa zhabs dang dum bu zhes bya thod pa can/ /dge slong klu sgrub zhes bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa/ /slob dpon
'od brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa rnams/ /gzhan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kye ma de lha ta yang dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod/ /dge
bcu'i lam gyis grub par gyur ba 'phags pa'i lha dang swa ba'i na bza' rta dbyangs dang / /phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pa zla ba pad+ma'i myu gu zhes/ /pod go sa la
rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po in+d+ra bo d+hi dang / /de bzhin gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jigs byed 'phrog byed sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /sa dang chu dang
byin za rlung dang nam mkha' mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yan lag drug /de yi dbyangs yig ring dang thung bas 'gyur gyi gzhan la dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min/ /nyi ma gang du
tshangs pa'i sa bon nye bar 'jigs par 'gyur ba des na dus kyi phyar/ /sa gzhi skyong ba mchod na 'dir ni g.yul ngor kla klo dang ni mu stegs 'jigs par 'gyur/ /thung dang ring ba
lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan mtshungs pa dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min/ /a sogs ma ning dbyangs yig stobs bcu mnga' bas gsung ste nyi
ma 'thab mo zad phyir ra/ /ring dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du a ko ka ni ring po phyugs bdag tshig las 'gyur/ /de phyir ma ning yod la i ko ya na tsa mi byed po'i phyogs nas nges par
bskyod| |thog ma'i lo nas nam mkha' mkha' dang gzhan yang zla ba tsin tsi ni yi dbang phyug 'byung / /de yi bka' yis yi dwags dbang bsgyur dus la ka sogs grogs ldan sgur mor
byin brlabs pa/ /phyi nas sa stong son pa'i gnas dang zhing gi lha gang drug cu rtsa brgyad kla klo yi/ /mgon po ma d+hu ma ti bu dang bu mo sbun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jigs par byed/ /der
ni bco brgyad lo la brgya yis brgya la bsgyur bas ma kha la sogs 'phags pa'i yul/ /kla klo rnams kyi lha khang mun can nyi mar rtogs pa gang de nga yis brlag par bya/ /sangs
rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum cho gas skye rgu rnams ni der bzhag nas/ /bde la bkod de ka lA pa gang lha gnas dga' ldan mchog tu nyi ma 'gro bar bya/ /nam
mkha' mkha' dang dus dang dbang po mig gis dus kyi dus su son pa'i lo yi tshad/ /slar yang skye bo rnams ni kla klor 'jug ste ji srid bco brgyad lo la bsgyur dang bcas pa'i bar/ /
yang nas yang du nga yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams gzhig par bya ba nyid/ /ji srid sa dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan nam mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams/ /phyogs skyong
phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lha nam mkha' sa gzhir yi dwags bram ze ba lang sogs/ /sa 'og klu dang lha min rnams ni sa yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod/ /don
kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong ba nyi mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod/ /slob dpon
mchog la gzhol bas srung ba lnga po rab tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod/ /sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga dro gso sbyong blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du nges par gdon/ /klog mkha'

bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyin dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur/ /slar yang de la bsrung ba bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang bya/ /zho dang 'bras chan nyi mar rta dang glang po'i
gtor ma 'bras chan 'o ma zla ba la/ /'bras chan la sogs mig dmar gza' la me tog bcud dang bcas pa'i 'bras chan gza' lag la/ /'bras chan ser po bu ram sogs kyi gtor na
lha yi bla ma 'o thug sha khar gyis/ /pa ba sangs la zan dron mar nag bcas pas spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de bskyon la/ /nyi ma slar yang phyogs su glang po rnams kyi gtor ma bya zhing khur
ba 'bras chan gyis/ /glang po rta mchog rnams kyis zhi dang rgyas pa'i don du sbyin sreg nyi ma la sogs gzar/ /'bru dang mar gsar so ma dur ba mda' yi
yam shing brgya dang 'o ma'i mchod yon btung / /sbyin sreg rjes la dung phor gang ba'i zhi ba'i chu yis rta dang glang po khrus bya 'o/ /yi dwags la sogs gtor ma sran tshan sha dang chang
rnams nyin mtshan dus su sbyin par 'gyur/ /srin po la sogs yungs kar dang ni rdo rje phur bus phyogs mtshams gtogs par phur bus gdab/ /slob dpon gyis ni srung ba lnga yi cho
gas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya/ /gang dang gang gis yul mtha'i bar gyi skye rgu nyin dang mtshan du zhi dang rgyas 'gyur ba/ /thog mar dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dag rang
bzhin yon tan dbang las pad+ma lnga yis bskor/ /gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang las sa dag kha sbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol tu/ /gang zhig zur rnams dar dbyangs bcings
pa phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de las rdo rje'i phreng bar 'gyur/ /rgyal chen phyogs kyi zur la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogs mtshams rnams/ /de nang zlum po'i snam
bu phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de la snod dang rtse mo'i phreng du 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i ge sar cha la 'dir ni dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid do/ /chu skyes 'dab mar srung
'khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhin gnyis pa gsum par de/ /de ltar pad+ma gnyis la 'gyur te nye ba'i snying po chu skyes 'dab ma rnam gnyis der/ /klu rnams zung gi bar du phyogs dang
mtshams kyi 'dab mar bar du de bzhin lha dang lha min dang / /gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams/ /srung 'khor 'dis ni thams
cad srung bar 'gyur te khrag dang gi wang la sogs rnams kyis bri/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang ma lus rgyas sras rnams kyis srung ba lnga sogs ma lus srung 'khor gsungs/ /bud med bu 'dod pa
las bu dang rgyal po dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur/ /nad pa nad las grol bar 'gyur te sa yi steng du dbul po rnams kyis nor rnyed 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med rnams kyis
'bras bu ster bar 'gyur ba sngon gyi bsod nams mthu yis so/ /bsod nams sems can rnams la phan gtags dge bcu'i lam gyis mchod las nam mkha' sogs la min/ /bram
ze gang zhig chang 'thung gyur dang gcer bu pa'am ral pa can nam dbyug gu can/ /dge tshul dang ni tshogs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral bas grub mtha'i spyod pa nyams/ /sum cu'i dam tshig
can gyi mi yi dbang pos de rnams yul nas bskrad par bya/ /gang phyir de dag rnams kyis dge dang mi dge'i las byas drug cu'i cha shas rgyal po yin/ /yugs sa mo rnams gang zhig 'khrig pa spyad
nas ngan pa dmyal ba'i 'bras ster me la btso bar byed/ /gang du yul na bdud ris de yod mi bdag dpung bcas der ni nam yang grub ma yin/ /rgyal po sa yi
steng du rgyal srid dang ni dgra dag 'joms dang nor rnyed bsod nams kyis/ /skal pa bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lha yul sa steng grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin/ /sa steng ma lus mi
yi rgyal po sbyin las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lha rgyal po/ /bzod pa tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang mtshan du rtsod pa las ni sbyin pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu bsam gtan la
gnas mchog tu rang bzhin rnam par bral ba shes rab kyis thabs 'phel/ /shes rab thabs kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang stobs dang stong nyid ye shes rdo rje 'o/ /chos kyi dbyings su
gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gal te 'khor bar byon pa ma yin na/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yul dang yul can lhan cig nam mkha'i khams rnams
su| |de ni rdzun gyi tshig las de bzhin bcom ldan rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha gang bzhugs zhes pa/ /'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam bral rdo rje sems las gzhan
du min| |changs pa la sogs lha rnams sa steng dmyal ba'i dmyal bas 'dir ni zhi ba la sogs kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub mtha'i chos su
gsal bar byas/ /tshangs pa la sogs bsod nams longs spyod mthar ni lha yul sa steng dag nas ltung bar 'gyur/ /srin pos byin brlabs rnams kyis de las thar pa 'dod pa de ni nam
mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin/ /byis pa rnams la rang rang ma yis rdzun tshig 'jam pos bdag nyid drung du 'khrid par byed/ /chang pa stong pa ston cing bdag gi lag la ril bu yod pa longs
shig bu zhes brjod/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyi lag nas shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis bdag nyid drung du 'khrid/ /nam mkha' tsam zhig ston cing bdag gi rigs kyi mya ngan las
'das longs shig bu zhes gsungs/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong gsal bar mdzad/ /de rnams de yis sangs rgyas nyid ni thub
pa'i bka' yi gsang sngags theg pa bden pa yin/ /gang zhig bskal pa dpag med byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan to/ /mo gsham bu ni lus med ma lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'dus pa rnams/ /srog ni nam mkha'i me
tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas klo ga cing dgod/ /srog chags bya rog rwa min bsod nams sdig pa'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor/ /srog chags gang zhig
rdul phran phung po'i lus ni sa steng 'chi ba'i tshe na mi ltung med/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas sangs rgyas pa yi gang zhig lam bstan pas/ /
rgyal ba stobs bcu dang ldan ston pa'i sras dang sangs rgyas pa dang lha klu dri za lha min dang / /khro bo srin po sha yi dam tshig can dang stag gzig rnams dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams/ /
de kun shaM b+ha la zhes bya bar rgyal mchog bzhugs gnas der ni nyi ma bdag gis bstan/ /dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig bdud rnams
btul mdzad pa/ /de kun shaM b+ha la yi dpal ldan kA la pa yi skyed mos tshal gyi dus 'khor gyi/ /don chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rtas
dris| |dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rin chen seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa stobs bcu mnga' ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud las phyung ba dpal dus kyi
'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong gnyan chung dar ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsa kra la gu tan+t+ra rA dza hri d+ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag
'tshal lo/ /thams cad mkhyen dang ye shes sku dang nyin byed sku ste pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du yangs pa'i spyan/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs phyir lha yi mchog gi sa phyag 'tshal
ba dang zla ba bzang po yis/ /spyi bos btud de lag pa'i pad+mo thal mo sbyar nas yan lag mchog gi steng du rab bzhag nas/ /a sogs ka sogs 'dus rim dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor
lo'i rnal 'byor mi rnams 'grol ba'i rgyu ru zhus/ /stong pa dang ni ye shes thig le rdo rje mchog 'dzin sangs rgyas lha dang lha ma yin rnams dang / /phyi rol dang ni nang dang gzhan la rang bzhin
rnams dang skyes bu nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid dang / /lus la sna tshogs pa yi tshad dang srid pa gsum gyi spros pa lha dang lha min bza' ba dang / /dkyil 'khor dbang dag de lta bu rnams thams
cad lha dang mi yi bla mas yang dag bshad du gsol/ /zla ba bzang po bdag dgyes de ni rab mchog lha dang mi dang srin po lha ma yin dang klu/ /gang zhig 'dod chags bral ba rnams dang mchog
gi drang srong rigs kyi mya ngan 'das pa la sogs pa'i/ /'dzin ma'i mthar thug khyod kyis zhus pa de mi shes pas tshig gi gnas ldan lus dbus ma lus pa/ /rnal 'byor 'di nyid dkyil

'khor dang ni dbang dag rnam par bshad par bya yi mi bdag shin tu nyon/ /dus kyi stong pa rnams las rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams/ /rgyu skar rnams dang nyi zla skar
ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang / /byol song skye gnas rnam bzhi rnam pa sma tshogs sa dang sa 'og dag la mi dang dmyal ba dang

chu las tshwa 'byung bzhin du sgong las kyang yin te stong pa las ni 'byung ba nyid rnams bskyed/ /sku dang ye shes nam mkha' sgrib bral rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang skye 'gro dang / /
mi mthong ba yi lha nyid skye ba rnams dang gnas ni rnam pa bcu ru brjod pa rdo rje'i sku/ /sngags kyi skya gnas de ltar yang dag 'byung ba 'di nyid slar log pa las 'jig ste mi bdag kye/ /
de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs ma yin te sems kyi rnam rtog grol ba'o/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ /phyi 'jig rten khams kyi le'u mdor
bsdus pa ste le'u dang po'i rgyud kyi snying po'o// //khu ba las ni rkang mar rus pa rtsa ru 'gyur te rdul las nges par pags pa khrag dang sha/ /mngal dbus zla ba gcig tu khrag dang
sa bon dag las rab tu bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi ror gyur pas/ /phyi nas sa bon myu gu las ni rang gi snying khar rtsa ni shin tu phra ba rnam pa bcu/ /lte bar brgyad pa brgyad de gzhan yang lag pa
rkang pa gdong rnams phyi ru 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni/ /zla ba gnyis pa rdzogs nas lag pa rkang pa gdong rnams cung zad 'di ni mdo ru bstan pa'o/ /zla ba gsum pa rdzogs nas lag pa rkang
ma mgrin pa rnams kyi rtse mo ma lus mnyam par 'gyur/ /zla ba bzhi pa la ni rkang lag gdong dang mgrin pa rnams kyi phyogs su rtsa ni phra mo rnams/ /zla ba lnga par sha rnams la ni brten pa'i rus
pa nam mkha' ro dang me dang tshigs rnams kyang / /zla ba drug pa la yang sha dang khrag dang tshor ba bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal rnams su 'gyur/ /thub pa mchog la smin ma dang ni skra dang bug pa
spu rnams kyang ni zla ba'i rjes nyid la/ /nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa rnams rab tu 'phel ba stong ba stong ba mig gi grangs rnams kyis/ /tshigs dang rus pa rnams dang rkang dang ro ldan dri chen
dri chu rnams ni brgyad pa nyid la 'o/ /bug pa zhes byar skye ba'i dus su de la skye gnas kyis bsdams mi bzad sdug bsngal chen por 'gyur/ /mngal du mngal gnas nyid dang skye ba'i dus
dang byis pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyis mi bzad sdug bsngal lo/ /gzhon nu lang tsho dag la bud med nor dang bkra shis 'dod pa nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen pos gang / /rga dang 'chi ba'i sdug
bsngal chen po dag ste slar yang du 'bod la sogs 'gro drug 'jigs ster ba/ /'gro ba 'di rnams ma lus sgyu ma la rmongs gyur pas sdug bsngal ba las sdug bsngal 'gyur ba'o/ /'khor ba'i
nang nas gal te mi nyid dag tu gyur kyang chos kyi blo ni brgya la ma zhig na 'ong / /de las dge ba'i dbang gris sangs rgyas nyid la rjes chags 'gyur zhing dang po'i theg par rab tu 'jug /de las
dpal ldan rdo rje theg pa dang ni ma lus snying po sgom pa'i blo 'jug brgya lam na/ /de las sangs rgyas nyid de 'dod mchog bde ba'i go 'phang la 'jug e
ma shin tu dka' ba'o/ /mngal du yang dag dag pa'i sku ste rab tu skye ba'i dus nas so skye'i bar nyid chos kyi skye/ /so rnams ba rjes pa'i bar gyis rgyal ba'i longs spyod rdzogs skur
nges par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye/ /de nas mi rnams nges par 'chi ba'i mtha' ru sprul pa'i sku ru rab tu gsal bar brjod pa ste/ /de ltar 'di ni ye shes rnam shes dbye bas
mngal dang phyi ru rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur ba'o/ /slar yang rnam shes zla ba nyi ma pad+mar 'dres par gyur pa rnams ni mngal du dag pa'i sku/ /khams dang phung po rnam pa bcu po skye bar
'gyur ba gang zhig rgyal ba'i chos skur 'gyur ba ste/ /de nas rna ba sgra la sogs pa skye ba yon tan dbang las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur/ /de nas skra la sogs pa skye ste
mngal nas skye ba'i dus 'di sprul pa'i sku ru brjod pa'o/ /gang zhig skyes nas dbugs 'byung ba ni nges par de nyid dag pa'i sku ru rab tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /de nas gang zhig so skyes gyur
nas tshig mi gsal bar slar yang de bzhin chos kyi sku ru brjod/ /de nas gnyis skyes pa rnams brjes pa rgyal ba longs spyod rdzogs par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye/ /so rnams
brjes nas 'chi ba'i mthar thug rgyal ba'i bdag po sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur ba phyi rol tu/ /ye shes dang ni rnam shes 'dres pa'i nyi ma ri bong can bcas ye shes rdo rje la sogs rnams/ /mngal du
sku yi rdo rje la sogs skye ba stobs dang ldan pa rim pas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ /dang por mngal 'dir dpal ldan sku yi rdo rjer 'gyur te gsung gi rang bzhin rab tu skye ba'i dus/ /so rnams skyes
pa nges par thugs te slar yang lhung nas skye ba ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur ba'o/ /dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'gyur/ /longs spyod
las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag pa sems can kun gyi don mdzad phyir/ /'khrig dus gnas skabs dang ni shin tu gnyid log pa dang sku yi dbye ba gzhan dang sad pa rnams/ /de
ltar sku yi dbye ba rnams kyis yid ni gnas te srog chags rnams kyi lus la rnam pa bzhi/ /sprul ba yid dang lus dang ngag dang dbang po rnams kyis longs spyod byed pa po ru 'gyur ba'o/ /longs spyod
rdzogs pa yon tan dbang las sems kyis mthong bar 'gyur te chos kyi sku ni gnyid log pa/ /dag pa 'di ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le gsum nyid grol ba'i mtha' ru bde bar 'gyur ba yis/ /de phyir
rnal 'byor pa yis nyin mtshan dus su de nyid mi 'gyur ba yi don du bsgom par bya/ /gang zhig g.yon nas srog nyid rab tu rgyu na de bzhin g.yas su bskum par rab tu 'gyur ba ni/ /g.yon brkyang
'dug stangs brjod de de ltar me dang nyi mar rgyu ba mnyam dang g.yas brkyang 'dug stangs so/ /sa ga zlum po dag dang nges par mchog tu rol pa rnams dang pad+ma rdo rje'i
'dug stangs rnams/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam la gnas nam mkha' la sogs srog gi rlung lnga rnams ni rab tu rgyu ba'o/ /gsang ba gtsug tor dang ni lte ba rnams la lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i
sku ni rang bzhin med/ /snying ga'i 'khor lor chos kyi sku ru 'gyur te mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru yang dag 'gyur/ /thig le pad+mar yang ni sprul pa'i sku nyid 'gyur te yon tan

dbang las rim gyis lhag pa'i lha/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo mgrin pa'i 'khor lo spyi bo'i pad+mar chos dang longs spyod rdzogs dang dag pa'o/ /lte ba mgrin pa gsang ba spyi po snying ga rnams dang de bzhin
gtsug tor dbus nyid rnams la ni/ /yum dang gtso bo'i sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rim pas rnam pa gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba ste/ /pad+ma rnams la 'khor lo rin chen gri gug chu skyes ral gri rdo
rje rnam ldan rigs drug mchog /de rnams steng 'og rtsa gsum rnams la zla ba nyi ma ma yi dbye ba rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /ser skya phra mo lug ste rtsa rnams lam gsum nyid du gnas pa snar ma

dang ni glang chen lce/ /rgyal nyid drug pa dang ni rgyal ba 'gro med 'phyang pa nor te dpal ldan ku ha dgu pa'o/ /dung can phyogs kyi grangs te gang zhig byang chub sa bon bde ba'i mthar ni 'dzag go mi
bdag kye/ /de ltar dpal ldan rtsa yi 'khor lo tshigs kyi dbye ba du mas rnam pa mang por 'gyur ba'o/ /dbang po me dang gshin rje bden bral chu lhar bcas pa rlung dang nor dang dbang ldan nyid rnams
kyi| |gnas 'di rnams su nus pa nyin mo mtshan mo la ni de yi rang bzhin rgyu zhing longs spyod do/ /de steng mgrin pa'i 'khor lor gza' tshogs dang bcas rgyu skar 'khor lo yang dag gnas par
brjod pa'o/ /changs pa'i gnas gyur dpal ldan dpral bar dbyangs kyis yongs bskor ba las thig le dkar po nges par 'dzag /spyi gtsug tu ni rgya mtsho snying gar brgyad dang spyi bor mi bdag
mgrin par so yi grangs rnams dang / /lte bar brgyad kyis brgyad bsgyur rnams dang mi yi bdag po nyis 'gyur gsang ba'i dbus su rab tu grub/ /rtsa drug 'khor lor 'gog 'gyur bcu yi
yul rnams 'joms te de rnams 'dus pa'i rang bzhin rnams su brjod/ /yang dang yang du nyis 'gyur du yang bsgyur bas bad kan dang ni mkhris pa rlung gi cha rnams so/ /de rnams kyis ni
nges par 'chi ba ster zhing bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang las tshe dang nad med ster/ /'khor lo drug la dus kyi rtsa yis 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'joms rnal 'byor rnams la 'dir ni ngo mtshar che/ /spyi
gtsug tu ni rgya mtsho dpral bar chu gter dus kyis bsgyur bas bad kan khams rnams rab 'khrug byed/ /mgrin par so dang snying ga'i chu skyes la ni mig gis dus bsgyur mkhris pa'i khams
rnams rab 'khrug byed/ /lte bar rgya mtsho drug cu slar yang gsang bar mi bdag de bzhin rlung gi khams rnams rab 'khrug byed/ /gzhan yang gsang bar phyogs dang
drug po gsungs pa rnams kyis nges par 'dus par 'gyur zhing 'gog pa'o/ /lte ba'i chu skyes nyi ma'i 'dab mar mchog gi rtsa rnams 'khor ba'i rim pas 'pho bar 'gyur ba ni/ /
srog zung rnams kyi 'pho ba dgu brgya nyis 'gyur rnams kyis karka Ta yi dus sbyor mi dbang skye/ /dus sbyor gang la nyi ma gnas pa nyin mtshan 'khor ba 'di nyid de ru reg par bya ba ni/
dus sbyor tshad rnams shes par bya ste bu lon nor du g.yas dang g.yon du rnam par bgrod pa'o/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma re re nub kyi phyogs su sa dang byang du chu dag rab tu rgyu pa 'o/ /lho ru me
dang shar du rab tu rgyu ba rlung ste gzhan yang 'dab ma'i dbus su stong pa'o/ /'pho ba lnga yi dbye ba rnams kyi mtshams nas rab tu rgyu ba'i cu'i dbugs las dman pa'o/ /de ltar
'pho ba'i dbye ba rnams ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su dus sbyor rnams kyis dbye bar 'gyur/ /stong pa la sogs de nyid lnga rnams byang nas nges par rab tu rgyu ste sa la sogs pa g.yas/ /
sgra gcan dus me dag dang zla ba nyi ma gza' lag sa skyes pa ba sangs dang bla ma dang / /mjug ring dal ba rnams ni nam mkha' la sogs dkyil 'khor rnams la bdag po bcu rnams
zhing can 'gyur/ /g.yon du zla drug zla ba dbang por 'gyur te g.yas phyogs su ni nyi ma nyid do mi bdag kye/ /de steng snying ga'i phyogs na nor gyi 'dab ma'i rtsa yi 'khor lo rnams ni yang dag
gnas pa'o/ /srog la sogs pa rlung gi tshogs rnams ri bong can dang nyi ma me rnams g.yon dang g.yas dang dbus/ /g.yon gyi zla ba'i rtsa nas ri bong can mtshan yin te g.yas kyi nyi ma
las ni khrag nyid do/ /dbus nas dus me'i rang bzhin dus sbyor rnams kyi mtshams su drug cu'i dbugs las dman pa rgyu ba'o/ /nor gyi pad+ma'i 'dab mar srog dang thur du rgyu dang mnyam

gnas gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung rnams dang / /khyab byed dang ni klu dang rus sbal dag dang rtsangs pa gzhan yang lha sbyin nor rgyal rlung rnams te/ /de ltar rtsa yi 'khor lor las kyi dbye bas rlung rnams
rnam pa bcu ru yang dag gnas pa ni/ /snar ma la sogs dung can mthar thug rtsa yi 'khor lo mtha' dag rnams ni snying ga'i pad+ma la'o/ /ye shes khams su thur sel rnam pa gsum zhes bya

par 'gyur te stong pa las kyang srog gi rlung / /rlung gi dbus gnas mnyam dang me las slar yang gyen du rgyu bar brjod de chu las khyab byed nyid/ /sa las klu dang de nas rus sbal rtsangs pa lha sbyin

nor rnams las ni rgyal ba rnams kyi rlung / /bzhi po rnams kyi rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams nyid las rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba'o/ /srog gi srog ldan byad cing nyi ma ri bong can nyid lam nas 'gro
ste bza' btung mtha' dag rnams/ /'og tu khyer ba thur du rgyu ba yin te lus la ma lus ro mnyam byed pa mnyam par brjod/ /lus la skyod byed pas shu
rgyu bar brjod pa kha dang lag pa rkang pas glu gar byed pas so/ /nad nyid byed pas khyab byed ces pas rang bzhin yon tan dbang las de bzhin lus 'joms byed pas so/ /klu yis sgrags

pa nyid de gsal bar lag pa dang ni rkang pa skum par byed pa rus sbal lo/ /khro dang 'khrug pa mtha' dag rtsangs pa'i rlung gis byed de glal bar byed pa lha sbyin nyid kyis so/ /lus la lnga 'gyur mthar
byed rlung gcig gis ni mi gtong ba de nor rgyal nyid kyis mi bdag kye/ /de ltar srog la sogs pa'i rlung rnams thams cad kyis ni rang bzhin gyur pa'i yon tan rnams mi 'dor/ /rtsa bar sa dang g.yon
du chu nyid rab tu yin te g.yas su byin za dang ni steng du rlung / /dbus su nam mkha' yin te sna bug gnyis po dag nas rim pas mnyam par rab tu rgyu ba'o/ /'di rnams nus pas rab tu
phug nas mchog gi rang bzhin 'gro zhing bcu gnyis mtha' nas cha mthar 'gro/ /zhing la sogs pa lag pa rkang pa dag gi pad+ma gnyis po sor mo ma lus rnams kyi mthar/ /'khor lo
can ni rang gi lus la rdo rje can te lha mchog bdag po yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog /rigs gcig yang dag ye shes yin te glang rta shing rta mngag gzhug 'khor rnams 'phags pa'i

tshad med do/ /drag po so so'i rang rgyal ming can nyid du 'gyur te ha nu man+d+ha nyan thos srog chags so/ /ma rungs kla klo'i dbang po sdig pa nye ste byed pa'i blo gros sdug bsngal stong nyid mi dge'i
las| /rta yi stobs nyid ma rag pa ste lha min stobs ni bdud kyi phyogs rnams bzhi po ma lus pa/ /de rnams 'thab pas sdud pa srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms pa ste rgyal bas dpal dang ldan
pa thar pa'i lam/ /kai la sha ru chos sbyin srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms pa ste rdzas kyis gang ba'i sa nyid khams dag pa/ /bu dag lha dang mi yi bla ma changs pa lha dbang rgyab dang mdun du 'byung bar
'gyur ba'o/ /srid gsum rnam par rgyal ba 'jam dpal 'jig rten mgon dang dpal ldan rdul dang byang chub sa bon no/ /sa steng rgyab tu tshangs pa la sogs sna tshogs rigs ni rnam par dag
pa'i sangs rgyas du ma'o/ /de ltar kla klo'i dbang po nges par 'thab par 'gyur ba lus can rnams kyi lus kyi dbus su'o/ /phyi ru sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis nges yin mkha'i yul du kla klo
'thab mo 'thab pas min/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo bsdus ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ /nang sems can khams kyi mdor bsdus pa ste le'u gnyis pa'i rgyud kyi snying po'o// //
dang por yang dag bsten bya'i bla ma rnams ni dam tshig ldan dang rdo rje'i theg la lhag par gnas/ /de nyid sgom dang ldan dang ma chags sdig pa rnam par spangs dang bzod dang rang bzhin lam
la gnas/ /slob ma rnams la lam ster dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms dang de kho na yi tshangs par spyod pa dang / /de rnams ldan pa bdud rnams rdo rje'i dbyug pa
sa yi steng du rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /nga rgyal ldan dang khro ba mngon du gyur dang dam tshig bral dang rdzas la chags dang thos pa med/ /slob ma rnams ni bslu ba dang ste bde ba
dam pa'i gnas la 'jigs sems dang ni dbang mthob/ /longs spyod la zhen bag med pa dang tshig rtsub bcas pa dang ste 'dod can dbang po don gnyer rnams/ /slob ma rnams kyis rdzogs
pa'i byang chub rgyu ru de rnams dmyal ba bzhin du blo yis spang par bya/ /zab cing rgya che'i sems dang bla ma'i nges pa la dga' gtong ba'i ngang tshul ldan dang yon tan shes/ /thar pa
don du gnyer dang rgyud la gus dang g.yo med sems dang de nyid snyed pa zhes bya gsang / /gdug pa rnams kyi dge 'dun 'joms pas de nyid rig pa'i bla ma shin tu tshol ba dang bcas
pas| |shes rab ye shes dbang sogs rgyu ru yin te gzhan zhes bya dang 'bring po bsod nams rgyu ru'o/ /'dir ni dbang nyid rnam pa gnyis te bu yi yon tan dbang las 'jig
rten pa dang 'das pa'o/ /gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu mar reg ba nyid dang gzhan yang bdud rtsi myong dang 'khyud pa'o/ /shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems ni zhu ba skad
cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang / /de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis nges par bstan pa'o/ /phyogs kyi lo ni gcig nas rnam pa bcu yi bar du lta
dang reg par bya ba yin pa ste/ /de rnams 'khyud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bsten par bya ba g.yo ba la sogs pa/ /nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs
byed khro bo 'byung po lha min rigs/ /dbang gi don du drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba dang gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o/ /skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g.yo dang gzhan
gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad can bu bcas dang / /khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la chags dang rdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan lag nyams dang ma dag pa/ /de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang
du shin tu 'bad de bla mas spang bya mi dbang kye/ /sngar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag pa gus ldan dam tshig 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya/ /sems kyis bsam par bya ba ma ste
reg par bya zhing 'khyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o/ /rdo rje rang zhugs bu mor brjod de byed pa dang bcas shin tu bde bar gyur ba tsha mo'o/ /thig le lhung ba chung mar 'gyur te chags bral

gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do/ /de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos/ /chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs sa dang me ru
rlung dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste/ /de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /chags dang chags
bral mtha' dang sngon du bde ba dam pa gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi pa'o/ /phyag rgya rnams las yum gyi mchog gyur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o/ /gang
zhig dang por yang ni dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod/ /ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba mthong bar byas pa gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur
ba'o| |mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan lag kha rnams sbyangs par byas te shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya/ /rgyal ba dbang por byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang
gzhan yang bla ma la yang 'dir/ /'dod dang dga' dang g.yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi sbyor ba gcig /gang ba nus pa dang ni skye ba nges par yin te mchog tu
dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o/ /'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yur ba dang ste khyad par dga' ba nyid rnams gsum pa'o/ /oD+Da dang ni sgra cam nyid de gnyid dang lhan cig skyes
pa'i dga' ba nyid rnams bzhi pa'o/ /de nas skye gnas rdul spangs med de yul 'jig 'gyur bas re zhig sa las dbang bsgyur yod pa min/ /'on kyang shes rab ye shes dbang ni
rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis sa bon zhig la sbyin par bya/ /de nyid rnams la sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag don du btsal bar bya/ /'di ni bsod nams don
rnams byed pas byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'bras bu du mar 'gyur ba'o/ /gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag bo dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa/ /
sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid la skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges/ /ma lus rgyal sras rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnams
kyis bsten byas na/ /ye shes snang ba de nyid rab tu shar bas bdud dpung g.yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg pa dang / /chags pa la sogs rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams lus la
lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam 'bras ster byed/ /shes rab ye shes zhes pa sems kyi snang ba nyid de de yang rnam pa bcu du 'gyur ba'o/ /dbang 'dir zhugs pa gang zhig dri ma
med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bur nges/ /des na bde ba 'dzag pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das par nges/ /des na sangs rgyas
zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o/ /gang zhig khrag gi btung ba byed pa'i sha sbrang de ni rab mchog lha dang mi yi bdud rtsi dang / /skyug pa zos pa gsang
ba'i zhal nas rdo rje nor bur gyur pa chu skyes nang du ma zhugs pa/ /bshad dang gci dang khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyug pa rnams ni nang du zhugs pa'o/ /de
ltar ye shes bdud rtsi 'di ni srid pa gsum gyi bla mas rgyud rnams thams cad du ni bstan/ /gang tshe shes rab chos 'byung du ni bde ba lhung nas slar yang rab tu bza' bas bsrung bar bya/ /de
yas sems can gang zhig de rnams rgyal ba'i rigs su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' cung zad 'gyur/ /de phyir nyi ma so so'i dus su de nyid za bar byed dang shes rab me tog dang ldan pa'i
zhi ba'i bde 'bras ster ba ston byed srin po dang ni bdud kyi pho nya rnams kyis za ru 'jug /rdo rje pad+ma las ni dbyung bar mi bya mchog gi bde bar gyur pa ma 'khums pa ru bya/ /de la sangs
rgyas byin gyis brlabs par gang tshe rab tu gyur pa de tshe 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges/ /rdo rje chu skyes dag tu rab tu bcug pas rang rang rdo rje snying gar ye shes 'khor lor zhugs/ /'khor lo'i
rnam par bya zhing slar yang gnyis ka'i lus su gyur pa 'od zer rnams kyis gang bar bya/ /gal te 'di yis grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu yang dag gnas pa bza' bas bsrung bar bya/ /
shes rab chos 'byung la gnas bskrun pa'i don du mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams dgod par bya ba'o/ /shes rab ldan pa nyid dam yang na gcig nyid dag ni sangs rgyas sku yi zhabs
su yang dag brjod/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'di la 'jigs par mngon par 'dod pa de ni rdo rje can byis gsod par 'gyur/ /lus nang gnas pa'i lag pa dang ni rkang pa lus nyid rnams dang drug cha
dbral ba yan lag mchog /las kyi dbang po rnams las dag ste gzhan yang dbang po rnams kyi nang nas yon tan bcas pa'i yid/ /khams kyi nang nas khams kyi cha ste bran dang phyugs rnams
de yi cha yis 'gyur ro gzhan dag kyang / /phyag rgya bzang mo slob dpon ched du rab tu phul na bde ba'i gnas su myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /srid pa rnam gsum la gnas 'jig rten khams kyi
sems can gang zhig ye shes rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis/ /de rnams ma lus kun nas bkug ste snying rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur byas pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo

rje'i bdud rtsi nyid de dri med rdo rje can lus rdo rje can rnams 'thob/ /dri ma rnam par bral rnams rang rang gnas su btang ste byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas par bsam/ /rdzas rnams spangs pa'i a ba
d+hU ti rnams la rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis dbang rnams sbyin par bya/ /de ltar du ba la sogs lam dang yon tan ma lus gtar ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa'o/ /bsten pa'i don du lag pa'i
phyag rgyas rang sems dbang las nyes pa thams cad rnam par grol bar byed/ /gzhan yang rgyal mchog thugs gyur yum gyi mchod pa rnam par bral ba rnams la sbyin par bya ba min/ /de nas
slob dpon slob mar bcas pa ma lus tshogs kyi rigs rnams ji ltar 'dod bzhin mnyes par bya/ /slob ma rnams la gnang ba byin nas rab mchog chogs kyi
rigs rnams rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /dgra dang seng+ge dang ni glang chen me dang lto 'phye'i rgyal po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching ba dang / /rgya mtsho 'khrug par byed dang sha za'i
'jigs pa nad kyis 'chi bar byed dang dbang pos 'che ba dang / /dbul bo dang ni bud med bral dang rgyal po khros pas 'jigs dang rdo rje ltung dang don nyams rnams/ /rnal 'byor ma yi zhabs
gyur de nyid gang gis gsal par dran pas 'di rnams rab tu 'jig par 'gyur/ /dpal dus kyis 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ /dbang bskur ba'i le'u mdor bsdus pa ste
le'u gsum pa'i rgyud kyi snying po'o// //gtum mo'i lte ba'i 'khor lor lto 'gro dgu yis bsgyur ba tsa rtsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan/ /dbus kyi ho yig ye shes
glog gi 'od dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me yis rab tu sad pa las/ /mi yi bdag po lte bar nges par snang mdzad sogs dang spyan ma sogs ni mig la sogs pa rnams/ /thams cad
bsregs te spyi bo'i zla ba bzang las 'dzag thig le'i gzugs gyur gang zhig rdo rje can nyid do/ /shes rab chos 'byung la gnas thag le slar yang de bzhin nges par ma lus spro bar bya ba ste//
rgyan rnams sna tshogs rnams dang ldan pas me long nang gnas lta bur ye shes 'khor lo rab tu 'byung / /'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med rnams te srid pa rnam gsum dag kyang rim pas
sbyang bar bya/ /phyi nang ye shes 'bar bas srid gsum ma lus lan gcig gis ni nges par 'gugs par byed pa'o/ /zla ba nyi mar a sogs ka sogs rnam gsum 'gro 'gyur sku rdo rje la sogs
pa'i bzlas pa ste/ /so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang pad+mar sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje gsum sgom byas pas dga' ba la sogs rdo rje dang ni chu skyes ro mnyam
gyur pa'o/ /shes rab chu skyes las ni thugs kyi thig le lhan cig skyes ba de'i dbang las gzhom du med par bsgom/ /bsnyen pa bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang so sor sdud sogs
rnam kyis so/ /sngags bzlas la sogs rnams dang rdo rje pad+ma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye bar bsgrub par 'gyur/ /dga' ba la sogs rdo rje gsum gyis chu skyes ro mnyam gyur par bsgom
pa sgrub par gyur pa'o/ /shes rab ldan 'dus 'jigs med yang dag gyur pa phra mo'i rnal 'byor nges par sgrub ba chen por 'gyur/ /dang por stong pa'i byang chub nges par 'gyur te slar
yang de nas zla ba thig le sdud pa'o/ /gzugs bskyed pa dang de nas rab mchog ro yi rigs la yi ge rnams ni dgod ba nyid du 'gyur/ /chu gter rdo rje 'di ni spyi yi bsnyen par 'gyur te gzhan
yang sgrub pa zhes pa dbu ma'o/ /'dir ni snyi dang mkhregs pa thabs ni rnam pa bzhi 'gyur de bzhin bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i yan lag brjod/ /so sor sdud pa rgyal
ba'i dbang po nyid dang bsam gtan mi bskyod pa dag rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur/ /srog sdud pa ni ral gri can dang 'dzin pa rin po che yi phyag can dag kyang rnam pa bcu/ /rtsol pa rjes su dran
pa pad+ma 'jin par yang ni 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can/ /de nas slar yang re re la yang wa lnga yi dbye ba rnams kyis a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis dbye/ /so sor sdud
pa yul dang yul can rnam pa bcu po 'brel ba rnams kyis rab tu mi 'jug nyid/ /shes rab rtog pa dang ni dpyod dang dga' dang bde ba mi g.yo rtse gcig sems ni bsam gtan no/ /
srog nyid rtsol bas lam gnyis mnyam par 'gyur gyi bar du bya ste dbu mar srog rnams gzhug pa'o/ /thig le ru ni srog gzhug pa ste gnyis ka'i 'gro ba gzhom zhing rtse gcig
sems kyang 'dzin pa'o/ /gang zhig lte bar gzhum mor gyur pas nges par lus dang nam mkha' ru ni rjes su dran par 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid kyis ni mi 'gyur bde
ba'i dbang las ye shes sku ni ting nge 'dzin/ /de ltar chung du la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub pa rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gsum ni rnam gsum 'gyur ba'i
dbang las skabs gsum zhes bya yang dag rtog pa bzang mo rnams/ /so sor sdud pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral zhing sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /mi yi bdag po
bsam gtan sbyor ba dag pas mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba dag pas ri bong can nyi bral nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod par byed/ /
'dzin pa'i stobs kyis bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs tshogs rnams rab tu bcom nas stobs bcur zhugs pa'o/ /rjes dran rab tu dag pas dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ni ye
shes gzugs su 'gyur/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pas cung zad nyin zhag rnams kyis ye shes sku ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang por rgyal ba ma lus pa yi lus nyid sngags pa rnams kyis
dngos grub don du yang dag bsrung / /lus med na ni dngos grub med de bde ba dam pa skye ba 'di la thob pa yod pa min/ /de phyir lus kyi don du nyi ma so so'i dus su rtsa yi sbyor ba bsgom par bya ba
yin| |lus grub pas ni dngos grub gzhan ma srid gsum gnas su mngag gzhug nyid du rab tu 'gyur ba'o/ /rtsa drug 'khor lor dgag gsungs lam nyid rnam gsum 'gro ba zla ba nyi ma me
yi dbye bas so/ /de dag lus la srung bar 'gyur ba bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis srog chags gang la 'chi ster ba/ /drug rnams su ni gang tshe srog 'jug gyur nas mi rnams nyid la rgyun du 'chi
ba spong bar nges/ /phra mo ru ni srog mi 'jug na rnal 'byor pa rnams 'chi ba'i yul nyid gang gis gcod par byed/ /nyi ma zla bdag ni dgag cing mnyam dang mi mnyam
'gro ba dbu ma dang ni dus mer gzhug /srog dang thur rgyu gnyis po dag tu nyin zhag dang bo song bas dus min 'chi ba blu ba ste/ /srog gis kun tu gang bar bya ba nyid ni lag rkang mthe bo'i
tshigs dang sen mthar bcas par ro/ /'khor lo drug tu sangs rgyas dang ni lha mo mi 'jigs phyag dang pad 'dzin rnal 'byor ba yis bsgom/ /g.yas las g.yon dang g.yon las g.yas
su skad cig nyid la rtsa ni rab tu rgyu bar bya ba ni/ /mchan khung g.yas dang g.yon dang nu mar yang ni stobs ldan btsir te srog ni 'gog dang bcas pa yis/ /zla ba phyed kyis kyang ni dus min
'chi ba ster las 'joms pa rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /thur du rgyu ba kun nas bskum par byed par gyur na lus mchog rlung nas ma lus pa rnams 'joms/ /srog sdom bad kan la
ni yin te slar yang de dag rnam par btang ba mkhris pa'i nad la'o/ /steng dang 'og ni yang dag 'gog pas 'dus pa dang ni rim gyis nad rnams bde bar byed pa ste/ /lte ba'i 'og tu srog rlung 'gog
pa nad rnams mtha' dag 'joms te lte ba'i rtsa bar gzhan ma'o/ /thur rgyu'i rlung ni rnam gsum lam du song bas kun nas bcings te de bzhin srog nyid steng du yang / /yang dag bsdu ba'i
par du stobs ldan gyis ni lus po ma lus me yis khyab par byas pas na/ /skran dang mchin nad gzhad nad rnams dang gzhan yang dmu chu la sogs rnams la zla ba'i sbyor bas 'joms/ /
dbugs mi bad dang glo yin da dang rnam pa gsum gyi dug dang mig nad la sogs rnams la yang / /lag pa dag ni 'chang bar byas la dang pa'i pad+ma mnyam par byas te srog rlung 'gog pa'o/ /
ji srid sa la lus po ma lhung ba yi bar ram gzhan yang rigs rnams bral gyi bar du ste/ /yang dang yang du ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed tsher ma can ni nges par 'joms/ /
snying ga'i pad+mar zla ba'i steng du dri med ri bong can nyid lta bu'i sna tshogs yum bsgom bya/ /shes rab dang ni 'dus bas rang gi byang sems babs pa rgyun du srog rlung yang dag bkag pa yis/ /
sngags pa rnams kyis lo phyed nyid kyis lus kyi mchog la mdze dkar 'joms na gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /de ltar lo gnyis rdzogs bas bdun cu'i lo la skra dkar gnyer mar bcas pa'i rgas pa
nges par 'joms/ /de yi rjes la cung zad nyin zhag rnams kyis lam sems rab tu 'dres pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /rkang pa dag ni rdo rje'i skyil krung gnas las lag pa'i pad+mas bzung
bas rgyab kyi zug rdu 'joms/ /steng du rkang bdag dang mgo bo 'og tu byas na bad kan nad rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'joms/ /rab tu 'dzag la nyin zhag cung zad rnams su srog nyid bkag na
gcin nad nges par 'joms par byed/ /tho rangs chu bral kha nyid srin lag gis ni so rnams rim par rab tu gsal bar brdar ba yis/ /mig gi mig sman 'gyur
te chu yis gtor ba yis kyang mig gi sdug bsngal 'joms par byed pa'o/ /gan rkyal nyal nas lte bar lag pa'i pad+ma bzung ba dag ni ma zhu ba yi zug rdu 'joms/ /skrangs
'bur byung ba rnams la nges par tshwa dang mar bcas rnams kyis bdug na 'phel ba 'jigs par byed/ /arka'i 'o mas rab tu byugs pas kyang ste cung zad so yi srin bu zug rdur
bcas pa la/ /stag shing sa bon gyi ni du ba la sogs sbu gu yis ni bdug na srin sogs 'joms par byed/ /mi bskyod pa ni cung zad dro bas kha yi nad dang so yi zug rdu dang
bcas zhi bar byed/ /tho rangs mi bskyod sna yis 'thungs na mgo bo'i sdug bsngal 'joms te sna yi chu yang de bzhin no/ /rna ba dang ni mig tu mi bskyod dro dang grang mo blugs pas
gnyis ka'i sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms/ /'byung pos bzung la mi bskyod tsha ba gsum ldan sna ru blugs na bde ster sos btab pa la yang / /lan tshwa dang ni skyur ba yis ni rlung rnams
'joms par 'gyur te mdar dang bas ba mkhris pa'i dgra/ /kha ba ma lus pa dang tsha ba gsum gyis de bzhin sman rnams bcud kyis bad ka na 'joms par byed/ /ra yi 'o ma tsha ba gsum
dang ldan pas bad kan 'joms te ma he'i 'o ma mkhris pa'i dgra/ /rnga mo'i 'o ma rlung 'joms pa ste ba yi 'o ma mar gyis sdug bsngal rnam gsum 'joms pa'o/ /dza ti bskol ba'i tshu ni
dron pos kha nad zhi ste so yi zug rdu mi bzod pa yang ngo / /mar khu dang ni dngos po'i chu bskol tsha ba gsum dang tshwa yis rna ba'i nad rnams 'joms pa'o/ /mar dang 'om bskol bar a hi
ni dang dmar po rnam par blugs pas sna yi nad rnams 'jig /karko Ti dang thod pa in+d+ra bong bu'i chur bcas 'bras dang sha ro dag la byugs pas 'joms/ /bshad ba gci ba khrag
dang khu ba mi shar bcas rnams zes pas tshe ni ster bar 'gyur ba'o/ /bsam gtan dang bcas me tog snas 'thungs pa yis rgas pa'i yan lag skra dkar gnyer ma la sogs 'joms/ /
mar me lnga dang sgrang bu'i skyug pa bsres pa zos pa yis ni sdug bsngal mtha' dag 'joms par 'gyur/ /bud med me tog khu ba nyid dang bsres pa lo gcig zos pa yis ni rgas pa
'joms pa'o/ /karko Ti dang de pa dA li tsha ba gsum dang bri ha ti dang ni ma pa tig+ta rnams/ /bskol ba'i khu ba nyin zhag gsum 'thungs pa yis 'ju bar 'gyur te dwangs pa'i bar du smyung bar bya/ /de
bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa mi yi chu dang dug chu rdo chu b+hal+lA ta yi chu/ /dri ngan ri bong sa rdo gzhan yang lo ma la sogs lto ba la bsngags sngags pas brtag par bya/ /so sor sdud sogs rnams
kyis sngags ba rnams kyi 'dod pa'i dngos grub gal te thob bar ma gyur na/ /sgra tsam goms pa rdo rje nor bu'i thig le chu skyes 'gro ba'i stobs kyis bzung ste
bsgrub par bya/ /mi mchog gang zhig rnams kyi snying ga'i gnas su gyur dang sgra ni rna ba'i bug par thos byed pa/ /de la mi rnams sems nyid yang dag ro mnyam gcig tu gyur pa'i
sbyor bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ /'jig rten rnams su gson pos sgra rnams gang zhig smras ba thob ba dang ste khyab bdag rnam shes kyis/ /rnam par shes pa ring bor gnas pa yang ni
rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste khyab bdag gis/ /skyil krung bcings bar byas te kha phye ba dang so rnams phan tshun du ni reg pa min pa dang / /bdud rtsi ldan byas nas ni phyi rol rlung rnams
bkug ste lte ba'i dbus su rab tu gzhug byas nas/ /mchog gi lus la yang dag gdung ba dang ni ltogs dang skom dang dug rnams nges par yang dag 'joms/ /dpral bar thig le dkar
po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bsams nas bdud rtsi rnams ni 'dzag par byed/ /kha btsum pa ru byas nas phyir song dag gi rlung rnams mtha' dag sna yi bu ga gnyis nas ni/ /
srog nyid stobs kyis mgyogs par rab bkug dri med glog mtshungs thur rgyu'i rlung dang yang dag sbrad de gzung / /rnal 'byor goms pa'i dus su zla ba nyi ma dag ni me yi dbus su
ro mnyam 'gyur ba ste/ /lus la zas la sogs pa'i bkres ba dang ni skom pa 'joms shing 'chi ba med pa ster bar byed/ /dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur ba g.yas

dang g.yon pa bcing ba dang / /phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde bar gyur pa rdo rje yang dag sad pa dang / /bde bad ma ba'i don du pad+mar rdo rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i pad+mas gsor
ba yis| |sa bon ma btang bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do/ /snang ba la gnas gzhan du phyogs te nyi 'od la gnas rang gi grib ma'i phyogs su lta
bas blta/ /phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par bltas pa las ni skyes bu rom nyam du ba'i mdog sogs mthong / /rnal 'byor zla drug goms pas sa la gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bug
ba rnams nas mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na ljon shing grib ma las ni rab tu zhugs nas nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i phreng ba bsgom/ /srog gi nus pa gang zhig lte ba'i dbus gnas bcud
gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mtha' yi gnas gzhan 'gro/ /de ni lte ba'i gnas nas dri med glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs kyis yang dag langs nas ni/ /'khor lo las ni 'khor lo'i
mtha' ru nges par dal bar mdzes par 'gro ba dbus ma'i rtsar song nas/ /ji srid stobs kyis sbyi gtsug phye nas phyi yi pags pa 'bugs par byed pa khab nyid bzhin du ste/ /dus der rtsol ba
dang bcas mchog gi stobs kyis steng gi lam du yang dag phul bar byas pa yis/ /spyi gtsug nges par phug nas zung gi rlung rnams 'gags te gzhan gyi lus
la 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni/ /de nyid rdo rje'i mthu yis yid kyi spyod yul de ltar mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas ni mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid la
sna tshogs yum du brjod pa'o/ /phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa nam mkhar sems nyid me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du ste/ /dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma
'phro bar byed pas 'jig rten gsum rnams snang gyur pa/ /phyi dang lus rnams la ni tha dad med bar yul dang bral ba'i snang ba tsam na ni ma mkhar gnas/ /'gro ba du ma'i sems kyi
gzugs la sems nyid kyis ni 'khyud par byed pa de dag gcig pa'o/ /las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems kyi g.yeng byed ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin pas/ /yang dag spangs
te rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog skyed byed phyag rgya bzang mo bsgom pa ni/ /gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la khyab pa'i mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor pa yis bgrod
bya ba| |lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su bsgom/ /rdul phran dngos bo med na rnam shes nyid de de bzhin srid gsum med na
rnam par shes pa med/ /sangs rgyas nyid la shes pa cung zad yod pa min zhes tshig ni ston 'gyur sangs rgyas pa rnams te/ /mi rnams gang gis 'gyur med bral ba'i stong ba de nyid bzung ba de
ni steng bar mi 'gyur bas/ /de phyir gtso bos 'dzag med gang zhig lhan cig skyes pa'i sku yi bde bar sngags kyi theg par gsungs/ /bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis stong par du ba la sogs
gzugs brnyan lam ni bsgom par bya ba 'o/ /de nas rtsa yi 'khor lo rnams su srog dang thur rgyu'i rlung rnams yang ni brtan par dag kyang bya/ /gzhan yang zla ba gza' yis 'gog par
byed pa bzhin du byang chub sems kyang rnal 'byor pa yis te/ /gang zhig de las khyad par 'dod pa yin te cung zad nyin zhag rnams kyi skye ba 'di ru thob/ /dang por dpal ldan dus kyi
'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyed mdzad 'bad pas bsgrubs par byas pa dang / /phyi nas sa steng gnas su gyur par zhi ba la sogs las rnams gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba ste/ /pha dang
ma dag bral ba'i bu nyid 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten pa rnams kun la grags/ /de phyir bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gnyis bo bsgrub par bya ste gzhan du las rnams 'grub pa
yin| |srog rtsol rab tu bya ba snying ga dang ni mgo bo de bzhin ji srid mer 'gyur bar du ste/ /de steng stobs kyis rtsol ba mi bya byas nas bzang po'i pad+mar shin tu rgyal bar gyur nas kyang / /
spyi gtsug dbye ba byas nas phung po dang ni khams rnams rnam par spangs te shi bar gyur pa na/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba zhig pas skyes bu rnams la tshe 'dir
bde mnyam 'bras bu dag ni ster ba ma ni/ /nyin mtshan dus su phyag rgya bsten pa bsgom pa'i don du bshad kyi 'dod chags zad ba'i don du min/ /chang ni sngags pa rnams kyi gsung gi rdo rje
tshim pa'i don du gsungs kyi nges par 'thung don min/ /nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' ba thams cad bde ba'i don du gsungs kyi mi 'ju'i rgyur ma gsungs/ /dpal ldan dur khrod mtshan mo
