bskor zhing spyod pa byed pa dngos grub don du yin te rtse don min/ /bsnyen par dang po'i rnal 'byor pa yis nam mkhar rnam bcu 'khor lo can gyi khro bo'i lta stangs kyis/ /nye bar bsgrub la
bgegs mthar byed kyi lta stangs kyis ni bdud rtsi'i gnas su gyur dang yan lag drug /shes rab las skyes zla ba'i thig le yis kyang rdo rje nor bu'i 'gyur med gsum ni bsgrub par bya/ /
bde ba mi 'dzag rtse gcig zhi ba lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes sbyor 'di sgrub pa chen po'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yis srog gcod pa ste srog rlung nyin mchan 'jig par byed ba de la gsungs
pa'o| |gang zhig zhal gyi sgra rnams sems la rab 'jug 'gyur ba de ni brdzun du smra ba'i tshig nyid do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes pa nyid bsgrubs pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa
rnams ma byin len par gsungs/ /bde ba'i theg le ma lhung ba ru gyur pa gzhan gyi bud med bsten no 'dod chags ma bral bas/ /srog bsdus pa yi me yis ri bong can las zhu ba'i ltung ba
rnams ni chang gi btung ba'o/ /mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor bar la tshes kyi dbang las nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ba dang / /slar yang spyi gtsug nas ni sor mo rnams la nag po'i
phyogs kyi mtha' ru 'di nyid 'gro ba ste/ /gang zhig spyod pa'i rnal 'byor de la nges par nyin mtshan so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster/ /sems dang 'dod dang yan lag tsha dang
pad+ma'i zhal mchog rab tu bskams dang zas mi zhim pa dang / /'dar ba dang ste smyo dang rmongs par gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang rab tu brgyal ba ltar/ /rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs
rnam bcu po rnams rab gsal srog chags lus kyi gnas skabs te/ /'jig rten du ni de rnams yid bsrubs pa las rgyal ba gang dang gang 'dod nges par rab tu 'byung / /gang zhig thig
le dkar po'i rgyun rnams nyin mtshan dag la 'bab pa chang ste chang gzhan cung zad min/ /mig la sogs pa nyin mtshan so sor sgro ba sha ste go ku la sogs sha gzhan cung zad min/ /
bsnyen pa dag la rang rig pa nas lha rnams dag pa'i sku ni bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsten pa'o/ /stong par sems ni zhugs pas ro mnyam bde bas khyab pa 'khrig pa yin te skye gnas la
ma yin| |nor rnams spangs pa sbyin pa yin te bud med dang ni 'dus kyang sems mi 'dzag pa tshul khrims so/ /sgra sogs sems mi 'jug pa bzod pa yin te gnyis
su 'gro ba'i rlung 'jig pa ni brtson 'grus so/ /lhan cig skyes bder gyur dang 'gro kun sems dang thams cad skad shes pa dag bsam gtan shes rab ste/ /de las sems can
don dang rdzu 'phrul srid 'joms pa dang skye med thob pa gzhan ma bzhi rnams so/ /gcig la sogs pa zhal mtha' yas dang phyag dang zhabs dang kha dog rnams ni du ma mun pa'i
mtha'| |thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid dag dang zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa ni 'gog pas bde mnyam 'bras ster byed/ /kun nas dri med nor bu dang mtshungs khyab byed sa la sogs pa rnams
la stong pa gcig bu yis/ /thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus med pa yi yul med yul ni sgrub pa dus kyi 'khor lo 'o/ /sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang de bzhin me la me ni rlung
la 'jug par 'gyur ba 'o/ /rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du/ /rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur bde ba dam pa gzhom du med pa
ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba 'o/ /mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir/ /nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzum
pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis/ /stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu srin bu me khyer mar me dri med rab tu gsal ba nyid/ /chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor rtse
gcig gnas pas khongs pa'i lta bas blta bar bya/ /'bar ba zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang gzhan yang thig le nyid rnams so/ /de dbus sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang
rnam par bral ba sprul dang longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma 'o/ /ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od zer 'phor ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong gi bar/ /de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang
nyi ma rnyog bral ba zhin du brjod med sna tshogs mdog /yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no/ /sa yi rnam par snang yang
sra min chu yi gzugs su snang yang chu min gsher pa med pa'i phyir/ /me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung gi gzugs su snang yang g.yo ba med pas rlung ma yin/ /stong pa'i rnam pa
yin yang mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs sna tshogs mthong yang kha dog min/ /rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis/ /
rnal 'byor dbang po rab tu g.yo ba'i yid ldan gal te sbyor ba ma thob 'chi bar 'gyur ba na/ /dpal ldan mi yi 'jig rten du ni rab mchog thub pa'i rigs su rnal 'byor ldan pa
skye bar 'gyur/ /de yis sngon du goms pas slar yang ye shes rnal 'byor mchog tu rgya chen nyams su len par 'gyur/ /ye shes thob par gyur nas mi bzad
mchog gi gnas te slar yang gang du'ang skye ba ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas zhing du gyur pa srid gsum ma lus skyed par byed pa'i las dang bral ba la gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang
dag pa'i rdul phran ro mnyam pa ste byang chub sems nyid rtag tu bcings pa'o/ /rdo rje'i sras te so so re re'i rdul phran rnams kyi gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las bcings pa las//
sa sogs nam mkha'i mthar thug rdul phran ma lus rigs rnams mi g.yo ba la sogs pa rab tu zhugs/ /de rnams kyi ni lhan cig rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkhar zhugs te
'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du'o/ /gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgrin pa dang ni mgor gyur pa dang lte ba gsang ba'i 'khor lo rnams/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad steng 'og nyin
mtshan so so'i chu srin nas brtsams dus sbyor gnyis gnyis bar du 'o/ /nus ma dang ni sangs rgyas gtso mor byas pa nyi ma zla ba'i dbye ba rigs ldan bslu ba ste/ /de yang nyi ma'i
gnas nas lus las skyes pa'i srin bu mi dang 'byung bo lha dang lha min rnams/ /thabs dang shes rab yi ge dag ni gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i
ming / /bzlas pa rdo rje gsum dang rkang pa gzhan pa la ste thog ma dang ni dbus dang tha mar byed/ /gang gi phyir na srog gis byin brlabs gnyis kar bgrod pa'i dbang las rang rang las kyi rjes
mthun pa/ /myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /gang zhig skye ba'i dus su dbus nas dbugs rnams rkang ba dang bcas ro dang
mda' ru 'gyur ba ste/ /de rnams 'khor lo brgyad pa rnams su 'gyur te steng 'og dbang las sgo dbus la gnas lha mo rnams/ /rkang pa gcig las skyes pa'i srid gsum skyed mdzad phyag
na gri gug dang ni nya phyis ba snams pa yis/ /nyi ma zla ba'i steng du bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha la g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo nyid kyi sa 'khyud/ /sgra tsam thig le'i cha dang ye shes rnams ni
bdud rtsi'i gnas su 'gro dang lu gu rgyud bcings rtsa/ /srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams las rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa yis/ /dbus su rlung dge 'gro dang 'jug pa
yang dag 'dus pas yul dang yul can med par 'gyur ba dang / /du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzung dang 'di rnams thams cad gsang ba chen po 'o/ /sku mthong gyur nas
nyin mtshan so so'i dus su srog gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa dang / /ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar/ /brtul zhugs
can rnams lam gyi sems na zla ba dus kyis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba 'o/ /chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad cig ma nas khyab
bdag dbugs kyis grangs 'phel lo/ /srog sdud pa yis kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba spyi bo'i bar ni de srid 'dod pa ste/ /de las steng du 'dod pa min pa phung po nges par nyams
nas 'chi bas 'jigs par byed pa'i rgyu/ /gtsug tor dbye ba byas te 'gro na bde ba dam pa'i gnas su nges par sbyor bar byed pa nyid/ /phung po dngos po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde
mnyam 'gro ste 'on kyang 'jig rten pa rnams 'phya/ /l-i sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul dang yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams/ /phan tshun dbye bas
tha dad rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mnga' rnams dbus ma'i dbugs rnams rgyu ba 'o/ /dus sbyor gnyis par yul dang yon tan dbang gis thung ring rnams te dus sbyor dbye bas shes par
bya| |phyis ni thun mtshams gsum par yul dang yon tan dbye bas shin tu ring po dbu ma'i dbugs su rgyu/ /de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri dang ro yi dbyangs
bcas dbu ma'i dbugs kyi tshad/ /gtso bo'i chu skyes rnams la rdo rje thig le ma lus 'gyur med rdo rje nor bur gnas pa yin/ /dga' ba thams cad kun nas bde ba mnyam par gnas te rdo
rje can las dus rnams thams cad du/ /zla ba zhu ba gang zhig zhugs pa de dag bla ma'i zhal te de nyid dus kyi 'khor lo 'o/ /'chi ba'i dus las grol bar byed dang bdud rnams 'jigs par byed pa
mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di/ /dang po'i dbugs rnams yul dang yon tan dbye ba brgyad kyis mkha' 'gro ma rnams nyid kyis bskor nas gnas/ /'gro ba drug la gnas pa rnams ni
'khyams te rgyun du rnam gsum btang bas du ba la sogs pa/ /de rnams dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i sku ni bdud rtsi'i cha 'phro ba yis 'khyud pa ste/ /gang gis dbugs rnams
bcad pas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid dus kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod/ /dbugs rnams bcad pa'i mthar ni rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang 'gro ba drug po 'di yang yod pa min/ /thig le
kun nas bkag pas khyab bdag dam pa'i bde ba bskal pa mtha' yas gnas par gyur pa yis/ /'khor ba'i bde ba spangs te mchog gi bla ma'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom
par bya ba'o/ /spyod pa dag ni sgeg pa'i gzugs kyis mchog tu 'jig par byed pa rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes pa min/ /pho nya mo rnams kyi ni lus dang pad+ma'i dri lnga rnams su 'gyur zhing de

rnams rigs ldar brjod/ /gla rtsi dang ni pad+ma dri chu sha dang rnag gi dri rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang las te/ /dpal ldan bzang mo pad+ma can dag nges yin chu spyod ma dang ri mo can ma glang chen
ma| |dpal ldan sgrol ma gos dkar mo dang mA ma kI dang spyan ma rnams ni rigs kyi dbang las 'gyur/ /lus po phra la skra rnams phra dang rkang lag 'jam zhing brtse ldan
dpal ldan shin tu bzad mo'o/ /cung zad lus po phra la ring zhing skra rnams 'khyil dang mig mi g.yo ba pad+ma can nyid do/ /do tsha med cing 'dod chags drag la rtsod pa mang po byed cing skra rnams
nyung ba dung can ma/ /bong ring yan lag thams cad rgyas la skra ring 'dod chags chung rnams nges par ri mo can du brjod/ /lus po sbom la thud zhing mkhregs te shin tu yul sra skra rnams
'thug pa glang po ma ru nges/ /pho nya mo rnams dag pa'i rigs ni brgya lam na ste rigs rnams thams cad 'dir ni 'dres par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa ni seng+ge ri dwags rta dang khyu mchog
glang po che yi rigs rnams dbye ba yis/ /mi bskyod pa dang don grub dang ni dri med nor bu'i phyag dang pad phyag 'khor lo can rnams so/ /seng+ge dag kyang yul dang bral zhing dben pa la
gnas 'jigs pa med gtong 'dod dang tshul khrims ldan/ /ri dwags myur du 'gro dang 'dzag dang yul yang ba dang skrag pa'i sems dang shin tu 'jigs pa'o/ /rta ni des par 'dod
la chags shing gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur gcin gyi dri ste pha rol don du gnyer/ /khengs pa'i mig dang dal bar 'gro dang rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ldan khyu mchog 'gyur/ /'dod
pa can dang ngal bar 'gro 'gyur rnag gi dri dang shin tu rmongs rnams nges par glang chen grags/ /sa steng gnas su sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas tha dad pa ni rigs dang dri yi rang bzhin no/ /mchod
pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan kun gyi gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /shin tu bde bas dgyes pa med na rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis dngos grub ster mi
'gyur| |dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug pa dang yul dang rnam par bral ba'i sna tshogs yum la 'khyud pa ste/ /rang gi rdo rje pad+mar gzhug cing spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab gzhug
pa| |bde ba'i sa bon ma lhung pa las shin tu bde bar gyur 'di rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor te/ /bsgrub par bya ba phyag rgya'i don du gtso bo mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan gsang chen las
gsang chen/ /'dir ni ye shes dgug par byed pa shin tu stobs can gyis te slar yang gzhug pa rmongs byed kyis/ /rengs byed kyis ni 'ching ste nges par mchog tu bde ba'i dbang las nga
rgyal byed pas mnyes par bya/ /'khor lo la ni ye shes 'khor lo ro mnyam par ni byed pa rdo rje shugs kyi byed pa'o/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud du khro bo'i lha mo rnams kyis nges par rab
tu gsal par bya/ /srid gsum gnas su bdud rnams ma lus rdung par byed pa dbyug pa sngon po can gyis mdzad pa ste/ /dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs khro bo mi g.yo ba yis 'ching ste phur
'debs shin tu brtson 'grus so/ /Tak+kis de yi brtson 'grus 'jig ste sa steng gyur pa gnod mdzes rgyal po rengs par byed pa'o/ /gtsug tor can gyis rdzu
'phrul 'jig ste nges par khro bo'i lha mo rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du 'o/ /gzhan yang gang zhig cung zad yod pa spros te khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni 'byung skyes mthar thug
go /sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnams pa sna tshogs rang gi lus la rig par bya/ /de ltar rgyud rnams dang ni sngags rnams sna tshogs rigs gyur rnal 'byor ma
dang rnal 'byor dbye bas so/ /rdo rje pad+ma dag gis gnyis sbyor gang yin de yis gnas pa'i bde ba 'phel bar rab tu bya/ /bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis mtha' dang 'bar ba'i
dbu sa dang mchog tu dga' dang lhan cig skyes mtshams dang / /gnyid dang brgyal ba'i dbus dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbus su 'di nyid 'phel bar the tshom med/ /bdud dang
nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig sbyor ba yis/ /sad dang rmi lam rang bzhin gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang 'khrig dus
ru t+ya'i rang bzhin rnams/ /lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul la bskyod pa med pa'i sems thim pa/ /ye shes gnas dang bud med dang ni rab 'dus pa
las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i skad cig ni/ /sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu 'gyur ba 'o/ /bag gi rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin mon
tan gyur pas 'chid ba dar gyi srin bu ji bzhin no/ /gzhan yang bdag gi rnam par mi rtog pa yi yid kyi nges par bdag nyid grol bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de phyir rang gi las kyis rang bzhin
yon tan gyur pas bde dang sdug bsngal byed do rgyal po kye/ /rang bzhin bral la byed pa po gang bya ba gang ste 'jig rten pa rnams mi shes pa yis bsgribs/ /a sogs ka sogs ri
bong can dang nyi ma dag dang gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi rten ma yin/ /hUM yig las ni mtshan mar yongs gyur pa dang gzhan yang kha dog dang ni gzugs rnams 'dod pa min/ /mchog tu
mi 'gyur ba yis 'gyur ba bcom ste skyes par gyur pa 'di ni lha yi dbang po ste/ /rnam ba kun gyi thig le sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa rgyal ba ma lus rnams kyi bdag po 'o/ /srid
gsum 'jig par byed pa phung po khams dang dbang po rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams dang / /de tsam dang ni las kyi skyon dang yon tan yid dang blo dang dar 'dzin dang bcas
la sogs pa/ /'di rnams kyis bcings ro yi gnas su srog nyid 'khyams pa dang ste slar yang phra mo'i rang bzhin gyis/ /bsam pa dor nas mi 'gyur mchog gi gnas su
gang zhig rab tu gshegs na slar yang skye ba min/ /de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams
kyi thig la'i dbus/ /khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni/ /rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba skyed byed
sa bon thig le btab na thar par ga la 'gyur/ /da phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar bya/ /mngon sum dang ni rjes su
dpag pa rnam gnyis gyur pa gang dag de rnams lha yi dmigs pa ste/ /mngon sum de kho na yi rnal 'byor mkha' la rgyu skar dang mtshungs longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma 'o/ /mngon
sum min pa'i rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid med pas de ni rtog pa ste/ /rnal 'byor yongs su ma gyur blo can rnams kyis bsgom pa'i don du ras bris la sogs
bstan par bya/ /gzugs sam dkyil 'khor dag ni dang por yang dag bris la de nyid med pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ /mkha' la de kho na yi rnal 'byor pa yis
mtha' dag tshang bar gyur pa rang sems mthong ba 'o/ /lo phyed dang ni lo gcig dag tu bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang las ji srid brtan par 'gyur gyi bar/ /de nas phyag rgya'i
sbyor ba yin te nyin zhag cung zad rnams kyis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rlung rnams yang dag bsdu bar byas pas glog gi me lces spyi bo las ni zla ba 'ju bar byed/ /gang
dang gang gis thig le zhu nas de las mgrin pa snying ga lte ba gsang ba rnams su 'gog /thig le zhu ba gang zhig 'dzag nas rdo rje nor bur song ba rgyal mtshan rtse mor yang dag 'gag
shes rab ye shes skad cig gang tshe thig le'i phreng ba mi 'dzag de tshe bad ba yang dag ster/ /de phyir 'dzag pa med pa'i bde ba skad cig 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa chos kyi dbyings ster
ba| |ro yi 'gro ba rnams su gyur pa'i srog rnams thams cad bkug ste nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas/ /rdzu 'phrul dang ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa dang srid gsum bla
ma nyid rnams rnal 'byor skye bar 'gyur/ /gal te lam du zhugs pa 'chi bar gyur pa de tshe zhen pa de yis skye ba gzhan la 'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad du ni nges par rdo
rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa la gsungs pa ste/ /byis pa rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du sna tshogs gtso bos snying rje mchog gis sbas pa'o/ /de phyir de nyid dbye ba byas la nyin
zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i don du rgyal mchog skyed par byed pa gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor
lo pa bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sgrub thabs kyi le'u mdor bsdus pa ste le'u bzhi pa'i rgyud kyi snying po'o// //khyab bdag sku yi stobs kyis
rnal 'byor pa rnams lus kyi mchog la lha yi mig nyid du ni 'gyur ba'o/ /de yi gsung gi stobs kyis lha yi snyan dang de yi thugs kyis gzhan gyi sems la gnas pa shes/ /shes rab sku
yi stobs kyis srid gsum la gnas 'gyur ba skye ba snga ma rjes su dran par 'gyur/ /shes rab gsung gi stobs kyis nam mkha' dang mtshungs ma lus pa la kun 'gro rdzu 'phrul ston par
byed| |shes rab thugs kyi rang bzhin stobs kyis gang zhig ma lus bde mnyam gzhom du med par 'gyur pa ste/ /lha yi mig gi stobs kyis srid pa gsum gyi mig gis ma mthong ba yang
mthong bar 'gyur ba'o/ /lha yi rna ba'i stobs kyis srog chags rnams kyis smras pa'i zhal gyi sgra thos 'gyur zhing dbugs kyis kyang / /de ltar reg bya la sogs thams cad sku gsung thugs
kyi sbyor bas 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye/ /gang zhig dbus kyi rtsa nas thur rgyu'i lam gsum gyur pa gcin dang bshad pa khu ba 'bab pa rnams/ /srog lam rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu dang mtha' ma
sangs rgyas zhal nyid rnams su gyur pa ni/ /rna ba sna dang mig rnams rnam pa gnyis gnyis zhes byar 'gyur zhing lce chung lce dang bcas pa dang / /thig le dang ni gtsug tor rnams kyi bug par 'gyur

zhing rgyas btab ye shes can gyur bcu pa ste/ /srog dang thar du rgyu ba 'gag na g.yo ba'i ri bong 'dzin pa nyi ma'i gzugs su 'gro ba ste/ /pad+mar rdo rje rab tu sbyangs pa las kyang nyi ma'i gzugs kyi 'od zer
rnams kyis 'dir zhu 'gyur/ /nyi ma zla ba'i rlung rnams 'gag par gyur pa na yang shes dang shes bya gcig par 'gyur ba ste/ /de ltar de bzhin yang ni de ltar rnam gsum du yang 'gyur te cung zad dang /
nyid yod pa min/ /zla ba nyi ma bzung ba'i gzugs ni nam mkha' nyin mo min te mtshan mo nyid kyang cung zad min/ /thun mtshams der ni rnal 'byor ba rnams lus kyi dbus su dus rnams kun tu bdud
rtsi gnas gyur pa/ /zla ba phyed pa zad pa'i nam mkha' la gnas nyi ma bzhin du lus nyid ro mnyam 'gyur ba'o| |lus la srog dang thur rgyu res par zad de 'gag pa'i dus na gsal bar grub par
brjod pa'o/ /lam gnyis srog rlung rgyun du 'gog pas zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs dag rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba ste/ /pad+mar rdo rje rab tu sbyangs pas ri bong can nyid zhu nas nyi ma'i gzugs la rab
tu zhugs/ /yang dag rab tu sbyangs pas dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur pa dang rnam gsum gcig gyur gzhom du med/ /de ltar cung zad dus kyi rnal 'byor pa de gnyis su med pa'i go 'phang mchog

la 'gro byed pa/ /khro bo dang ni sangs rgyas lha mor bcas dang nges par ro yi rdo rje ma dang sa'i snying po/ /mkha' la mngon sum nyid du 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa yi rab tu dga' ba'i thugs ni grub pa'i dus/ /
ri bong can gyi nyin mtshan dag gi tho rangs dang ni nam phyed de la 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /dus sbyor khyad par 'phags pas rin chen me tog char pa rnams ni sa yi
steng du 'bab par 'gyur/ /sku ni rdul phran rab tu zhig pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs dwangs pa'i mtshan la sogs pa rdzogs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum la sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam
lta bur dwangs pa sna tshogs mthong ba'o/ /gsung ni kun nas rgyun mi chad par skad gzhan rnams kyis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug par 'gyur ba ste/ /thugs ni bde ba dam pas gang ste 'gyur ba
med pa lhan cig skyes pas dus kun 'khyud pa'o/ /shes rab ma yin thabs ma yin te lhan cig skyes sku 'di las chos kyi skur ni 'gyur ba'o/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin nges par
mun pa bral bar ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba yis/ /de las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yis brag ca bzhin du sems can du ma'i don rnams mdzad pa'o/ /'dir yang sems can ma
lus smin bya'i don du sangs rgyas las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur ba'o/ /'dod pa sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur te gang ba rdzogs pa de yi gsung du 'gyur ba'o/ /'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te
oT+Ta las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes zhes su brjod/ /dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa 'di dag rim pa yis/ /gsung dang
thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed/ /g.yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsung / /gnyid ni nges

par chos kyi thugs te 'khrig dus ru t+ya ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms/ /yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le sgra dang rim pa yis/ /gsung dang thugs dang ye

shes rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum la gnas dag pa'i sku ru skyed par byed/ /dus nyid dag pa dpal ldan rdo rje can du 'gyur te lo zla la sogs dang dbye'o mi bdag kye/ /sems kyi rnam pa nyin mtshan min te nyin mtshan

so so'i dbye ba rnam par dag pa sna tshogs yum/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di las dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa'i he ru ka ni nges par 'gyur/ /de yang gdugs rnams smin bya'i don te rmongs pa rnams ni bde
ba'i don du rgyal ba'i dam tshig go/ /rin chen 'byung ba sdug 'phongs rnams kyi 'gyur te pad+ma 'dzin pa chags can rnams kyis chags pa'i phyir/ /bgegs rnams gzhom pa'i don nyid du ni phyag gi pad+mar

ral gri 'dzin pa'i don yod grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum ste de nyid dus mtha'i me mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma ru 'gyur/ /gti mug las ni spyan mar brjod de mchog gi snying rjes nga
rgyal rgyu las mA ma kI ru gsungs/ /'dod chags las ni gos dkar mor gsungs yon tan ma lus gter gyur phrag dog nyid las sgrol ma'o/ /'di nyid gnyis po dag ni sna tshogs gzugs te yul dang
yul can 'di dag thams cad gzhan du 'gyur/ /sbyin pa la sogs drug bzhi'i rnam pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bde ba de rnams nus ma bcu ru gsungs/ /de rnams thabs
ni byang sems mchog tu dag pas gang ba'i bum pa rnam pa bcu po rnams su 'gyur/ /bdud dang nyon mongs nges par zad pa 'dod lha bde byed dag ste rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa sogs/ /phyag rgya drug ni
stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa shes dang shes bya gcig pa'o/ /gang gis nges par rigs kyi gzugs su gyur pa rtsom pa de la gzugs ni chen por gsungs pa'o/ /'khor ba'i sdug
bsngal rab tu bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa'o/ /'khor ba'i 'du shes bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rdo rje chen po'i 'du shes nyid du gsungs/ /gang du 'khor ba'i
'phel ba bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o/ /gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni rnam par shes par gsungs pa'o/ /mi shes pa yi dngos
po bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid du gsungs/ /de rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs rgyal mchog dam pa rnams te rnam pa drug ni rigs drug go/ /gzhan yang khams
drug dbye ba rnams ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' bzhi rnams las/ /gti mug mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin de ni spyan ma yin te de nyid sa ru gsungs/ /nga rgyal mtha' dag bcom
par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni mA ma kI ste de nyid chu ru gsungs/ /'dod chags mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni gos dkar mo ste de nyid me ru gsungs/ /phrag dog mtha' dag bcom par gyur

pa gang yin rnams ni sgrol ma nyid de de nyid rlung du gsungs/ /zhe sdang mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang yin rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'/ /ser sna mtha' dag bcom par gyur pa gang
yin rnams ni sna tshogs yum ste mi 'gyur bde ba'o/ /yid kyis nam mkhar nges par gzugs mthong ba ste ma mthong ba nyid ba gang yin de ni mig /ring nas sgra brjod rab tu gsal bar thos

par gyur pa 'di ni rgyal ba yi ni rna chen po/ /dri rnams thams cad 'dzin pa nyid de mchog tu bde bar gyur pa de ni khyab bdag dam pa'i sna/ /rang gi zla bzang bdud rtsi rtag tu myangs pas yang dag bde

ba ster ba gang yin de ni lce/ /rdo rje reg bya kun nas rgyun du 'phrog pa de ni rdo rje lus kyi dbang por 'gyur ba'o/ /thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa chos te de las bde ba mnyam par zhugs pa gang yin de ni
yid| |drug po 'di rnams dbye bas phye na yul dang yul can dag ste byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas/ /gzugs sogs 'di rnams rgyal ba mchog gi yul te rnam pa drug rnams gzugs
brnyan bzhin du sprul pa rnams/ /dang zhing mi skye mi 'gag pa dang mchog tu bde ba 'dzag med rnyog med ye shes go bya ba/ /'gro ba gzhan gyis bzung bar mi nus khams gsum kun gyi dbang po'i
sgo yis yang dag go ba min/ /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga nyid du snying rje yis ni bzhugs gyur pa/ /nges pa bral dang bsod nams ma
yin bsags pa'i sems can ma lus smin par bya ba'i don du'o/ /gtsang ma'i gnas sogs rnams su bcom ldan 'das nyid bzhugs pa nyan thos gang zhig rnams kyi don du'o/
e waM rnam par gang bzhugs mchog gi nges pa dang ldan ma lus gang du dgod pa'i don du'o/ /sems can rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas bzhugs
pa rnam pa gsum/ /nges par rdo rje can rnams phyi dang nang dang gzhan gyi dus rnams kun la rtag par rab byung ba/ /phyi rol rnams la sna tshogs ma ru 'gyur te lus la rlung gis
rab tu rgyu ba gang zhig rnams/ /sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang gtso bo gang zhig rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha gar rab tu yin/ /gzhan ni gang zhig sgra la sogs pa'i yul gyur
rnams la sems mi 'gro dang de bzhin de kho na/ /gang zhig e waM yi ger zhugs kyang mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang las ni sku gsung thugs bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje can nyid gcig
la gsum gyi dbye bar 'gyur ba yul dang yul can khams kyis bskor ba yis/ /srid pa gsum gyi sems can du ma rnams kyi don phyir dus gsum bde gshegs gnas gsum
rnams pa bzhugs/ /rgyud rnams su ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya'i tshig rnams 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste/ /mgo mgrin snying ga lte ba gsang ba rnams kyi pad+mar zla ba zhu ba
rdo rje can gyi dus/ /mchog gi pad+ma de la thig le gsum gyis thar par gshegs pa rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha gar brjod/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu zhugs pa de 'dir bcom ldan
'das su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /gcig ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang las zhi dang chags pa la sogs rang bzhin gyis/ /'khor lo la gnas skye ba snga ma
nyid kyi bag chags stobs gyur rnams kyi sems las byung ba ni/ /don gcig la ni ma lus gsung rnams srog chags rnams kyi rang rang bsam pa dang sbyar rab tu 'jug /'khor lo la
gnas khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi bsod nams don du bsod snyoms mdzad du gshegs pa ste/ /dud 'gro yi dwags lha min brang 'gro lha dang 'phags pa mi dang du 'bod la sogs
pa rnams la/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum du rtag par bden pa'i chos rnams gsungs pa ni/ /srid gsum ma lus rang rang skad rnams kyis ni lam la
yang dag gnas par byed do gzhan gyis min/ /bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung 'di yin te lha skad rnams kyis 'byung ba min/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po thams
cad du ni nges par rdo rje can gyis rdo rje'i tshig rnams sbas pa las/ /srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i don du dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud du ma lus mngon
su ma gsungs pa yis/ /de phyir 'jig rten pa yi rgyud kyi bla ma ma lus ma tshang med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ /dpal ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud du rgyal ba mchog gi
bdag po mngon par rjod byed zla bzang kye/ /'di yan sangs rgyas kyi bka'/ /mi yi 'jig rten rnams su nyon mongs rnams bral dpal ldan bla ma gang dag rdo rje 'dzin bdag nyid/ /'di man bka
bsdu ba 'jam grags kyi gsung yin 'dra/ /de la nyes pa byed pa'i srog chags rnams ni nges par 'dir ni dmyal bar 'gyur te ngo mtshar med/ /de mnyes pa yis bdag mnyes pa ste de la khro ba'i
me chen byed na bdag la khro ba yin/ /sems can rnams la de yis bde mnyam 'bras bu'i thar ba ster bas phyag rgya mchod bya sras rnams kyis/ /dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs
bzang pad+mar dus gsum rnams la phyag mi 'tshal ba las ni sdig can gang / /dus gsum rnams su sna tshogs me tog rnam pa mang pos maN+Dal mi byed de las rmongs pa gang / /
myur bar bde ba ster ba'i bla ma skyo ba skyed pa gang yin gang zhig mnar med pa ru 'gro/ /shes rab ye shes thob pa gang ni mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs gang mi spong ba de nyams
pa min/ /su zhig nyams na gang zhig rtsa gsum la gnas rlung rnams dpag med dus su gsod byed nyams pa'o/ /dpa' bo gang na mnyam dang mi mnyam lam du srog dang thur du
rgyu ba'i rlung rnams gsod byed gang / /sbyin bdag gang na dpal ldan bla ma rnams la rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs gang 'bul rnams/ /ngan pa gang na slu byed rang snying nyon mongs pa yi
sems kyis 'gugs pa'i g.yo sgyu can rnams gang / /dpal ldan chos kyi 'khor lo kha dog sna tshogs pa yi gdan de la ni sangs rgyas nyer bzhugs pa/ /lha mchog rnams kyis btud nas
mi yi bdag po zla bas zhus pa lha dang mi yi bal ma yis/ /khong du chung nas sems can kun gyi don rgyur rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas de nyid gsungs/ /de yang A li kA li dang ldan bsdus
pa'i rgyud snying nga yis nyi ma khyod la gtad de kye/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa las ni nga yis dus kyi 'khor lo me tog phreng ba 'dzin bsdebs pa/ /pad+ma dkar po khyod kyis bsngags
pa rnams la nges par drang srong nyi ma'i shing rta yin 'dra/ /rdo rje'i tshig 'dzin 'di nyid brtan par gyis/ /'di yis nyi ma dang bcas thub rigs rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin shes rab ye shes thob gyur
cig /de ltar dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin gyis srid gsum la gnas sems can rnams kyang de ltar 'gyur bar shog /nyi ma khyod dam mi bdag phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par dus kya
'khor lo'i rnal 'byor kho na las/ /bram ze'i rigs su skyes dag mi dbang grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs nyid de bdag gi dga' ma ni/ /dpal ldan sgrol ma
pad dkar mtha' dag yon tan gter gyur 'jig rten mgon po pad+ma'i phyag mtshan can/ /ut+pal yi sdong po bdag gzhan snga ma'i srid pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin nges par ltos/ /bdag
gzhan kun gyi srid pa snga ma'i ut+pal yi sdong bu ji lta ba bzhin mthong nas ni/ /nyi ma dang bcas thub dbang rnams kyis dbu rgyan bcas pa'i dbu yis rigs gcig zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /
lag gnyis thal mo sbyar te btud nas smras pa thub pa'i rigs rnams mi bzad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las/ /gdon phyir ye shes lam la mchog gi snying rje yis ni 'god par byed
pa ston pa gcig pu kye/ /bgres dang gzhon pa nyid kyang khyod de ma lus rgyal ba'i sras dang dang po'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang khyod/ /bud med dang 'dus pa dang tshangs par spyod dang mchog
gi snying rjes 'jig rten gnyen dang gshin rje'i gshed/ /khyod ni zhi dang mchog gi mchog ste khyod nyid 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dang ni bdud kyi bdud/ /grol ba yang ni
khyod de 'gro ba smin bya'i don du srid pa 'dir 'jug pa yang grags pa khyod/ /nyi ma bdag dang bram ze thub pa'i rigs rnams kun gyi zhabs kyi drung du phyag byas lhung pa dang / /
sems can ma lus sgrol ba'i don rgyur dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa steng gsal por bsgrags par mdzad/ /dpal ldan ka lA pa ru nyi mtshungs rigs gcig rigs la sa yi bdag pos phyag byas pa
yang khyod/ /mi bzad 'khor bas 'jigs pas khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni skyabs su lhag par mchis pa dang / /dpyid zla tha chung nya yi mtshan mo 'das nas nyin mor rab tu ma zhugs pa yi dus nyid
la/ /sna tshogs gtso bo'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nyi ma thub pa'i skye bor bcas pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob/ /bdag gi sems kyi rdo rjes steng ma lus song bas sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i
rgyur 'gyur ltar/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin gyis srid pa rnam gsum sems can rnams kyi don la 'gro bar byed par shog /mchog gi snying rje sems can kun gyi don rnams mdzad pa po yi rgyud
kyi don rnams bstan mdzad nas/ /rab mchog yon tan kun gyi gter ldan sras po pad+ma dkar po nyid la bka' stsal gnang nas ni/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag tshangs pa nges par glegs bam
la gnas byas pa 'di la 'jig rten gnyen/ /khyod kyis dang por nges par rgya cher 'grel pa gyis la de nas mchog gi go 'phang 'gro bar mdzod/ /steng na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rnams
kyis bdud kyi phyogs gyur rnams dang lha min ma lus rnams/ /mchog tu 'jigs mdzad mi yi 'jig rten phyogs mtshams la gnas khro rgyal btsun mor bcas pas srin po rnams/ /sa 'og

gnyis/ 'gyur chad 'gyur lhag gnyis/ 'gyur 'khrug 'gyur log gnyis/ 'gyur dman 'gyur bcos gnyis te 'gyur skyon brgyad dang bral ba'o/ /dus 'khor bsdus rgyud kyi snying po 'di snye thang rin chen gling bla mas
shod smad 'jang phu lha khang gi dpe khrod nas rnyed pa paN chen dpal ldan ye shes la gzigs su phul bas/ khong gi zhal nas 'di ni/ rigs ldan 'jam dpal grags pas dus 'khor bsdus rgyu/

las kyang shin tu snying por bka' bsdu mdzad pa/ byang sham+b+ha lar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thams cad kyis kha ton du klog pa/ bod kyi bka' 'gyur gyi nang du ma tshud pa ngo mtshar bye ba'i 'byung
gnas yin/ zhes gsungs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsakra gar+b+ha nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi snying po/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /nyin mor byed pa'i 'od lta bu/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i spyan/ /sangs rgyas seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /lha yi mchog gis phyag byas pa
spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal po zla ba bzang pos zhus/ /yan lag pad+ma sbyar ba ni/ /yan lag mchog la bzhag byas te/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ni/ /rtsod pa dag gi dus kyi ni
mi rnams grol za'i rgyu ru'o/ /so sor sdud pa rnam pa bcu/ /rgyal ba yi ni dbang por 'gyur/ /de bzhin bsam gtan mi bskyod pa/ /srog dang rtsol ba ral gri can/ /slar la yang ni rnam pa
bcu| |gzung ba rin chen phyag rgya can/ /g.yung mo rjes su dran pa ni/ /pad+ma 'dzin pha ru ni 'gyur/ /dpal gyi ting 'dzin 'khor lo can/ /re re yang ni lnga ru dbye/ /
slar la yang ni gang dbye ba/ /a la sogs dang ka la sogs/ /so sor sdud pa yul dang ni/ /yul can rnam pa bcu po rnams/ /lus la 'jug pa med pa'o/ /shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa'o/ /
dga' ba mi g.yo bde ba dang / /bsam gtan sems ni rtse gcig pa'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba gnyis kyi lam/ /mi 'jug pa ru 'gyur ba ni/ /dbu mar srog ni 'jug pa'o/ /thig le ru ni
srog 'jug cing / /gnyis ka 'gro dang 'ong ba dag /gzung ba yid ni sems gcig pa/ /gtum mo yi ni snang ba gang / /lus la nges par gsal 'gyur ba/ /nam mkha' de ni rjes
dran 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi/ lhan cig skyes pa'i bden dbang gis/ /ye shes sku ni ting 'dzin te/ /'di ni chu sogs dbye ba yis/ /gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sna
tshogs bdag po'i sgrub thabs so/ /phyag rgya gsum dang tshad ni gsum/ /rnam pa gsum gyi srid dbang gis/ /las dang kun rtog bzang po yi/ /so sor sdud pa rnal 'byor pa/ /yul du
rnam par bral ba dang / /sngags kun gyis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba dag pa yis/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ /srog dang rtsol ba dag pas ni// zla ba nyi ma
dag pas bral/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod/ /gzung ba yi ni stobs kyis ni/ /nyon mongs la sogs bdud 'joms shing / /stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /dri med 'od 'phro
dkyil 'khor te/ /gzhan yang ye shes sku las so/ /de phyir dag ba ting 'dzin gyis/ /nyi ma cung zad tsam gyis ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /so sor sdud la sogs pa yis/ /gal te ga
bar de 'gyur na/ /sngags pa rnams kyis 'dod mi 'grub/ /sgra la goms pa yan lag ma'i/ /pad song rdo rje nor bu yi/ /thig le sgrub pa song bar bya/ /bsnyen pa dang po sbyor ba ni/ /nam mkha' ru ni rnam
pa bcu| |'khor lo can ni khro lta ba'o/ /bgegs ni mthar byed kyi lta ba/ /bdud rtsi lam du song ba yang / /nye ba'i bsnyen pa yan lag drug /shes rab las 'phros zla thig le/ /gzhan yang rdo rje nor bu
ste| |yi ge gsum ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /bde bar mnyams gcig zhi ba/ /lhan cig skyes pa ru ni 'gyur/ /sgrub chen ye shes sbyor ba'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba kun nas ni/ /mgo bo'i bar ni phan pa ste/ /
mnyam pa'i bde ba 'bras ster ba/ /de las steng ni mi phan pa/ /'chi ba'i 'jig pa byed pa'o/ /sems can nges par klog pa'i rgyu/ /gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas su/ /mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang
du| |'di ni sbyar bar bya ba nyid/ /phung po med pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba la bzhugs mod/ /'on kyang 'jig rten grags pa med/ /dbus su srog dang 'jug pa ni/ /yul dang rnam
par bral ba nyid/ /sna tshogs yum gyis 'khyud pa'o/ /pad+mar 'jug pa'i rang rdo rje/ /spro ba yang ni de bzhin te/ /rdo rje dbus su gzhag par bya/ /sa bon ma lhung bde ba//
shin tu chags pa'i chags par song / /rnal 'byor pa yi 'byor pa nyid/ /mchog tu yang ni khyab pa'i bdag /dpal ni gsang las gsar ba po/ /gtsug tor du ni rtse lnga pa'o/ /rdo rje yi ni 'gyur
ba yin| |phyi yi rtse mo nyis 'gyur du/ /'gyur ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de ni gnyis su 'dres pa dang / /de ni gzhan yang nyis 'gyur ro/ /de yi yang ni gzhan nyis 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes dang longs
spyod rdzogs/ /sprul pa yi ni 'khor lor ro/ /de yi nang du rtse gcig go /mnyam pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster ba/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma'i nang gsang ba'o/ /rnal 'byor ba dang srog gcod pa/ /nyin dang
mtshan du phye ba ni/ /de ni srog 'jigs pa ru gsungs/ /sgra gang kha dang bral ba ni/ /snying la yod par rab 'gyur ba/ /de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid/ /kun mkhyen gyi ni ye shes sar/ /'dzin par
yang ni dbye ba gang / /rnal 'byor pa la de gsungs so/ /bde ba'i thig le ma lhung ba/ /gzhan gyi bud med du ni 'gyur/ /bsten pa chags bral min pa'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i me yis ni/ /ri
bong can la zhu ba yi/ /btung ba chang gi btung ba'o/ /mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor du/ /chos kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ni/ /nya mthar thug par rang gi sems/ /gtsug tor gnas nas
mtho bo ru/ /yid ni 'dir ni 'gro 'gyur te/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug par/ /rnal 'byor ma spyod pa des ni/ /nyi ma re re'i dus su ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster/ /spyod dang 'dod pas lus
tshan/ /mchog gi kha yi pad+ma las/ /tshig mi 'byung dang gnyid log dang / /'gul dang na ba lkugs pa dang / /yid ni 'khrug dang brgyal ba ni/ /du ba la sogs rdo rje can/ /de rnams gsal ba rnam pa
bcu| |srog can lus kyi gnas skabs so/ /'jig rten 'dod pa'i gnas skabs ni/ /nges pa kho nas gsal ba las/ /su zhig rgyal ba su 'dod pa/ /thig le dkar po'i rgyun ni gang / /nyin dang mtshan
mor ltung pa ni/ /mA ma ki ni de chad do/ /ko ku la sogs mig la sogs/ /nyi ma re re bzhin spro bas/ /sha gzhan res 'ga' yang ma yin/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsten pa ni/ /rang gi rigs kyi sar song
ba| |lha rnams dag pa'i lus las so/ /stong pa'i sems de rtsod pa yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa khyab bde bas/ /de ni skye gnas 'khrig pa med/ /nor gyi sbyin pa btang ba dang / /bud med sbyor la yid kyis
ni| |mi 'jig pa ni tshul khrims so/ /bzod pa sgra sogs mi 'jug pa/ /gnyi gar 'gro ba'i le lo ni/ /rnam par 'jig pa brtson 'grus so/ /bsam gtan shes rab sems dang ni/ /bde ba lhan cig par
song ba/ /kun 'gro thams cad brjod pa'o/ /sems can don du de rdzu 'phrul/ /srid pa don ni med byed pa/ /thob pa gzhan ni bzhi pa'o/ /lus gcig la ni nus ldan pa/ /cha dgu dang ni lhan cig pa/ /nyi
shu rtsa lnga bdag nyid sogs/ /bsam gtan phyag rgya'i gnyis dag nyid/ /cung zad tsam gyi nyi ma yis/ /dngos grub yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhi ba dbang dang
rengs pa dang / /srid pa 'jig par byed pa ni/ /zhal gyi dbye bas phye ba nyid/ /'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gnas/ /lha min lag 'gro dag gi rigs/ /'di bsgoms nas ni bsgrub
par bya| |dpal dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las gsungs pa dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba las/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa sbyor ba yan lag

drug pa'i sgrub thabs bkol ba'i dum bu'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI b+ha dra bo d+hi'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi jo ban+d+he zla ba'i 'od zer gyis 'bro dge slong gi phyir bsgyur cing zhus te
gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ she ka pra kri ya/ bod skad du/ dbang gi rab tu byed pa/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phab pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo

dang ni snying ga spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin pa dang / /gsang ba rnams su srung ba rgyal ba rnams kyis rang gi rigs gyur rnams la rang gi rdor gsum gyis/ /slob ma rnams kyi lus la gos ser bskon
zhing mig rnams bkab nas dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/ /kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid rnams la brtul zhugs rnams ni sbyin bya rtag pa ru/ /gsad dang mi bden pa

dang gzhan gyi bud med rnams spangs de bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag kyang ste/ /'khor ba'i rdo rje zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams/ /gang zhig gang gi dus su
byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'i/ /sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyod rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar gyis/
rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang / /ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya/
grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha mi'i bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang / /dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa
lnga'o| |dpal ldan sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i pad+ma kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te/ /dbang po lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad+ma kha sbyar gnas pa'i me
tog dkyil 'khor du ni ngor/ /gnas gyur gang du me tog bzang po lhung ba de nyid de yi rigs su des so mi bdag kye/ /phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji lta ba
bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu sbyin/ /klu rnams kyis sa ma bzhis te rgyal ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bum pa nor bu gser gyi bum pa'am/ /sa las byung ba rnams su
rin chen sman ldan dang ni dri ldan rnams kyis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rab dbye rnams kyis dbu rgyan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus
ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs nyid/ /rdo rje dril bus nyi ma zla ba nyid de brtul zhugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po sbyang bar bya/ /ming gis khro bo rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag
po'i rjes gnang phyi mor bcas pa sbyin/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu rab tu sbyin nas mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya/ /rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa srog gcod pa dang ral grir
mi bden pa yi ngag brjod bya ba dang / /rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog gi pad+ma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog /'khor lor 'chang dang mar me sangs rgyas
rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bsten par bya ba'o/ /gri gug tu ni gdol pa mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha' yi pad+ma smad mi bya/ /sems can rnams kyi don du
nor dang lus bcas sbyin gyi 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min/ /rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal ba grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges//
chu yis sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal ba rnams te dar dbyangs nus ma rnams/ /rdo rje dril bus nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gis
byams pa sogs su sbyong / /rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa/ /de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i dri ma
'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin/ /dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang rnams bkur na dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ /phyis ni phyir mi ldog la
sogs pa nges par rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang / /shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur ba'o//
'gro ba g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas yon tan can gyis bzlas pas rnam par
dag par 'gyur/ /gal te bum pa dang ni gsang bar brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa yod ma yin/ /gang zhig la ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i don du
dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug bya/ /rjes gnang thob nas phyi nas tshogs kyi rigs su 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa las ni gzhon pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis te dpal ldan bla ma'i
thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de yi bka' las 'das pa gzhan te de bzhin du ni spun la khro ba gsum par nges par 'gyur/ /byams pa spangs pa bzhi par 'gyur te
gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las ni mda'/ /grub mtha' smod pa drug pa nyid de gzhan yang ma smin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin pa ri/ /phung
po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te gzhan yang dag pa'i chos la ma dad dgu pa'o/ /sgyu yi byams pa phyogs te ming sogs bral ba'i bde ba ster la rtog pa gang yin drag po'o/ /
dag pa'i sems can rnams la rab tu skyon brjod nyi mar 'gyur ro dam tshig rnyed pa spangs na gzhan/ /bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa la gnas
rnams kyi'o/ /phyogs kyi lo ni gcig nas rnam pa bcu yi bar du lta dang reg par bya ba yin pa ste/ /de nas 'khyud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bsten par bya ba g.yo ba la
sogs pa/ /nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'byung bo lha min rigs/ /dbang gi don du drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba dang
gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o/ /gang zhig dang por yang ni dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod/ /ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba mthong bar
byas pas gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur ba'o/ /mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan lag kha rnams sbyang bar bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya/ /rgyal ba dbang por
byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yang bla ma la yang 'dir/ /rgyan rnams thams cad ldan pa'i gser zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i lo nyid bcu gnyis ma ste bu mo mdzes/ /thabs
dang shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi rdo rje nor bus spyad bya nyid ni chags bcas la/ /slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhug par bya ba nyid/ /phyis
ni rang gi phyag rgya bu la byin par byas nas de nas gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs ldan yang / /skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g.yo dang gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad ldan
bu btsas dang / /khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la chags dang rdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan lag nyams dang ma dag pa/ /de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang du shin tu 'bad de bla mas
spang bya mi'i dpang po/ /sngar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus ldan dam tshig 'dzin la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya/ /'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi yid nyid 'dod chags kyis ni 'khrugs
par byed dang gang bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /yan lag mchog la gang ba las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu nas yang dag 'dzag pa nyid/ /oD+Da dgug par rab tu byas pas mchog gi bde ba
ster ba thig le thar pa gsum gyi mthar/ /snang reg 'dus dang 'gyur dang bde ba rnams te dga' ba'i dbye pa la sogs pa yis de ltar ro/ /dang por yang ni mi rnams kun gyis mig gis bltas
pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste/ /phyi nas gang ba rang gi lus la rab tu 'dus pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ /'bar ba yang dag
rol pas rdo rje las ni pad+mar thig le 'dzag par dga' ba'o/ /oD+Da rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga'o/ /'dod dang dga' dang g.yo ba dang ni mi
'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi sbyor ba gcig /gang ba nus pa dang ni skye ba nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o/ /'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yur ba dang
ste khyad par dga' ba nyid rnams gsum pa'o/ /oD+Da dang ni sgra tsam nyid de gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid rnams bzhi pa'o/ /sems kyis bsam par bya ba ma ste rig par bya
zhing 'khyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o/ /rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa bu mor brjod de byed bcas shin tu bde ba de bzhin tsha mo'o/ /thig le ltung ba chung mar 'gyur te chags bral gzhan gyi
rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do/ /de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos/ /chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs pa dang mer ni
rlung dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste/ /de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du
bde ba dam pa'i gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi pa'o/ /phyag rgya rnams la yum gyi mchog gyur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o/ /rnam pa bdun dang rnam pa gsum ste bcu
po 'di ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang ste/ /de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa zhes gsungs pas so/ /bzhi pa ni/ gsum pa shes rab ye shes ma yin te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi
pa zhes smras pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin yang zhes gsungs pas so/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu mar reg pa nyid dang gzhan yang bdud rtsi
myong dang 'khyud pa'o/ /shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang / /de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje
mchog gis nges par bstan pa'o/ /gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa/ /las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems
g.yang byed de ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin pas/ /yang dag spangs te rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog skyed byed phyag rgya bzang po sgom pa ni/ /gos pa med cing mi 'gyur
mun 'joms kun la khyab pa mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor ma yi go bya ba/ /lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los rjes khyab pas/ /sems
kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges/ /ma lus rgyal sras rnams dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal
'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsten byas na/ /ye shes snang ba de nyid rab tu shar bas bdud dpung yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag bsregs ba dang / /chags pa la sogs rnams kyis
rnal 'byor ba rnams lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed/ /shes rab ye shes zhes pa sems kyi snang ba nyid de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba'o/ /dbang 'dir
zhugs pa gang zhig dri ma med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bur nges/ /de nas bde ba 'dzag pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das
par reg /des na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o/ /nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzum pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam
du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis/ /stong pa las ni du pa smig rgyu rab tu gsal ba dri med srin bu me khyer mar me dang / /'bar dang nyi ma zla ba rdo rje rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha
dang thig le nyid rnams so/ /de yi dbus su sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang rnam par bral ba longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o/ /chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor rtse
gcig gnas pa'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni/ /ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba mthong ba dus kyi rtsa yis so/ /der ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang nyi ma bzhin
du rnyog pa med pa sna tshogs mdog /yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no/ /sku mthong gyur nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su
srog gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa dang / /brtul zhugs can rnams lam gyi sems ni zla ba drug gis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba'o/ /ji srid nges par rang gi lus
la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar/ /chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo/ /
mtha' dag 'bar ba'i dbus kyang khyad par dga' dang lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang / /gnyid dang brgyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje pad+ma dag gis gnyis sbyor
bde ba gang yin pa/ /de yis 'phel bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tshom med/ /bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas
rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig sbyor ba yis/ /sa yi rnam par snang yang sra ba min dang chu yi gzugs su snang yang chu min gsher ba med pa'i phyir/ /me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung
gi gzugs su snang yang g.yo ba med pas rlung ma yin/ /stong ba'i rnam pa yin yang mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min/ /
rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis/ /sgra tsam thig la cha dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas su 'gro dang lcags sgrog
bcings pa'i rtsa/ /srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje pad+mar bcas dang pad+ma rdo rje ldan pa yis/ /dbus su rlung dag 'gro dang 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul can med
par 'gyur ba dang / /du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzungs dang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang ba chen po'o/ /dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang bcas
zla bar gyur pa gams dang g.yon pa bcing ba dang / /phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde gyur pa dang rdo rje yang dag sad pa dang / /bde ba dam pa'i don du pad+mar rdo rje
bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i pad+mas gsor ba yis/ /sa bon ma btang bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do/ /sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la
de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o/ /rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du/ /rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur bde ba dam pa
gzhom du med pa ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba'o/ /mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir/ /'dod pas sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur
te gang ba rdzogs pa gsung du rab tu 'gyur ba'o/ /'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te oD+Da las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes zhes su brjod/ /dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku
ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi rim pa yis/ /gsung dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed/ /g.yo ba nges
par chos kyi sku ste srid gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsung / /gnyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs te tuR+ya de yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms/ /yi ge
nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le sgra tsam rim pa yis/ /gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum la gnas dag pa'i sku ru skyed par byed/ /sad dang
rmi lam rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tu R+ya'i rang bzhin rnams/ /lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul las bskyod pa med pa'i sems
thim pa| |ye shes gnas kyang bud mad dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i skad cig ni/ /sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu
'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus/ /khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster
thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni/ /rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon thig le btang na thar par ga la 'gyur/ /de phyir
'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar bya/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa sum cu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las
mdor bsdus pa dbang gi rab tu byed pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po sa man+ta shrI dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA ki nI dza la saM wa ra nA ma ut+ta ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro
ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /
gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor
ba| |mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /chags med chags dang bral ba min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgyu/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog /sgyu ma
dag ni thams cad pas/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par che/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis/ /gus bar byed pa dag tu
'gyur| |rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis/ /ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub/ /ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /mkha'
'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to/ /DA ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes/ /khams las mngon du brtags pa ste/ /nam mkha' kun tu spyod 'grub pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /thams cad
ma lus phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes/ /sangs rgyas
khams las rnam par brtags/ /kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /shaM zhes bya ba bde bar bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin/ /sgyu ma
thams cad rab sbyor ba/ /mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos
por bdag gyur to/ /sems dang sems pa'i ting 'dzin dang / /byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid/ /de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de ni byang chub sangs rgyas
yin| |rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang / /de bzhin pad+mo pad+mo 'chang / /nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang / /de dag gi yang rigs yin no/ /de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral/ /'dod pa dang ni
grel ba'ang yin/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang / /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i/ /gnas pa thams cad de nyid do/ /'gro ba dag
ni ma lus kun/ /thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyangs mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /dngos
po thams cad de yin te/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog
go /bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ /tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni bdag gis brtag par bya/ /
sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog /bdag nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go /rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems/ /lha la dmigs par
byed pa dag /rnal 'byor gzugs brtan rang bzhin te/ /lcags ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye/ /yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor la/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /rang gi dam tshig bdag
sbyor ba| |mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la/ /rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /byang chub sems la rab brtson na/ /de las rnal 'byor lhar
'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams
cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no/ /de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad
dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor
ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dang pa'o// //'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das//
rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde pa'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor bas/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub//
sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che/ /de bas bde ba nyid kyi ni/ /sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po/ /'di la khrus dang sdom mi dgos/ /dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos/ /dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang / /bde ba dang ni dka' bas
'grub| |de bas ji ltar 'dod spyod cing / /kun za de bzhin thams cad spyod/ /spyad pa ji ltar 'dod par byed/ /g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed/ /langs pa dang ni 'dug pa'am/ /'chag
gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung / /dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung / /gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung / /dkyil 'khor du yang ma zhugs pa/ /sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung / /rang gi lhar ni
bdag sbyor na/ /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /thams cad sgrub par byed pa na/ /ngas zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis/ /nyes pa dag tu yong
mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye bar mi 'thob pa/ /sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga dag gis ni/ /bsgrubs na kun tu 'thob 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i
mchog /'di ni bdag gi sa brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba/ /cha lugs ji bzhin
bsgyur ba yis/ /thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgya 'di sgrub pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /shin tu byin
gyis brlabs na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing / /rnam pa kun tu mchod byed na/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /mthong zhing mchod pa byas par
'gyur| |'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang / /bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //
thos pa dang ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor
bas| |bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing / /sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rnam pa thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub
par| |de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pas/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyis/ /bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs dag gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
mchod pa mdzad/ /thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /bde ba'i mchog ni thob par
'gyur| |rnal 'byor kun la nyer sbyor bas/ /dpal ni bzhir 'gyur grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi nye bar
sbyor ba ni/ /khams gsum ma lus thams cad do/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi longs spyod kyis/ /ji ltar bde bar sten byed cing / /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag nyid rab tu mchod
par bya| |rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing / /rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag /bdag nyid kun tu myang byed na/ /shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi//
ras yan bde ba 'dis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang / /lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro
sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'
'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ dpal rdo rje sems dpar kun tu sbyor ba'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o// //'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bde/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che/ /rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun/ /so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje
sems dpar sbyor ba yi/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor bde ba myos pa kun/ /so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du//
bde bas myos pa'i dngos grub kun/ /so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /bde bas myos pa'i dbang phyug kun/ /so so rjes su
rang 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yi/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa'i/ /bud med mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur/ /de yi dam tshig de byung
ba| |sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang / /shin tu sbyor dang sbyor chen po/ /thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog /gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa/ /lhan cig spyod pas rjes spyod
sdug /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog tu 'bar/ /thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i/ /phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che/ /rtag pa dam pa lha mo yis/ /rgyal
mos mchod pa thams cad mchog /rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba dang / /thams cad lha mo 'dus pas ni/ /ma lus skal pa bzang po kun/ /bde ba so so rjes su
'grub| |phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo bde ba chen mo kun/ /thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos//
sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas/ /skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar byed/ /dbang po kun nas byung ba yi/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi/ /bkod
pa rab 'byams tshogs rnams kyis/ /thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed/ /rnal 'byor bde ba thams cad kyi/ /dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba/ /rin chen tshogs rnams
thams cad kyis/ /rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur/ /lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la/ /ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba/ /bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag la bdag gis rab tu
mchod| |rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba yis/ /rjes su sbyor ba mchod byed cing / /rtag tu myang bar byed pa na/ /shin tu sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag
nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya na bde ba des/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang / /lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag /'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/ /rin chen dbang phyug kun
gyi bdag /de dag dang ni dga' spyod na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /lha mo thams cad grub chen po/ /'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam
mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa/ /de las rgya chen mchog gzhan med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen des//
'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa'i/ /dngos grub kun gyis bde myos pa/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /dbang
phyug kun gyi bde myos pa/ /dam pa rgya chen gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des/ /'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mi
'grub med/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ lha mo
thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa mchog bzang po dpal rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// //'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /skal ba bzang mchog 'dod pa ste//
yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba/ /'dod chags ther zug brtan pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs che dang / /dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi reg bde mchog /rang gi sbyong
par de spyod do/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa/ /gzungs dang sa rnams de bzhin du/ /dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i/ /skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos/ /lha yi dngos grub dga' ba dang //
sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /skal pa bzang po bde myong bas/ /so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad las byung ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal/ /skal pa bzang
po longs spyod kun/ /rang gi spyad par de spyod do/ /rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang / /'jig rten dang po mchog gi dpal/ /sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa/ /'phrog nas nye bar spyod par
byed/ /khams gsum dag na ma lus pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun/ /rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /'phrog nas nye bar spyod par byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ /
mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag /kun nas 'phrog nas de spyod na/ /longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan/ /'phrog las grub dang dran las dga'//
'o thon stobs kyis 'phrog nas kyang / /de ni dad la sbyin par byed/ /ma lus 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas/ /ngo thon stobs kyis 'phrog nas kyang / /de ni
dad la sbyin par byed/ /tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi/ /mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag /kun nas 'phrog ste myur sbyin na/ /longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /de yis mi sbyin ci
yang med/ /sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun/ /mi bya ba ni gang yang med/ /sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /'phrog nas kyang ni sbyin byed na/ /las mchog
dag ni rab 'byams dang / /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za/ /sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po/ /'khor los
bsgyur ba rab grub pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che/ /rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug /la lar byang chub
sems chen po/ /la lar spyod pa mthun par 'gro/ /la lar dga' ldan lha dag las/ /dam pa shin tu 'pho ba'o/ /la lar skye ba rnam par dag /la lar nges par 'byung bar gsal/ /
la lar byang chub chen por gshegs/ /la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal/ /la lar byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya/ /la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /la lar pha rol mu stegs rnams/ /chos
dang mthun par tshar gcod do/ /la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba/ /grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog /grub pa'i dbang phyug
bla na med/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis/ /'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar/ /rnam par sprul pa dgyes shing rol/ /dngos grub chen
po kun gyi mchog /brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag /gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin/ /'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing / /de bzhin
gshegs pa kun gyis mchod/ /lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog /rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grub/ /sems can khams ni du ma dag /ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs/ /lha dang
byang chub dka' ba rnams/ /brtan par sems can dag la smin/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis/ /sems can kun gyi don byed cing / /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /bskal pa
kun tu srid par gnas/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/
sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste/ dpal dam tshig gi rtog pa ste bzhi pa'o// //'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar/ /rtog pa'i cho ga
thams cad la/ /grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog /sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang / /bde ba thams cad 'grub pa'i
phyir| |bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pas/ /sems can kun don rnam sprul na/ /myur du shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /nyin re'am yang na zla re
'am| |yang na de bzhin lo re ni/ /ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o/ /khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang / /de bzhin srog dang rtsa las 'byung / /rang
gi lha yi cha lugs su/ /sgrub pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bya/ /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis/ /slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der/ /mchod pa byas
nas des sgrub bo/ /de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa/ /ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i/ /gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /sems dpa'
sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /
rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste/ /rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin/ /ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka'/ /cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la/ /las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs
kyis| |sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog /sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams/ /sangs rgyas la
sogs 'dul bas 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs phyung ba'o/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab
la| |'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson/ /'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas/ /'gags shing yongs su mya ngan
'das| |rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa kun tu bskyed/ /stong pa ma
yin mi stong min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /thabs kyi snying rje bdag nyid rnams/ /de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin
par gsal/ /rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ /sems can don du yongs brtags pa/ /rnam par mi rtog la mos pas/ /thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya/ /brag tsa yi ni sgra 'dra ba/ /tshe
kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te/ /de las theg pa chen po yi/ /yang dag yon tan rgyas pa'i glus/ /dus gsum pa yi dam tshig gsum/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod/ /mnyam med mi g.yo
mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ /yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa/ /dri med mi g.yo mnyam med
dam pa'i mchog chos can/ /yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de/ /dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod pa'ang min/ /dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams/ /sems can
khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol/ /rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung / /smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ /'gro ba'i don grub rab tu
brtson pa mtha' yas pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang / /tshad med tshad dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang //
khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan/ /mchog sbyin
rnams kyi nang na go 'phang dam pa brnyes/ /khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad/ /mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa/ /
dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yang dag yon tan rgya chen te/ /lan gcig tsam ni brjod pas kyang / /sangs rgyas thams
cad grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid sbyor bas/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis/ /dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun/ /dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku ni blta
bas mi ngoms pa/ /thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang / /legs so zhes nas dngos grub ni/ /mchog rnams kun ni rab smin mdzad/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang / /bsam
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang / /rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad/ /de nas de yis sgrub pa dang / /shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub dag /gang
gis srid pa 'di nyid la/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag thob pa shad/ /rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis/ /thal mo lan
gsum rnam par brdab/ /dbang po gang dag gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing / /ji ltar mos pa'i
chags pa dang / /Sha Da ba la sogs pa yi/ /ci nas yongs su ma skyo bar/ /rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya/ /kun tu kun na ma thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas kun
tu dngos grub pa/ /rab tu mthong zhing mchog grub pa'o/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub
par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan gcig glur blangs pas/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa rtag pa'i mchog /dngos
grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid thob par 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid dbang phyug mchog /sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
kun grub ste/ /de bas dam tshig gsum la sogs/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam par dkrol/ /dpal rnam par snang
mdzad kyis dbugs phyung ba'o/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba/ /de tshes sems can thams
cad ni| |shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur/ /shin tu gdug par khro ba yis/ /'o dod 'bod par lhung bar 'gyur/ /de nas 'phos nas sems can de/ /bag chags kyis ni mtshams
sbyor bas/ /shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur/ /blo ni bdud kyis byin brlabs nas/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad/ /phra men ma dang gnod byed gdon/ /bdud
dang rnam par log 'dren nyid/ /shin tu gdug pa chen por gyur/ /gnas gsum po ni 'jigs byed cing / /sgrub pa po rnams la yang za/ /lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed/ /bstan pa
dag kyang 'jig par byed/ /de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha/ /tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong / /tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas/ /'jug sel la yang skyabs su dong / /tshangs dang
'jug sel lha rnams kyang / /lha chen drung du nye bar dong / /tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen dang / /rdo rje can la skyabs su dong / /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba
yis| |rdo rje se gol phyag rgyas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rjer bcings/ /rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad na/ /de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas/ /'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcings pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta
smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /rdo rje se gol gtog pa yis/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa/ /kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas/ /shin tu
gdug par gtum po la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi/ /khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ /khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang / /'jig rten gsum
dag sreg byed na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos/ /de nas sna yi rtse mo la/ /yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung / /sna yi dbugs ring dro
ba las| |rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung / /bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung / /dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ /'bar bas thal bas rab tu 'jig /sems
dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i ngang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar por 'bar/ /'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag /dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra/ /'bar ba chen po sgra 'bar ba/ /thod pa mang po'i
dbu rgyan can/ /'jig pa chen po dus ltar drag /dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jig /khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa/ /zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang / /smin ma khro gnyer bcas par
'gyur| |'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas/ /gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas/ /gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas/ /thal ba bzhin du rab tu
ba shig /rdo rje rdo rje kha TAM ga /dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis/ /thams cad phab nas slar yang ni/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las/ /byung ba'i grib ma mi
bzad pa/ /bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs/ /gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus/ /rgyal po de ni de dag dang / /lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol/ /thams cad
rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis/ /shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas/ /dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su/ /
sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod/ /rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam par
sbyangs| |dpal he ru ka sa dbugs phyung ba'o/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung
pa| |de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /log par lta la gnas par 'gyur/ /shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis/ /'o dod 'bod pa chen por lhung / /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /byang
chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir/ /pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje chos su gnas par gyur/ /ji ltar pad+mo dmar po 'di/ /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /de bzhin bag chags
khams gsum gyi/ /nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag /'dis ni kun tu gzigs pas na/ /rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur/ /dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /rdo rje
sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /'dod chags thams cad dag pas na/ /mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis/ /sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar spro/ /
kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal/ /pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /pad+mo'i rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des/ /pad+mo gar dbang la sogs kyi/ /rtog pa bla med
