thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs/ /dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon
byung ba| |bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /shin tu gdug cing brkam par gyur/ /
shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa yis/ /yi dwags rnams dang dmyal bar ltung / /de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni/ /shin tu dbul por skyes par gyur/ /bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis//
de dag phan tshun gsod par byed/ /shin tu gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das/ /dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po/ /rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur/ /nam mkha'i snying pos
thams cad phyogs/ /kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs/ /shin tu gdug cing khro ba la/ /zhi bas
phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni/ /rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / /brog pas kyang ni khyad par du/ /rgyal
bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi/ /nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas
pa'i| |sems can khams ni rab tu dkrol/ /dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs phyung ba'o/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
rab la| |'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba/ /de tshe sems can thams cad ni/ /brtson 'grus shin tu chung bar gyur/ /shin tu brtson 'grus chung ba yis/ /mnar med pa yi dmyal bar
ltung / /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu/ /rta mchog dpal ni byung bar gyur/ /thams cad dag par
mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis/ /shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa'i/ /sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams/ /'jig rten thams
cad rab tu 'jig /byi ba rkun po chom po yis/ /thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed/ /khrid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang / /ngo thon stobs kyis de bzhin du/ /dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni/ /
de tshe 'khrig 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /skye 'gro gnas pa 'gro ba rnams/ /mtha' dag brtul nas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu
skyong / /g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par gyur/ /khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog /zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog /drag shul can la drag pos gnon/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du//
dbang phyug dam pa rab mnan nas/ /lha mo b+hi mo 'phrog nas ni/ /de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /mthu bo che yang rab mnan nas/ /rug mi ni yang 'phrog
nas ni| |de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /skye rgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas/ /lha mo rab tu zhi ba 'phrog /de tshe longs spyod rang gis spyod/ /sdig med stobs
kyis ngo thon du/ /'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas/ /dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma/ /'phrog nas de tshe nye bar spyod/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam
pa| |nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas/ /thabs dang rtsal gyis grub pa
yis| |drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs na ni/ /khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa des thob nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog /drag shul sbyor bas grub
par byed/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel/ /lha yi dngos grub dka' ba
dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /go 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag/ rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas/ /sems can khams ni du ma dag /ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing / /'chi med byang
chub dka' ba dag/ sems can rnams la brtan par sbyin/ /rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yis/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yis/ /bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas/ /sems can kun gyi don
kyang byed/ /de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs/ /rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sems can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs/ /dpal rta mchog
gis dbugs phyung ba'o/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags/ /nam mkha'
kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad
gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste lnga pa'o// //de
nas gzhan yang thams cad du/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun/ /
dngos| |rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba
bde| |de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog /rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras/ /dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i/ /bla re dam pa bres pa na/ /rdo rje glu dang mchod la sogs/ /glu
dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul/ /me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang / /mar me dri dang sogs ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub/ /yang na
bdag gi gnas dag gam/ /skyed mos tshal la sogs pa bsgrub/ /der ni dang por gdan bshams te/ /'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur ba/ /sna tshogs pad+mar ras kyis g.yogs/ /de
ni thams cad dag pa'i gdan/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam 'phrul pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha/ /de ni rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad/ /
stan de dag ni thams cad la/ /ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma sogs/ /sgo srung dang ni ldan par
byas| |rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi/ /bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa/ /skel bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /mi yi tshal ni
grub pa la/ /dmar chen po zhes pa bar bshad/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang / /rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'o/ /rdo rje'i chu dang rdo rjer bcas/ /mtshal chen po dag sgrub pa ni/ /mthu yis rab tu
grub pa ste/ /pad+mo'i snod kyi nang du bzhag /chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin shegs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da'
bar dka'/ /de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang / /mtshan chen po ni sgrub pa dag /chags pa chen po las byung bas/ /dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad/ /dmar chen dang ni ga bur bcas/
tsan+dan dmar por sbyar ba dag /tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni/ /ra sa ya na kun slong ba/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin
myangs nas/ /rtag pa yin dngos grub thob/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan/ /nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /'dus pa der mi zhugs pa dag /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni//
bdag| nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni srung ba byas pas dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur/ /rnal
'byor mkha' 'gro bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub/ /de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus/ /ci 'byor ba yi gos dang rgyan/ /sna tshogs gos bzang bgos dang
ni| |me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim/ /sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang pos/ /slong pas dpal gyis dal gyis su/ /gos gdab pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi 'byung ba bskul bar bya/ /rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams/ /shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis/ /sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing / /bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa//
rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan/ /brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa/ /kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni/ /stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus/ /nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar
gnas/ /bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pas bzhengs su gsol/ /rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /'di dag nyid kyi glur blangs na/ /shin tu mya ngan yongs
'das pa'i/ shi ba'ang slar ni slong 'gyur na/ /yang srid pa lta ci zhig smos/ /lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa/ /rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas/ /sna tshogs 'brang ba rab
tu 'grub/ /'jig rten gsum ni rab bsgrub pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum la skyid
sbyin pa/ /'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis/ /sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po/ /a ra li ni kun
'grub 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo kun dang bde myos pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs/ /nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
yang dag sbyor/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'byung / /lan gcig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang / /bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba/ /brtan cing grub pa slong byed pa/ /sna tshogs 'brang
bas de bzhin du/ /gan+d+har+b+ha pa dang Sha Da ba'i/ /glu dbyangs sna tshogs glus bsgrub po/ /de nas de nyid dam pa yis/ /thar pa thams cad rmongs pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid
la| |glu 'di yis ni bskul bar bya/ /rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag pa'i/ /mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas nas/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor
bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod/ /kye ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid/ /mchog tu bde ba shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa/ /rang gi dam tshig skyon med/
dag la rol cig rol cig to/ /kye ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir/ /rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so/ /'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba
gsal bar mkhyen/ /dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma ho/ /kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub
chen po rab tu sgrub pa ston/ /dzaH hUM baM ho e ma'o bde mchog bde bar drongs/ /rnam par sprul hUM snang bar mdzod/ /a la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma
sna tshogs kyis/ /slob ma dag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas/ /kun gyi sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /glu
'di dag ni len pa na/ /dkyil 'khor sna tshogs thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par snang / /rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can
ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /te na te te hUM/ rnam mang rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud
kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hUM hUM hUM/ rnam pa mang po khro
pa'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam
par sprul/ /ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa mang po srog gi rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma bde mchog sgyu mas
thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ /hUM shi Sh+ya pi Sha hUM/ de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /
rab byung rnams kyi glu yi rgya/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur/ /
glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang / /lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub/ /dbang po kun las byung ba yi/ /mchod
pa sprin chen rnam bkod pa/ /rab 'byams tshogs rnams thams cad kyis/ /kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par byed/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde
mchog gis/ /dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis/ /bud med dag kyang bsgrubs nas ni/ /rdo rjer bcas pa'i
mtshan ma 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor mar gyi rab tu 'gyur/ /de dag rang gi lha rnams dang / /'dra bar byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs nas/ /sngon med rol mo'i sil snyan dang / /rnam par 'phrul
pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri/ /ro dang reg pa'i bde myos pas/ /bdag nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing / /mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur/ /lha yi mchod pa mnyam
sbyor ba/ /skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can/ /rnam pa kun tu skal bzang po'i/ /bde ba yang dag grub par byed/ /sangs rgyas sgyu mas byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam
sbyor ba'i/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mthong dka' myong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpar mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /sna tshogs kun gyi
skal bzang po/ /rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang / /dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du/ /de yis rab mthong mchod par
byed| |mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid kyi ni/ /dngos grub ma lus lus med 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar/ /rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang / /de nas yang dag rab gsang bas/ /bud med dag ni bzhi
rnams dang / /gar gyi phyag rgya mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /rab tu dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam par
grub par mdzod/ /oM hUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ /oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod/ /oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod/ /
glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /mchod pa ma lus lus med pa'i/ /rab 'byams las la'ang sbyar du rung / /gang dag grub par ma gyur dang / /mchod
pa dag ni mi 'byor ba/ /phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas nas/ /mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub/ /mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang / /lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni/ /me tog la sogs
mchod byas nas/ /slob ma thams cad gzung bar bya/ /dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par/ /snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskyong nas/ /de dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi/ /ras kyis g.yogs
te gzung bar bya/ /dngos grub ji ltar 'thob 'dod par/ /slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug /lha mo gang la lhung ba ni/ /lha de de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas gdong ni dkrol nas
kyang / /yon gyi mchog ni blang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas/ /ji lta bar ni dbang bskur ro/ /dmar chen po dang ga bur bcas/ /tsan+dan dmar mo sbyar ba rnams/ /
tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa la/ /g.yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rje bcas/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtses/ /zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /rtag pa'i
dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs kyis kyang / /rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te/ /de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de
nas mna' ni bgegs byas nas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yis/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa/ /dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /
sdom pa nyams par khyod byed pa/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang / /de bzhin rnal 'byor grub pa po/ /de dag la ni
snying rings nas/ /snying nas khrag chen 'thungs pa bzhin/ /sems can khams ni ma lus don/ /srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir/ /mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis/ /rtag pa nyid du bsgrub
par bya| |bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing / /dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya/ /ci bde bar ni bde bar spyod/ /'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la/ /
cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /sdig pa med kyi khyed ma 'jigs/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /grub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod/ /lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug /
sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin/ /yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu bsten/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis/ /yang dag
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to/ /rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i/ /bdag gi ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas/ /ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed par/ /slob
ma rnams la bde bar sbyin/ /slob ma dam pas de phyin chad/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung nas/ /rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid grub/ /de nas
ro dang zas dang gnas/ /glu dang sil snyan la sogs pa/ /de dag mgon po rnams la dbul/ /rdo rje bla ma chen po dang / /bdag dang gzhan la 'dod rgus mchod/ /'dod don 'bras
bu phun tshogs 'grub/ /de nas bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas/ /kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa/ /ji lta'i tshul bzhin 'jug pa yis/ /bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dpal gyi tshul/ /rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrubs shing / /rtog pa kun rab sbyor ba yis/ /ngo bo nyid phyir chen po'i mchog /sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang / /'dul ba'i bdag
nyid sna tshogs pas/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
thar pa thams cad rnam sbyang phyir/ /grol ba'i mkha' 'gro byung bar gyur/ /rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis/ /rang gi byin rlabs sgrub pa'i rgyas/ /phyag rgya ji bzhin rjes mthun pa'i/ /sangs
rgyas sprul pa bsgrub par bya/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro byung bar
'gyur| |gzhan yang shin tu rnal 'byor pa/ /ma lus pad+mo rnam sbyang phyir/ /skal bzang dam pa mi 'gyur ba/ /pad+mo sgyu ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /
nor gyi mchog gis rnam sbyang phyir/ /nam mkha' kun gyi bdag po che/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpal 'byung 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /drag shul sbyor ba sbyang ba'i phyir/ /rta
mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa/ /rta mchog rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis/ /rang gi byin rlabs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gzugs brnyan ngo bor sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor
bas gar bya'o/ /dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /de ltar rnam par spyod na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyar ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'grub/ /kun tu kun nas
thams cad ni/ /sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro/ /kun tu sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa thams cad kyis/ /bdag nyid rnam par 'phrul pa ston/ /lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus pa/ /
sangs rgyas sprul pa grub par byed/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa ston/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma gar byed pas/
khams gsum dag ni ma lus par/ /dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro/ /pad+mo sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yis/ /'gro ba thams
cad mgu bar byed/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che/ /'jal dum g.yul 'byed grub pa dag /rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas/ /bya ba thams cad ston par byed/ /khams gsum pa yi
rgyal srid che/ /bdag rtul phod pas mnan nas ni/ /'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms par/ /rta yi gar gyis ston par byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang
mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dpal dgyes
rol pa rnam 'phrul pa/ /sna tshogs kyis ni rnam par rol/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis/ /'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sems can khams
ni rab tu bsgrub/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog /nam mkha'
kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid grub par byed/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas
de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ba bde ba'i mchog las/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor
gyi rtog pa ste drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha/ /rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog /'khor lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'o/ /gsang ba
mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rjes su sgrub/ /dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam/ /rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs par/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /kun tu sna tshogs bde
mchog gis/ /kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa rnams/ /ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya/ /rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang / /ri yi rtse rnams thams cad du/ /rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i/ /sangs
rgyas dgongs pa bsgrub par bya/ /dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang / /ma mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag /rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur/ /pad+mo'i skyed mos tshal
dga' dang / /chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu/ /pad+mo 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams/ /yang dag par ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang / /rgyal po'i skyed
mos tshal dag tu/ /rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi/ /rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya/ /mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam/ /rgyal khams gzhan las
grub pa ru/ /rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya/ /cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dgos pa la/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu bsgrub/ /
sangs rgyas rnams kyi pad+mo dmar/ /phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs la/ /'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ser/ /kha dog kun dang ci 'byor ba/ /bla bre rgyal mtshan rgyan gyis
rnams/ /thams cad rab tu sgrub pa dang la/ /rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o/ /gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang / /bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang / /'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar/ /de
'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i lha rnams kyi/ /'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las/ /bsod nams brtags pa ci 'dra ba/ /phyis bris pa yang de bzhin no/ /
dkyil 'khor thig btab shes rab can/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid sgrub cing / /shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag
ci 'dra bar/ /rab tu brtag par su zhig nus/ /rang gi lha yi rang bzhin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor brtag pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub
par bya/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang / /nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /kun tu sna tshogs 'khor lo can/ /kun tu sna tshogs 'grub pa'i phyir/ /dkyil
'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin/ /pad+mo'i dbang gi pad+mo'i dbyibs/ /rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs/ /ji ltar 'dod
pa ci 'byor ba/ /ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas par dpal/ /rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'o/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing / /dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dag /
gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas/ /bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo/ /srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing / /dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang / /byang chub sems ni mi gtang ste/ /
slob dpon skal bzang yong mi gtang / /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang por/ /bdag rang bsgrubs pas skal ba bzang / /bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa/ /dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan/ /
srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na/ /skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na/ /shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /rtog pa thams cad bsgrubs pa'i
phyir/ /skal bzang phyag na rdo rje dpal/ /stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas/ /rang rgyal rnams ni skal ba ngan/ /'dod chags thams cad rnam dag pas/ /skal bzang
spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /log par lta dang ldan pas na/ /skal ngan 'jig rten mu stegs na/ /dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir/ /skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal/ /bdag gi bu yang ma
chags pas/ /skal ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun/ /rgyal srid mchog rnams kun bsdus pas/ /rta mchog dpal ni skal pa bzang / /bdag med yongs su 'dzin med pas/ /thub pa thams
cad skal ba ngan/ /bde ba thams cad bdag sgrub phyir/ /kun gyi slob dpon skal ba bzang / /lta ngan dam tshig la ldang ba'i/ /slob ma thams cad skal ba ngan/ /gsang ba'i don ni yang dag
nyid/ /'di ni gsal bar shes pa yis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun gyi slob dpon la gnas pas/ /'khor lor 'jug par byed
pa na/ /dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la/ /gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog /thog ma nyid du gsang brjod pas/ /kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dri/ /skal ba bzang la bdag dga' zhes//
'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya/ /gsang ba'i yan lag 'di shes na/ /ji ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug /gsang ba yang dag mi shes te/ /g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya/ /de ltar dkyil
'khor du zhugs nas/ /de bzhin shin tu yon 'bul te/ /gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes pas/ /mi 'gyur pa yi mchog 'grub bo/ /kun tu sna tshogs bla ma la/ /yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges//
gang la yongs su gtang dka' gang / /da ni mchog tu bshad pa yin/ /gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog /yang na shin tu khyad par can/ /de dang de ni bla ma la/ /de nyid mi zad 'dod pas dbul/ /yang na
de ni 'dod 'gyur ba'am/ /'on te sems la dgos pa dag /de sbyin yang na dgos pa bya/ /de ni chung yang mchog yin no/ /de la gal te mchog bdog la/ /de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na/ /kun gyi
slob dpon brnyas pas na/ /de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob/ /bu mo shin tu brgyan pa'am/ /de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag /phul nas rin gyis blu ba ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon/ /ma chen
dag ni phul nas su/ /slar yang rin gyis blu ba ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yi/ /'on te mchog gi yon yin no/ /mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang / /shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung dang / /de bzhin rta ni
dkar po dag /pad+mo can gyi yon mchog yin/ /rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang / /gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang / /de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no//
shin tu brgyan pa'i rta dag dang / /glang po shin tu brgyan pa dang / /shing rta rin chen gang ba dag /rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no/ /khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam/ /srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin
te| |sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba/ /mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag /spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / /ldan pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru/ /sangs rgyas rin
chen thams cad kyi/ /dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa'o/ /khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam/ /srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te/ /thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan nam/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi
nor bu dag /kun tu sna tshogs bla mar ni/ /kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya/ /rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag la/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las
byas| |de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dbang bskur bas/ /slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje byed/ /rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin/ /
spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku/ /nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin/ /sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang / /rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du/ /thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la/ /rang gi dbang
bskur bsdus pa'o/ /blugs pa dang ni byas pa'am/ /brdungs pa'am yang na khris pa'ang rung / /sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag /kun tu sna tshogs
skal bzang po/ /rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog /gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du/ /skal ldan de

bzhin skal ba bzang / /thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga /rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no/ /pad+mo rgya gram dpag med tshe'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe sgrub pa/ /lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi/ /mtshan ma
phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin/ /mda' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo /de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje tri shul phyag rgya'i mchog /dpag bsam shing dang lcug ma dang / /pad+mo rta
mgrin 'phang mtho ba/ /rta mgrin ljang gu de bzhin no/ /phag gi mche ba grub pa dang / /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no/ /rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi ra sa yi/ /thams
cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang / /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ /gling bu dang ni pi wang kun/ /ku mun+Da dang mu ra dza/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dang / /sna tshogs dri rnams
de bzhin no/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs/ /nam
mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur/ /chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang //

de bzhin du ni 'khar sil dang / /dam pa'i chos ni glegs bam dag /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ /de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang / /cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang / /rdo rje dang ni rin chen
snod/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang / /me long dang ni rlung yab dang / /rdo rje ser ba'i sprin dang bcas/ /de

bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje 'bar ba kha T+wAM ga /thod pa kham phor de bzhin no/ /dmar chen dang ni snying rje dang / /sha chen dang ni de bzhin te/ /rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren/ /chang

dang chu dang de bzhin te/ /lcug ma rlung gi sa bskyod pa dang / /ras dang de bzhin me dang ni/ /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal/ /gdug pa thams cad za ba yi/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs/ /
rnal 'byor dngos grub rab sgrub pa'o/ /pad+mo sna tshogs dmar po dang / /ljang gu de bzhin dkar po dang / /mthing ga ser po le brgan dag /pad+mo mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun/ /pad+ma smyung po
bud med rgya/ /de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /gsal zhing dpal bskyed rdo rje dag /pad+mo mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhan no/ /gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang / /de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i
me| |dbang bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dag /mchod pa'i mtshan ma bsdus pa'o/ /de bzhin sna tshogs pad+mo dang / /rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin te/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis/ /rgyal
srid thams cad 'joms pa ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa/ /dngos po brtan g.yo ma lus kun/ /rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas
pa'o/ /de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi gsungs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las/ dkyil
'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// //de nas gzhan dag bshad ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i/ /rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog /
mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur/ /dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs/ /g.yas pa bdan gsum
du bya| |srid zhur bcas pa'i steg pa'i mchog /bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta/ /bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo
'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas/ /skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na/ /khengs pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas/ /btud
de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas/ /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur/ /bsam pa g.yos pas phyag byas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas na/ /
ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /smin ma g.yon du 'degs tshul gyis/ /ru lu ru lur bcas bgad na/ /tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas/ /khams gsum pa rnams phyag byed 'gyur/ /
thal mo pad+mo kha 'bus bzhin/ /rang gi sbyor ldan snying gar bcing / /mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhin/ /rgyas pa btud pa'i phyag kyang bya/ /lus kyi yan
lag thams cad ni/ /sa la bsnyal te phyag bya ba/ /snying ga kha dang spyi gtsug tu/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag bya'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs/ /'dzum pa'i mig gi sa phyag
byas nas/ /khams gsum pa yang phyag byas nas/ /mthu snyems gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /gar gyi rgyun rnams ji snyed dang / /de bzhin bya
ba'i tshul ston kun/ /de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya/ /rang gi don rnams grub par byed pa'o/ /'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas/ /ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed cing / /bskor ba'i
gar rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu
tshur bcang / /g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang / /dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi/ /dbang phyug chen po
'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa/ /dpal skal pa bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /snyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yi/ /sbyor ba de nyid btegs
nas su/ /'gram pa'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur nas/ /spyi bo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya/ /thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas/ /gar byas de nas phab nas su/ /skal bzang hUM
zhes bya ba'i glus/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bskal ba bzang po bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yas
g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ /de bzhin g.yon du bsgyur bar bya/ /de ni sbyor bas btegs nas su/ /spyi bo'i mtshams
su gzhag par bya/ /skal bzang oM zhes bya ba'i glus/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /dpal rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis
dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol/ /mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul/ /dur khrod cha lugs gar byed pas/ /phyag rgya 'di yis gar byed
cing / /skal bzang rdo rje drag por dgod/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal mo ste mchod pa'i gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'o/ /lag pa g.yas
g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya/ /dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi
thal mo'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te/ /rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar nas/ /mchod pa thams cad dbul
bar bya/ /re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs/ /bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dang / /me tog
bdug pa mar me mchog /dri yi mchod pa 'byung ba'o/ /gang ba'am 'on te stong pa'ang rung / /yang na ci 'byor ba yis kyang / /dam tshig mnyam par sgrub pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad
'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur/ /dngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang / /kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur/
chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun/ /gang dag de yis ma byas shing / /spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'i//
rlabs chen dam pa gang yang med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang / /dngos grub las dang bde ba dag /'di yis mi 'grub gang yang
med| |mchod pa rab 'byams grub pa rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ mchod pa thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba dpal skal pa bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang
bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i/ /kun tu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /bde ba thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /zla ba nya ltar
rtsa dmar sku/ /'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir/ /chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'ong / /khams gsum
dag na rin chen gzhan/ /sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che/ /dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog /gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrog pa/ /lha yi chu
'dis dag pa ste/ /mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang / /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan drang / /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can/ /kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten
dbang / /mi mjed la sogs de 'grub bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub/
sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs pas bslangs nas ni/ /las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed/ /phyag rgya 'di
yis btab pa ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang
po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yi/ /bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing / /sems dpa'i skyil
mo krung bcas nas/ /dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo / /zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /dngos grub thams cad dag pa
dang | |pad+mo'i 'dod chags rnam dag phyir/ /brla yi dbus ni dmar la dkar/ /phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra/ /de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang / /bde bar reg pa'i dbang
phyug pas/ /dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan/ /lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog /'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /pad+mo sna tshogs la gnas pa/ /thams cad dag par
rab tu gnas/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo la sogs mchog /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin/ /mi mjed pa sogs brgyan pa bzhin/ /bya ba dang
ni bzlog pa dang / /'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par mdzad/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /yan lag thams cad 'phrog par 'grub/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du
'gro 'ong lding / /dpal ldan 'dod pa kun la dbang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje mda' bde ba'i mchog rol pa
zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags/ /bde ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog /dbus kyi lha mchog chen po yis/ /phyag rgya 'di
yis rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga' la rab sbyor ba/ /skal ba bzang po dpal
rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /ser la kha yi tshul dag tu/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM ga bzung ste/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /pad bcas rdo rje rgya
gram mchog /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu
sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham phor 'grub/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'od lding / /dpal ldan tshe dang gzhon 'grub pa/
rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje tshe bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas
mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /rang byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' la gnas te/ /grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'bab 'grub 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i
mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes mthun pa'i/ /dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis/ /mda' bzhi yongs su 'phangs na ni/ /bdud bzhi dag las
rgyal bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dpal rdo rje mda' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa 'deg cing phab pa dang / /gshibs te mchong ba'i stabs dag gis/ /'khor lo'i
phyag rgyas bstod nas ni/ /khams gsum dag las mchod par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / /'phrog pa dag gi khyad par
du| |sna tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing / /khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya/ /dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lhug ma gang yang rung bzung nas/ /bdag la 'khyud
pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /bud med thams cad rtses nas ni/ /dpag bsam shing ltar rtag tu 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje 'dod pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /myang ba btung ba ltar byas pas/
drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum dag skam par byed/ /dpal rdo rje rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sna yi myang ba'i rdub pa yis/ /drag po
dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /khams gsum yang ni sdud par byed/ /dpal rdo rje phag mo zhas bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mig tshugs zhen par lta ba yis/ /drag
po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje spyan nyi zla zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /thams cad bdag nyid myangs pa
yis| |drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i
phyag rgya'o/ /gling bu len pa'i tshul ston cing / /ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas/ /tshangs dang nye dbang drag por bcas/ /'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed/ /dpal rdo rje gling bu'i dbang byed
ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /pi wang len pa'i tshul ston cing / /ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas/ /las rnams grub pa rab 'byams dang / /dngos grub ma lus
myur du 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje pi wang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /cang te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pa/ /ji ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas/ /rims dang gdon
dang dug zhen pa'i/ /sdug bsngal thams cad myur du sel/ /dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa/ /ji
ltar 'bab pa'i gar byed pa/ /gnas gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed/ /dpal rdo rje rdza rdzas myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya
gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /mchod pa thams cad byas nas ni/ /rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug byed/ /phra men
gdon gyi gnod pa rnams/ /bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis/ /skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /
rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag /skad cig tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
mtha' klas pa/ /rang byung lha mo phyag rgya rnams/ /nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rang nub pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid
babs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /rab tu grub pa'i glu rnams kyis/ /bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas phyag rgya ye
shes 'di/ /dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab grub cing / /srid pa shin tu sgrub pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzang dpal khyod bdag la bsgrubs
la rtogs par mdzad du gsol/ /kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog /'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul
mchog sgrub pa bdag la grub par mdzad du gsol/ /a la la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol/ /dzaHhUM baM ho/ /kye bde mchog
bde bas zungs la rnam par sprul/ /hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol/ /a la la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma gzung du gsol/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /kun tu kun nas thams cad du/ /'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
mkha' 'gro ma'i rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /thar
thams cad bla ma dag phyir/ /sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas/ /'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /bcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin/ /chags med la sogs chags tshon
phyir| |dkar zhing sma tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs/ /chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrubs pas/ /rin chen chos las lhag pa med/ /de bas theg chen byang chub sems/ /rgyal ba rdo rje
rin chen can/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa ni/ /sor mo kun la reg pa ni/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi| |shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin/ /byang chub sems chen skye ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par/ /rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin/ /byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ /sangs rgyas nyid du rig par
bya| |mchog tu rtag pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing / /rnam pa kun tu mchod byed pa/ /de yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog /mthong zhing mchod pa byed
par 'gyur/ /sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang / /chos kyi 'khor lo legs pa bskor/ /dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis/ /g.yon pa'i
yan lag kun las rgyal/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas/ /bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo / /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /lag
pa g.yon pas bkab pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun blo dngos grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med pa'i 'grub/ /de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje khu tshur chen po dag pa/ /dpa' bo 'dod pa'i dngos
grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /pad+mo'i bud med khu tshur ni/ /de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang / /byang chub spyod rab 'grub pa rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rin
chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang / /lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni/ /sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su/ /lag pa g.yon
pas bkab na ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad myur
'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rta gdong dpal gyi khu tshur yang / /lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni/ /thams cad 'gugs par rab grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par
'grub| |dpal grub spyan gyi khu tshur yang / /lag pa g.yon pas bkab ba ni/ /snang ba thams cad rab 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dang po sangs rgyas
kun snod pa/ /gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin/ /gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i lo/ /bzhi pa mi zad snod yin no/ /sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal/ /de bzhin zhal bzang gzungs ma
yin| |sprin chen mo ni bdun pa ste/ /brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan yin no/ /gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i glu mchog ni/ /'grub
par 'gyur pa byed pa'i mchog /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /slong bar byed pa bstan sgrub pa/ /de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag /drug pa'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas/ /de pa ta yi
glu blang ngo / /'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs snyed khyab par 'phros pa yi/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa/ /sprul pa'i sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs
snyed ni/ /srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis/ /rdul phran grangs snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa mdzod ho/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad
sbyor ba a la la la ho/ /de ring grub par mdzod/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /grub par 'gyur ba gdon
mi za| |de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang / /rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis/ /cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /me tog la sogs mchod pa bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /rnal
'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir/ /dur khrod dpal gyis phyag rgyar gsal/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum po la/ /zhi
pas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni/ /thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te/ /sems
dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po snang / /gzhan gyis ma yin mi 'phrog pa/ /lha rdzas chu yis dgang ba ste/ /'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang / /mthu dang ngo bo
nyid kyis 'grub/ /gos chen po dang blugs pa che/ /sha chen po dang sbrang rtsi che/ /dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yi/ /phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog /shin tu khro gdug gtum pa yi/ /
sems can khams rnams rnam sbyang phyir/ /'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i/ /rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /rgyal
srid thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rje bcas/ /dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa/ /dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam
sprul pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas de zos nas/ /thal bar gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje
he ru ka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug bcas bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /se ral kha yi tshul dag tu/ /kha T+wAM ga la rgya brten byas/ /lag pa g.yon na thod pa thogs//
g.yas pa ba dang gsum par byas/ /nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor pa/ /nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /dngos po thams cad mkha'
las 'byin/ /phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas/ /bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas/ /nam mkha' las ni kun lhags te/ /bdag gi spyod par de spyod do/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang
bcas| |nyi zla mkha' 'gro mi bzad tshogs/ /mkha' las sgyu ma kun blags nas/ /lus pa med par de za'o/ /nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor bskal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje
mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas/ /skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas la/ /rkang pa rang gi
brla bsdams na/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas su/ /gar dag byed cing de za'o/ /de nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /
de nas bde bar brla bsdams pas/ /legs par bsdams de phyir btags nas/ /rab tu bkram ste btung bar bya/ /sgyu ma de dag nyid kyis ni/ /de nas bla phrag bskyod pa yis/ /skal bzang lha dang
mi rnams kyi/ /bud med kun la de spyod do/ /bde bar reg pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa
sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dpal ldan he ru ka babs pa'i/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o/ /zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog /dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas/ /shi ba
ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ /zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang / /gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde
mchog gis/ /me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba mchog /chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang / /ras dang me gtong grub pa yis/ /khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so/ /rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /sbyor
ba'i gnyer ba bde ba sbyin/ /mngon par gtor zhing sa gol rdeb/ /dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas/ /g.yon du lta zhing lag pas drangs/ /'o byed 'khyud pa de bzhin te/ /gar byed rab tu
rmongs pa dang / /za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang / /tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las rgal/ /de bzhin gzhan las 'dren pa dang / /rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul
ston dang / /dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang / /de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang / /rab tu 'jigs par sreg pa'i me/ /las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ /dang po
rgyas 'debs ma yi rgya/ /snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o/ /gsum pa shin tu rmongs byed pa'o/ /de bzhin bzhi pa 'deg byed ma'o/ /lnga pa gar byed pa yi rgya/ /drug pa gsod ma'i yin
bar bshad/ /bdun pa zab mo ba yi rgya/ /brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi/ /phyag rgya'i lan rnams bla na med/ /phyag rgya'i bdag nyid kun 'joms pa/ /khyad
bar du ni bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje pad+mo slong / /gar dag byed cing byas na ni/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa
'di| |dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol ba/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas
man bas su gsol/ /bde mchog ngo mtshar bde ba zhugs/ /hUM a la la la ho snang bar mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul/ /dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol/ /nyon
mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod/ /ma lus pa dag mnabs su gsol/ /nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzod/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha'
'gro rgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /
'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /pad+mo phyag rgya dpal du gnas/ /mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir/ /shel sgong shin tu dag pa 'dra/ /'dod chags thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ /'bar
ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ /sangs rgyas tshe ni rin chen spras/ /gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ /bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur/ /gar
thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas/ /pad+mo'i mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas/ /phyag ni brgya rnams 'khor lo bskor/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma
khams gsum pa/ /pad+mo sgyu mas rnam sbyangs nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub par mdzad/ /'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa'o/ /skal pa bzang po dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i
phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /skyil mo krung ni phye mar gnas/ /rgyal bo'i skyil mo krung bcas na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/ /dpal pad+mo rgyal po gnas pa
zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+mo dmar po ci bder bzung / /rang gi snying gar 'dren pa'i tshul/ /pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o/ /
snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+mo sngon po ci bder bzung / /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul gyis/ /bud med phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+mo dkar
po ci bder bzung / /'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+mo mthing kha ci bder bzung / /g.yas pas rab tu gar
byed pa| |dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum/ /snyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+mo ser po ci bder bzung / /g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pas/ /chu srin tshul du bsgreng bar bya/ /snyems pa'i
lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /pad+mo la brgan mchog bzung ste/ /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul gyis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal/ /sgrol ma'i byang
chub mchog yin no/ /rgya chen ma yi 'khor lo bskor/ /khro gnyer ma ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /pad+mo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin/ /'dod pa'i dbang mo'i 'gro ba gsum/ /dpal pad+mo'i rgyal po'i
rig pa'i lha mo chen mo rnams so/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ /pad+mo rgyal po dpal gyi glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba/ /kye sems dpa' pad+mo dga' mchog sgyu ma'i
dga' ba bstan du gsol/ /a la la la ho/ /kye gar dbang thar dga' dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag /nyi zla bdag lags
a la la la ho/ /pad+ma sgyu ma sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa/ /pad+mo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol/ /'dod chags rnam par spyod pa
thams cad da dung rnam par sbyongs/ /pad+mo 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngar gar mkhan gar mdzod cig /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /sna tshogs pad+mo mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog
gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /nor mchog rnam par
sbyang ba'i phyir/ /dpal ldan nyi ma phyag rgyar gnas/ /nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /rin chen thams cad
mkha' las 'bebs/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum po la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni/ /dam pa'i don du drag por gyur/ /drag pos 'dul ba'i 'jig rten
rnams/ /drag po nyid kyis sgrub par byed/ /nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang / /tshul dang gzi brjid chen pos ston/ /rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dag /shin tu legs
par 'gengs pa ste/ /mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i spyan/ /g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du 'deg /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten
gsum po ma lus pa/ /drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad/ /dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bus mo gnyis bcings te/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung
bcas nas/ /bdag ni stan la 'dug nas ni/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/ /dpal rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo / /dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang / /rgyal mtshan mchog
ldan mchod pa che/ /ji lta'i tshul dag ston pa drag /rang gi don rnams 'grub pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ /rgyal po'i sgyu ma mchog gi glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub
pa| |khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs mchog gi nor ldan pas/ /mjal du ma g.yul 'gyed rnam mang khyad par sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba/
rnam pa sna tshogs mjal du ma rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po bde mchog sgyu ma bstan du gsol/ /sems can sprin la byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs
char 'bebs pa/ /bdag gi re ba kun sgrub myur du ston/ /a la la la ho/ /mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol/ /khyad par rin chen 'di dag thams cad bud med
rin chen rnams kyi phyir/ /rin chen tshogs kun nang na bud med rin chen gcig bu mchog /bud med rin chen dag pa dam pa'i don du thams cad 'gro/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /rgyal srid
thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /drag shul sbyor bas rnal 'byor dpal/ /rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yi/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /rab tu gdon pa'i rtsal
dag gis/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /'dod chags can la g.yem par ston/ /gdug pa rnams la gdug par ston/ /zhi ba rnams la zhi bar 'gyur/ /drag shul can la drag shul

sbyor| |'di la bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi/ /rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste/ /dbang phyug dam pa grub par 'gyur/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyis/ /dpal ldan pad+mo sna
tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rje bcas shing slong bsgrub/ /g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /shin tu ltung bar gyur pa yang / /de ma thag tu kun bslangs nas/ /ldang ba thams
cad rab tu 'grub/ /thams cad dag pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje slong ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /brkyang
brkum pa yi tshul byas nas/ /khro bo'i skyil mo krung bcas te/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig /dpal rdo rje khro bo gnas pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di'i/ /rta mchog dpal dang
ldan pa'i glu/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /myos byed stong pas lhag par bde ba 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje stong
pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs/ /zhi ba'i skur yang tshangs pa stong pas shin tu lhag par ston/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun 'grub par mdzod/ /thams cad
rnam par dag pas ngo thon stobs kyis gnon pas non/ /hi he he he he/ dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo thon dbang phyug non/ /
sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum grub drongs/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo thon mthu chen non/ /mnyam sbyor ru Ta ma Ta snying las dpal mo drongs
shig rab drongs shig /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo thon tshangs pa non/ /sbyor chen tshangs las grol ma drongs shig sma ra Ta/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs
sa ngo thon dga' dbang non/ /mnyam sbyor kun gyi dbang la dga' drongs a la la la ho/ /gdug cing khro la rab tu gtum pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir/ /sgrub zhugs a la la la ho/ /

oM su m+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM phaT phaT/ mdza' bo mi la bya 'am mi bya yongs rtog de dag med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas de la mdza' bshes su zhig zer/ /rgol ba la yang bya 'am mi bya
yongs su rtog pa med kyang bla/ /de 'dra'i rgol ba sgyu ma yin pas de la dpa' zhes su zhig zer/ /glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni/ /rta mchog mnyam pas sbyor ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i
mchog /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni/ /rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan/ /dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya
ste| |mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur byas/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /rdo rje spyan ni gnyis dag tu/ /khong stong du ni sbyar bar bya/ /dpal grub rdo rje'i spyan yin no/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams
cad dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal grub spyan ni grub pa ste/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/ /las
kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams/ /ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /mthe bo'i rtse mo mnyam par gzhag /khong stong mi
'gyur dam pa'o/ /spyi bo'i mtshams su rab bzhag nas/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub ma lus pa/ /lus pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /
sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /mthe bong gnyis kyi mche ba gtsigs/ /'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma/ /'grub
pa bdud la sogs pa za/ /de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /de bzhin rnam par shes pa sgrub/ /gter rnams 'byin par byed pa dang / /de bzhin nor
kun 'phrog par byed/ /ngal bso po ni dpal mnan te/ /dpal mo dag kyang 'phrog nas ni/ /mngag gzhug mar ni byed pa dang / /gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba spyod/ /gnod sbyin dag gi sde
dpon du/ /'dis ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /gung mo mnyam par rab tu sgrub/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma
bzhi| |pad+mo dri med rab tu rgyas/ /'dis ni sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa byang na rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /
dpal ldan pad+mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /mdzub mo mnyam bar phyir bkug ste/ /mthe bong rdo rje g.yogs pa ni/ /rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab
na ni| |nam mkha' thams cad rab 'grub ste/ /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas/ /mthe'u chung srin lag
mnyam par brkyang / /mdzub mo rtse bsnyams bkug pa ni/ /dpal mchog rta zhes grags pa ste/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'brel na/ /thams cad dga' bar
byed pa'i dpal/ /lha yi skal bzang smos ci dgos/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te/ /thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor
ba yis| |bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal/ /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//
sangs rgyas bdag la dngos grub ni/ /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde
mchog 'dis/ /mi 'grub sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /dam pa rgya chen gang yang med/ /dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i/ /ji lta'i gzugs dang
dbyibs su ldan/ /bde ba nyid kyis kun gyi bdag /kun gyi bdag la zhugs par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kun dang
'dra| |rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /chags
pa med cing ma chags med/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu sbyor 'di/ /gnyis su med cing theg pa'i mchog /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro
'ong lding / /dpal ldan sgyu ma kun gyi bdag /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /sgyu ma thams cad kyi lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /yod pa ma yin med pa'ang min/ /dbu mar yang ni dmigs
su med| |shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub pa'o/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /khams gsum dag ni ma
lus pa| |thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste/ /ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du/ /mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur/ /dmigs su yod pa'ang ma yin te/ /de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul/ /phyag rgya 'di yis
rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /bud med la sogs rin chen mchog /mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad spyod/ /dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas/ /nam mkha'
kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /shin tu rtag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /chags pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'ang
de bzhin du/ /gnas kyi nyes pas yong mi gos/ /shin tu gdug cing drag po la/ /zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba ni/ /rnam par rgyal phyir rab tu drag /thams cad
dag par mos pa yis/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /drag shul sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba/ /'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya/ /sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sbyor ba ji snyed yod kun
dang / /byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /chags pa
chen po dbang phyug dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal pa bzang po dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang / /khyad par du ni 'phrog pa
dang / /yan lag kun tu byed pa yis/ /de ni nor rnams kun kyang 'phrog /'o byed 'khyud la sogs pa yis/ /khams gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so/ /thar par byed cing gsod par byed/ /shi ba'ang
mod la sos par byed/ /sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /gnas gsum po ni ma lus par/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas su/ /gar byas nas ni za bar byed/ /sbyor ba kun gyi
bde myong bas/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyi bde
ba'i mchog /mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur zhing / /bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba/ /mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma
khams gsum pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma che/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur ba/ /rim gror bcas shing
steg pa'i mchog /mdzes par lta bas gar byas pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas ni/ /zos nas slar yang 'tsho
bar byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba/ /rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum/ /shin tu srid pa yang dag sgrub/ /gsang bar lta la gnas na ni/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi
zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i/ /srid pa kun tu kun bsgrubs nas/ /gnas gsum dag ni sgrub par byed/ /steg la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam bsgyur
zhing / /rim gror bcas shing steg pa'i mchog /steg pa'i lta bas gar byed cing / /mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje
tshangs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum dag sgrub par byed/ /mche ba chung zad gtsigs pa'i kha/ khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa bzhin/ khro la 'gyur bar bcas shing 'dzum/ /
gsal bar lta zhing legs par gnas/ /drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas/ /nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa/ /rgyal po sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas/ khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed/ /
'dod chags myos pas g.yem spyo ba/ /mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bsgyur/ /'di ni bzhin gyi phyag rgya mchog /khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed/ /drag po mche ba rnon po
gtsigs/ /gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /g.yas pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis/ /khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /rab tu dga' bar
lta zhing 'dzum/ /g.yon pa'i bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis/ /khams gsum dag kyang thar par byed/ /spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mtho ba/ /rta gdong ljang ser kha dog gsal/ /so gtsigs
pas ni mchu mnan na/ /'jig rten thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyi bde ba'i mchog/ /mdzes ma'i mchu ni sos mnan te/ /'dzum pa'i
phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/ /'dod chags bde bas g.yem spyo ba/ /steg pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khams
gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed/ /sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba mchog /mdzes pa'i ma mchu g.yo bar byed/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed/ /sha chen
gyi ni ro myong zhing / /ma mchu so yis mnan pa yi/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed/ /bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing / /
ma mchu rnam bar mdzes byas pa/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog shes pa'o/ /bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba//
zam zim lta ba rnam bsgyur bas/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa yi/ /khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed/ /bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog /mdzes par lta ba'i gar
byas nas/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed/ /sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba/ /lta ba rab zhi bde bar gnas/ /lta
ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /bud med thams cad dbang du byed/ /smin mtshams khro gnyer 'gyur bar bcas/ /lta ba rab 'bar rnam par bsgyur/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /
khams gsum dag kyang 'bar bar byed/ /khro zhing 'gyur bar bcas par 'dzum/ /lta ba gsal la bde ba gnas/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khros pa thams cad rab
tu sgrub| |steg la sogs pa'i ro dang ldan/ /steg bcas lta ba'i gar byed pa/ /lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug /lta ba'i phyag rgya shes
pa'o| |na mastu sar+b+ba bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ zhes pa'i phyag rgya la gnas na/ /las dang mchod pa ma lus pa/ /lus pa med par thams cad 'grub/ /rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun/ /chos dbyings mnyam
dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa/ /lan gcig brjod pas 'grub pa'i phyir/ /dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis/ /gang dag byas par ma gyur cing / /spel ba dag tu ma

gyur pa'i/ /dam pa rgya chen de dag med/ /oM ru ru spu ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/ /stobs

kyis myur du bkug nas ni/ /bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug /su b+ha gA s+t+waM ma hAn de bi hi ri/ mi ri/ ri ti/ ni ri shri ye swAhA/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di/ /'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin pa'o/ /oM

tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ chos kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub na/ /bud med gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /traM b+ha ba TA TA/ tra Ta tra Ta/ re ba thams cad kun nas rdzogs/ /

chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa dang / /re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o/ /shri badzra pad+ma ba Da ba mu kha yo gI shA ra hi hi hi hi hi/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig /chos
kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman dang / /gre bsgyur bcos shing bzlas pa dang / /dus rab zhi ba mchog rnams kyis/ /hUM la sogs pa'i glu blang zhing / /tshig rnams kun
gyis ci 'dod par/ /ji ltar spro bar glu kun gyis/ /hUM gi glu yi phyag rgya dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab sgrub pa'o/ /lha mo kun gyi lha mo mchog /cha lugs bzhin
du gar bya zhing / /ka ka la shaM b+ha la sogs/ /glu rnams thams cad rjes su blang / /oM gyi glu yi phyag rgya ni/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci dgar slang / /ma lus lus pa med pa yis/ /
sems can thams cad thar par byed/ /rdo rje drag po gad me che/ /mkhur ba'i dbugs kyi sa rlung 'byin cing / /'brug gi sgra ltar zab pa yi/ /ru lu ru lu'i sgra byung na/ /phyag rgya 'di yis
rnal 'byor pa/ /khams gsum dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing / /thar par byed cing gsod par byed/ /shi ba mod la 'tsho bar byed/ /rdo rje drag tu bzhad pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /Te
zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya/ /thams cad dag par rab bsgrubs pa'o/ /hi zhes bya ba glu yi rgya/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed/ /ka ka la l+ye dang co ra'i dbyangs/ /de bzhin rab tu
gdangs snyan dang / /ka ta sha yi glu yi rgya/ /'joms pa thams cad grub pa'o/ /glu yi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang / /de bzhin rgyud mang rgyud stug dang / /sil
snyan phyag rgya bshad pa rnams/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas/ /ma brdungs par yang rab tu 'grub/ /las rnams kun la mchog tu ni/ /
brdungs na dpal ni bzhi 'gyur 'grub/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig dang / /bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rnam par sel la sogs pa'i thabs/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /dzaHhUM

baM hoHruT+Ta maT+Ta/ sma rA ra Ta/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sid+d+h+ya/ Tak+ki hUM dzaH ki ni d+hu ni hUM truM/ Tak+ki hUM dzaH hu lu hu lu/ a la la la ho/ /shud+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ da riShA ya sar+b+ba na Ta g+hai g+hai/ Ta Ta g+hai g+hai g+hai/ Ta g+hai Ta ka

gai gai gai /Ta ta kai /Ta ta kai /Ta ge /haM To Na/ Tak+ki hUM dzaH ge ta ge d+ho na/ Tak+ki hUM truM/ a la la la ho/ /ruT+Ta maT+Ta/ thal mo brdab pa brtag pa'o/ /Ta g+he g+he/ Ta g+he g+he/ Ta ke na Ta g+heM g+heM g+heM/ Ta g+heM g+heM

Ta g+heM/ rgyun gyi rnga'o/ /AM AM AM/ hUM hUM hUM/ bAM bAM bAM/ d+haM d+haM d+haM/ dam tshig gsum gyi rnga'o/ /d+he k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM/ d+he badzra badzra N+yang / koM koM koM koM /hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo/ d+heM/ k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM/

D+NeM| k+hoM k+hoM k+hoM/ D+Ne koM koM koM /dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i rdo rje rnga'i phyag rgya'o/ /pad+ma pad+ma hri/ pad+ma pad+ma shi /pad+ma pad+ma hri/ dpal pad+mo brdab pa'i rnga'o/ /trAM trAM trAM/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/ tA TA tA TA TA TA

TA TA| tAM/ tA tA tA/ trA trA trA trA trA/ traM TaM ke tang+kut+ta/ tuT+Tat+t+ra/ rgyal po'i rnga'o/ /Tak+ki hUM dzaH Tak+ki hUM dzaH snyems pa'i 'gros so/ /trAT+Ta trA trA trA trA tra/ myur zhing rab tu myur ba'o/ /ta Ta b+ha ta/ ba truM/ ta

thA ga ta| ba hUM/ ta TA b+ha ta ta b+ha hi na/ dpal rta mchog rnam par rol pa'o/ /ta tA b+ha Ta Ta b+ha tA tA/ shin tu myur ba'i rnga'i phyag rgya ste/ sil snyan gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
bdag sbyor bas/ /lag gnyis rdo rjer bcings pa yi/ /rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas/ /'khor
gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang 'du 'gyur na/ /gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig smos/ /g.yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang / /thal mo dal bus brdabs pas 'grub//
g.yas ba'i thal mo yin par gsungs/ /gnyis ka kun tu sdud pa yin/ /thal mo'i sbyor ba rab sbyor bas/ /las kyi tshul bzhin 'brang ba dang / /thal mo dal bus bsdu ba dang / /glu dang
sil snyan gar byed pas/ /steg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang / /dgod dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang / /mi sdug ngo mtshar zhi ba yi/ /nyams kyi phyag rgya rang don sgrub/ /steg la sogs ba'i
nyams dang ldan/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gar byas pas/ /thams cad bdag nyid rgyar sbyor bas/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' steg pa la/ /dpal la dpa'
bo de bzhin gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa snying rje la/ /dgod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog /rdo rje nyi ma khro ba la/ /rdo rje drag po 'jigs pa la/ /shAkya thub pa mi sdug la/ /ngo mtshar la
ni a ra li/ /rab tu zhi la sangs rgyas rtag /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'i phyir/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /nye bar gnas shing byin gyis rlob/ /blta bas mi ngoms pa yi
gzugs/ /thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad/ /legs so zhes bya 'grub pa yi/ /mchog tu gyur pa'ang rab tu stsol/ /thams cad bdag nyid grub pa'i mchog /re ba thams cad
yongs rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'gyur ba'i mchog /rnal 'byor dam pa ster bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba 'di dag gis/ /rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal
gyi lha'i| |sbyor ba thams cad rnam 'phrul dang / /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan rnams dang / /sna tshogs phyag rgya rnam 'phrul pas/ /yid la bsam pa kun rdzogs phyir/ /mchod pa dam pa sbyar
bar bya| |kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /kun gyi slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur/ /kun 'byung la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /rgol ba bdag dang gar byas te/ /de nas rgol ba ci rigs par/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas slar ni rgol ba yang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por bsgyur/ /rgol ba'ang de nas tshul bzhin du/ /pad+mo gar 'byung mchog tu bsgyur/ /de nas
slar du rgol ba yang / /rdo rje nyi ma mchog tu bsgyur/ /de nas phyir yang rgol ba ni/ /rta mchog 'byung bar bsgyur bar bya/ /de nas slar ni rgol ba yang / /bdag nyid 'byung bar rab tu 'grub/ /de
nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di/ /sdom pa thams cad rab ston pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi glu/ /khyad par du ni bshad par bya/ /la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong las mdzes
pa'i gzugs su rnam par snang / /la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i nyi ma bye ba phrag dgu'i 'od zer mchog bas 'jigs/ /la lar mdangs bzang gzi che bde
dang zhi bar ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugs su snang / /la lar 'gro ba thams cad mnyam par 'jog pa'i gzugs ldan gsung mchog ldan par ston/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub phyir
'dul la mkhas pa ma lus bde ba'i mchog rnams las/ /a ra li rnams mnyam sbyor srung mdzod ruT+Ta maT+Te a la la la ho/ /rnam pa mang po 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul la gar
mkhan mchog gis gar mdzad pa/ /dam tshig gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar mdzod a la la ho/ /rnam mang bde mchog rab tu bar mdzad pa yis thar pa'i bde ba'ang
thob par mdzod/ /'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /de ltar rab tu
gar byas te/ /de las gang zhig pham gyur pa/ /tshogs la de yis tshogs kyi zas/ /yon dang bcas par dbul bar bya/ /mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis/ /sdig pa kun las thar
par 'gyur/ /bsod nams thams cad 'phel par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rtag par srung bar 'gyur/ /rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang //
bdud dang sems can dmyal ba rnams/ /'di yis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub rnams dang phun sum tshogs/ /dga' dang de bzhin bdag po dang / /sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad
dang / /phyag rgya'i mchog rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /gar gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba rjes su rab chags dga' ba'i mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pas/ /rab tu dga'
bar sbyor ba'i bde bas myos pa bde ba thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod/ /rab tu bde mchog rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i longs spyod dang / /rab tu dga'
ba'i dbang phyug tshe mchog grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs ho rta mchog ho/ /rab tu sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog la rol cig ho/ /bde bas slong la rnam par rol cig hUM snang mdzod/ /
a la la la ho/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs kyis/ /slob ma rab tu gzung du gsol/ /kye ma'o bde mchog grub par mdzod/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba stsol/ /
dam par rab tu zhugs par mdzod/ /bdag la rab tu dgyes par gyur/ /a la la ho/ /e ma'o shi shi zhugs shig zhugs shig /mkha' 'gro bde mchog yongs bskor kun tu zhugs/ /
'di dag glur ni blangs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang / /rdo rje
rin chen bla med pa/ /rdo rje chos ni gsung ba dang / /rdo rje las ni byed bar 'gyur/ /hUM rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam
tshig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /la lar rab tu drag cing skye bor drag la drag
pa'i bud med sku ltar rab tu snang / /'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir la lar rab tu rno ba'i 'khor lo phyag na bsnams pa'i sku/ /la lar rab tu des shing zhi ba mi 'gyur sbyin pa
tshangs pa'i skur yang ston par mdzad/ /la lar rab tu 'bar ba'i chags pa pad+ma rgyal po'i dam tshig bdag la grub par mdzod/ /thams cad dbang bskur dbang phyug dam pa mi zad
gter mchog bdag la grub bar mdzad du gsol/ /kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba'i rdo rje rin chen shin tu che ba bdag la grub par mdzod/ /la lar mkhas pa'i gzugs
kyang 'dzin/ /la lar dus mtha'i dus ltar drag /la lar rgyal ba'i dbang po bzhin du zhi/ /la lar rta mchog sbyor bas 'dod pa sgrub/ /rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /me
tog dkar dang dmar ba dang / /mthing kha ser po kun bsdus pa/ /me tog phyag rgya mchog 'di ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spro/ /rgya skyegs mthing kha ljang gu'i mdog /tshon sna
bzhi yis bcos pa dang / /dkar bo lnga yi phyag rgya dag /snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub/ /khams las byung ba thams cad dang / /srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te/ /rnam par mdzes shing dri zhim
