pa| |snga ma bzhin du mnyam par sgrub/ /tsan+dan gnyis dang gla rtsi dang / /ga pur nA ga sha la ki /bdug pa bu ram dang sbyar ba/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gan+d+har dri dang gu gu la dang / /

sardza ga pur gla rtsi dang / /rdzas 'di dag las btsos pa'i mar/ /me mar byas na snang ba skye/ /tsan+dan gur gum sbr-i ka dang / /ga bur dang ni gla rtsi dang / /bcas pa bdug pa grub pa ste/ /spos kyi phyag

rgya spos mchog 'gyur/ /ka ko la dang sug smel dang / /gla sgang ga pur gla rtsi dang / /'di rnams zhib tu btags pa ni/ /seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar/ /shing tshwa ba twa lo dra dang / /na le sham
dang ga pur sbyar/ /sa ha ka ra'i shing mngar gyis/ /sbrus pa kha yi spos yin no/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya sbyor ba'o/ /me tog dmar po sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la sna tshogs pa/ /
'jig rten dbang la me tog dkar/ /ser bo mkha' las byung ba la/ /tsan+dan bdug ba sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la du ru ska/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang ka pi ta/ /ce pog rdo rje nyi ma la/ /mar me
phreng ba sangs rgyas la/ /rdo rje can la mar me bdun/ /spyan ras gzigs la mar me brgya/ /stong ni rdo rje nyi ma la/ /sangs rgyas rnams la tsan+dan spos/ /rdo rje can la gur gum yin/ /
spyan ras gzigs la tsan+dan dmar/ /ga pur rdo rje nyi ma la/ /me tog kun dang bdug pa kun/ /de bzhin mar me thams cad dang / /spos rnams thams cad ci
snyed pa| |rdo rje rta la dbul du rung / /mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sgeg mo dang ni na chung dang / /myos dang de bzhin bdud rtsi dang / /gcig tu dpa' dang 'dod chags sra/ /
g.yon can bran mo de bzhin te/ /lan tshwa la sogs ro kun dang / /kha ra la sogs bdud rtsi bzhin/ /bdag nyid kun gyi ro sgrub ba/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /sha dang chang du ldan
pa yi| |bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni/ /dga' ba'i longs spyod skal mchog ste/ /tshe yi dam ba rab tu 'grub/ /a 'bra smin dang rgun 'brum dang / /pa na sa dang na le kar/ /arka la
sogs 'bras bu'i/ /phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di rnams te/ /dngos grub 'bras bu thams cad 'thob/ /kha ra sbrang rtsi byugs pa yi/ /a 'bra la sogs tshig gus byug /sa ha ra yi mar la
sogs| |mnyam pa'i dri yis bsku bar bya/ /yungs dang rgya skegs la sogs pa'i/ /tshon gyis mthun par kha bsgyur nas/ /shun pa gro ba la sogs byas/ /mchod pa'i tshe na dbul bar
bya| |'bras bur bcas pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams la bshos dbul lo/ /sha dang chang ni rnam par spang / /glu dang sil snyan grub pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal
mtshan ba dan dang / /sha dang chang du bcas pa ni/ /gtor ma'i mchog ste sna tshogs pa'o/ /bdag gi phyug chen skal bzang bo/ /rdo rje'i las ni dpal grub pa'o/ /bshos dang gtor ma dkar po
dang / /pad+ma'i me tog ldan pa ni/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso bo la/ /phul na dgos pa thams cad 'grub/ /rgyal po'i kha zas sna tshogs pa/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa dang / /glu dang sil
snyan skal bzang dag /rdo rje nyi ma'i 'khor la dbul/ /kha zas kun gyi ro rnams dang / /sha dang sha yi mchog rnams dang / /sha yi sbyor dang sha skam dang / /bshos dag rdo rje rta la dbul//
mchod pa dang gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /gung mo gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/ /lhag ma rdo rje
thal mo sbyar/ /sangs rgyas rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba/ /rgyal srid thams cad ma lus pa/ /lus pa med pa myur du 'grub/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / /ldan
pa gnyis dang rtag par ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen mchog /dbu rgyan kun tu brgyan par bya/ /dbu rgyan bcing bas bcings nas ni/ /'gying zhing mtha' nas dgrol bar bya/ /dar gyi
mtha' ma dpyangs pa ltar/ /byas nas thal mo brdab par bya/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /de yis dgra med sdig med par/ /bdag gi longs spyod nyid du
spyod| |'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub che/ /'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan mnyam par sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sor mo thams cad nang du bsnol/ /sor mo
rtse mo kun sprad nas/ /mthe bong rdo rjes mnan pa ni/ /sna dang mig phugs lta bu ste/ /pad+mo'i rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /bdag nyid chen por dbang bskur ba/ /rgyal srid thams cad ma lus
pa| |lus pa med par myur du 'grub/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang / /ldan pa gnyis dang lhag par sbyar/ /thod pa'i phreng ba dbu rgyan te/ /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu 'bar/ /dbu
rgyan bcing bas bcings nas ni/ /'gying ba'i mtha' nas dgrol bar bya/ /dar gyi mtha' ma dpyangs pa ltar/ /byas nas thal mo brdab par bya/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas nas
ni| |rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra/ /khams gsum dag ni rgyal srid che/ /'khor los bsgyur ba rab tu 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka pad+mo'i nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan
mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa bzang po dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /lag gnyis nor bu rin chen du/ /ji ltar rigs par mnyam sbyar
nas| |mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtse mo bzhi/ /yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su/ /dpral bar legs par bzhag nas ni/ /khams gsum bdag po rgyal bar bdag /ma lus lus pa med par
'grub| |dpal rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa shin tu brkyang ba yis/ /mdzub mo gnyis pa'i mdud par bcing / /gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur/ /yongs
su bsgyur te bteg nas kyang / /khro gnyer du ni legs bzhag na/ /rgyal srid thams cad legs 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /rdo rje las kyi
dpal dang 'dra/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /ma mo dang ni byad ma dang / /mkha' 'gro ma yang lhag par 'grub/ /dur khrod dngos grub thams
cad dang / /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe bong dpa' bo'i skyil mo krung / /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /gung mo gnyis ni mnyam
par sbyar/ /lhag ma rdo rje thal mo'i 'od/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rang byung rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /'jig rten dbang po dam pa kun/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /'di yis
bsrung ba byas na ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad dpal dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa rnam par nges pa zhes
bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la/ /mdzub mo bsnyams te phyi rol dgug /mthe bong gnyis ni rab tu brkyang / /rdo rje nor bu zhes kyang bya/ /dpral bar
myur du bzhag pa ni/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /rgyal srid thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dpal nor bu rin po che dbang bskur ba'i
phyag rgya'o/ /sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang / /de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang / /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen mchog /rta mchog rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgyas rab tu dbang bskur ba'i
phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mo yin par bshad/ /sor mo thams cad bsdams pa ni/ /rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad/ /rdo rje bsdams ba byas
nas ni| |mdzub mo mthe bo'i nang dag tu/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i mtshan ma 'di/ /rtse mo bcug la bsdam par bya/ /dga' chen dpal gyi phyag rgya ste/ /phyag rgya thams cad rang byung ba/ /rab
'byams las rnams dngos grub ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas ni/ /gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i
phyag rgya yongs su bsgyur/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal bde

ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de las gung mo lcags kyu ni/ /bdag gi snying gar sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya/ /de ma thag tu phyag rgya 'dis/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin//
rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa/ /bkug ste dbang du byas nas ni/ /las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed/ /dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas
ni| |gung mo bcings pa'i nang du gzhug /mthe'u chung mthe bong rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyar yongs bsgyur na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpar yang / /sbyor ba 'di yis mi dka' na/ /
dngos grub gzhan dang las kyi mchog /rab 'byams gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las/ /sbyor ldan
thal mo khong stong sbyar/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed/ /dpal rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa las/ /gung mo de bzhin bkug
nas ni| |rdo rje rdo rje zhes brjod de/ /gung mo nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding / /dpal ldan 'dod pa kun gyi bdag /rdo rje sems
dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa la gnas te/ /mthe bo'i rtse mo de bzhin bsnyams/ /mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bar
bya| |phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /dag pa kun la rab tu gnas/ /byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchog /dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /dpal
rdo rje rab tu gnas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i pad+mor byas pa las/ /gung mo bcings pa'i dbus na gnas/ /mthe'u chung bsnyams pa'i rtse mo mde'u/ /rdo rje mda' ni yongs su 'phang //
phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /tshangs pa nye dbang dga' byed bcas/ /mthu yis myur du brgyal byas nas/ khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed/ /dpal rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje'i
phyag rgya yongs bcings na/ /gung mo bcings pa'i phyi rol bzhag /rdo rje sna tshogs dpal gyi rgya/ /ldang ba thams cad rab grub pa'o/ /rdo rje phyag rgya thams cad shes pa'o/ /A li kA li
mnyam byas nas/ /mkha' yi thad kar bsdu bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu ri mo rnams/ /yi ge thams cad dgod par bya/ /gug skyed dag gi lcug mar bya/ /yi ge ra ni myu gur bya/ /klad kor
zla ba kham pa dang / /tsheg gnyis zla ba gnyis su bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya mi 'gyur dam pa ste/ /sangs rgyas dpal gyi ri mor bshad/ /yi ge dag kyang mi
'gyur mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i/ /bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na/ /sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /bsod nams thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dpal sbyor zhes/ /rab tu chags pa'i mtshan bris na/ /sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur/ /bde ba thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /chags chen grol ba dpal zhes pa'i/ /chags
pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni/ /sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun la rab tu gnas/ /snying rje dri med khro dpal zhes/ /bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na/ /sdig pa kun las
thar par 'gyur/ /dngos grub kun gyi mchog kyang 'grub/ /pad+mo chags pa dpal dag ces/ /chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni/ /sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /dag pa thams cad
rnam par dag /rdo rje nyi ma'i dpal mdangs zhes/ /bstod dang bcas pa'i mtshan bris na/ /sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /longs sbyod kun la rab tu gnas/ /rta mchog pha rol gnon
dpal zhes/ /chags pa'i mtshan dag bris na ni/ /sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te/ las kyi dngos grub rab
'byams dag /ma lus par ni myur du 'grub/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gis/ /slob dpon gang dang gang yin pas/ /de dang de yi mtshan dag ni/ /dpal gyi tshig dang ldan par brjod/ /
slob ma dkyil 'khor btsud nas kyang / /yon gyi mchog dag blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin gshegs par de lung bstan/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis//
byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /rdo rje'i ming du rab tu gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur/ /bstod pa dang bcas pa'i ming gi phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /sbyi bor nyug
pa gang yin pa/ /phyag 'tshal bar ni ston pa yin/ /dpral bar reg par byed pa ni/ /phyag lan yin par shes par bya/ /smin ma bskul ba gang yin pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
gnas pa'i brda/ /g.yas pas nam mkhar 'gro ba 'grub/ /g.yon pa rnam par rgyal ba yis/ /rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya/ /mig gnyis g.yo bar 'grub ba ste/ /g.yon pa bud
med bzang mo yin/ /g.yas pa skyes pa bzang po 'o/ /rna ba dag la reg pa'i brda/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis ka de bzhin te/ /g.yon pa legs par blangs pa yi/ /g.yas pa legs
par smras pa'o/ /sna yi bu ga gnyis kyi brda/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa ste/ /g.yas pa bdag la bdug pa slong / /g.yon pa bdag la dri slong pa'o/ /lce ni bldag pa ltar
byed pa| |brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ /g.yas pa sha yi phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa chang gi phyag rgya yin/ /mche ba g.yas dang g.yon pa yi/ /bar du ma mchu mnan pa ni/ /g.yon pa
bud med reg na bde/ /g.yas pa de bzhin skyes pa'o/ /lkog mar reg pa'ang de bzhin te/ /brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ /theg pa chen po bla med pa'i/ /rtog pa thams cad smra
ba'i mchog /snying gar gyen du 'dren pa ni/ /rang byung phyag rgya'i brda grub pa/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dren pa ste/ /'khor ba shin tu sdud pa'o/ /lte ba'i dkyil du reg pa ni/ /brda yi phyag rgyar
gnas pa ste/ /dbu ma'i nan tan bsgrubs pa yis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil/ /rang gi dbang po bsgreng ba ni/ /rang byung rnams kyi brda yi rgya/ /de las de bzhin bde ba yis/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /phrag pa gnyis ni kun bstod pa/ /brda yi phyag rgyar gnas pa ste/ /g.yas pa 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa slad du gtong pa'o/ /dpung pa
g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis/ /bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /g.yas pa thams cad 'grub pa yin/ /g.yon pa dbang phyug thams cad 'grub/ /khu tshur g.yas g.yon gnyis ka yis/ /
khu tshur bcings dang dgrol ba dag /g.yas pa rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa mi rnams thong zhig pa'o/ /brla gnyis rab tu bsdams pa ni/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te//
g.yon pa 'dod la rab tu brtson/ /g.yas pa chos la brtson pa 'o/ /pus mo lha nga'i brda dag kyang / /g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te/ /g.yon pa 'dud pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /g.yas par
rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /bus mo g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis/ /brda yi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas/ /g.yas pa bcing pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /g.yon pa thams cad rnam par dgrol/ /rkang
pa gnyis kyis sa gnon pa/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa de bzhin te/ /g.yon pa thams cad gnod par byed/ /g.yas pa thams cad rab tu 'joms/ /dngos grub
las dang bde ba dang / /'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med/ /rang don las rnams rab grub pa/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /oM a ti b+hu zhes bya ba'i
brda| |'di ni phyag 'tshal ba zhes pa'o/ /bra ti oM d+hi b+hu zhes pa/ /phyag lan yin par shes par bya'o/ /sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ /sangs
rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /e ma'o bde ba yin par bshad/ /e ma'o bde ba dpal gyi mtshan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang brjod pa/ /sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur/ /bde ba thams
cad rab tu 'grub/ /bde mchog e ma'o bde ba dang / /sgron ma de bzhin shi shi dag /rgyas 'debs ma dang rmongs byed dang / /za ba mo dang tshe 'phel ma/ /sangs rgyas byang chub chos 'khor
lo| |de bzhin khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /'dod pa'i lcug ma thams cad kyang / /phyag rgya brda yi phyag rgya 'o/ /rta dang rdo rje snang ba dang / /thal par rlog pa'i ro langs ma/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi brda yin no/ /gling bu dang ni rgyud rnams dang / /de bzhin du ni rgyud gcig dang / /stug po dang ni rdza rda dag /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya'o/ /me tog mchod dang bdug pa'i
mchod| |de bzhin mar me'i mchod pa dang / /spos kyi mchod pa gla rtsi dag /longs sbyod phyag rgya'i brda yin no/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /lha mo kun gyi brda yin no/ /smin ma bskyod pa mda' bzhi yin/ /b+ha ga ling+ga e ma'o bde/ /thod pa pad+mo yin par bshad/ /kha T+wAM ga yang rgyal mtshan
che| |sangs rgyas phyag rgya pad+mor gnas/ /bde ba kun gyi bdud rtsi yin/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /shi shi sangs rgyas kun tu bshad/ /dkyil 'khor la ni 'khor lor bshad/ /de
nyid dam tshig yin par bshad/ /lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na/ /skye po dam pa kun tshogs pa/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni/ /mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa ste/ /sangs rgyas
kun gyi brda dag gis/ /de bzhin mdza' ba 'dus par gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad yin par bshad/ /lha mo thams cad kun 'dus pas/ /
thams cad sna tshogs skal ba bzang / /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas kun tu bdag sbyor bas/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen shes pa'i phyir/ /kun gyi slob dpon yin par bshad/ /
kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa/ /lha mo thams cad 'dus pas na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog dag gis/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po'o/ /de yi slob ma grub pa ni/ /grub pa'i rjes
su grub pas na/ /sangs rgyas brda yi gsang ba yis/ /rgyal mtshan yin par rnam par bshad/ /de las gzhan pa'i slob ma kun/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i
rnams| |sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis/ /byang chub sems dpa' yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen mchog/ /dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi
rgyal srid mchog /yin par rang byung rnams kyis gsungs/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang / /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi/ /dpal gyi pad+mo'i tshul
du bshad/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin grub gcig dang / /de bzhin pad+mo'i rang bzhin gcig /thams cad dbang bskur dbang bskur che/ /yin par don kun grub pas gsungs/ /yon gyi dam
pa grub pa ni/ /nor gyi dbyig tu bshad pa ste/ /snying yang nor gyi mchog yin par/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad/ /ga bur tsan+dan dmar po dang / /sbyar ba brag chen yin par
bshad| |tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa dpal/ /thams cad ldang pa'i ra sa yin/ /bag zan las ni byas pa'i phyugs/ /tsan+dan dmar pos bskus pa dang / /bag phye'i zan las byas
pa'i sha /rgyal po'i zan zhes gang bshad pa'o/ /de nas grub pa'i mna' bsgags pa/ /dam tshig ces par gnas pa'o/ /bde mchog bde mchog ces gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas bde mchog
thams cad kyis/ /phyag rgya'i bde ba mchog tu gsungs/ /de bzhin e ma'o bde ba dang / /snang ba shes pa'ang rab tu gnas/ /shi shi srid pa'ang srid pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
'da' bar bya ba'ang ma yin pas/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /phyag rgya'ang sbyor ba yin par bshad/ /sbyor ba'ang phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad/ /nga ni sna tshogs dam tshig ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /sbyor ba thams cad yin par bshad//
de yi nye pa'i longs sbyod ni/ /khams gsum thams cad ma lus pa'o/ /de yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri/ /ro dang reg pa bde myos pa'o/ /gzugs ni ri mo yin par gsungs/ /sgra ni glu yin zhes
bshad do/ /dri ni rab tu tshim par gsungs/ /ro ni ra sa ya na yin/ /reg pa bde ba yin par bshad/ /rab tu reg pa dga' ba'i bde/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yi/ /chos ni sbyor ba yin par
bshad| |sbyor ba'i longs sbyod thams cad kyis/ /ji ltar bde bar sten byed cing / /bdag gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyar ba/ /rang gi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod na ni/ /sbyor ba
kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /bde ba chen po yin par bshad/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa 'o/ /ye shes tsam la snyoms
'jug pa/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /ting 'dzin rab tu sbyor ba'ang bshad/ /lha mo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /sangs
rgyas thams cad 'dus pa 'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /dga' bar sbyod pa grub par bshad/ /rjes su sbyor ba rjes su sgrub/ /skyes
pa ltar byed dga' sbyod pa/ /slar yang rjes su sgrub par mdzad/ /lha mo kun la bde sdug pa/ /sbyor ba kun la mos pa ni/ /kun tu sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /ras ya na bde bar bshad/ /
thams cad ldang pa kun 'gro ba/ /dngos grub dam par rab tu bshad/ /dngos grub chen po ldang ba cher/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyar bshad/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug
chen po bla na med/ /sangs rgyas dam pa kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis bshad/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas
thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen no/ /khrag ni me tog yin par bshad/ /mdangs ni bdug pa yin par bshad/ /sha chen dag ni mar me ste/ /thal mo dag ni
spos su bshad/ /chang ni sgeg mo yin par bshad/ /rab tu myos pa sbrang rtsi 'o/ /bu ram chang ni myos byed gsungs/ /rgun chang dag ni bdud rtsi yin/ /bdud rtsi lam gyi yan lag brgyad/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no/ /rgun dang sbrang rtsi mchog tu dpa'/ /tshwa ni 'dod chags sra ba yin/ /skyur po'i khu ba g.yon can yin/ /kaM b+hi la ni bran mor bshad/ /phyur ba zla ba nya ba yin/ /sha ni
sman gyi mchog yin te/ /dbang phyug dam pa kun gyi mchog/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yis bshad/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /chang ni ra sa ya nar bshad/ /zas ni tshe zhes bya bar

bshad| |bza' ba sna tshogs grub pa ni/ /sha dang chang du ldan pa dag/ /dga' ba'i longs spyod skal bzang po/ /tshe yi dam pa yin par bshad/ /a 'bra rgun 'bru pa nas/ /na li ke ra a ru ka/ 'bras bu chen po'i

khyad par dag /bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu yin par bshad/ /a mra smin pa grol bar bshad/ /de bzhin bde bar nyal ba dang / /bde bas rab tu rmongs pa dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no/ /'bras bu chen po pa na
sa| |rgun 'brum khu ba khu ba'i mchog /na le ke ra'i dngos grub che/ /dam chos 'bras bu a ru ka /glu yi tshig tu brjod par bshad/ /dar dir dag ni sil snyan yin/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya
yis| |gar ni rnams par rol par bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i/ /glu dang sil snyan gar byed pa/ brda yi dam par bshad pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam sprul pa'o/ /rab tu zhi ba'i
sil snyan glu/ /dur khrod glu dang sil snyan dang / /gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o/ /chags bcas glu dang sil snyan dang / /gar ni shin tu rnam sprul pa'o/ /mi yi dbang po'i sil snyan glu/ /gar ni
shin tu rnam sprul pa'o/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sil snyan glu/ /rang gi rtsal gyi gar byas pa/ /rta mchog rnam par sprul pa ni/ /brda yi dam par rab tu bshad/ /DI zhes bya ba
mkha' 'gro yi/ /khams gsum 'dir ni rnam par brtag /nam mkhar 'gro ba'i phyag rgya dag /mkha' 'gro zhes ni rab tu grags/ /kun tu sna tshogs phyag rgya ni/ /thams cad nam mkhar
'gro ba ste/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /sgyu ma'i gar dbang grub pa ni/ /a ra li zhes ming du btags/ /mkha' 'gro ma yang a ra li/ /
sang rgyas brda yi phyag rgya 'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /sgyu ma kun gyi gar byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig mchog /bcom
ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/ /rdo rje a ra li zhes bshad/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' dga' ba'i mchog/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /de ni skal pa bzang por bshad/ /gang zhig rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan/ /skal pa bzang po zhes brjod na/ /shin tu srid
pa kun 'grub cing / /de ni dbang phyug chen po 'grub/ /Tak+ki 'dod pa yin par bshad/ /dga' ba ki li ki li la yin/ /byams pa chu srin yin par bshad/ /'dod pa'i dbang po dbang phyug
mchog /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /dam tshig gsum gyi dam pa yin/ /oM dang b+hu khaM kun bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /grangs te bcug nas bcings pa dang / /zhugs nas dbang
du gyur pa ni/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH bshad pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda yin no/ /e hi ya hi zhes bshad pa/ /tshur sbyon phar bzhud zhes bsgrags pa'o/ /tis+ha zhes gsungs pa ni/ /longs la drongs shig
drongs shig pa'o/ /kha kha khA hi zo zhig pa'o/ /a pi zhes pa 'thungs shig pa'o/ /da ra da ra byin ces pa'o/ /ru ta ma ta rol cig pa'o/ /hu lu hu lu zhugs shig pa'o/ /a ra ra rar skul cig pa'o/ /e

ma'o bde mchog ngo mtshar ni/ /a la la la ho zhes bshad pa'o/ /bde mchog rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yin/ /e ma'o bde ba rmongs byed ma'o/ /snang ba zhes ba zab mo'o/ /hUM shi shi ni tshe 'phel ma'o/ /shin
tu brtan dang rab tu brtan/ /kun tu brtan dang cher brtan pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / /'jig rten dbang dang mkha' las skyes/ /shes 'gyur dag 'gyur grub par 'gyur/ /zhugs la dbang
du 'gyur par mdzod/ /aM aM a a kun bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa dang / /de bzhin bde bar mkhyen pa ni/ /oM sarba bid ces bshad pa ste/ /sangs

rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sar+b+ba a r+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ 'khor lo dngos grub mkhyen pa dang / /don dam nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rang byung bcom ldan
'das| |rnam snang mdzad chen gtso bo ni/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /skal pa bzang po zhes bshad pa'o/ /ke Ta Sha/ ko Ta ba/ ko Ta bash+tsa/ ko Ta ri ka /ko la gak+Sha/

ko la ba| ko la/ ko la bash+tsa/ ko la b+ha sta thA/ phyag na rdo rje rang don gyi/ /mtshan 'di rnams ni gang brjod pa/ /de la rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /bran bzhin dngos grub gter bar 'gyur/ /rgyal srid
dang ni longs sbyod dang / /gter gyi rnams kyang lhag par ster/ /dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin dgra yang med par byed/ /mig dang rna ba sna dag dang / /lce dang lus kyang de

bzhin te/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dag dang / /ro dang reg kyang bdag gi don/ /rdo rje mtshon cha be di dang / /dgra bo dag tu rab grags pa/ /de yi phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje zhes kyang
bya| |nyon mongs thams cad gang zad dang / /dgra rnams kyang ni gang zad pa/ /phyag na rdo rjes 'dul ba'i phyir/ /de ni yak+Sha yin par bshad/ /he ru dpal ni rdo rje che/ /thal bar 'jig pa'i mchog
yin te| |sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che/ /brda yis rab tu bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu 'jigs/ /kha T+wAM ga ni rgyal mtshan che/ /thod pa kham phor pad+ma'i snod/ /khrag chen dang ni sbrang
rtsi che| |dkar me rku byed rab rmongs dang / /ro langs dang ni spos byed dang / /gtum mo dang ni smra ma dang / /lha mo bdun ni brda yin no/ /srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal/ /thal ba bzhin
du rab tu lhogs/ /haM haM hri hUM kun bshad pa/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin/ /rol cig dgongs shig de bzhin du/ /rol du chug cig gsod du chug /mar Ta phaT phaT ces bshad pa/ sangs rgyas
kun gyi brda yin te/ rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dbang phyug dam pa'i rig pa ni/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis/ /skal pa bzang po yin par bshad/ /rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
'jig rten dbang phyug ces bshad de/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda dag gis/ /de yang skal ba bzang zhes bshad/ /dag dang grub dang de bzhin blo/ /rju 'phrul 'phel dang 'byor pa dang / /rnam par lta

dang sgrol ma dang / /rgyal chen ma dang khro gnyer ma/ /pad+mor gnas zhes bya ba dang / /rdo rje pad+mo'i dbang phyug ma/ /pad+mo lha mo rigs chen te/ /sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyas bshad/ /nam mkha'i snying

po thams cad phyogs/ /re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa/ /skal ba bzang zhes rnam par grags/ /rdo rje nyi ma nor po che/ /trI dang ba ba Ta Ta dang / /tra Ta tra Ta kun grags pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brda
yin te| |dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang / /rgyal mtshan rtse mo mchod chen po/ /sna tshogs pad+mo thams cad sbyan/ /de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad pa/ /byang chub kun gyi sems chen po/ /sna tshogs
rdo rje bla na med/ /thams cad dag par mos pa yis/ /'jig rten thams cad rab 'jigs pa/ /rta mchog pad+ma dpal dang ldan/ /skal pa bzang zhes brda yis bstan/ /brda yi phyag rgya 'di rnams
kyis| |dkyil 'khor sbyor bas nges pa ni/ /grogs po mkhas par bcas pa yi/ /dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /brda yi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rjes su chags
par bya'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed cing / /dngos grub kun la rjes chags pa/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa
kun| |las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams dag /ma lus par ni myur du 'grub/ /rjes su chud par bya'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog/ /cho 'phrul
dag ni ston par byed/ /rjes su chud par bya 'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rjes su sbyang bar bya 'o
zhes| |cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /sgrib sbyang thams cad dngos grub rnams/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rjes su yi rang bya 'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /
bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mchod pa'i las kun myur du 'grub/ /rjes su gzhom par bya'o zhes/ /cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed pas/ /rtul phod las rnams thams cad ni/ /ma
lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /ye shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /dbyibs dang gzugs ni ci 'drar ldan/ /thams cad bdag nyid rgyar sbyor ba/ /mi
'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /pra se na yi dngos grub mchog /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams
cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis/ /yang dag bde ba tshul bzhin du/ /mthong ba dang ni thos par byed/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang / /khams rnams kun ni thams cad
las| |thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed/ /rnam par shes pa kun 'grub cing / /kun tu thams cad kun gyi bdag /'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang / /rnam par shes pa'i las kun la/ /
thams cad mthong zhing shes par byed/ /pad+mor chags par rjes chags shing / /sna tshogs pad+mor kha 'byed pas/ /pra se na ni sna tshogs pa/ /mthong ba dang ni thos par byed/ /me tog bdug pa
mar me mchog /spos dang mchod pa thams cad la/ /rnam par shes pa kun grub pa/ /thams cad mthong zhing thos par byed/ /reg dang ma reg rdo rje che/ /ral gri me long mda' gzhu dang / /shing

dang chu dang 'bab chu brag /gzugs brnyan byung ba'i khyim dag las/ /bya dang de bzhin mi bya dang / /stor ba dang ni ma stor dang / /'phrog pa dang ni ma 'phrog dang / /de bzhin rnyed dang ma rnyed dang / /
gson pa dang ni shi ba dang / /de bzhin rgyal dang pham pa dang / /don yod dang ni don med dang / /de bzhin grub dang mi grub dang / /bde dang mi bde cho ga bzhin/ /lha yul dag ni don rnams dang //
sangs rgyas zhing gi don rnams kyang / /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bsam pa mthong zhing thos par byed/ /rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas/ /dur khrod lha yi gnas rnams dang / /ma mo gnas kyi thal ba mchog /thams cad dpral ba'i srung ba ni/ /thig le sor ris
gsum du bya/ /phyogs mtshams nam mkha' bcings na/ /srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje thal ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i srung ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ji
lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan pas/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i gzugs chu'i 'gram/ /lha rdzas zhi ba'i chu mchog gis/ /gtor ba dang ni blugs pa dang / /khrus bya ba dang 'bogs pa
yis| |phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings na/ /srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi dri ma med pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor
ba| |ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas/ /mi yi thod pa'i nang du ni/ /nyungs ka ra bskyed nas blang bar bya/ /lo ma nyungs mar zas su bza'/ /mgo bskul de bzhin 'bras bu yis/ /
phyogs mtshams nam mkha' sa bcings na/ /srung ba kun gyi bla med pa'o/ /dpal don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ma mchu so yis
legs mnan nas/ /dpal ldan g.yon du 'gying dang bcas/ /gsal bar phyogs su 'khor lo'i tshul/ /bla 'og tu ni byin brlabs na/ /gnas gsum dag ni rgyas 'debs so/ /gzhug dka'
bdag nyid ngan pa'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor 'grub/ /thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug byin gyis brlabs pa dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /bde bar rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgya 'dis btab ma thag tu ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
byin brlabs 'gyur/ /shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa las/ /sangs rgyas kun dang phrad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /dpal skal pa bzang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i srung ba'o/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag sbyor ldan pas/ /phyogs su legs par 'khor lo'i tshul/ /bla dang 'og tu byin brlabs nas/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /khams gsum
dag ni ma lus par/ /gzhug dka' bdag nyid ngan ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/ /thams cad kyi mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo
rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /he ru dpal gyis rnam sprul pas/ /thams cad kun tu kun gyi bdag /thams cad srung ba mi 'gyur che/ /rims dang dug dang
dbyig dug nad/ /mkha' 'gros gtse dang gnod rnams dang / /bdud dang ngan khrid thams cad ni/ /mod la rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka dbab pa rnam par sprul pa zhes bya
ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ji lta'i dbyibs dang gzugs ldan zhing / /sna tshogs pad+mo kha 'byed pas/ /sgrib pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /sgrib pa kun
las rnam par grol/ /dag pa thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa thams cad rnam dag na/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rdo
rje'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i srung ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /'bar ba lta ba'i tshul zhugs na/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'am/ /rab tu 'jigs pa mi bzod 'gyur/ /'di yis
bsrung ba byas na ni/ /bskal pa yi ni me ltar 'bar/ /'di yis ngan 'gro rnam gsum dang / /khams gsum dag kyang thal bar rlog /rdo rje chen po'i me rab tu 'jigs pa 'bar ba
mi bzod pa'i dam tshig chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba/ /ji lta'i tshul bzhin byed pa yis/ /rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /go cha
bgo ba'i thabs su bya/ /spyi bo dang ni dpral bar gnyis/ /glo gnyis dang ni rgyab tu gnyis/ /rdo rje phreng ba bcing ba dang / /sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag /dar bcings thabs su bcings
nas ni| |'gying dang bcas par mtha' nas dgrol/ /dar dpyangs ba yi thabs byas nas/ /thal mo brdabs pas bstan par bya/ /'di yis bsrung ba byas na ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal
dang 'dra/ /mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa'i/ /rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub/ /rims nad dug dang dbyig dug nad/ /mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams dang / /yan lag ma rungs byed pa kun/ /
'di yis bsrungs na yong mi tshugs/ /dpal rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /srung ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /chos sems pa yi tshul ston cing / /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dag
dang / /zhi ba'i lta bas bltas nas ni/ /rims dang dug rnams thams cad sel/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mthe'u chung lcags kyu lta bur bcing / /mdzub mo bsnyams pa'i rtse
mos mnan/ /nad rnams thams cad zlog par byed/ /yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas ni/ /dpal bar bde bar gzhag par bya/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar
byed| |dpal rdo rje smin mtshams lus kyi nad gso pa'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa byas pa las/ /mdzub mo phan tshun mngon phyogs pa/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /zug rngu kun las grol bar
'gyur| |bu nad lhog rgal skran dag dang / /dmu rdzing la sogs kun las thar/ /'di nyid grub par gyur nas ni/ /nang rnams kun gyis gnod pa med/ /zug rngu
thams cad med par byed/ /grub pa dpal gyi spyan bcings te/ /'di yis mig gnyis phyis na ni/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba mchog 'di yis/ /long ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /bdag
nyid sbyor bas ldan byas la/ /rdo rje khu tshur dam po yis/ /drang ba'i tshul du klad pa nas/ /kha phyogs drang zhing btung bar bya/ /rims dang dug dang gdon rnams kun/ /rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyis
bzung / /bdag gis lhar ni sbyor ldan pas/ /'thungs na thams cad med par 'gyur/ /klad pa'i sman no/ /ta thA ga ta gar+b+ha s+t+waM si ho/ /'di ni rna bar bzlas pa'i mchog /zug rngu med cing myur
du thar| |zug rngu thams cad 'byin pa po/ /g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis/ /sems dpa'i gtsug tor bcings na ni/ /byis pa nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /thams cad srungs shig bde ba 'thob/ /
gzhon nu gso ba'o/ /g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis/ /klu yi gdengs ka lta bur bya/ /'bar ba'i tshul ston 'debs bcas na/ /dug gi las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /'bar dang 'dul dang bcing
ba dang / /za ba'i dug rnams med par byed/ /gdug pas zin dang lu ta dang / /shi ba sos par byed pa'i mchog /gdengs ka'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis/ /g.yon
pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi/ /gung mo la ni reg byas na/ /gdon rnams kun las thar par 'gyur/ /dug gso ba dang gdon gyi cho ga 'o/ /ba dan gsum po gnyis bcings nas/ /gung mo gnyis ni
mdud par bcing / /mdzub mo mthe'u chung rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bcings la/ /yongs su bsgyur te bteg nas su/ /smin ma'i mtshams su bzhag pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro'i las rnams ma
lus par/ /lus pa med par thams cad 'grub/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /gnas gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /
dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i khro gnyer zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste ma mo shes pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /rta rnams thams cad zhon na ni/ /rta rnams nad med sos pa dang / /nyam skye
thar zhing mgyogs par 'gyur/ /dpal rta mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /glang po kun la zhon na ni/ /glang po thams cad nad med sos/ /nyam skye spro ldan myos par
'gyur| |shrI badzra satwa s+t+waM ma si ho/ /'di ni rna bar bzlas pa'i mchog /bya rnams nad med 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /mi yi skad du smra bar 'gyur/ /bya gso ba yi phyag rgya 'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal
sbyor bas/ /'byor pa kun la rjes chags na/ /shing rnams nad med mi skam zhing / /rtag tu me tog 'bras bur ldan/ /shing rnams skyed pa'i gtsug lag las/ /sbyor pa'i cho ga gang
bshad pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis thams cad ni/ /yid la bsam pa bzhin du 'grub/ /shing skyed pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /'khrul 'khor gyis 'phangs ma 'phangs
dang / /de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang / /'phangs nas slar du gzung ba dang / /stobs su 'gyed pa lnga yin te/ /rang byung rnams kyi dgra cha'i dpyad/ /phyag rgya lnga la rab tu gnas/ /rdo
rje sems dpa' dpal gyis bshad/ /dam pa de dag bshad par bya/ /dbyibs dang bde blag sbyor ba dang / /kun tu sbyor dang 'dren mar myur/ /'gengs dang 'phen dang gsal ba 'o/ /
rkang pa gshibs pas sa mnan cing / /rkang pa 'gyed pas sa gnon to/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang mnan par bya/ /brkyang bskum gyis kyang gnas gsum mnan/ /dbyibs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /
mi ltod pa dang sran gzugs dang / /mnyen cing yan lag brten pa dang / /rgya cher 'gengs shing rnam par dag /lus kyi phyag rgya bde blag can/ /'di yis lus la gnon pa dang / /rims
dang dug dang dbyig dug dang / /mkha' 'gros gtse dang gdon rnams kyis/ /nam yang tshugs par yong mi 'gyur/ /rgya cher 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rang gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ /bde
blag can gyis gzhu bzung nas/ /g.yas pa rab tu gar byed cing / /mda' 'phangs na ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa legs
bsrangs la/ /skyon med pa yi g.yas pa dgug /gzhu rgyud dal bus drangs nas ni/ /'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya/ /thams cad dgug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rna drung bar du zlum bor ni/ /ji ltar rigs
par legs bkang la/ /yi ge oM tsam rang gi khar/ /bzung na 'gro ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /ji ltar rigs pas drangs nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bzung nas kyang / /der ni cung
zad dbye bar bya/ /'gengs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /chang pas 'ben ni bsgrib par bya/ /'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta/ /lta ba chang pa la gtad nas//
myur du 'phangs na dam pa 'grub/ /mda' gzhus rgyal bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /gru bzhi pa la rno ba dang / /de bzhin kun nas bskor bar bya/ /g.yas phyogs nas ni mda' bskor nas/ /smad de de
bzhin bstod pa dang / /rkang pas mnan cing rmig pas mnan/ /'bigs pa bcu yi rgya mchog gis/ /khams gsum rgyal srid chen po dag /bde bar thub nas nye bar spyod/ /dpal khams gsum
rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ /rab tu 'phangs dang mnyam par 'phangs/ /de bzhin glog ltar 'phangs pa dang / /glog ltar 'khrug pa de bzhin te/ /phyag rgya thabs rnams sgrub pa'o/ /thabs thams
cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /nyam nga lag dang bde phyogs dang / /thad ka de bzhin gyen du 'debs/ /'di dag zlog pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnas gsum dag ni bzlog par bya/ /nges par zlog pa thams cad kyi
phyag rgya'o/ /thams cad 'debs dang nges par 'debs/ /kun 'debs gyen du 'debs pa'i gar/ /'di dag 'phrog pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnas gsum dag kyang 'phrog
par byed/ /'phrog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad kyi/ /rtag tu bdag nyid rnam pa kun/ /mda' gzhu'i dpyad kyi phyag rgya'i mchog /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par
'gyur| |dgra cha thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /srin lag gnyis kyi nang du ni/ /mthe bo legs par gzhag par bya/ /de nas khu tshur bcangs nas ni/ /mdzub mo legs bar dgug
par bya| |rdo rje khu tshur dpal gyi rgya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas/ /las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams/ /ma lus par ni myur du 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/ /
rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la/ /bdag gi mthe bo'i nang du gzhug /zhi ba'i las rnams rab grub pas/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur
ro| |rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni rab brkyangs nas/ /mkha' 'gro'i las rnams thams cad ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i
khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o/ /brdeg pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mthe bong dag la gung mo bzhag /dpal pad+mo'i khu tshur grub pa ste/ /thams cad dag pa'i las la sbyar/ /dpal pad+mo'i khu
tshur ro| |khu tshur rdo rje rin chen mchog /'bebs pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/ /rang don las rnams grub pa ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /dpal rdo rje rin po che'i khu tshur gyi
phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur dpal bcangs la/ /sor mo thams cad yongs su bzung / /rtul phod las rnams thams cad ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /las thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes
pa'o| |rkang pa brkyang dang gnon pa dang / /bskums nas bteg pa'i stabs dag dang / /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs rnams thams cad mnan par bya/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo
thon du| |rnam par snang mdzad dpal mnan nas/ /kun tu byang chub yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal mnan nas/ /kun tu
grub pa yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang dpal mnan nas/ /kun tu dpal mo yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par
de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpal mnan nas/ /kun tu longs spyod yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /rta mchog
dam pa dpal mnan nas/ /thams cad dbang phyug yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad bar do spyod do/ /byang chub pha rol phyin pa dang / /grub dang gzugs dang sa rnams dang / /rig dang phyag rgya
rnams mnan nas/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /dbang phyug dam pa mnan nas ni/ /mig gsum pa las gsum grub bkug /
bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /mthu po che yang mnan nas ni/ /snying las dpal mo yongs bkug ste/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis
ngo thon du/ /skye rgu'i bdag mo mnan nas ni/ /mos las grol ma yongs bkug nas/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /sdig med stobs kyis ngo thon du/ /rab dga'i dbang phyug mnan nas ni/ /
kun gyi bdag las dga' ba bkug /bdag gi spyad par nges spyod do/ /'jigs la sogs pa'i lha mo dang / /ma mo byang ma'i ma mo dang / /mkha' 'gro ma rnams mnan nas ni/ /bdag gi spyad
par de spyod do/ /de bzhin ku be ra la sogs/ /rig pa 'grub pa spyod pa dang / /mi yi rgyal po la sogs kyang / /mnan nas bdag gi spyad pa spyod/ /'gro ba dang ni mi 'gro ba'i/ /dngos po thams
cad ma lus pa'ang / /rnal 'byor bdag nyid des mnan nas/ /bdag gi spyad par de spyod do/ /dpal rdo rje gnon pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /khu tshur snying gar bcangs pa ni/ /bud med phyag rgyar
de bshad do/ /bud med sbyor ba ma lus pa/ /lus pa med pa'ang thams cad 'grub/ /g.yon pa 'gying pa'i tshul byas nas/ /lag g.yas bdag gi snying gar ni/ /gyen du drang ba'i tshul byas na/ /
bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje 'gying ba'o/ /dpal ldan sna tshogs pad+mo 'dzin/ /g.yon pa brdeg pa'i khu tshur dang / /g.yas par ldang bar gyur pa dang / /sangs rgyas dbang phyug
ting 'dzin bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad du 'phar ba'o/ /g.yon pa dril bu'i sgra sgrog cing / /g.yas pa yi ni lag pa yis/ /rdo rje gyen du gsor zhing bskor/ /sgyu ma thams cad 'byung bar bya/ /dpal rdo
rje sgyu ma'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /g.yon pa g.yon pa'i brla la bzhag /lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yi/ /rtse mos pad+mo dam par 'dzin/ /g.yas pa'i brla la lag ngar gzhag /mi dge ba thams cad
sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ /g.yon pa nor bu rin chen 'dzin/ /g.yas pa re ba kun rdzogs pa'i/ /bud med la sogs rin chen 'dzin/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su

rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /bdag gi snying gar 'dren tshul du/ /pad+mo sna tshogs dam pa 'dzin/ /g.yas pa rdo rje 'gying ba yis/ /dbang phyug dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug gi phyag
rgya shes pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ kun tu rnam pa sna
tshogs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dgu pa'o// //de nas kun tu sna tshogs 'di/ /phyag rgya shes pa'ang grub pa ni/ /kun tu sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ /kun tu sna tshogs
bshad par bya/ /smin ma mig dang so dang mchu/ /kha dang lus dang rkang lag gis/ /cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas/ /phyag rgya thams cad yongs su dgrol/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas/ /lha mo kun dang 'dus pa ni/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /rab tu bde bar grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
byin gyis rlob/ /legs par byin gyis brlabs na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam spyod bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i/ /mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /so
so dag nas grub par 'gyur/ /blta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku/ /thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad/ /legs so legs so zhes grub pa'i/ /dam pa dag kyang rab tu stsol/
bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /grub pa kun mchog nyams dga' ba/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i longs spyod du/ /thams cad kyi ni bdag nyid stsol/ /dang po kun las byung ba yi/ /
mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi/ /bkod pa rab 'byams tshogs rnams kyi/ /thams cad bdag nyid mchod pa mdzad/ /dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying dang bcas/ /dpal ldan lag pa
g.yas pa yi/ /pad+mo khu tshur dpral bar bzhag /bdag gi mig ni gyen du lta/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gyen du 'phar ba'i dngos grub dang / /rab 'byams
las rnams myur du 'grub/ /phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/ /khams gsum pa dag ma lus pa/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang / /thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo
rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po/ /dpal rdo rje pad+mo gyen du 'phar ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / phyag
rgya'i lan zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ /rtag tu dpag med tshe dang ldan/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /bden pa'i tshig ni rab tu smra/ /mtha' yas pa dang mu
med pa'i/ /rtog pa kun dang 'di yi ni/ /mthu dang yon tan bsngags pa'i mtha'/ /brjod pa dag tu yong mi nus/ /mthu dang rang bzhin dag gis grub/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu grub/ /so so rjes
grub bde ba ster/ /'di ni gsang mchog mchog gi mchog /sems can don phyir las rnams sbyong ba dang / /rnam par dag par rgyal ba yong mi mdzad/ /'di la bgegs med bdud kyang
yod ma yin/ /rtog pas mi 'grub thar par yong mi nus/ /mi brtan pa dang bdud du nga mi 'gyur/ /brtan par bya ba'i phyir yang nga mi 'doms/ /gang zhig rang gi bde bas da sgrub na/ /dngos grub
mchog gis de ni brtan par byed/ /kun tu sna tshogs pas ni de skad gsungs/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dgyes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal
gyis legs gsungs la/ /mngon par bstod cing rab tu dgyes par gyur/ /le'u bcu pa'o// //rnam mang rjes chags dga' ba'i pad+mo rnam dag mchod pa dang / /rta mchog rnal
'byor bde bas gsal bar rjes su mchod na ni/ /rab tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor dam pa skal bzang dga' ba'i mchog /rab mchog bde ba'i rang bzhin dam tshig bde bas rjes su grub
par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rtog pa/
rtog pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po bde ba chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba kalpa sa muts+tsha ya nA ma sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA ki nI dzA la saM wa ra
ut+ta rot+ta ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rtog pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma/
dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sems la ni/ /de kho na nyid nges par gnas//
sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'dod chags chen po bde chen po/ /
bde chen rdo rje chen po pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang lhan cig pa'i/ /bde gshegs mgon mchog rnams kyis bzhugs/ /thams cad mchog 'gyur 'dod chen gyis/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub
phyir| |sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rtog pa 'dus pas bka' stsal 'tshal/ /rnam par mi rtog chos bdag las/ /rtog pa'i don 'di gang la gsungs/ /ci yi slad du'ang rgyud
phyi ma| |dang po'i sa mchog ji ltar lags/ /gdod ma tha ma med nyid yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin te/ /yig 'bru ji ltar gsungs pa lags/ /sngags phyung ba yang ci 'dra ste/ /shin tu dga'

dang bzang nyid de/ /rdo rje snying po gtso bo gtso/ /sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin yang / /de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'dzin nyid chen po yang / /byang chub spyod pa rnams ji ltar/ /bdud dang bdud
las rgyal ba yang / /sangs rgyas byang chub ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje gtum mo thar byed dang / /phyag rgya rdo rje yang ji ltar/ /dang po'i rigs bskyed ji ltar lags/ /'dod pa'i thar pa rnam pa ci/ /mgon
po rnam gsum ji ltar 'tshal/ /thams cad yang nyid ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar dang po snying po 'byung / /nye ba'i snying po de ji ltar/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags/ /
dkyil 'khor ji ltar gsungs par gyur/ /de yi rnam smin ji 'dra ste/ /thig gdab de bzhin rtog pa yi/ /dngos grub ji ltar bshad pa lags/ /gsang ba lnga dang de nyid
che| |gang lags ci 'dra de bzhin te/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnams dang ni/ /rigs rnams kyang ni ji ltar lags/ /thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang / /de nyid tshogs kyi phyag mtshan yang //
thams cad dgug dang mchod chen dang / /rang gi byin rlabs sogs grub pa/ /de rnams de nyid gsang chen dang / /dam pa dang ni don dam pa/ /dam pa'i yi ge grub don du/ /thams cad mi gsung
'os ma lags/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ de kho na nyid thams cad nges tshig gi rtog pa ste bco brgyad pa'o/ /da
nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /rtog pa kun gyi gtso chen pos/ /the tshom kun gyi tshogs gnas nas/ /don dam 'dzin pa yang bka' stsal/ /de la ji ltar rtog pa'i don rgyud yin zhe na/ rnam par mi
rtog chos dag las/ /sems can don du yongs su rtog /de phyir rtog par yang dag bshad/ /rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar rgyud phyi ma yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rab tu 'brel bar
bshad| |phyi ma gong du phyung ba yin/ /de nyid gsang ba gsang chen rnams/ /de yang rgyud ni phyi mar 'dod/ /de la ji ltar dang po sa nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun tu rab gnas
pa| |rdo rje kun gyi dngos po mchog/ /bde chen dgyes pa chen po de/ /dam pa'i yi ge gzhal yas khang / /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar gdod ma
dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhe na/ yi ge ka sogs d+ha yig mtha'/ /nga nya spangs nas 'jug par bya/ /yi ge d+ha sogs Sha yi mtha'/ /phreng ba gnyis pa yang dag bri/ /dbus gnas par
ni a yig phreng / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bkod de/ /thig le zla tshes dang ldan par/ /tsheg drag zla ba gnyis yin te/ /a yig mi 'gyur bsgom par bya/ /dbus su rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas/ /de dbus
rtag tu sgom pa ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas ri mo grags pa yin/ /de las 'gro ba g.yo mi g.yo/ /thams cad yang dag 'byung bas ni/ /
nam mkha' las byung mtshan ma'i phyir/ /gdod ma tha ma med mchog yin/ /rdo rje chen po dngos sems ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes 'dod do/ /de la bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na/ dngos grub
chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po rig pa lha/ /rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /dam pa yi ge shin tu dga'/ /de la ji ltar yi ge rtog pa yin zhe na/ yi ge a sogs k+Sha mtha' ni/ yi ger
yang dag bshad pa ste/ /mi zad dga' ba'i rdo rje can/ /de nyid kun don mtshan nyid phyir/ /de la ji ltar sngags 'byung ba yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems sogs 'khor lo la/ /gang rnams sngags su
cher bshad pa/ /de rnams byung ba'i don du ni/ /rdo rje can gyis yang bka' stsal/ /gur gum la sogs byug pa la/ /bris sku la sogs rnam brgyan nas/ /bla re la
sogs bres nas su/ /rtag tu re'u mig bzhi brtsams nas/ /gru bzhi gzhal yas khang byas te/ /re'u mig phyogs bzhir 'bar bar byas/ /re'u mig sum cu tham pa la/ /bcu dgu dang
ni ldan par bya/ /brgya phyed stan la gnas pa la/ /sde pa lnga mtha' thig le yis/ /spyi bo gtsug la brtag pa yi/ /ka dang sha zhes bya ba ni/ /dbus kyi re'u mig la bri'o/ /de yi phyi rol
gnas brgyad dag /mtshams dang phyogs kyi re'u mig la/ /dbang ldan la sogs rim pa ru/ /ya dang sha yi sde bkod de/ /me mtshams la sogs re'u mig la/ /ma yi yig 'bru bzhi po
dang / /a yig sa bon la brten nas/ /sa bon bcu gnyis bkod par bya/ /dbang ldan la sogs re'u mig la/ /ka yig la sogs rim par dgod/ /de ltar bzhi la rim par ni/ /thams
cad rnam par gnas byas te/ /ka sogs re'u mig bzung nas su/ /yig 'bru dam pa phyung bar bya/ /shin tu dga' chen rgyal po ni/ /spyor ba thams cad dbang phyug gtso/ /re'u mig nyi shu
rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa zla phyed gtsug phud zhal/ /de 'og sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ /dga' ba rdo rje can gyis phyung / /re'u mig bcu bzhi zhes pa la/ /gnas pa tsheg drag dang ldan pa/ /re'u
mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /sum cu rtsa bzhi zla dang ldan/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig la/ /gnas pa nga ro thig le ldan/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa tsheg drag sbyor ba bya/ /sum cu
rtsa brgyad sbyor ba yis/ /de ni bzhi bar rnam par bshad/ /bde ba chen po rgyal chen po/ /lha mo dam pa rtag pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu gcig la gnas pa/ /thig le nga ror yang dag ldan/ /re'u mig
brgyad pa la gnas pa/ /bcu dgu dang ni ldan pa ste/ /de 'og sum cu rtsa bzhi dang / /thig le nga ro brgyan pa 'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa tsheg drag sbyor ba 'o/ /re'u mig gnyis
pa la bkod pa'o/ /thig le nga ro ldan pa 'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs btus pa'i/ /sngags phyung ba ni mchog yin te/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa brgyad la/ /gnas pa'i thig le nga ro ldan/ /dbus na nyi
shu rtsa gcig la/ /dbus nas bco lnga zla ba can/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig gnas/ /dbus nas bco lnga zla ba can/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas/ /bcu gcig zla ba dang ldan te/ /lha mo
gling bu ma sogs kyi/ /sngags phyung rmad du byung ba'o/ /re'u mig bcu pa la gnas dang / /bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin te/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gsum gnas/ /bcu drug pa yang de bzhin te/ /me
tog la sogs bsdus pa yi/ /'di ni sngags phyung mchog yin no/ /rta mgrin 'phang mtho lcags kyu sogs/ /dang po 'byung ba'i sa bon nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /sgo la nan
tan gyis sbyor ro/ /zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ /re'u
mig gnyis pa can kho na/ /zla tshes gtsug dang ldan pa'i zhal/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal chen po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug yin/ /re'u mig bco lnga gnas pa la/ /thig le nga ro ldan
pa 'o| |re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa 'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lngar ldan/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa'o/ /dbus nas nyi shu pa nyid la/ /thig le nga ros brgyan
pa 'o| |chos gos ma tshogs bzhi dag gi /sa bon 'byung ba mchog 'di yin/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas /thig le nga ros brgyan pa 'o/ /re'u mig bdun pa de bzhin yang / /dbus
nas bco lnga pa dang ldan/ /thig le nga ro ldan pa ni/ /byang du sil snyan cha lang ngo / /dbus gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ /gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa/ /thig le nga ro ldan pa ni/ /rdo rje rin
chen cher brjod do/ /dbus nas bco brgyad pa dag nyid/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor la/ /chos kyi dung gi phyag rgya che/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal
rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi re'u mig la/ /gnas pa nyi shu pa ldan ni/ /khrag 'thung zhes pa'i
rgyal po che/ /tshig drag lhag chad gyur pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa 'og na bcu dgur ldan/ /re'u mig nyi shu gnas pa dang / /sbyor ba chog drag ldan pa'o/ /tsheg drag dang
ni rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa dbus gnas bcu gcig ldan/ /re'u mig bcu gnyis pa sbyor ba'i/ /tsheg drag ldan par 'dod pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa/ /'og gi 'dren pa nyi shu
gcig /bcu gnyis pa dang tsheg drag can/ /gsum pa can de bshad pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa/ /bcu gnyis pa dang ldan pa la/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam sbyor ba/ /lha mo snod
chen ma yi 'dod/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa dbus nas gnyis pa can/ /de bzhin thig le nga ror ldan/ /thig le 'byung gnas gsum pa la/ /dbus nas bcu pa gang yin pa/ /
rtag tu tshe ga drag ldan pa ni/ /dmar chen sogs pa'i lha mo yi/ /bzhi po dag ni phyung ba 'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /gnas pa'i thig le bcas pa 'o/ /dbus las drug pa gang yin pa/ /theg
le nga ro ldan pa 'o/ /re'u mig de bzhin bcu bdun pa/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa 'o/ /re'u mig bcu dgu la gnas pa/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa 'o/ /lha mo mda' rnon 'dzin sogs kyi/ /sa bon
byung ba de ngo mtshar/ /lha mo me tog ma sogs kyi/ /sa bon byung ba sngon bstan yin/ /gang dag sgo srung bstan pa yang / /gzugs mi mthun pa kho na'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa
bcu dgu'i gdan la gnas/ /nyi shu tsheg drag sbyor ba ni/ /pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug yin/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa'i/ /tshig gnyis lci bde de bzhin no/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la//
gnas nas dbus nas dgu pa ldan/ /rtag par thig le dang ldan ni/ /gnyis pa yi ni yongs grags pa/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa gcig la/ /gnas par nga ro thig les brgyan/ /re'u mig nyi
shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa dbus nas bcu gsum ldan/ /tsheg drag can ni bzhi pa yi/ /khro gnyer ma yi rgyud las grags/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir ldan/ /dbus nas dgu pa'i thig
ler bcas/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /dbus nas bco lnga dang ldan no/ /re'u mig bcu gcig la gnas pa/ /tsheg drag gis ni sbyor ba'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//
sum cu rtsa brgyad pa dang ldan/ /tsheg drag mnyam par sbyor ba ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang mchog yin no/ /lha mo gling bu ma sogs nyid/ /de bzhin lha mo me tog sogs/ /lha mo lcags kyu
ma sogs kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor la ni bskyed pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi
dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /dbus nas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /bcu gcig pa dang ldan pa ste/ /bcu dgu zla ba gtsug lnga ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma 'byung ba yin/ /
dbus nas bcu gsum gang yin pa/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhi la/ /gnas pa bcu dgu dang ldan pa/ /re'u mig nyi shu gnas dang sbyor/ /tsheg drag ldan pas
gnyis pa 'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan/ /tsheg drag lhan cig can de ni/ /gsum pa yi ni grags pa yin/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas//
bcu gcig dang ni thig le ldan/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa/ /tsheg drag ldan par 'dod pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /dbus nas dgu dang zla ba 'o/ /re'u mig sum cu rtsa
gcig gnas/ /thig le nga ros brgyan pa 'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /dbus nas bcu gsum pa dang ldan/ /tsheg drag mnyam par ldan pa ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i lha dag yin/ /lha mo gling
bu ma sogs kun/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyor skyes yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi yi ge 'byung ba'i phyag rgya
shes pa'o/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun sbyor ba ste/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug can ni/ /yul 'khor thams cad 'dus pa'o/ /re'u mig bcu bzhi la gnas pa/ /bcu
dgu pa dang ldan pa ste/ /nyi shu tsheg drag sbyor ba ste/ /sna tshogs pa yi brjod pa yin/ /re'u mig nyi shu rtsa bzhir gnas/ /gnas pa tsheg drag ldan pa 'dod//

rol tu| |yi ge sa ni 'jug par bya/ /rlung mtshams 'dab ma'i phyi rol tu/ /yi ge ha ni 'jug par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs

bzung nas/ /byang gi dang po ba yang yin/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /'od kyi gong bu mtha' ru 'gyur/ /de nas thig le sbyin byas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes

sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan dang / /thig le e yig ldan pa yi/ /lho las dang bor 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /de nas byang gi dang po ste/ /
dbus las tha ma de bzhin du/ /i yig dang ni sbyor ba yi/ /nub kyi tha ma 'gyur bar bya/ /tsheg drag o yig dang ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol par gyur pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan
'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las
tha ma de bzhin du/ /yi ge e dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te/ /de bzhin dbus nas tha ma dang / /yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol 'gyur
bar bya| |thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas mda' gzhu 'dzin pa dang / /rdo rje kha T+wAM ma dang / rdo rje
nyi ma mo dang / rdo rje bsreg bya za ba mo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje nyi ma'i lha mo bzhi gsungs so/ /gling bu ma sogs 'dus pa dang / /sgo srung ma sogs 'dus pa sta/ /me tog ma sogs 'dus
nas kyang / /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs
kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /yi ge i dang mnyam ldan
pa'i| |byang gi tha mar 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /bden bral phyi rol pa yin te/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams
phyi rol pa 'gyur te/ /rta mchog rgyal po chen po yi/ /thams cad dus su bzla bar bya/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa ni/ /'joms pa las grub dran las
dga'| |zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbang
ldan phyi rol de bzhin te/ /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma yang yin te/ /byang las bzhi pa gang
yin dang / /me mtshams pa yi mnyam gnon pa'i/ /dbus las tha ma 'gyur ldan bya/ /lho las dbu ma yang yin te/ /tsheg drag e yig ldan pa ni/ /sna tshogs pad+mo zhes su grags//
zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /i yig dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /dbang ldan phyi
rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol bzung
ba dang / /dbus las dbu ma ldan pa yi/ /byang las dang po 'gyur par bya/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa yang yin/ /rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /
sna tshogs rdo rje zhes grags so/ /gang dang gang gi dbus la ni/ /rta mchog 'di ni gzhag bya na/ /de nyid de ni dkyil 'khor yin/ /yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das thogs
med shin tu dga' ba dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ sngags 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste nyi shu pa'o// //de la ji ltar shin tu dga' ba nyid yin zhe na/ skyon med rtag pa gtan du ni/ /'dod
chags thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /de nyid gsang ba bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /zhes so/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yin zhe na/ gtan du dga'
ba kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /byang chub sems mchog cho ga'o/ /de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso bo
yin zhe na/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje dbang chen thugs kar bsgyur/ /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /dam pa'i dang bo skyes bu'o/ /de la ji
ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems nyid yin zhe na/ bsam med rgya chen zab pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad zad med bde/ /kun gyi dri ma med pa ni/ /byang chub sems bdag brtan pa/
yin| |de nas de'i yongs su las kyi khyad par ni/ sems brtan nyid kyis sems dpa' ste/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' sgom pa 'o/ /rnam par shes pa sems dpa' ste/ /rdo

rje nyid yin rdo rje las/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa 'byung ba'o/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs ni/ /nyon cig rdo rje gang gsungs pa/ /zla ba 'dra bar yang dag blo/ /rdo rje zhes su rnam par bshad/ /de la ji ltar bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yin zhe na/ ting 'dzin la sogs rnam bzhi yis/ /gang gi bskyed pa yod bsgoms na/ /bsgoms na thams cad bdag nyid du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//
sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs sbyor yang / /rang byin brlab 'di grub mchog ste/ /de nyid nyin re grub pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'thob bo/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i
spyod pa yin zhe na/ gsungs pa/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pa yang / /ci phyir sems can don du 'gyur/ /de phyir kun tu bzang po yi/ /ji bzhin byang sems spyod ces 'gro/ /de la ji ltar bcom
ldan 'das bdud dang bdud las rgyal pa yin zhe na/ sems de kho na bdud yin te/ /sems de kho na de bzhin gshegs/ /rang sems 'dul ba'i don du ni/ /bdag gi bdug nyid nye bar 'gro//
de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor 'bigs pa ni/ /byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid/ /de nyid de las de sangs rgyas/ /rang byin
brlab mchog bsgoms phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum mo mthar byed dang / phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/ /dbyer med so sor 'bigs pa ni/ /sdang ba thams cad nges par gnon//
sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ni/ /byang chub sems rnams bstan pa yin/ /brtan pa thams cad 'grub don du/ /rgyal ba bdag gis kun bzang gis/ /phyag la phyag mtshan de byin te/ /des ni phyag na rdo
rje yin| |de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs 'byung ba yin zhe na/ ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ /'dul phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /skye ba bdag ni rigs yin no/ /de la ji
ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i thar pa yin zhe na/ dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /kun grub zad med bde ba yin/ /bde ba chen po zhes
'dod do/ /gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i phyir/ /mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po/ /dam tshig dam pa shes ldan phyir/ /dgyes pa dam pa nyi ma ste/ /sbyin pa la sogs
mchog grub phyir/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /rdo rje rta mchog las nyid phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' rgyal chen po/ /ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum nyid yin zhe na/ /'jig rten gsum dag mtha' yas phyir/ /'dul phyir srid
gsum mchog gsum bdag /thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum/ /'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams
cad nyid yin zhe na/ sems can bsod nams cher 'phags phyir/ /mi g.yo thams cad kho na bdag /sems 'du 'bral phyir g.yo ba ste/ /kun byed thams cad kho na'i phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma
bdag lha mor gsungs/ /thams cad mdzad pas skal ba bzang / /rnam par rtog pas skal ngan par/ /brda yi mtshan mar gsungs pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i snying po
dbyangs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud yin zhe na/ gtan du srid pa yang dag 'grub/ /dbang phyug chen po 'grub ba don du/ /dpa' bo'i dngos grub kun don du/ /bskal pa'i dang po bcom ldan
gsungs/ /'dod chags chen po'i phyir bcom ldan/ /dam pa zad med shin tu dga'/ /gsang nyid phyir ni snying po'i dbyangs/ /hUM yig dam pa zad med pa'o/ /de la ji ltar nye ba'i snying po de
nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ dkyil 'khor dag ni dman pa dang / /dam tshig dag ni spangs pa dang / /de nyid gsang ba mi shes pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa min/ /'dod pa bcom
ldan sems dpa' ste/ /de kho na ni 'dod chags yang / /rdo rje phyag na rdo rje ni/ /chags bral de dang 'grub ba min/ /ling+ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs byas nas/ /ling+ga
mchod rten byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje dbyings ni rang bdag 'gyur/ /ling+ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling+ga rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ khrag 'thung zhes bdag sngon

skye'o| |ling+ga 'greng par rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling+ga pad+mar byin brlabs te/ /dag pa'i chos bdag sngon skye'o/ /ling+ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi stang du bzhugs nas

su| |ling+ga rin chen byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje nyi mar bdag sngon bskyed/ /ling+ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling+ga sna tshogs byin brlabs te/ /rta mchog dag ni sngon
skye 'o/ /b+ha gar ling+ga bcug byas te/ /der ni khaM yig bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs dag 'od/ /sku gnyis ldan pa spro bar bya/ /b+ha gar ling+ga bcug nas ni/ /de la hUM yig bsgom
par bya| |shin tu dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan pa'i spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling+ga btsug nas su/ /de la hrI yig bsgom par bya/ /khrag 'thung 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis
ldan par spro bya 'o/ /b+ha gar ling+ga bcug nas su/ /de la b+ha yig bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro bya 'o/ /b+ha gar ling+ga bcu gnas su/ /de la traM yig
bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling+ga bcug nas su/ /de la hUM yig bsgom par bya/ /hUM mdzad 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan
par spro bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nyid gsang ba gsang chen yang / /snying po yongs su grags la yin/ /snying pos rjes su 'grub
pa ni| |nye ba'i snying por yongs grags so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las/ gsang ba sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig
pa'o// //de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang / rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rgyud yin zhe na/ kun 'grub zad med bde ba ni/ /de ni rdo rje 'grub pa ste/ /don yod dam
tshig 'da' dka' yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don yin zhe na/ ji ltar gnas su gang 'khor lo/ /de ltar sde dang 'gro ba bzhin/ /'khor dang yang dag 'jug 'gyur
ba| |de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor bskyed mchog yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam smin gyi rgyu yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' sogs lha yi/ /dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthod ba las/ /ji
'dra rtag pa'i bsod nams su/ /phyi ni de bzhin bri bya'o/ /de la ji ltar thig gdab pa'i cho ga shes pa yin zhen/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bya na/ /mtshams kun mnyam por 'dren par bya//
shar dang nub dang byang sogs phyogs/ /thig skud bzhi ba re'u mig brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin/ /pad+ma pad+ma'i tshul yin te/ /rin chen tshul ni rin
chen gyi| |sna tshogs gyi ni zlum por gsungs/ /ji ltar 'dod pa ci bde bas/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /re'u mig brgyad par 'dod pa'o/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /nang gi dkyil
'khor du ni 'dod/ /re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gnas pas/ /gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa yin/ /zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na/ ji
ltar bden par dkyil 'khor bdag /gang gis rtogs par nus pa ni/ /gang gis yi dam lhar sbyor pas/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa yin/ /bris sku bris pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /rang sems bris
par sbyor pa yin/ /lhag chad cho gar gyur na yang / /bsgrub ste skyon du mi 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin zhe na/ sems dpa' dang po gdod ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba
che| |kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po gtso ba'i gtso/ /gdod ma tha ma med phyir yang / /dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod do/ /'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir ni/ /dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug
yin| |de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang lags/ ci 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'dod pa chen po kun gyi mchog /'di bde bas na 'dzum pa che/ /rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba des/ /dam pa bcom ldan
'gyur ba yin/ /de nas de yi zla mdog ni/ /dam pa yig 'bru grub nyid phyir/ /chos rnams thams cad dag phyir dang / /gsang ba de nyid rnam dag phyir/ /rdo rje 'dzin de zla ba'i mdog /de nas de'i sna
tshogs dmar ba'i 'od 'bar ba ni/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'dod chags che/ /'dod chags kun la rjes chags phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid kyang / /sna tshogs
dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /de la ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin zhe na/ thod phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni/ /khams gsum la ni dbu rgyan med/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ni/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' bdag mngon bskyed/ /khams gsum las ni rin chen gzhan/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces/ /dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin/
de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe na/ yan lag g.yas pas mnyam gnon pas/ /g.yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas su/ /de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rdo rje
snying po gtso yi gtso/ /de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa yin zhe na/ kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na/ /dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i
mchog /kun mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas/ /thams cad dbang phyug che ru 'phags/ /'grub rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs/ /dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag /rdo rje lha mo
tshogs phyag rgya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin/ /de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin zhe na/ me long khrag 'thung zhes bya
rnams| |mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog /so sor rtog la nyi ma ste/ /bya ba la ni rta mchog dang / /chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni/ /thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag
nyid ni| |'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg dang de bzhin yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni/ /de rnams de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen/ /chos kyi dbyings
la 'byung ba yis/ /rgya cher dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas ji ltar phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya'i yan lag gi shes pa yin zhe na/
'phrog byed ma dang 'dzin byed ma/ /gzung thar ma dang tshe sbyin ma/ /nam mkhar 'gro dang lha mo dag /mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu grags/ /gang gis skra ni bstan 'gyur na/ /de la dpral ba bstan par
bya| |mig la ston pa gang yin pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /gang gis lte ba bstan pa na/ /de la mthu ni rab tu bstan/ /gang gis ma mchu rab bstan na/ /de la so ni rab tu bstan/ /gang gis lce ni
bstan 'gyur na/ /de la gsus pa bstan par 'gyur/ /gang gis b+ha ga bstan gyur na/ /de la ling+ga bstan par bya/ /gang gis rje ngar bstan na/ /de la bral ni bstan par bya/ /gang gis bral ni
bstan gyur na/ /de la rkang mthil bstan par bya/ /gang gis rkang mthil bstan na ni/ /de la sen mo bstan par bya/ /gang gis mtshan khung bstan gyur na/ /de la smin ma bstan par bya/ /gang gis
sgra sgrog byed gyur na/ /de la tsho nge bya ba 'o/ /gang gis kha yang bstan na ni/ /de la zhags pa bstan par bya/ /gang gis gsal shing bstan gyur na/ /de la mdung thung
bstan par bya/ /gang gis san mo bstan na ni/ /de la nu ma rab tu bstan/ /gang gis khu tshur bstan na ni/ /de la mtshams su bstan par bya/ /gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na/ /de la bshang gcig
bstan par bya/ /gang gis mi sdug gzugs byed na/ /de la mdzes pa'i gzugs bya 'o/ /gang gis he skad byed 'gyur na/ /de la lag pa bstan par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma yin zhe na/ nad pa'i mig gi 'bras 'dra ba/ /dpral par tri shul de mdung thung / /phyin log mig dang khro
gnyer can/ /nu ma dag ni mi sdug pa/ /sna ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /gtsug gis bskor ba shes byas te/ /ri mo gsum gyis yongs su bskor/ /de yi khyim gyi mtshan ma ni/ /tri shul chung
du me long dang / /ral gri tshul dang rgyal mtshan dang / /rtse gcig khyim gyi mtshan mar bstan/ /'gro bar gyur na mkha' 'gro ma/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan ma bstan par bya/ /glo bur mi dga' bya
ba dang / /don med par yang 'jug pa'o/ /gang pa la yang ral gri 'gyur/ /tri shU la dang 'dra ba'i tshul/ /skad dang bya rog 'dra ba yis/ /de ni rtag par 'gyur ba'o/ /mtshan nyid de dag dang
ldan pa| |dam pa'i mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgyu yin zhe na/ rtogs pa thams cad
gsang chen po/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas bkug nas de nas bya ba ni/ /dril bu rjes su dkrol ba 'o/ /de la ji ltar mchod pa chen po thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad
gsang chen gyi/ /gang gis dga' nas mchod pa ni/ /rjes su mchod pa dang gzhan yang / /dbyangs dang sil snyan gar gyi yin/ /de la ji ltar rang gi rig pa'i lha thams cad sgrub pa chen po'i rgyu
yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya kun/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo 'gyur ba ste/ /rang gi yi dam lha sbyor nas/ /thams cad de ni 'grub par bya/ /de nas ji ltar thams cad rjes su 'grub pa'i rgyu
yin zhe na/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas/ /bzlas pa'i dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /rtog pa thams cad rjes grub pas/ /mchog gi dang po 'grub pa 'o/ /de la ji ltar rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i
sgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin zhe na/ o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i/ /nub las dang po yang yin te/ /shar las dang po bzung nas su/ /lci bar i yig ldan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa
bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dbu ma bzung pa la/ /tsheg drag yang dag ldan par bya/ /the tshom med par de las 'dis/ /rjes su sbyor bar ldan par 'gyur/ /lho las dang
por bzung nas su/ /gnyis pa la ni ldan par bya/ /nan tan gyis ni i yig sbyor/ /skad cig ma las gcod 'gyur ro/ /de nyid thig le dang ldan bas/ /byang las dbu
ma yang yin te/ /de nyid lan gnyis brjod par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /thig le u yig ldan par ni/ /drug par yongs su grags pa yin/ /dbus las gnyis pa gang
yin pa| |nub las dang po yang yin te/ /de ni a med shes bya ste/ /skad cig mas ni bdud rtsi 'grub/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /yi ge u yig mnyam ldan ba'i/ /dbang ldan phyi
rol pa yang bya/ /me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa/ /shar gyi dang po ldan par bya/ /tsheg drag u yig ldan pa yi/ /dbus kyi tha ma ldan par bya/ /thams
cad kyi ni sgrub byed pa/ /khrag 'thung zhes pa 'byung ba 'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrub bya 'grub/ /de nas phyi na ci 'dod par/ /ci 'dod 'dod pa bya ba yis/ /kun bzang kun byed de bzhin te/ /
langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /'gro ba yis sam 'greng ba 'am/ /bzhad pa dang ni smra ba la/ /gang dang de ru ci de bzhin/ /gang dang dbang po'i las nyid pas/ /gang gang de de'i rang bzhin
du| |rang gi mnyam gzhag med sbyor bas/ /rang gi rig pa'i lha 'dren no/ /de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni/ /thams cad kho na 'grub pa 'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni/ /rtag tu mthong
na rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /de ni nyes pa rnam grol te/ /dngos grub thams cad dbang phyug 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de ltar sna tshogs rjes su chags pa'o/
dga' ba pad+ma rnam dag che ba yis/ /gsal bar rjes su gtsang ba dam pa rtag par sbyin pa yis /dam pa bde ba'i dngos pos dam tshig bdag la bde ba rjes su sgrub/ /dam pa'i dga' ba shin
tu sbyor ba skal bzang dam pa shin tu dga'/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rang bzhin dag pa rtag tu rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos/ /dam pa dga' ba la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzang dam pa shin
tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub pa 'o/ /dag pa rjes su 'grub pa'i rang bzhin kho na so so rjes su grub pa bde ba las/ dam pa'i gsang chen rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //
bdag gi 'di ni dang ba'i snying po mchog /bde ba chen po mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu chen po/ /kun mchog 'byung ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi phyir/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang po nyid ni sbyor ba
po| |mtha' yas thob med thogs pa med pa'i phyir/ /tshul chen po yi chen po thams cad kyi/ /mkha' dang 'dra ba'i mchog gi dngos grub 'phel ba sbyin/ /ga dod ma tha ma med gang gis/ /rdzogs
byed med pa nus ma yin/ /sems can le lo can dang nyung tsam 'dod pa dang / /mi dad pa dang lkog smra ba dang ma dag pa/ /rta tu rjes su chags dang chags bral
