dga' ba dang / /de rnams phan pa'i don rdzogs pa'i don 'di yin no/ /gang gi khyim du bzung ba gang gis gyur pa dang / /bdag gis ji ltar ston pa sgrub par byed ba'am/ /mthu yis thams
cad so sor mngon du gyur pa ste/ /dngos grub mchog gis rgyus pa'i las dag mi 'grub pa 'o/ /gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa dang / /gzugs sogs thams cad 'di la
ji ltar mos pa bzhin/ /yi ge hUM yang ji ltar rab tu 'dod par bris byas na/ /des ni 'dod pa dngos grub cho ga bzhin du 'thob/ /sems can don du las dag byed pa ma yin pas/ /rgyal ba
dag gis rnam par dag 'di la/ /bgegs med de bzhin bdud kyang med pa ste/ /rtog pa yis kyang dngos grub 'phel stobs byin gyis rlobs/ /gang gi rtog pa mchog chen 'di sgrub byed pa
la| |bdud nyid du ni mi 'gro mi brtan nyid kyang min/ /brtan pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston par mi byed de/ /myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub phyir bstan par 'gyur byed do/ /gang gis
bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni/ /mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtag par bde chen dang / /chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang rgyas pa dang / /yig chen yang ni rtag
par bdag gis 'grub par byed/ /de nas mchog skyes rgyal ba thams cad dga' nas su/ /'dzum pa chen jo thams cad khyab par rnam par 'byed/ /kun bdag dbyings kyi rdul phra mchog chen
gzugs dag gis/ /kun nas de la legs pa'i sgra ni dbul bar byed/ /bdag gis dbyings kun rjes su che mchog gzugs kyis su/ /phan mchog gyur pa sangs rgyas kun gyis legs se
legs| |mchog gi rdo rje las byung khyod ni legs so legs/ /dam pa'i chos nyid chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs/ /dam pa'i las can mchod pa'i bdag nyid legs so legs/ /rtogs
pa'i byin rlabs mdzod cig mnyam par byin rlabs kyis/ /don yod dngos grub rtag tu yig 'bru chen po yi/ /grub pas phyi na mi 'dul ba yi dus su ni/ /de dag gi yang ji ltar dam pa'i bder
'gyur phyir/ /de ltar ngag chen zhus nas su/ /sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis/ /gsungs pa la ni mngon par bstod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang
mnyam par spyor ba'i mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde pa'i mchog ces bya ba khri brgyad stong pa las/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brgya bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti
dz+nyA na kirti nyid kyis bsgyur/ yon bdag bod kyi mkhan po gzhon nu grags pas zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ he badzra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ kye'i
rdo rje zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ /kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las shin
tu ches gsang ba'ang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po snying rje chen po lags so legs so/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam tshig sems dpa' chen po snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba nyon cig /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags/ /ji ltar
sems dpa' chen po lags/ /gang gis dam tshig sems dpa' lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mi phyed ces byar
brjod/ /sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa/ /'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /ye shes chen po'i ros gang ba/ /sems dpa' chen por brjod
par bya| |rtag tu dam tshig la spyod phyir/ /dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ ming bsdus pa ni ji lta bu/ /gang gis kye yi rdo rje lags/ /he yi rnam pas ci
zhig bshad/ /badzra yis kyang de bzhin ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /he ni snying rje chen po nyid/ /badzra'ang shes rab brjod par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud/ /de ni
nga yis bshad kyi nyon/ /lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang / /don byed rnam mang brjod pa dang / /rangs par byed dang skrod pa nyid/ /sde rengs byed dang mngon spyod dang / /ji ltar rigs par
rnal 'byor ma'i/ /bskyed dang gnas dang phyed rgyu dang / /don byed ye shes rnam shes dang / /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba 'o/ /he ru ka ni skyed pa'i rgyu/ /dang por gcig ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo
rje snying po snying rje che/ /dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing / /dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /de yongs shes pas grol ba yin/ /dngos po med par yongs shes pas/ /dngos po
sgom 'gyur shes rab can/ /dngos po med pa yongs shes pas/ /de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya/ /lus la ye shes chen po gnas/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag sbangs/ /dngos po kun la
khyab pa po/ /lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa 'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rtsa
rnams ni/ sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dzag pa'o/ /de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni/ gtso bo ste/
rkyang ma dang / ro ma dang / kun 'dar ma'o/ /rkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas/ /kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su/ /gzung
dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /rkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste/ /ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing / /shes rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa/ /de ni kun 'dar ma rab grags/ /mi phyed ma
dang / phra gzugs ma dang / rtse ba ma dang / g.yon pa ma dang / thung du ma dang / rus sbal skyes ma dang / sgom pa ma dang / dbang ma dang / skyon ma dang / 'jug ma dang / ma mo dang /
mtshan mo dang / bsil sbyin ma dang / tsha ba ma dang / rkyang ma dang / kun 'dar ma dang / ro ma dang / gzhol ma dang / rengs ma dang / shin tu gzugs can ma dang / spyi ma dang /
rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang / sdug gu ma dang / grub ma dang / 'tshed ma dang / de bzhin du yid bzang ma dang / sum skor ma dang / 'dod ma dang / khyim ma dang / gtum
mo dang / bdud dral ma'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid
gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /yang na thabs ni thams cad kyis/ /dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtag /sdom pa'i dbye ba'ang bshad
par bya ste/ /A li kA li ni/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / shes rab dang / thabs so/ /chos dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa ni/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs so/ /e waM ma ya ni/
e yi rnam pa lha mo spyan/ /wa gyi rnam pa bdag mar brjod/ /ma ni lha mo gos dkar mo/ /ya yi rnam pas sgrol mar brjod/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo la pad+ma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
chos kyi 'khor lo la 'dab ma brgyad dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma bcu drug dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /'khor
lo'i grangs kyi rim pas rnam par bzhag pa/ skad cig ma bzhi ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa bzhi ni/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo/ /de kho na nyid bzhi ni/ bdag gi de kho na dang / sngags kyi de kho na dang / lha'i de kho na dang /
ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do/ /dga' ba bzhi ni/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /sde pa bzhi ni/ gnas brtan pa dang /
thams cad yod par smra ba dang / kun gyi bkur ba dang / dge 'dun phal chen no/ /zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / A li dang / kA li dang / 'pho ba bcu drug dang / dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / thun tshong bzhi ste/ de ltar thams cad bzhi'o/ /lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing //
spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te/ /bsregs pas ri bong can haM 'dzag /rdo rje rigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba
d+har+m+ma NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan+ma twa ta oM AH hUM phaT swAhA/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /bruM aM dzriM khaM hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon no/ /oM de ba pi tsu badzra hUM
hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ kye rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /sngags thams cad kyi rkang pa dang por oM gyi rnam pa dang / mthar ni swAhA dang / hUM phaT kyi rnam pa ni/ nang du gzhug go /oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya
sha swAhA| grong khyer dkrugs pa'i sngags so/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o o/ aM aH/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sa bon no/ /oM trai lokyA k+She pa hUM hUM hUM phaT

swAhA/ phyag gnyis pa'i 'o/ /oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag bzhi pa'i 'o/ /oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag drug pa'i 'o/ /oM AHhUM/ sku dang gsung dang thugs
byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ sa sbyong pa'i sngags so/ /oM hUM swAhA/ rangs par byed pa'i 'o/ /oM aM swAhA/ dbang du byed pa'o/ /oM khaM swAhA/

sgrod par byed pa'i 'o/ /oM dzraM swAhA/ sdang bar byed pa'i 'o/ /oM buM swAhA/ mngon spyod kyi'o/ /oM hUM swAhA/ 'gugs par byed pa'i 'o/ /oM hUM swAhA/ gsod par byed pa'o/ /oM ku ru ku l+le hrIHswAhA/ ku
ru kul+le'i sngags so/ /a phuH'i rnam pas mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan byas la bdud rtsi lngas ni/ blug /me tog nag pos ni/ mchod/ klu 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni/ byug /glang po che'i chang
gis ni| byug /kham phor kha sbyar du ni/ gzhag /ba nag po'i 'o mas ni/ dgang / gzhon nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud pas ni/ dkri/ rlung gi phyogs su rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der gzhag go/
de'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhengs bar bya ste/ dur khrod kyi sol bas ni/ rdul tshon nag po/ skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni/ rdul tshon dkar po/ ldong rus kyis ni/ rdul tshon ser po/ dur khrod
kyi so phag gis ni/ rdul tshon dmar po/ rkun ma'i lo ma dang / skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye ma dag gis ni/ rdul tshon ljang gu ste/ rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so/ /dur khrod kyi
srad pus thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bya ste/ de'i dbus su mtha' yas mnan pa'i kye'i rdo rje zhal brgyad pa/ zhabs bzhi pa/ phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis che ba/

'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par mdzad pa bri'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis nang gi ma rungs pa'i sems kyis dben pa'i gnas su sngags bzla ste/ oM g+hu ru g+hu ru g+ha Du g+ha Du ma sa ma sa g+ha Ta g+ho Ta g+ho Ta ya

g+ho Ta ya/ a nan+ta k+Sho b+ha ka ra ye nA gA d+hi pa ta ye he he ru ru kaM sap+ta pA tA la ga tAn nA gA kaR+Sha ya paR+Sha ya/ gar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHhUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ gal te
char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di ldog la bzla ste/ char 'bab bo/ /gal te mi 'bab na/ de'i tshe mgo ardza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so/ /char dbab pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /sbrin dral ba
bshad de/ dur khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas sngags bzlas shing dral te/ oM AR+ya sh+ma shA na pri yA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o/ /pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig
par bya ba'i phyir kha Ti ka'i sgrub pa bshad de/ kha Ti ka dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / ku ThA ra ts+tshin+na dang lhan cig btags la ril bu bya ste/ sngags ni/ oM badzra karta ri he badzra ya hUM
hUM hUM phaT/ dngos grub kyi don du bye ba bzlas shing sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ de bsgrubs la ril ba spyi blugs kyi mgrin par bskor zhing bskor nas bcad na dgra thams
cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o/ /lha rnams dgas par 'dod pas thig le bsgrub ste/ tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal la bsgrubs nas ku ThA ra ts+tshin+na dang
bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa dang btags shing btags nas dgra sta byas te/ de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzla ste/ oM badzra ku khrA ra pA Ta ya pA Ta ya hUM hUM
hUM phaT swAhA/ bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te gang la phyag byas pa de 'gas so/ /lha dgas pa'i cho ga'o/ /tsha bas gdung bar 'dod pas ar+k+ka'i lo ma la dug dang skye tshe dang tsi tra ka'i khu

bas dgra bo'i ming bri zhing 'bras phub kyi me la gdungs te sngags khri bzla'o/ /oM ha badzra dz+wA ra dz+wA ra sha truM b+h+ruM hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ cho ba'i cho ga'o/ /khri bzlas pas 'grub bo/ /chang skyug par bya bar
'dod pas bsgrub bya'i lte bar yaM gyi rnam pa bsgom zhing maM gyi rnam par gyur pa las chang lto bar rnam par bsgoms te skyug par byed par bltas na chang skyug go /rab tu myos ma dbang du bya
bar 'dod bas mya ngan med pa'i brgyad la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste gos dmar po bgos nas myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing / ka kA ma tsi ka'i khu bas thig le byas nas sngags
bzla ste| oM a mu kaM me hrIH ba sI b+ha ba tu swAhA/ khris 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas sA lu btags pa'i 'gyur ba la zla ba dang nyi ma byas nas rdo rje'i chu la

gzhug cing sngags bzla ste/ oM badzra ar+k+ka mA tse la mA tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha he badzra ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyi ma dang zla ba dag yang dag par gnas shing nyin mtshan bye brag med
bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /oM na grAn grA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dus ma yin pa'i dus su don bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhon nu ma'i mig dag la brgya rtsa
brgyad mngon par bsngags nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod cing snyan gsan dbab bo/ bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad pa'i snga ba'i dus
su bum pa la sogs pa bzhag cing 'bru mar dang a lak+ta'i khu ba la sngags 'di nyid kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags so/ /de nas mngon par bsngags pa'i a lak+ta'i
khu bas bsngags pa'i mthe bong rgan pos bskus nas 'bru mar gyis kyang blugs la gzhon nu ma la bstan te/ nga'i rdzas sus khyer smos/ de la nges smras pa/ che ge mo zhes bya
bas khyer ro/ /rdo rje skar ma'o/ /be Tu yA be Tu yA zhes brjod na glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /mar+m+mA mar+m+mA zhes brjod na stag 'bros par 'gyur ro/ til+li yA til+li yA zhes brjod
na bse 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /i li mi li phuHphuH zhes brjod na sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /nor skyong 'dul ba'i phyag gis lag pa rab tu bstan na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro//
rdo rje ma dang / dkar mo dang / chu ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / bdag med ma dang / sa spyod ma dang / mkha' spyod ma'i rnal 'byor las rengs par byed pa la sogs pa
brtul zhugs can gyis byed do/ /sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas lha'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dang por byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis par snying rje
rnam bsgom zhing / /gsum par dga' pa bsgom pa dang / /kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms so/ /yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste/ /gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu/ /gsum pa la ni gzugs
brnyen rdzogs/ /bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod/ /re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam pa bsgoms nas/ /nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rab dang / /gur bcing ba yang rnam
par sgom pa nyid/ /dang po ra ro ni rnam bsgoms pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod/ /de steng rnal 'byor pa gnas nas/ /he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi snying gar re pha
bsgom| |de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor/ /der ni hUM gi rnam pa nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ni/ kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /rdo rje
lte ba'i dbus gnas par/ /yang ni hUM gi de nyid bsgom/ /hUM gi rnam par gyur bltas nas/ /zhes dang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje skye ba nag po che/ /'dam skyes sngon po 'dra
ba'i mdog /yang na sngo dang nyi ma'i ma dog/ /dad pas nges par rnam par bsgom/ /nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje skye ba snying rje che/ /rgya na rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi/ /
lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod/ /dkar mo ri dwags mtshan ma 'dzin/ /chim rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod/ /ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/ /g+ha sma ri ni sman 'dzin cing / /puk+ka si
ni rdo rje'i lag /de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin/ /gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdung / /'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas//
g.yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid/ /A li zla ba kA li nyi/ /sa bon nang du son gyur pa/ /de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /nam mkha'i
dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi/ /rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro/ /bsdus nas snying gar dgug pa na/ /yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sngo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog/ ban+d+hu
dmar po'i spyan dang ldan/ /skra ser gyen du 'khyil ba dang / /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo rna cha nor bu dang / /lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam
dag pa| |'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi tshul/ /g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang / /g.yon pa nas kyang kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid/ /hUM gi
yi ge 'don pa'i bdag /rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas/ /dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rigs pa 'dis/ /dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod/ /phyag
bzhi ni/ bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba rnam par dag ba ste/ gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang / sku mdog dang / hUM las byung ba'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa
lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba/ de bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje/ phyag lhag ma dag gis shes rab la 'khyud pa/ shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
gzugs can no/ /phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa/ g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu dang po sngon po/ /gcer bu gong du brjod pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can/ phyag rnams
ni| pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa na dril bu/ phyag g.yas kyi gnyis
pa na gri gug /phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la snyoms par 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar shes rab ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na gri gug dang thod pa/
khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o/ /lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rang gi snying gar sa bon
bsam mo/ /sa bon las ni/ 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la ma mo
brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /oM a b+hi ShIny+tsan+tu mAM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa lngas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba na me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur
ro| |rnga'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gur gum gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i glu spyan la sogs pa
rnams kyis blang bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni/ he ru ka rdzogs pa nyid do/ /thun gsum du byin gyis brlab pa'i sgom
pa rnam par bsgoms nas langs te lha'i gzugs su gzhag go /dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /ngo bos gzugs
med mthong ba po/ /sgra med thos pa po yang med/ /dri med snom pa po yang med/ /ro med myong ba po yang med/ /reg med reg pa po yang med/ /sems med sems las byung ba'ang
med| |skyed byed ma dang sring mo nyid/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /gar ma tshos ma rdo rje ma/ /gdol ma de bzhin bram ze mo/ /thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/ /de nyid
rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsten pa nyid/ /ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun dang / /sa spyod me yis sdug bsngal byed/ /rigs
lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ /thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje 'dis ni gdab pa nyid/ /des na phyag rgyar brjod par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma de bzhin las/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rin
chen nyid/ /snying rje chen po dam pa yi/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru brjod/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya g.yung mo nyid/ /de bzhin pad+ma'i gar ma nyid/ /las ni tshogs mar rab tu bshad/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bram ze mo/ /rin chen gdol mar shes par bya/ /phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par nges/ /'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par
bya| |dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing / /de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid/ /'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par bya/ /rigs ni
rnam pa drug brjod cing / /mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang / /phung po lnga
yi rang bzhin gyis/ /rigs dang bgrang bya 'di yis ni/ /rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya/ /bsgom pa po med sgom pa'ang med/ /lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin/ /spros pa med pa'i
rang bzhin las/ /sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas/ /rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang / /rin chen dpag med sems dpa' po/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang / /thams cad sangs
rgyas de nyid brjod/ /tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid/ /'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya/ /rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid/ /thams cad kun gyi bdag
nyid gnas/ /dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de/ /bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas/ /gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid/ /lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'di la b+ha
ga mnga'/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya/ /b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod/ /dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun/ /yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud/ /bcom phyir bcom
ldan 'das zhes bya/ /gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa yi/ /shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya/ /gang phyi skal pa ston pa yi/ /shes rab sring mo zhes bya nyid/ /btso blag ma dang bu mo dang //
gar mkhan ma zhes brjod par bya/ /sems can thams cad 'tshed pa'i phyir/ /btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod/ /yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab ni/ /bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya/ /
snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyir/ /shes rab gar mar brjod par bya/ /gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa/ /de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya/ /A li kA li rab brtags pas/ /
brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad/ /rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /nyed phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/ /lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgya yin/ /sor mo nyed pa'ang de
bzhin no/ /gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni/ /gang bsam de ni bsam gtan no/ /ji ltar pha las bde thob pa/ /de yi bde ba rang gis bza'/ /bde ba gang gis 'chi
ba 'di| |de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod/ /de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid/ /gang gis dngos
grub mthar 'gro ba/ /kye yi rdo rje dngos grub rgyus/ /sgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa/ /rna ba dag la rna cha bzang / /spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin/ /lag pa dag la lag gdub nyid/
rked pa la yang ska rags nyid/ /rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub bo/ /lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid/ /mgrin par rus pa'i phreng ba ste/ /bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid/ /bza' ba mi
'chi bcu phyed de/ /he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste/ /kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas/ /rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa/ /rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag /kha dog du ma nyid kyis ni/ /
gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya/ /shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang / /yang na dben pa'am bas mtha' ru/ /sgom pa bzang por brjod par bya/ /cung
zad drod ni thob pa na/ /gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pas/ /gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na/ /'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid/ /shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma/ /rang gis
dbang bskur snying rje can/ /rdo rje'i bu mo 'di khyer nas/ /spyod par bya bar rtogs par bya/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med na/ /rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis bya/ /yang
na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba/ /byang chub sa bon gdab pa dang / /sbyang ba yis ni gzung bar bya/ /gal te dga' bas glu blang ste/ /de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no/ /gal te dga' ba skyes pa
na| |thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste/ /de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar/ /yo gis mnyam par bzhag pas byed/ /'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa/ /rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med//
mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen bdag /lag gdub rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /ska rags la ni don yod gnas/ /kha T+wAM ga gzugs shes rab ste/ /thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang
te'u nyid/ /zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa/ /glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas/ /gar ni sgom pa byas pa nyid/ /de yi phyir na glu dang gar/ /yo gis rtag tu rtag tu bya/ /sman ni
rnam par bza' ba ste/ /chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid/ /rga shis zil gyis mi gnon cing / /rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rkun ma'i skra las cod phan byas/ /de la hUM byung
sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi yod pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin/ /thod pa sor lnga pa yi tshad/ /byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed/ /thabs dang shes
rab rang bzhin las/ /sgra yi sga rags nyid bskor nyid/ /thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin/ /cang te'u sgra ni bzlas pa ste/ /kha T+wAM ga sgom shes
rab nyid| |rdo rje thod pa'i spyod pa yis/ /'di dag bzlas bzlas dang sgom pa yin/ /brkam dang rmongs dang 'jigs dang khro/ /ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spang / /bdag nyid kyi ni gnyid spangs
nas| |the tshom med par spyod par bya/ /lus kyis sbyin pa byin nas ni/ /phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad/ /skal dang skal min rnam spyad pas/ /de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya/ /bza' bca'
bzhin btung ba nyid/ /ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'/ /yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir/ /zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o/ /bza' dang bza' min spyod pa dang / /de bzhin btung dang btung min
nyid| |bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis/ /rnam rtog nyid du mi bya 'o/ /dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang / /yang dag ye shes snang ba po/ /mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir/ /grub pa
bla ma mngon phyag btsal/ /bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol/ /de bzhin ngo tsha'i 'bras bu nyid/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi/ /yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje che/ /sbyin sreg mchog
sbyin dka' thub 'das/ /sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs/ /dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol/ /rnal 'byor ldan par spyod pa byed/ /nges par sngon du lha min gang / /brgya byin
lta bu yin na yang / /de la 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /seng+ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya/ /rnal
'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa/ /gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med/ /spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas ts+tsho ma'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gang gis spun dang sring
mor yang / /the tshom med par shes par bya/ /gang zhig sor mo gcig ston dang / /gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin/ /g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs pa las/ /snyun gyi phyag rgyar rnam
par shes/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa la/ /de yi mthe'u chung rnam par sbyin/ /gang zhig gung mo ston pa la/ /de yi mdzub mo rnam par sbyin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa la/ /de yi
mgrin pa rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig gos ni ston pa la/ /de yi rtse gsum rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig nu ma ston pa la/ /de yi mtshams ni rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ /de
yi kha ni rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la/ /gtsug phud dgrol bar brjod par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la/ /de yi rgyab ni rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig rkang mthil
ston pa la/ /lto yis rnam par rtse bar bya/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni/ /dam tshig gis ni rnam par dbye/ /de la rnal 'byor mas smras pas/ /e ma bu ni snying rje che/ /gal te
phreng ba'i lag ston na/ /'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin/ /phreng ba mngon par gtad byas na/ /dam tshig la gnas brtul zhugs bzang / /de la phyi rol zhes 'du ba/ /bzang po'i spyod yul
la gnas pa/ /de la 'du bar rnal 'byor mas/ /gang smras de ltar thams cad bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ 'du ba'i gnas du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang nye ba'i zhing nyid dang / /ts+tshan+do nye ba'i ts+tshan+do dang / /de bzhin 'du ba nye 'du ba/ /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur
khrod nyid/ /'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid/ /'dis ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas ni dzA lan+d+ha rar bshad/ /de bzhin du ni u Di nyid/ /gnas ni ko lA gi rI nyid/ /de bzhin du ni kAM rU nyid/ /nye gnas mA la wa zhes

brjod| |sin+d+hu nA ga ra nyid do/ /zhing ni mu m+mu nir bshad de/ /zhing ni byed pa'i brang nyid do/ /de wi ko Ti de bzhin zhing / /zhing ni lcags pa'i brang nyid do/ /nye zhing ku la ta zhes brjod/ /de bzhin

arbu ta nyid dang / /ba yi mchog sbyin kha ba'i ri/ /nye ba'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /ts+tshan+do ha ri ke la dang / /lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang skyes dang / /laM pa kA dang kAny+tsi nyid/ /de bzhin
so so raSh+Ta nyid/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan+do ka ling+ka/ /gser dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni/ /kong+ka Na yang nye ts+tshan+dor/ /mdor bsdus pa ni brjod par bya/ /'thung gcod grong
khyer gyi dang yang / /'thung gcod grong gi mthar gnas pa/ /tsa ri tra ta ko sa la/ /bin+d+ha gzhon nu'i grong khyer ro/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /nye ba'i 'thung gcod de nye ba'o/ /dur
khrod rab gson dge 'dun dang / /dur khrod rgya mtsho'i 'gram nyid do/ /skyed tshal ra ba rdzing bu'i 'gram/ /nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//
rnal 'byor ma rgyud kyai rdo rje/ /rnal 'byor ma yi legs 'du ba/ /nyin bar nyid kyang rab bshad bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ nyi ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ yi dwags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang / /de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid/ /lan bdun pa'ang bza' bar bya/ /'bang pas snying rje bskyed
pa yis/ /gsad par bya bar brjod pa nying / /snying rje med na mi 'grub pas/ /de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid/ /thams cad bdug par gzhug pa ste/ /cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par
bya| |de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid/ /nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya/ /mi bya cung zad yod ma yin/ /rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin/ /'di la mi
bsam yod ma yin/ /bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med/ /ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan/ /de bzhin bdag nyid nga mchog nyid/ /'di ltar sems pa'i rnal 'byor bdag /bza' dang
btung ba la sogs spyad/ /yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang / /tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid/ /he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas/ /de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya yin/ /shrI ni gnyis
med ye shes te/ /he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid/ /ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid/ /ka ni gang du 'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi/ /sha ni
mkhas pas bza' bar bya/ /sems can de de dbang du 'gyur/ /brda dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad
bar bya'o/ /nam mkha'i khams su b+ha ga bsam/ /dbus su rnam par bsgom pa ni/ /'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/ /'khor lo sa dang chu ni
sngo| |ji ltar rigs par byin za dang / /lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang / /ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'ang / /chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo nyid/ /'phar ma gnyis dag skyon
med pa| |ze 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te/ /gru gsum gyis ni phyi mar brjod/ /de dbus shi ba bco lnga yi/ /gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam/ /de yi steng du zla ba yin/ /zla ba'i
steng du sa bon nyid/ /phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan/ /gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po/ /A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas/ /kA li'i gzugs kyis
snang byed do/ /zla ba nyi ma 'dus pa las/ /dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags/ /zla ba me long ye shes ldan/ /bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan/ /rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /
so sor rtog par brjod par bya/ /thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid/ /rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa yis/ /rnam pa lnga po sgom pa nyid/ /
A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan/ /yi ge las byung gong bu la/ /hUM phaT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya/ /sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i//
dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom/ /phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin/ /zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /'di ltar thams cad rdzogs
pa nyid| |zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas/ /A li shes rab kA li thabs/ /'di las dkar mo la sogs pa/ /kha dog dbye bas so so yin/ /re zhig nang gi 'phar ma la/ /rnal 'byor ma
lnga nges gnas pa/ /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar/ /chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /lus ngan rdo rje
mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /phyi rol gyi ni 'phar ma la/ /dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI/ /ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo/ /brgyad pa
Dom+b+hi ni ru brjod/ /'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid/ /mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /snying rje chen po 'di dag gnas/ /lha mo thams cad kha
dog nag /drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /zhal gcig spyan ni dmar ba dang / /lag par gri gug thod pas khyab/ /'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang / /lag par lag gdub
ska rags ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas/ /'di lnga phyag rgya dag pa 'o/ /ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad/ /lag pa gcig ni thod pas
brel| |g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin/ /g.yon pas kha T+wAM ga nyid do/ /stag gi pags pas rnam dkris shing / /ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar/ /phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyes
ser| |nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams/ /gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi /mgo bo pad+ma'i snod du ni/ /bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag /dngos
grub phyir ni btung par bya/ /stong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wAM ga /thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag /'dis ni 'khor lo rnams bsgoms na/ /dngos grub myur du thong par 'gyur/ /dang
por nag po rab tu bsgom/ /gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom/ /gsum pa la ni ser po bsgom/ /bzhi par ljang gu de bzhin no/ /lnga par kha dog
sngon po dang / /drug par dkar po'i lus can te/ /yan lag drug sgom rnal 'byor pas/ /dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni/ /rdzogs pa yi
yang rim pa nyid/ /rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do/ /bskyed pa yi ni cha bshad do/ /nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma la/ /b+ha ga zhes bya ye shes
brjod| |sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid/ /de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod/ /sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid/ /rim pa ji bzhin rang rig nyid/ /lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems/ /ji
ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis/ /re zhig btsun mo shes rab yin/ /skyes bu thabs su brjod pa nyid/ /kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las/ /phyi nas
de yi rnam pa gnyis/ /re zhig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis/ /de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid/ /skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang / /de yi khu ba bde ba nyid/ /de nyid phyir na dga' ba
nyid| |bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yis/ /skyes med rim pa'i phyogs las ni/ /'di ltar lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi/ /dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid/ /mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma//
shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges/ /de bde'i thabs las thams cad rig /dga' ba bde ba cung zad de/ /mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag /dga' bral dga' pas chags bral
yin| |lhag ma lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ /dang po leg par 'dod pa dang / /gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa dang / /gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid/ /des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya/ /
mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod/ /dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das/ /dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de/ /'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /
dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di las thabs dang shes rab med/ /yang dag de nyid snang ba 'o/ /gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes/ /gang du yang ni mi rnyed de/ /bla ma'i
dus thabs bsten pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams las shes bya/ /dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang / /gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams kyang / /ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms
pa yis| |'di kun mnyam pa nyid du blta/ /dman pa rnams ni phra ba'i don/ /mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya/ /dbu ma gnyis kyis spangs pa nyid/ /gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po
drug /gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g.yo/ /'di kun zhes bya ba nyid de/ /mnyam nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid/ /ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa ni/ /mnyam zhes bya ba mtshungs par
brjod| |de yi 'khor lo ro zhes brjod/ /sgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid/ /'dis ni don gyis brjod par bya/ /nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'byung / /nga las
gnas gsum po yang 'byung / /nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong / /de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes na/ /shin tu mnyam bzhag gang goms pa/ /bsod
nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang / /de ni 'grub par the tshom med/ /bza' dang btung dang blugs pa dang / /nyal dang log dang sems pa na/ /phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas/ /de nas
mngon du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir yid kyis mi sgom par/ /'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya/ /thams cad chos ni yongs shes na/ /sgom pa nyid ni sgom pa min/ /brtan dang g.yo
ba'i dngos po gang / /rtswa lcug 'khri shing la sogs pa/ /bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las/ /dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya/ /de rnams dam pa gcig yod min/ /rang rig bad ba
chen po nyid/ /rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur/ /rang rig phyir na sgom pa nyid/ /rang gi rig pa'i 'gyur ba las/ /mnan pa las ni las skyes te/ /rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis byed/ /
rang rig rgyal po rang gtso bo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog dang / /de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid/ /de kun gnas ni nyams dga' bar/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /chos
'byung las skyes ye shes ni/ /mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /'jig rten gsum po de las skyes/ /khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan yin
de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod/ /gcig dang du ma bral ba ste/ /skad cig gcig las mchog dga' ba/ /rang gi rig pa'i ye shes 'di/ /ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul te/ /'di ni byin rlabs
rim pa'i phyir/ /kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni/ /me dang nam mkha' nyid dag ni/ /rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis/ /kun gyis skad cig mi gnod de/ /mtho ris mi
yul rkang 'og gi /skad cig las ni gzugs gcig 'gyur/ /rang gzhan cha yis rnam rtog gis/ /gnod pa nyid ni nus pa min/ /thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang / /de bzhin las
rgyas la sogs pas/ /srid pa dag pa'i dngos grub min/ /yang ni srid mthar skye bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /de med pas kyang dngos grub med/ /gang gis mi shes kyai'i
rdo rje| |de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'bab dang / /mar me'i rtse mo rab bcings ltar/ /rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ /nyin dang mtshan du mnyam par gzhag /rnal
'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'du ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nges par dngos po thams cad kyi/ /dag pa de
bzhin nyid du brjod/ /phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis/ /lha rnams kyi ni brjod par bya/ /phung po lnga dang dbang po drug /skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga/ /rang bzhin
gyis ni rnam par dag /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib byang bya/ /rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid/ /dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min/ /yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir/ /rang
gis rig pa'i bde chen mchog /gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba/ /dngos po de kun dag pa ste/ /'di ltar 'gro ba sangs
rgyas 'gyur/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ /rnam par ma dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o/ /ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung
ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya/ /sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya/ /dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya/ /lce yis ro ni myong bar bya/ /dngos po lus kyis reg par bya/ /yid kyis bde
sogs thob pa ni/ /dag pas dug med byas nas ni/ /bsten bya 'di dag bsten pa nyid/ /gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te/ /tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod/ /'du shes chu
yi rnal 'byor ma/ /'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so/ /rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas
'grub 'gyur/ /nang gi 'phar ma'o/ /de nas phyi yi 'phar ma bshad/ /dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI/ /mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma/ /bden bral gdol pa mo gzhag cing / /rlung du g.yung mo rnam
par gzhag /phyi ma lha mo dkar mo sogs/ /dbang dkar gshin rjer chom rkun ma/ /chu bdag phyogs su ro langs ma/ /lus ngan por ni g+hasma rI/ /'og tu sa spyod ma zhes brjod/ /steng du
mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas/ /gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad/ /sgra la
chom rkun ma rab grags/ /dri yi cha la ro langs ma/ /ro la g+hasma rI rab grags/ /reg la sa spyod ma zhes bshad/ /chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma/ /rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas/ /de
nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur/ /phyag gi dag pa stong pa nyid/ /bdud dag pa las zhabs rnams nyid/ /rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal rnams nyid/ /rdo rje gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan/ /
sa ni puk+ka sI zhes bshad/ /chu khams rngon pa ma zhes brjod/ /me ni gtum mor shes par bya/ /rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags/ /zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rje ma/ /'dod chags chu yi rnal
'byor ma/ /phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser sna gsang ba'i dkar mo nyid/ /gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad/ /zhe sdang la sogs rnam sbyong ba/ /bskyed pa'i
rim pa'i phyogs la ni/ /'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya/ /gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba/ /de dang des ni 'ching ba las grol te/ /de nyid mi shes 'jig rten mi grol
zhing / /de nyid rnam spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med/ /ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med/ /reg med chos med thams cad rnam par
dag /rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes/ /rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad/ /
gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/ /cho ga'ang rab tu bshad par bya/ /dang po lha yi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang / /'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can/ /byas te phyi
nas dkyil 'khor bri/ /tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang / /dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs/ /rdul
mtshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni/ /yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te/ /rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am/ /yang na 'bras la sogs pas so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum dang / /mthe bong gsum
ni lhag par bya/ /der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i/ /rigs ma bzang mo rnam par gzhug /yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de/ /de ltar bcu drug lon pa nyid/ /ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa/ /de srid phyag rgya
bsten par bya/ /phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang / /thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no/ /bsten pa de las gang byung ba/ /slob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya/ /ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul
nyid| |de nyid la yang bya bar bya/ /rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /rang bzhin yang dag rig pa spangs/ /mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/
thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres/ /de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid/ /de nyid 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de/ /de nyid thams
cad khyab pa po/ /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /dngos dang dngos med de las byung / /gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams dang / /rnam par shes pa kun gyi tshul/ /skyes bu sngon rabs
dbang phyug dang / /bdag dang gso ba sems can dang / /dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ /dang po dga' ba tsam
nyid de| |gnyis pa'i grangs las mchog dga' nyid/ /gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ni/ /rdo rje snying po la sogs
kun| |mkhas pas de skad nges thos nas/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni/ /brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /de bzhin
mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid/ /dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid/ /gsum pa lhan cig skyes pa med/ /bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa//
rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir/ /the tshom legs par sel ba ni/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi
phyir| |lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod/ /yang na de nyid thams cad bdag /yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs/ /de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon/ /dga' ba gsum po rnam par
spangs| |dang po sprin dang 'dra ba yin/ /grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur/ /gnyid log sad par mi byed par/ /nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las/ /rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur//
dngos grub mtshan nyid mi phyed pa'i/ /phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub/ /ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs/ /gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid/ /sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen
po ste| |do shal do shal phyed pas brgyan/ /phreng ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /rdo rje srad bu mnyam par ldan/ /me tog sna tshogs nye bar brgyan//
bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri/ /bum pa brgyad la sogs pa ldan/ /de yang yal ga la sogs brgyan/ /mgrin pa gos kyis dgab pa dang / /rin chen lnga ni yongs su gzhug /rnam par
rgyal ba shar du sbyin/ /rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni/ /gsar ba legs par bkal ba dang / /shin tu tshad ma mdzes pa yi/ /srad bus shes rab can gyis gdab/ /'khor lo'i
bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum/ /dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri/ /gong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis/ /mkhas pas nor 'dzin rnam par sbyang / /gong gi A sogs sngags kyis
ni| |de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin/ /ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir/ /srung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid/ /gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor cho gas sbyin/ /mchod
dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid/ /ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir/ /'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam bris nas/ /myur du dkar mo la sogs bri/ /shar du gri gug rnam par bri/ /lho dang nub
tu'ang de bzhin no/ /byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni/ /bden bral rlung du 'ang de bzhin no/ /dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa/ /de lta de ltar 'og dang steng / /rdo rje sems dpa'i snyems
byas nas/ /rkang pa g.yas pa brkyangs byas te/ /phyag gnyis kye rdo rjer sbyor bas/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis
rnam par brgyan/ /hUM hUM snyems pa byas nas ni/ /hi hi rnam par 'jig byed dag /phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad/ /rnam dag ye shes gzugs can dang / /'khor
ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /khyad par cung zad yod ma yin/ /mchog dgar sgom pa med cing sgom pa po yang med/ /lus kyang med cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin pa'ang med/ /sha dang
khrag kyang med cing bshad dang gci ba'ang med/ /skyug bro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir thogs med dang / /chags med sdang ba med dang rmongs med phrag dog med/ /ser sna med
dang nga rgyal med cing mthong bya med/ /sgom dang sgom pa po med bshes dang dgra med cing / /rlom sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa sna tshogs nyid/ /rdo rje snying pos 'di skad gsol//
gzod nas rang bzhin med pa yi/ /lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni/ /ci slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mkha' 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs//
rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag/ thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /kye bcom ldan 'das/ /ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i phung po lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ po la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni/ /sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur/ /byang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las/ /chu yi khams ni 'byung bar 'gyur//
bskyod pa las ni drod skye ste/ /'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags/ /bde ba nam mkha' nyid kyi khams/ /lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba/ /de phyir bde ba de
nyid min| |lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa/ /lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod/ /rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig /phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las
yo gi snying rje thabs su 'gyur/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod/ /sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med dang sbyin sreg med/ /dkyil 'khor can yang me
cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med/ /de ni sngags bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg /de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /mdor bsdus nas ni sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs
can no| |dbang gi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu pa'o// //mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba can/ /rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod/ /dbang gi lta stangs g.yon na gnas/ /g.yon pa nas
ni gzugs brnyan gnyis/ /g.yas pa'i cha la dgug pa nyid/ /steng nas kyang ni gzugs brnyan gnyis/ /dbu ma rengs pa'i lta stangs nyid/ /sna yi rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis/ /'byung
ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed/ /rdub pa yis ni dbang du byed/ /dgang ba yis ni dgug pa nyid/ /zhi ba yis ni rengs par byed/ /rlom pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid/ /dbang ni me tog rab tu grags
rdo rje'i shing la dgug pa nyid/ /g.yo bcas rtsa la rengs byed nyid/ /zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /'di la 'khrul bar
mi bya ste| |sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni/ /mkhas pas sems can gzhug par bya/ /gsad par 'di la bya ma yin/ /dam tshig nges
par nyams par 'gyur/ /sems can slu ba spangs nas ni/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad bya/ /sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de la dam tshig
bza' bya ba/ /na dang ga ha dang po dang / /mtha' yi shwa dang dang bo'i shA/ /kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub phyir/ /bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'/ /kye yi rdo rjes gsungs mtshan nyid/ /skye
ba bdun pa'ang de nas mtshon/ /dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa/ /lan bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang / /dri lus gzi brjid chen po dang / /de yi
grib ma bdun du 'gyur/ /mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon/ /de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /skad cig la ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ /ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste/ gong
du brtag pa bcu gnyis par/ /rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu/ /hrIH las byung ba'i lha mo ni/ /kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma/ /ut+pa la dang
lcags kyu 'dzin/ /'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/ /'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams/ /khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid/ /bye bas phyugs dang
gnod sbyin sogs/ /'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid/ /brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa
las/ rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so// //rdo rje'i snying ngos gsol/ bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
snga nas bod kyi lo ts+tsha bad ge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhas te gtan la phab ba/rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya DA ki nI badzra pany+dza ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza kalpa nA ma/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' bem bcas dang ba dang / /go skabs med
dang 'byed pa dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi gnas khang / /sems can khams dang yid 'ong dang / /sems can snod dang 'jig rten dang / /sa dang sa 'og par snang dang / /yid dang
lus dang ngag dang ni/ /gcig dang gnyis dang mkha' bde dang / /drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang / /bzhi dang skye 'gro rnams dang ni/ /gcig gis nyi shur ma tshang dang / /khams
gsum ma lus pa dang ni/ /pha dang bu dang ma mo dang / /phyi rol dang ni nang dang 'am/ /btsun mo kun dang chos dang ni/ /thams cad las dang bdag med dang / /'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba
zhes| |bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje dang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang / /chos kyi dbyings dang ma byung dang / /nam mkha'i khams dang rang dbyings dang / /bdag med pa dang
bdag ces dang / /dngos po med dang dngos med min/ /bde ba can dang gru gsum dang / /a skyes dang ni skyon bral dang / /rdul bral dang ni sdig bcom dang / /dba' rlabs med
pa'i rang bzhin dang / /mthar ni zhi ba'i bde rig dang / /gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa la/ /sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan
'das| |lha yi bdag po gcig pu nyid/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje/ /las ni dkyil 'khor lnga gsungs pa/ /rdo rje can dang phan pa dang //
de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid nyid/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / /rta bdun rgyal po lnga ba'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dkar mo rkun ma ro langs ma/ /g+ha sma rI dang puk+ka sI/ /ri
khrod gdol pa g.yung mo 'o/ /rdo rje phan pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /skam pa zhags pa nyi ma dang / /do la zlum dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ /me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor du/ /nyi lag ma dang mar me ma/ /rin chen sgrol ma glog lag ma/ /lA s+ye la sogs mtshams char ro/ /pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrog dang / /'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor
du| |gling bu ma sogs mtshams kyi char/ /bdag nyid cha byad sbyor bas so/ /rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sgo lcags lde kyog ma/ /sgo ma dang ni gos 'dzin ma/ /de bzhin
mtshams su spyan la sogs/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de rnams kun/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas/ /snying gar g.yon bcangs sdigs mdzub ste/ /kha dog sna tshogs che 'bar
ba'o/ /shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdang che/ /gau rI la sogs rab tu grags/ /shin tu gti mug rmongs chen las| /skam pa ma sogs cher gzung ngo / /shin tu gzi
brjid cher gsal ba/ /nyi ma la sogs rab tu grags/ /shin tu 'dod chags chen po las/ /pad sogs chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /phrag dog chen po sgrib chen las/ /sgo lcags
ma sogs myur 'gro bdag /rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni/ /gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrog/ /rta mgrin 'dod pa
chen po ni/ /'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster/ /rdo rje mgyogs 'gro phrag dog che/ /theg pa gzhan ni rnam bar spangs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mi bskyod ye shes
'byung ba'i gnas/ /skye 'gro mi zad mgron gnyer phyir/ /sgrib pa lnga ni 'joms pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /zhe sdang
gti mug nga rgyal dang / /'dod chags ser sna skye bo rnams/ /bsdu phyir rang gi 'khor lo la/ /rdo rje gzugs ni du ma 'dzin/ /shin tu gdug pa drag po la/ /zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar
te| |'di mkhyen rdo rje can chen ni/ /rang gis kye yi rdo rjer 'gyur/ /shin tu stong par zhen rnams kyi/ /yod min brtul zhugs 'dzin rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas gti mug sbyong
don du| |rdo rje rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /shin tu nga rgyal gdug rnams kyi/ /skye 'gro'i nga rgyal zad par mdzad/ /rdo rje nyi ma bdag nyid rgyal/ /nga rgyal chen po'i mun pa 'joms/ /
byang chub chags bral las skyes spangs/ /sems can gang zhig bde byed pa/ /chags pas byang chub rab grub phyir/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gnas
shing / /gang zhig lam gzhan nas 'gro ba/ /de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir/ /rdo rje mgyogs 'gro rang gtso bo/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid/ /de dang de yi ngo bor 'gro/ /mchog
tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /gang dang gang gis dngos po yis/ /skyes pa rnams kyis yid sbyor la/ /des na de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /sna tshogs
gzugs nor ji bzhin no/ /gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yi/ /sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste/ /de dang de yi rnam pa yis/ /chos kyi bshad pa bya ba 'o/ /sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i//
sems can sna tshogs rang bzhin can/ /sems ni rang gi rnam rtog gis/ /skye bo'i dri mas nag por byas/ /de bas kun tu rab 'bad pas/ /sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyang / /sems dag
pa ni bde ba yin/ /nyon mongs dug ni thams cad 'phrog/ gal te stong pa thabs yin na/ /de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ /'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir/ /thabs ni stong pa nyid
ma yin| |lta ba rnams las log rnams dang / /bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi/ /bdag zhen bsam pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /stong pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /
de phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes/ /thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste/ /sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur/ /ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan//
gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan/ /de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub bya dang / /de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no/ /thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog tu zhi ba sems can 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang
po'o|| ||de nas rdo rje khams gsum thob/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rdo rje gur/ /dam tshig mchod pa yid 'ong ba/ /'khor la rab tu bka' stsal pa/ /glu ni rdo rje can la dbul//
gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la dbul/ /hi rA mchog la de bzhin dri/ /'jig rten rje la bza' dang btung / /gos kyis mchod pa rta mchog la/ /'di rnams dam tshig dam pa ste//
rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yi/ /rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed/ /a ga ru nag kye rdo rje/ /phan pa la ni tsan+dan dkar/ /dmar po 'jig rten rje la dbul/ /kha che rdo rje snang ba la/ /bdun
gyi rgyal po thams cad de/ /hUM rdo rje las byung ba'i dri/ /'di rnams dri yi rab sbyor bas/ /dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/ /tsha ba kha ba rdo rjer dbul/ /mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa la/ /skyar

ba rdo rje nyi ma la/ /de bzhin lan tshwa 'jig rten rjer/ /rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam/ /bska pa rab tu brtag par bya/ /kye yi rdo rje rdor can gyis/ /me tog mdog nag rkang 'thung byung / /mal+li kA
dang ma la ti/ /kun da rtag tu sangs rgyas dbul/ /shing gi dbang mchog dri med mdog/ /snang byed la ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang mdog dmar po chu skyes dang / /ban+d+hu dmar po pa ta lar//
pad+ma gar gyi dbang la 'bul/ /rta mchog rdo rje can la kun/ /rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa/ /snang byed la ni khru lnga nyid/ /pad+ma gar dbang drug pa
ste| |lcags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdun/ /bza' ba rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /lam du lcags kyu mchog gi dang / /gnyid la sangs rgyas mgon po yi/ /shin tu bde la gar dbang gi/ /glu gar de
bzhin rol mo'i sgra/ /sa gzhi yongs bzung dus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas su/ /bdag gi rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub/ /rdo rje'i dbang po sngon po ste/ /zla ba chu shel thub chen
gyi| |mkhar phyin skyes pa'i me tog dmar/ /pad+ma dmar po spyan ras gzigs/ /rta yi yang margad ta ste/ /rin chen lnga yi rdul tshon mchog /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen
po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur 'byung po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so/ /dam tshig yang dag rab phye ba/ /kun tu bzang po'i sa bon bdag/ dbang po sngon po lta bu'i 'od/ /
phyag bzhi 'jigs byed chen po ste/ /mdzes pa'i khro bo yi ni lus/ /dbang ldan 'byung bo mnan pa ste/ /g.yas pas rigs kyi bdag po nyid/ /lag pa g.yon
pas mi lpags nyid/ /gnyis po dag gis phyag rgyar sbyor/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang bas yang dag gnas/ /cung zad mche bas 'jigs par byed/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba'i rgyan mchog ste//
mgo 'dzings phyed du bcings par ni/ /ri yi rtse mor bsgom par bya/ /'byung po 'dul bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin du ma 'byung po dang / /gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo dang / /mi mo

lha yi mdzes ma ni/ /sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub/ /sngags ni/ /oM b+hU ta Da ma ra b+hU tA pa ti ak+Sho b+h+ya ki ri TI na sarba b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsa sI d+ha ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje
can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur stobs po che'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so/ /char chen rab tu dbab bya ste/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam/ /der ni klu brgyad dgod par bya/ /
stobs po che ra ni rab sbyor bas/ /de rnams rnga ma yang dag mnan/ /char med stobs po che las ni/ /chu yi tshigs ni dbab par bya/ /kha dog nag cing cher gsal ba/ /'jigs
pa lang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste/ /skar nyi rdo rje gdan mdzad pa/ /phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag bsnams/ /phuH zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas shing //
hUM dag nang du chud byas te/ /phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar bar bya/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /gnyis pa zla 'od bzang po nyid/ /gsum pa ser po'i mdog lta bu/ /bzhi pa dmar po nyid du brjod/ /
sprul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag brgyan/ /rdo rje sems dpas rnam par brgyan/ /klu rnams kyis ni char dbab phyir/ /stobs po che ni rab bsgrub bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin ba rdo rje gur smra ba pos sangs rgyas kyi de kho na dbye bar bya'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma'o byas dang / /ri dwags brgyan pa zos pa dang / /rdo rje chu 'thung nor ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas
de nyid 'di rig pa/ /dag pa'i gnas ni gnas chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang ba/ /rdo rje rin chen kun khyab pa/ /gang gyur nga yis bshad par bya/ /phan pa'i grong khyer yid 'ong
bar| |mkha' 'gro rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /zhen ba chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /lcags sgrog rdo rjes bcing bar bya/ /dga' ldan du ni ldeg par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thob/ /
rgyal ba mgon po byams pa ni/ /ye shes spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas/ /rgyal bo'i tshogs rnams bcing par bya/ /gang zhig dngos grub mi ster na/ /sgrog
gis bcings nas dgug par bya/ /rdo rje kyo ba dkar mo che/ /rdo rje zhags ma chom rkun ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog ro langs ma/ /rdo rje dril bu g+hasma rI/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang du byed/ /bzlas
dang sgom pa mngon dga' ba'i/ /dngos grub gal te mi ster na/ /de tshe mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni drag shul sgrub/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal po
mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dkyil 'khor 'bum/ /rdo rje can gyi de bzhin 'bum/ /'bum
gyis rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /'bum gyis rdo rje chos kyi 'o/ /'bum phrag phyed kyis rdo rje ste/ /'byung po 'dul ba stong phrag lngas/ /lnga yis las ni rab rgyas pa/ /lnga yis sangs rgyas gar mkhan
nyid| |stong phrag gsum cu dag gis ni/ /ku ru kul+le brtag pa'o/ /lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni/ /cho ga'i rim pa rgyud kun gyi'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro kye'i rdo rje'i/ /'bum phrag lnga ni
bris pa 'o| |de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa blo dang ldan pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur sangs rgyas kyi gar gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so/ /gar dang glu la rab zhen pa'i/ /sems can rnams
ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rdo rje yis/ /'dod chags can gyis byang chub bsgrub/ /de nas rdo rje can 'byung ste/ /me tog
snyim pas rab sbyor bas/ /sems can kun la phan ldan pa'i/ /dam tshi ga der ni bshad par bya/ /sems can ji snyed pa rnams sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las
skyes pa'am/ mngal las skyes pa'am/ /drod gsher las skyes pa'am/ rdzus te skyes pa'am/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs med rnams sam/ 'du
shes med pa can nyid rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa rnams sam/ sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la dgod par bya'o/ /dam tshig che
bshad de nas ni/ /zur mig mi g.yo mgon byung ste/ /mi bskyong ye shes brnyes ldan pa'i/ /ston pa la ni rnam par smod/ /ci khyod dam tshig hUM zhes bya/ /thub pa chen po gzhu can yin//
nga ming snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan/ /bdag stobs bcom pa min nam ci/ /ci khyod dam tshig oM zhes bya/ /khyod ni tshangs pa thub ba rnams/ /da ming rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /
khyod ni me bcom 'dod pa bral/ /ci khyod dam tshig AH zhes bya/ /mnga' bdag mkha' lding mkhyen nam ci/ /da ming pad+ma gar dbang dpal/ /khyod ni gar mkhan nyer bzhad
mkhan| |ci khyod dam tshig traM zhes bya/ /khyod ni gdugs te tsha ba 'phrog /nga ming rdo rje nyi ma dpal/ /gdugs kyi rnam khyod ji ltar min/ /ci khyod dam tshig khaM zhes bya/ /khyod ni
mkha' stong rang bzhin no/ /ngaM ming rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yin/ /khyod ni rta ste pha rol 'gro/ /ci khyod dam tshig snying rje 'chang / /e ma chang tshong mdzes ma 'o/ /mi g.yo bdag ni mA
ma kI| |zhang po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci/ /ci khyod dam tshig zhi ba nyid/ /bud med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci/ /bdag ni ma yin lha mo spyan/ /spyan yin na ni g.yo
dang bcas| |ci khyod dam tshig 'dod chags che/ /smad tshong ma la smrar ci yod/ /bdag ming lha mo dkar mo 'o/ /ji ltar dri ma dkar ba yin/ /ci khyod dam tshig dbang byed che/ /btsun
mo'i pho nya min nam ci/ /bdag ming zur mig sgrol ma 'o/ /sgrol ma mig ni bcom pa yin/ /mig yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal/ /de ltar ngo tsha med pas legs/ /ngo tsha med pas sangs
rgyas min/ /mthong dang mi mthun myur du smos/ /de nas rdo rje mig yon po/ /smod pa bas ni rang gsungs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpal zhe sdang che/ /thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs/ /
'dod la zhen pa 'jig rten bdag /ser sna rdo rje snang byed do/ /don yod skyon ni thams cad byed/ /'dren pa lnga ni skyon ldan no/ /sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa'am/ /drod gsher
skyes dang mtha' 'khob bzhin/ /gzugs can rnams sam gzugs med dam/ /rdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bya'o zhes/ /khyod kyis dang por gsungs pa ni//
khyod nyid sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/ /de rnams ji ltar rgyal ma mdzad/ /de nyid phyir na rdzun gsungs pa/ /mnga' bdag ji ltar 'di ma gsungs/ /sems can bslus na khyod kyi gang //
sangs rgyas nyid de ngo mtshar rmad/ /'chi bdag che'am mu ge'am/ /phas kyis 'khor lo'i gnod pa dang / /rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang / /char med pa dang zhi ba dang / /sngags dang sgom
par ldan par ni/ /gang zhig bdag ni rtag rol pa/ /de yi mdun du bdag 'dug ste/ /der ni rdzun du mi 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon lda dang lha mo bzhi/ /mi g.yo bdag nyid smod pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor khang
pa'i gnas nyid du/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad/ /khams gsum de bzhin rtsa ba 'am/ /ma dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar mkhan gar/ /bde ba dga' bar

byad dad bcas/ /chos 'byung grong khyer nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje dam tshig glu yis dang / /rdo rje rkang ba'i gom pas gang / /mthar ni rdza rnga lA s+ye sogs/ /phyag rgya chen po rab ster ba'i/ /de nyid 'dir
ni cher gsang ngo| |rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' ji bzhin/ /rab tu 'bad bas bsrung bar bya/ /glu sna tshogs dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gar dang / 'dul bar 'jug pa dang / char dbab pa dang / mi
g.yo ba'i bdag nyid che ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te 'byung po'i gtor ma gsungs
pa| nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya/ /dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar bsam/ /mthar byed lhor ni dgod par bya/ /chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la/ /byang
du nor sbyin dgod par bya/ /mer ni byin za chen po nyid/ /bden bral mtshams skyod de bzhin no/ /rlung du gnas med bsam par bya/ /dbang ldan du ni 'byung bo'i gtso//
zla nyi tshongs pa la sogs dang / /tshangs pa'i ris ni dam pa dang / /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don nyid dang / /dga' ldan 'thab bral gnas pa dang / /rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang / /gzhan
'phrul dbang bsgyur nyid dang ni/ /gang zhig 'phrul dga'i gnas rnams dang / /gtsang ma'i gnas su gang gnas dang / /bde ba can du 'dug pa dang / /'og min du ni gnas pa dang / /'od
zer can gyi 'jig rten khams/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa dang / /de kun steng du gnas par bya/ /chos 'byung nang du son pa ni/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang / /de bzhin mtha' yas
nor rgyas bu/ /'jog po dang ni rigs ldan nyid/ /pad chen pad+ma bzang po can/ /lha min dmyal ba sems can rnams/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og tu 'o/ /oM las tshangs pa la sogs
lha| |hUM las ma chags pa la sogs/ /AH las stobs kyi rgyu la sogs/ /lag gnyis gdong gcig ldan pa ste/ /steng gi lha rnams dkar po che/ /dbang po la sogs nag por
mtshungs| |stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che/ /rang mtshungs rig ma lus sprad ldan/ /rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel/ /g.yas brkyang bas ni stan la gnas/ /tshangs sogs rtag pas
phyag rgyas gdab/ /mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis/ /stobs kyi rgyu sogs gar bdag gis/ /thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa'o/ /dkar mos dgug par byas nas ni/ /chom rkun mas ni
zhags bcings pas/ /ro langs mas ni sgrog bcings pas/ /g+hasma rIs ni dril bus dbab/ /de nas mchod de zhabs bsil dbul/ /sngags ni 'di yis bsang gtong bya/ /oM AHhUM/ phyi nas

'thor 'thung dbul bar bya/ /sngags ni 'di yis gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dri D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ shA shwa

to me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ hr-i da yam+me a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba kAR+ye Shu me tsit+taM shre yaM/ ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga waM sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra mA me muny+tsa/ badzri b+ha wa mahA sa

ma ya satwa AHmu/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur rdo rje ming gi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje ming phye ba'o/ /ming gi dbang gi dus su ni/ /slob ma bdag nyid dbang

bskur bya/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba/ /skye ba 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang / sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang / mdzes pa'i rdo rje dang / rol pa'i rdo rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i rdo

rje dang / shin tu dga' ba'i myu gu'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma rdo rje dang / pad+ma myu gu rdo rje dang / a la la rdo rje dang / pad+ma lcags kyu rdo rje dang / ye shes rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang /
yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang / shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang / snying rje myu gu'i rdo rje dang / dam par dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin tu bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / spyan ras

gzigs kyi rdo rje dang / 'bebs pa'i rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje dang / shes rab rdo rje dang / pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ni/ dag pa'i gnas su phyag rgya chen po grub pa

rnams kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams yin no/ /bud med rnams kyi 'byung ste/ rdo rje snyems pa dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang / rdo rje e ma'o bde ma dang / rdo rje bdag med ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma dang /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang / rdo rje 'bar ma dang / rdo rje 'khri shing dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje bskor

ma dang / rdo rje phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje lA s+ye ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma dang / rdo rje 'khyud ma dang / rdo rje phye ma dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'byung ma dang / rdo rje chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma dang /

rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje do shal ma dang / rdo rje sgeg mo dang / rdo rje kong+ka NA dang / rdo rje lA ma dang / rdo rje dbugs dbyung ma dang / rdo rje rnam pa ma ni/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi'o/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan du gyur pa/ /kye yi rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rnam snang chen po dang ni rang byung dang / rdo rje ar l+li skem pa'i khro bo dang / /de bzhin du yang rdo rje'i khro bo

nyid| |rdo rje bdud rtsi bdud rtsi thabs sbyor dang / /he ru ka dang snying rje'i stobs nyid do/ /rtag pa dang ni gti mug rdo rje dang / /rnam par snang mdzad dang ni thams cad skyob/ /sgyu 'phrul dang ni de nas oM mjad

dang / /sku yi rdo rjer rab tu grags pa dang / /sa snying dang ni gti mug chen po dang / /gshin rje gshed dang tho ba'i dbang phyug dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / /sangs rgyas zhes byar rab

tu grags pa 'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma de nas rin chen bdag /rin chen rgyal po nyid de bzhin du yang / /rdo rje gzi ba rjid dang ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje bdud zil gnon dang snang byed do/ /rta mgrin dang ni 'jig rten
bdag po dang / /rdo rje chos dang spyan ras gzigs dang ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang dang ni 'dod chags dang / /'jig rten mgon por rab tu grags pa'o/ /dam pa'i rta dang rta yi rgyal po dang / /bdun gyi

rgyal po de nas lcags rgyal dang / /dam tshig rdo rje dang ni rta mchog dang / /de bzhin du yang las kyi rdo rje nyid/ /don yod dang ni don grub rgyal po dang / /rdo rje mgyogs 'gror rab tu grags pa'o//
rdo rje sems dpa' de nas rdo rje can/ /rnam par rgyal ba phyag na rdo rje dang / /dpe med ro mnyam shin tu dga' ba dang / /dam pa dang po bde ba chen po'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dam
tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni/ /'di rnams rigs ni drug tu brjod/ /'dod pa'i thar rab sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// //
rdo rje snying po mngon byang chub/ /brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid/ /sgyu ma'i brtag pa gnyis pa ste/ /rdo rje gar ni gsum ba'o/ /bzhi pa sna tshogs brtag pa ste/ /rdo rje brtag
pa lnga pa'o/ /brtag pa drug pa stobs po che/ /brtag pa 'dun pa mi g.yo mgon/ /brgyad pa gzugs kyi brtag pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ku ru kul+le dgu/ /bcu pa 'dul ba'i brtag pa ste/ /rnam bar
snang mdzad bcu gcig pa/ /dngos grub brtag pa bcu gnyis pa/ /sgrol ma'i brtag pa bcu gsum pa/ /rdo rje phag mo bcu bzhi pa/ /bco lnga pa ni gzi brjid che/ /bdag med brtag pa bcu drug
pa| |gshin rje gshed kyi bcu bdun ba/ /hUM mdzad la ni bco brgyad pa/ /dbyangs can gyi ni bcu dgu pa/ /sbyin sreg brtag pa nyi shu pa/ /rab gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen
po'i brtag pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa ni gnyis su 'dod/ /gtor ma'i brtag pa nyi shu gsum/ /nyi shu bzhi pa sta gon gnas/ /mngon par rtogs pa nyi shu lnga/ /de bzhin phyag rgya nyi shu drug/ byed
ba nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /klu ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /gar gyi dbang phyug brtag pa ni/ /sum cur gcig med sum cu pa/ /brtag pa sum cu par ni bshad/ /stong sum cu yi grangs kyis ni/ /
mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /'bum phrag lnga yi rgya mtsho che/ /kye yi rdo rje 'chang gi ni/ /rgyud ni e ma rgyas bstan pa/ /'bum phrag lnga bdag kye rdo rje/ /dag pa'i snying po yongs

su gzung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa ste/ /'di ni rgyud kyi nges pa'o/ /kye yi rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyud/ /dang por rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/ /de nyid bud med bzung
phyir ro| |bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na spros pa las bsdus pa lags/ bskal pa bzung po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang so so'i skye bo rnams tshe thung bar 'gyur na/ /ji ltar na de rnams
'dzin par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de rnams thos par 'gyur/ ji ltar na sems par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na skye bo phal pa tshe thung bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ re zhig
gang dag slob dpon rnams su 'gyur ba de rnams rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag spyod pa po de rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag so so'i
skye bo de rnams srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag bud med kyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir rgyud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan pa ma
yin no| |de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung thos nas mnyes par 'gyur cing dgyes pa brnyes nas tshig 'di gsungs pa/ snying rje chen po kye'i
rdo rje| |nga ni dur khrod chu 'gram dang / /nags tshal skye bo med grong du/ /bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ /mtsho skyes rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong / /sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang / /rkang
'thung rlon pa'i 'og tu ni/ /nga ni sangs rgyas dngos grub ster/ /tshong dus tshong rdal nyid dang ni/ /tshong dus rnam pa'i khyim du ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma brtan pa nga / /bsnyen bkur can
la dngos grub ster/ /glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang / /chang tshong ma yi khyim du ni/ /'di ltar pad+ma gar mkhan nga / /bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu 'gro mgyogs zhon
'gyur dang / /res 'ga' lam du 'gro ba na/ /rta ni don yod brtan pa nga / /dngos grub rdo rje rnams steng ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam
par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi brtag pa las/ /phyag rgya rnam gsum shes par bya/ /sku la
lag pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya/ /sems la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yin/ /de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor la'o/ /lag pa g.yas na skam pa ste/ /g.yon na
sdigs mdzub de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro skam pa ma 'jigs ma/ /gdug pa rnams kyi 'khur ba 'don/ /g.yas pa'i lag na zhags pa ste/ /gdug pa rnams bcing rnam par dgug/ de
'di zhags pa ma shes bya/ /g.yon pas gdug pa sdigs mdzub ma/ /g.yas na nya rgya zlum po ste/ /gdug pa rnams ni bkri bar 'dod/ /'di ni rtag tu dol zlum bshad/ /g.yon pas
gdug pa sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste/ /gdug pa rnams ni dgug par 'dod/ /'di de rdo rje kyo mar bshad/ /g.yon pas bdud la sdigs mdzub ma/ /lag pa g.yas
pa nyi ma ste/ /gti mug mun pa rnam par dral/ /g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mar ni bshad/ /de ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod/ /lag g.yas mar me'i sdod snod de/ /de bzhin g.yon par sdigs mdzub po//
'di de rdo rje mar mer bshad/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'joms/ /lag pa g.yas na rin po che/ /sems can rnams la sbyin pa ster/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /rin chen sgrol
ma 'di rab brjod/ /glog ni lag pa g.yas par te/ /rnam par rtog pa'i chu 'dzin 'joms/ /de 'di glog lag mar shes bya/ de bzhin g.yon pas sdigs mdzub ma/ /lag pa g.yas par
pad+ma ste| |pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya/ /g.yon pas sdigs mdzub ma nyid de/ /'di ni mkha' 'gro'i pad+mar brjod/ /g.yas par b+ha ga'i pad+ma ste/ /bde ba chen po rnam par 'phel/ /
g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste/ /'di ni chos 'byung mar ni brjod/ /g.yas pa'i lag na lcags sgrog ste/ /byang chub zhen pas kun 'ching pa/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste/ /
'di ni rdo rje sgrog mar brjod/ /sangs rgyas rjes chags 'ching ba yis/ /bdag nyid 'khyud par 'dod pa ste/ /byang chub chags pos rab sgrub ma/ /de 'di rdo rje 'khyud mar bshad/ /g.yas
pa'i lag na sgo lcags te/ /ye shes kun gyi srung ba mo/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /'di de rdo rje sgo lcags brjod/ /g.yas pa'i lag tu lde kyog ste/ /
ye shes blangs nas gcod pa mo/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /'di de rdo rje lde kyog brjod/ /g.yas pa'i lag tu sgo mo ni/ /ye shes skyes pa ma spangs pa/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub
'dzin pa mo/ /'di ni rdo rje sgo mar brjod/ /lag pa g.yas par yol ba ni/ /rang mtshungs btsun mo srung ba nyid/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ /rdo rje yol ba mar ni brjod/ /de 'di
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs/ /mkha' 'gro lnga ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams
cad mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya 'phrog pa 'di ci nyi tshe ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya 'phrog pa lags sam/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal ba/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje nges
par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i lung bstan pa yod de/ 'di ni/ de'i yin te/ Dai bai ha ya sa ga ma ne'i skad kyi byings 'dir rnam par rtogs pa ste/ thams cad kun tu nam mkhar spyod par grub
pas 'di ni/ mkha' 'gro mar rab tu grags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad tshig 'di thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba nye bar skyes par gyur pa dang tshig 'di gsol pa/ /e ma
mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud/ /rgyud kun las ni phyi ma dang / /rtogs sla rtogs par dka' ba dang / /rig dang mi rig pa nyid pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rdo rje de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul ba'i phyir 'di skad gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal
po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi bsdu ba yin/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ /sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa mtha'
yas pa ngas srid pa las bsgral bar bya'o/ /zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub gong du rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ ci'i phyir na srog chags rnams gsad pa dang / gcig tu 'dod pa'i
btsun mo rnam sbangs lags/ lta ba rnams las log rnams dang / /btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud bshad do/ /bde ba'i thabs ni 'dor bsdus pa/ /gzhung nyung

don ni rgyas pa ste/ /blo dman rab tu sang byed pa/ /rgyud kun gyi ni snying por nges/ /sngags rnams kyi ni khyad bar du'o/ /rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'di ni bshad pa
tsam gyis ni/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma nyid kyis/ /sngon du gar gyis mchod byas te/ /rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /
gal te rdo rje chos dang ni/ /rta mchog rdo rje nyi ma yang / /bdag gis spangs na mi 'grub ste/ /nga nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yum gyi gzugs kyis skyed par byed/ /de rnams kyi ni mdzes
ma nga / /de la nga ni dngos grub ste/ /mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang / /ral gri 'og sgrub pa dang / /ril bu mkha' la spyod pa dang / /mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len/ /rig 'dzin 'khor
los bsgyur nyid dang / /bu mo dam pa dgug pa ni/ /bdag mnyes pas ni sgrub pa pos/ /dngos grub rdo rje rnams thob bo/ /spros pa rnam pa mang por ni/ /smras pa 'dir ni ci zhig bya/ /
bdag spangs nges par mi 'grub cing / /byang chub med cing sgom pa med/ /gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing / /rtag tu klog cing sems pa dang / /sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas pa dang / /nga yi sku
ni sgom byed pa/ /gal te sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sam/ /gal te rmi lam 'dra bar lta/ /shin tu bsgoms pa'i rim pa las/ /mngon sum du ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor
ba las| |de yi dngos grub sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas/ /shin tu bde chen sbyor ba las/ /gang zhig bdag la 'dod ster ba/ /lus can de la smos ci dgos/ /gang zhig nyi ma
gcig sgom pa/ /rdo rje'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba las/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dngos grub/ /ster te 'di la the tshom med/ /bdag nyid he ru gar byas shing / /rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas/ /gang
zhig rnal 'byor cher 'dod pa/ /de rnams la ni nga mnyes 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan zhing / /spro ba dga' bar ldan pa dang / /glu gar rol sgra'i rnam pa dang / /'dod kun bde ba spro ba
dang | |sna tshogs sgeg par ldan pa dang / /sna tshogs ro yi btung ba dang / /sna tshogs gos ni ri mo can/ /sna tshogs dri yi byug pa yis/ /gang zhig bdag dang rtag nyal ba/ /de yi dngos grub
ster ba nga / /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug pa/ /de yi 'dod pa mar gyur to/ /oM a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM swAhA/ gang zhig 'dis bskul bar byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras
de rnams kyi lag tu bud med kyi sgyu ma'i bde ba yang dag par gnas kyi 'dug go/ /rdo rje ma ni/ shar du sbyin par bya'o/ /lho phyogs su dkar mo'i gzugs can ma'o/ /nub phyogs su ni chu'i
mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /byang du ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /nga dbus su bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam par byed pa de'i bdag mdzes ma ste/ /phyag gnyis ma
zhal gcig ma'o/ /gri gug dang skyes pa'i thod pas brel ba/ stag gi pags pa bgos pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ shar gyi sgor ni
dkar mo chen mo'o/ /lhor ni chom rkun ma'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor ni chu ma'o/ /de bzhin byang du ni g+hasma rA'o/ /dbang ldan du ni buk+ka sI'o/ /'tshed pa'i mtshams su ni
ri khrod ma'o/ /srin mo'i phyogs su ni gdol pa mo'o/ /rtag tu 'gro bar ni g.yung mo'o/ /'di rnams ni/ mtshams dang bral du sbyin no/ /gang zhig bdag rab tu sgom par byed pa de'i
lag mthil du phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nus so/ /thams cad kyang kha dog nag por mtshungs pa rab tu ston pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa khro mo chen mo dpal mo g.yon pa
