kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rig ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa/ rang gi
rig ma skyes bu'i chus/ /bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje thugs ni rab bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje can bsam dbang bskur bya/ rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgoms pa/ /der ni dbu rgyan sbyin
par bya| |thams cad sngon sbyin de bsams nas/ /rdo rje'i tshigs bcad sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /snying gar rang gi lag pas bya/ /slob ma 'jig rten dbang phyug byas//
rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni/ /de ring khyod ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /bzang bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje gzung / /

slong ma lcags mchog lha mo ni/ /sgrol mas 'khyud par bsam par bya/ /lag pas rdo rje dril 'khrol zhing / /rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra d+hI pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha/ badzra sa

ma ya s+t+waM| slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni/ /ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra sa twa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra nA mA b+hi She ka ta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje/ gang gang kun gyis rang gtsor gyur/ /de de
bdag nyid he ru ka /sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o/ /'di ste sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /rdo rje snying po brtul

zhugs brtan/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung / /oM badzra ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha sa ma ya s+t+waM e Sho haM s+t+waM d+hA ra yA mi hIH hi hi hi hi hi hUM/ kun kyang chog gcig pa yis/ /rtag
tu bla med mchod pas ni/ /slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin/ /phyis ni rdo rje la gnas lag /sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po/ /kun tu bzang po kun
gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po'i bdag po'i bdag /yang ni dar ni dril bu sbyin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin skyes pa'i/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /'di de
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod/ /rgyal bas byang chub mchog brjod pa/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung / /dbugs 'byin thams cad byin
nas ni| |shAkya thub par rang gyur pas/ /slob ma chen po lung bstan te/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /khyod kyis 'chi 'jigs mya ngan med/ /de bzhin
nad dang tsha ba med/ /bde chen theg pa chen po ni/ /'di las nga yis lung bstan bu/ /oM e Sho haM bya ka ro mi s+t+waM badzra satwa ta thA ga ta/ srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te/ /shin tu srid pa'i
dngos grub phyir/ /kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /ming ni rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rig ma chen mo'i dbang gi dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ston pa pos dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba bton te tshig 'di skad dka' stsal ba/ bla ma rdo rje rnams mchod cing / /bdun po rnam par dag
par bya| |byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par bsgom/ /de la sangs rgyas gnas bsams nas/ /rnam pa lnga ni bsgom par bya/ /dang po skyes bu bsam de
nas| |mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /dri za mnyam bar zhugs pa ni/ /khu bar rjes su dran par bya/ /mtshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pa bskul nas ni/ /
mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgong / /phyi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste/ /ye shes rnam par gzhug pa dang / /dbang ni rig ma brgyud rnams kyi/ /
yang ni bdud rtsi myang ba dang / /lha mo brgyad kyi mchod pa nyid/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pa bstod pa'o/ /rang byin brlab pas byin brlabs te/ /de la yan lag drug bsgom bya/ /phyi nas yang ni dam tshig
gi /cho ga'i go rim rim pa yis/ /mtshan ma yang dag mtshon par bya/ /dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste/ /gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba yin/ /gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin/ /bzhi pa mar me nye 'bar ba/ /
lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ste/ /sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu/ /dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar/ /rmi lam rnam par skad cig
'gyur| |khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams/ /ye shes phung po'i blo ldan pa/ /de yi
rjes su thams cad 'brang / /ji srid skye gnas las byung ba/ /khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar/ /phyag rgya chen po rab sbyar bas/ /de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /byang chub
sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /tshig gi rdo rje rnam thos nas/ /dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni/ /smra ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan/ /rig ma chen mo bdag med dang / /rdo rje rnam snang
mnga' bdag dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen dang / /rta mchog thub pa chen po dang / /rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid che/ /rta mgrin mnga' bdag chen po ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni nyid dang yang / /
lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur/ /lan gcig rgyal po ston pa yis/ /'phral du mngon sum byed pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje
'dzin pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te tshig 'di skad gsungs so/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa/ /zhal brgyad pa la stobs po che/ /phyag ni bcu drug rnams
dang ldan| |dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gzi brjid chen po zhabs bzhi dang / /sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs can te/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam
par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /dkar po dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lhag pa'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste/ /spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ der
ni rdo rje mdog nag po/ /'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya/ /dbang bskur ba yi gnas nyid du/ /sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/ /mi dang sha ra b+ha byi la/ /
g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni/ /gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni/ /drod dang zla ba nyi ma nyid/ /mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad
na'o| |skyes bu chen po bzhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba la/ /ser sna 'dod chags de bzhin du/ /reg dang bdag med
bsgom par bya/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid/ /lag pa gri gug thod pas brel/ /srog song steng du yang dag gnas/ /sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid dang //
de bzhin rkang 'og gnas pa mo/ /'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /gnas gsum du ni gnas par bsgom/ /oM mdzad rgyal po chen po ni/ /sku yi rdo rje rnam par brgyan/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po che/ /rdo rje
sems dpa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /a ni mchog gi de nyid de/ /ngag gi lam ni gsal byed brjod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi/ /chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
dbus gnas par/ /dkar mo gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /lcags kyu'i sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o/ /kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo/ /dkar mo rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dmar
po dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /chom rkun ma yi gzugs can bsgom/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /rdo rje zhags pa mtshon chen po/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ro
langs ma ni khrag dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog nga rgyal byed/ /byang chub 'ching bar mdzad pa mo/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /de nas g+hasma rI bsgom bya/ /rdo rje dril bus
lag ba brel/ /margad ut+pal 'dra ba'o/ /rdo rje sge skyong ma rdo rje btson ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mtshams su lha mo bzhi rnams ni/ /cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /byang sems
bum pa ri rab dang / /me yi thab khung rgyal mtshan che/ /phyi bcas gnyis med rnal 'byor pas/ /mgon po de ltar bsgom bar bya/ /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas/ /
dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba 'thob/ /'byung ba bzhi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa po thams cad kyi rnam pa'i ting nge
'dzin la bzhugs te dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ hUM las byung ba'i khro po ni/ /rtag tu zhe sdang ldan pa'o/ /nang du ma rungs sems kyis ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ /na maH sa man+ta

bud+d+he b+h+yo/ /na mo badzra mud ga ra has+t+wa ya tsaN+Ta maN+Da lAk+She pa ka rA ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'dir khro bo chen po bshad pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs
shing 'dar bar gyur nas mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa dran par byed do/ /skyes ba'i pad+ma gas chags med/ /srub gcig pa dang srub gnyis pa/ /rig ma bzhi yi rab sbyor bas/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang / /rkang rjes rdul gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rkang bas mnan cing bsdig par bya/ /sku gsum bskyed pa'i sgom pa yis/ /bu mo chen mo dgug par bya/ /gshin rje gshed

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ma hA da N+Da d+ha ra bi bi d+ha sU rA su ra marda na b+hU tan+ni r+m+ma tha hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshad
pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang 'dar bar gyur cing de dran par byed do/ /'byung po yi dwags shu za nyid/ /mkha' 'gro grul bum zin pa la/ /hUM gis dregs

byas phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje btsir bas bde ba nyid/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ /oM hu lu hu lu/ mahA pad+ma a mr-i ti ku ru ma hA pi ShA na AH

btsan dug chen po dgug par bya'o/ /brgyal ba bslang ba de bzhin no/ /pad+ma'i dregs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ /na mo badzra kro d+hA ya ma hA daM Sh+Tot+ka Ta
b+ha ra wA ya/ badzra san+do ha dar+b+pA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo bgegs 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid mi
dga' bar gyur to/ /rlung gis bteg pa po dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byang bzung ste tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod cing hUM phaT ces bya ste/ hUM gis

nga rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa khro bo'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed do/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /shin
cu legs bar gsang bar ni/ /bya ba 'di ni rab bskul bar/ /ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste/ /nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ /oM ya ma daN+DA ya/ nI lA ya/ nI
la da N+DA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sarba duSh+TA na mA ra ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen bo dbyug pa sngon po skyes bu chen po bshad pas sems can thams
cad dang / sangs rgyas rnams srog la the tshom du gyur to/ /brgya phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang shin tu sgom par sbyor ba'i chogs bskul ba las gdug pa thams cad 'ching bar

'gyur ro/ /dbyig pas mnan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nams man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ /na mo ma hA ba lA ya/ u ts+tshu Sh+ma kro d+ha rA dzA a sar+b+ba nA gA nAM hr-i da yaM tA Ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas
gtum po chen po bshad pas dug gi gdong 'jigs shing stobs dang bral ba dang / skrag cing 'dar bar 'gyur te stobs po che dran par byed do/ /rdo rje stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo a tsa la kaM tse T+Ta tseT+Ta/ moT+Ta moT+Ta/ tuT+Ta tuT+Ta/ g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba skyes bu chen
po bshad pas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin chen po brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/ /'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po yis/ /seng+ge zhon pa'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las/ /

skyes pa dang ni lha rnams khug/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga waM bid+ya ra dzA hUM phaT/ /rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa yi/ /khro bo chen po
zhad pa phas/ /lha min bu mo gu mor bcas/ /nu ma 'dar zhing raM ba'am/ /rdo rje zhags pas nges bcings te/ /lcags kyu yis ni dral nas ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgom pa yis/ /bu mo
thams cad dgug par bya'o/ /'jig rten gsum dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje chos ni char sprin che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' char mchog ste/ /rdo rje nyi ma dge 'dun che/ /rta
mchog tshogs ni chen po dang / /phan pa'i yang ni char sprin gyi/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i sgom pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs brjod na/ /so so skye bo smos ci dgos/ /rang gi
rig ma skyes bu bsam/ /sku gsum rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /lcags kyu la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /bu mo bkug la bza' bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chen pos dgug
pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /na maH sa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaH kha ti dang ni btsag la yang / /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las/ /zla ba nye bar chags dus su/ /khar bcug nas
ni bsgrub par bya/ /ming ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang / /brgya ni gsal bar bzlas pa yis/ /sgra ldan gnas med dbang po drag/ /chung mar bcas pa dgug par bya/ /dam tshig lcags kyu'i rdo
ce zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bsam gtan sngags dang ting 'dzin gnas/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bu bdag /dgug pa'i gnas su gzung bar bya/ /thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /
na maH sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ na maH sa man+ta d+harmA NaM/ na maH sa man+ta saM g+hA nAM/ oM si tA ta ba tre/ oM bi ma la/ oM shaM ka ra/ oM pra t+yaM gI ra/ oM badzra uSh+Ni Sha tsa gra waM rti

sar+b+bA yan+t+ra man+t+ra mU la karmA ban+t+ra nI tA Da nA kI la naM bA ma ma kr-i taM ya na ka na tsit+ta kr-i taM tat+ta ta/ sarba n+du ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT
phaT phaT/ bdag nyid srung ba'i sbyor ba la/ sbyor ba rgyud sogs gzhig pa la/ /dpung bar rig pa btags byas na/ /'jig rten gsum gyis 'da' mi nus/ /khro bo chen po 'khor lo
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dben pa'i nags tshal nyid du yang / /yid gnyis thams cad rnam spangs la/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na/ /thub pa gzhan du mi
'gyur ro/ /khro bo chen po 'khor lo'i sngags la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /sems can kun gyi snying la
zhugs/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung pa/ /yang dag nges par rab tu dbye/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas
gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te/ /rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab
bsgoms nas/ /'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam bsgoms te/ /rta yi don yod rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i/ /dkyil
'khor rnams ni rtag bsgom bya/ /thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis/ /snying gar ye shes gnas su dgod/ /ye shes sems dpar rab sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub thob par
'gyur| |rang sngags yi ge rdzogs pa dang / /phyag rgya dang ni phyag mtshan brtag /spro dang bsdu pa byas pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'byung pa nyid/ /sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas//
lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po/ /gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid
bcom ldan rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag nyid/ /dri la rnam gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/ /rin chen pung po
rab tu grags/ /ro la rnam gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags nyid/ /rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs/ /reg la rnam
gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /don yod 'bras bu ster ba po/ /srung ba'i dam tshig bsdus pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor lnga ni
bsgom par bya/ /lnga lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom 'dod pa yi yon tan lnga dang ldan/ /'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab
sna tshogs las ni byed par brjod/ /thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /rdul tshon gyis kyang bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /phung
po lngar ni rab tu grags/ /sangs rgyas mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /shar gyi char ni rab tu grags/ /g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yi/ /byang du rta yi rgyal po
yi| |dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /shar du dkar po chen po ste/ /lho ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /dmar po nub kyi cha nyid du/ /btsod ni byang du yang dag ldan/ /mtshams kyi char
ni thams cad dang / /sgo yi logs dang ya phubs su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs snang ba rnams kyis mdzes/ /sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor
dbus su 'gyur ba ni/ /de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor brjod/ /snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor re rer sgom pa 'am/ /yang na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro//
brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa 'am/ /yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga ru/ /gang tshe dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yi/ /sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog de bzhin rdo rje nyid/ /'jug
pa'i sgo srung dgod par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ /dom dang bya rgod de bzhin bse/ /smyig glang dang ni stag nyid dang / /spre'u dang sna thung
ba glang 'tshe/ /rdo rje chos kyi g.yas na'o/ /khwa 'ug chu skyar seng+ge dang / /mtshor gnas de bzhin ra dang ni/ /ri dwags phag dang yang dag ldan/ /g.yas min par ni rtag tu gnas/ /rma bya ma he

chu srin dang / /nyi ma'i rgyal po rus spal dang / /'og gi rlung dang ngang pa dang / /ri bong phan ba'i g.yas pa na/ /sbal pa thu bo sprin shugs kyi/ kha chu mig sman mtshungs byi la/ /g.yag dang dri
ldan de bzhin bshad/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/ /ka ran+Da dang 'khor lo dag/ lug dang tsa ko ra dang ni/ /bya khra hor mo 'ol ba dang / /ku rar nyi ma'i g.yas na'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang dung
skyong dang / /rigs ldan pad+ma pad bzang dang / /'jog po nor rgyas mtha' yas ni/ /rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na'o/ /gza' lag phur bu mjug ring dang / /sgra gcan mig dmar pa ba
sangs| |spen pa khyab 'jug rta rgyal nyid/ /g.yas pa nyid du rab tu grags/ /dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag/ 'dod lha de bzhin thod pa can/ /gcer bu dang ni thag bzang ris/ /stobs
ldan zhes bya g.yon na 'o/ /glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin 'bog khong skem mdze dang rkang shu dang / /mchin pa mcher pa'i rang bzhin yang / /glang po la sogs rab tu grags//
lcags stegs dang ni rjed byed dang / /khrag rdog cod nad rgyal po dang / /gzhang 'brum skran dang bkres nad dang / /mig ser dom la sogs pa'o/ /rdzi ma byi dang
so nad dang / /mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung / /bad kan 'dzag dang lus skam dang / /skya rbab 'bras ni rna bya sogs/ /rkang 'bam chil nad rlig skrangs dang / /rgyu ma 'phel dang gsung
pa dang | |tshad pa rims dang rabs gas ni/ /ka raN+Da sogs rab tu grags/ /rlung ma bris de bzhin ma zhu ba/ /sgrib g.yogs rab rib gcin sri ba/ /gzhogs phyed na dang lkog 'bras
dang | |rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o/ /mi yi 'gro ba dam pa ni/ /rab mchog de lta bu 'gro ba/ /thams cad nad kyis khyab mthong nas/ /sangs rgyas ldar ni cher grags pa/ /
bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /sems can rnams la gdungs ma gyur/ /nad rnams zhi phyir sangs rgyas ni/ /glang po la sogs nad 'dzin to/ /de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa la//
nad med ru dza trad grum med/ /'chi med nges par bya d+hi med/ /nga rgyal med cing gti mug med/ /bkres pa med cing sgom pa med/ /sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med/ /lha dang lha min
mi rnams sam/ /gang gis kyang ni nad byed min/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal
po lus thams cad 'dzin pa po mkha' 'gro ma'i yid 'phrog pas tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems kyi rjes dran dmigs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /sems kyi rin
chen bsams nas ni/ /chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /las rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /'khor lo chen po rab bsgom bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab ste/ /ma byung 'byung bar
mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje rnam snang bsams nas ni/ /phyag rgya bsgoms pas phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje'i phyag
rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /rin chen phung po rab bsgom bya/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas/ /las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab/ /zhe sdang rgyal po rgyal po che/ /skyon rnams thams cad zad par mdzad//
spro zhing bsdu bar bsgom par bya/ /bsdu ba yang ni yang dag bshad/ /sangs rgyas mgon po rab bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs
rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya/ /sems kyi rin chen rin po ches/ /bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad/ /sems kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis/ /yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya/ /chos kyi rgyal
po gti mug che/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can de/ /thun tshod bzhir ni byin brlabs pa/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems ni 'gro mgyogs ltar bsams nas/ /
gzhal med 'bras bu stsol pa'o/ /rta mchog char sprin chen po yis/ /bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dam
tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems kyi rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rnyog med dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sku yi yi
ge rnam par bsgom| /khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod/ /ches kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par/ /gsung gi yi ge rnam par bsgom/ /las
kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /de na yod yi ge gzugs can te/ /sku gsum mi byed sgom pa yis/ /ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i/ /chos kyi
'khor lo rnam snang la/ /rin chen sems kyi rin po che/ /pad+ma bzang po 'dab ma dmar/ /shes rab ral gri don yod kyi/ /shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /rnam rtog ri bo
bcad nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po ldan par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad bye ba brgya par ni/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang / /rin chen phung
po 'od chen dang / /chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las/ /sna tshogs 'od zer chen 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nam mkha'
khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang / /thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs/ /mchod ba kun gyis mchod par bya/ /mtshams
kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya/ /dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje chen po 'bar/ /sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /skad cig la ni
gnyis med 'gyur/ /ru rak+Sha dang dung bse ru/ /gu yi 'tsho ba bad 'bras dang / /mu tig la sogs byi ru sogs/ /bsam gtan ldan pa sngags bzlas bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang rang btsun mo/ /mngon sum du ni bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags ni snyan gsan 'bebs par brjod/ /dper na skyes chen la la zhig/ skad cig nga ros bos pa na/ /thos
pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur pa/ /de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs/ /'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang / /na mkha'i khams kyi mkha' grong du/ /phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi//
mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de rnams sngags rig drung ni gshegs/ /rdo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /gang gis sngags kyi rim thob pa/ /e ma de yis byang
chub thob| |sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin/ /rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes 'thob/ /de ltar shes
pa'i sangs rgyas te/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa/ /'bras bu nyid la ni gzigs te/ /de ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa brjod/ /sangs rgyas nga rgyal dmigs
nas ni| |chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba/ /gang zhig sgom pa de bas na/ /sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur/ /'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te/ /ji ltar chos kyang dge 'dun te//
sems can khams ni de ltar bshad/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /dan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /rin chen sems ni dri can byas/ /sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur
ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'jig pa/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems/ /sems kyi rin chen bskul ba las/ /sems nyid sgom pa sangs rgyas te/ /skye bar sangs rgyas
dam pa nyid/ /rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i/ /sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med/ /rnam par shes pa'i gnas don nam/ /phyi rol gyur ba cung zad med/ /yid kyis sangs
rgyas thams cad nyid/ /khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste/ /'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che/ /sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri//
ro dang reg bya'i rang bzhin te/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mchog tu zhi/ /'di ni rin chen mchog tu brjod/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid/ /'di
dag thams cad sems las skyes /thub pa 'di ni gzhan mi 'gyur/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /'dod don 'bras bu rab ster ba/ /sems kyi de nyid rang bzhin dag /sangs rgyas byang chub
'bras bu ster/ /de nyid phyir na sangs rgyas kyis/ /sems gyi rdo rje bskul pa yis/ /zab mo'i rnam pa des ldan pa'i/ /phyed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i
le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i gur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sangs
rgyas gnas ni rab rdzogs dang / /rnam pa lnga po bsgoms pa dang / /kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin dang / /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sgrub dang / /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang / /mchod bstod
bdud rtsi la sogs pa/ /rim pas rjes su bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA mr-i tA swA da badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko nyahaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas de skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta stu ti badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA pU dzA badzra
swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko nyahaM
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal te/ /spro ba dang ni bsdus pa'i sku/ /rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad che/ /chos dbyings yi ge las skyes pa/ /des
ni sangs rgyas gnas dgod bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nI la ya badzra swA b+hA ba A t+ma konyahaM/ rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par//
'byung bzhi'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid/ /de yi steng du sangs rgyas bsam/ /spros nas gzhal yas gnas dgod bya/ /rdo rje lta bu mi phyed phyir/ /des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya/ /ma skyes
rjes su dran pa las/ rnam par snang mdzad phan pa nyid/ /rin chen rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ 'di ni rin chen sems su bshad/ /rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che/ /'dod chags mtshan nyid
'dzin pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pa'i/ /sems ni 'dod chags zhes byar bshad/ gang phyir 'bras bral mi 'grub ster/ /de phyir don yod rab tu grags/ /rig ma
mdzes ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste/ /gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang / /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ /ji ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs//
dkyil 'khor dam ba bris nas ni/ /dam tshig khu ba'i cho ga yis/ /haM dang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas/ /de tshe dbugs byung sbyin par bya/ /mkha' 'gro lnga dang ldan pa dang / /dam tshig lnga yis
bkang ba dang / /mkha' 'gro ma yis tshogs ldan pas/ /rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byas la/ /slob ma rtag par nges bsams te/ /rgyun gyis rigs kyi ming gis ni/
slob ma rdo rje can dbang bskur/ /spyan dang bde bdag mo sgrol ma dang / dkar mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyis/ /rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje bla med bshad par bya/ /bla na med pa'i de
nyid 'di/ /gnyis su med cing yi ge med/ /chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed/ /bde ba bzang po'i ro myang ge/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ /ga dang ha zhes bya ba
dang | |dang po mthar yang shwa ldan pa'i/ /rab tu gsal ba dam pa nyid/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /tshogs kyi rdo rje bdud rtsi myang / /'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas
kun mnyam rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje dang ni mnyam par 'gyur/ /nad rnams thams cad rab tu zhi/ /de ni gzi brjid lus chen po/ /'jig rten kun gyi yid 'phrog pa/ /phas kyi rgol ba kun
las rgyal| |'jig rten kun gyi bdag pos brgyan/ /lha rnams kyi ni 'dren par brjod/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /chos kyi bras ni zab bo/ /dam tshig chen po'i bsam
gtan zos pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs/ /rtag par chu shel chen por
ldan| |rdo rje nyi ma rgas pa med/ /don yod rgyal po chen po ni/ /rdo rje srog gi yan lag 'byung / /don kun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan/ des ni rnal 'byor par ni brjod/ mi bskyod btung
ba'i sbyor ba las/ /stong phrag lngas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /phan pa'i sa ni khri ru brjod/ /rdo rje nyi mas rdo rje'i 'bum/ /tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang / /bdun gyis nam mkha' ji
srid bshad/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag/ /'khor ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid/ /'di dag bsten pas rnal 'byor pa/ /kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin
ye shes/ /'di ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod/ /chos rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid kyi/ /thabs dang shes rab
zhon pa dag/ khams gsum dag ni thams cad du/ /sa dang sa 'og bar snang la/ /khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs/ /sen mo ba
spu de bzhin khams/ /khu ba la ni rnam par gzigs/ /pags dang khrag la gzi brjid che/ /tshil dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /rtsa dang sha
la bdun rgyal po/ /'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gros rnam par bshad/ /sa yi khams ni rnam dag pa/ /spyan ni 'khor lo mdzes pa nyid/ /rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste/ /pad+ma'i
bu mo tsha ba nyid/ /sgrol ma rlung ni rnam par dag/ /rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya'o/ /gur gyis de rnams bka' stsal to/ /sngags thams cad rnam par dag pa bdud rtsi
lnga mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting ngo 'dzin le'u bdun pa'o// //khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ /thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas/ /lha yi lus ni
yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /pu ba sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten don gyi phyir/ /stong ba nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs
skyong ba| |sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /mgon po ri khrod ma la myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du//
stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ /gsung dag legs par so sor rtog pa yis/ lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ gtu ma
par ldan pa bdag la myur du gzigs/ rnam par 'dren pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs skyong pa/ gzugs
kun na tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /Dom+b+hi bdag la mgon po myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten
sman slad du/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /thams cad bzhes par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'khor lo can rnams thams cad kyi/ /'dis ni bskyed bar 'gyur

bar ni| |ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po de skad gsungs/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA khA+e tsa rI badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA b+hu tsa ri badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/
oM sarba tA thA ga tA la wa si nI badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ /sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams kyi/ /byin rlabs gnas su rtag par ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/ /'di ni byang chub rim
bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor ba/ /sku yi rin chen sbyang bar bya/ /bsam gtan rdo rje
bsams nas ni/ /sems kyi rin chen rab bsgrub byed/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis/ /ngag gi rdo rje dri ma med/ /gti mug rdo rje rab sbyor pas/ mig gi rnam par shes ba sbyar/ zhes
sdang rdo rje bsam pa yis/ sgra yi sgo bsam pa'o/ sna ni se rdo rje yis/ ro drug 'dod chags rdo rje yis/ lus ni phrag dog rdo rje yis/ yid ni kun tu bzang po yis/ de
nam mkha' 'gro bdag med ma/ /'di rnams kyis ni rnam par sbyang / /gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang / /de'i tshe rgyal ba'i dngos po sbyang ba yod/ /kun rdzob pa bden par yang dag gnas
nas ni/ /'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam rnam par sgom/ /chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa las/ /gang zag thams cad rnam spangs 'jig rten pa/ /'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te//
chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dag/ tshigs pa rnams kyi gdung dang dug khyab pa'i/ /lus kyi sman ni gzhan gyi dug nyid de/ /ji ltar chu ni rna bar zhugs pa la/ /yang na chu ni thabs su 'gyur
ba nyid/ /ji ltar rlung gis bkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyis/ /de bzhin mkhas pas mon sran gre 'u bzhin/ /'dod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi/ skye bo 'dod chags me yis gdung / 'dod
chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa/ /'dod chags smad pas zad par 'gyur/ /'dod chags rdo rje yongs shes pas/ /yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhags pas 'ching
ba yis| |'jig rten chags pas khyab par brjod/ /'dod chags bral ba'i mngon byang chub/ /'dod chags mthar phyin rnams mi 'dod/ /de nas rdo rje sgrol ma yis/ /sgrub thabs sbyin
sreg las kyi ni/ go chas 'dod don thams cad kyi/ sgrub thabs yang dag rab bshad bya/ de la 'di ni rnams ni/ sngas kyi rkang pa yin te/ oM na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/ oM na maHAr+ya ba lo ki

te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ mahA satwa ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re sarba du Sh+TAM ma ma kri te je sam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+haM ya/ hUM hUM hUM/
phaT phaT phaT/ sarba du ShaT stam+b+ha ni tA re swAhA/ ma mdo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya/ phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi ba ste/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par rgya
gser gyi kha dog 'dra bre sgom/ gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang skyes pa'i/ sangs rgyas bzhi yi dbu rgyan can/ lang tsho la ni bab pa'i lus/ g.yob gser
gyi rna cha ma/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ 'od zer dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung / g.yas bsam mnga' ni 'gengs pa'o/ rdo rje lcags kyu ut+pa la
sdigs mdzub g.yon pas 'dzin pa mo/ rdo rje skyil krung sbyor pa yis/ gnas gsum pa ni bsgrub par bya/ shar du me tog sgrol ma stem/ kha dog dkar zhing yid 'ong ma/ ye ge oM
las skyes pa'o/ me tog phreng pas lag pa khyab/ phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig ma nyid/ rgyan rnam skun gyis rnam par brgyan/ g.yas su bdug spos sgrol ma ste/ mdog nag
mdzes pa'i gzugs can ma/ spos dang dung gis lag pa 'brel/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ nub tu mar me sgrol ma ste/ mar me sdong bus lag pa khyab/ mdog ser
rnam par brgyan chen mo/ g.yo ba ser gyi rna cha ma/ byang du dri yi sgrol ma ste/ dri yi drung gis lag khyab pa/ khrag gi mdog ltar lha mo ni/ dkyil 'khor snying po bsgom par bya/ lcags kyu la
sogs rab dbye pas/ der ni sgo yi srung bsam/ ste ba du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma/ 'og tu gnod mdzes ma rab bsgom/ 'khor lo klu zhags bsams nas ni/ spro zhing sngags ni bzla bar
bya/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ ye ge bcu yis lha mo bcu/ pha rol phyin bcu la gnas ma/ 'bras bu thams cad rab sgrub phyir/ rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ sngags ni mchog
dang phul du phyin/ sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa/ bklags pas 'gyur byed drag po ste/ rdo rje gur gyis bshad pa 'o/ sngags 'dis gos kyi thu bar bdun/ mngon par bsngags
par bya ba ste/ mdud pas bcings te nags tshal du/ 'gro na'ang kyang mi 'khyer te/ stag dang / chom rkun dang / chus rin sna thung dang / seng+ge dang / sprul dang / mche ba can dang m+he dang
dom dang / smyig glang la sogs pa dran pa tsam gyis nyams shing yi pa'o/ sangs 'dis ut+pal la sbyin sreg du lan brgya rtsa brgyad ji tsam bsku bar bya ste/ oM tA re tu t+tA re a mu ka me

wa Sham+mA na ya swAhA/ yang sangs de nyid kyi khwa'i sgro la lan sum hu tsa gnyis yongs su bzlas te dgra'i khyim du sbas na / nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed do/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tsa la pra tsa
la shI g+h+raM gA mi de wa da t+taM uts+tsA Ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur pa/ om tA re tu re a mu kA b+hI ng+hA na ku mA rI ma d+ya mud+bA he na ta s+ya pe ta pra ya ts+tshan+tu
me swAhA/ spra tshil dang / gtum pa'i sa bon dang / myos bye dang / a shwa ka'i lo ma dang / me tog bsreg blugs bya zhing / mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram du bcas pa stong phreg lda'i sbyin sreg
ni/ bu mo'i dngos grub la rab tu bsangs te/ nyi ma bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas rang 'dod pa'i bu mo 'thob bo/ de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor par 'gyur pa/ oM tA re

tu t+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+hA nAM sa s+thA na ta A kaR+Sha ya man+ti ke dzaH sngags 'dis ba da ra'i tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog dang sbrags te bsreg blugs bya bar brjod pa 'di byas pas
skyes pa skyong pa rnams kyi bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do/ de nas gzhan lang sbyor bar 'gyur pa/ zla mtshan 'dzags pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis ma zhal gcigs
ma/ lag pa lcags kyu dang / ut+pal dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te/ de'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas me tog 'di rnams zhing dge zhes bya ba la sogs pas
mtsho nas phyi nas sgom pa dang ldan par sangs bzlas so/ oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re a mu kI ma me pa si taM/ swa p+naM ka thA ya hUM phaT/ stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ zhags pa dang
mgrin par bcings te lcags kyur drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams khol mo'i tshul gyis sbyad par bya'o/ de nas gzhan yang sbor par 'gyur ba/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon
par bsngags par gya ste/ bdag gi mig gnyis mig sman gyis bsku par bya zhing rgyal po'i rigs gyi drung du 'jug par bya'o/ de nas rgyal po slob mdang 'dra par gus par byed cing 'gal par mi
byed pa dang / bka' drin stsol zhing snyan par brjod par byed pa dang / bran rdu yang dag par 'gro zhing khros pa yang dbang du 'gyur pa ste/ 'di ni/ mngon sum su mthong ba dang ngo mtshar dang bcas
pa'o/ de nas gzhan yang sbyor par 'gyur pa/ sgrol ma'i gzungs na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ ba gnyis pa'i so drug thal par bya/sa pa kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang / shing ba la las
sdong bu rab tu sbar la mig sman bsdu bar bya'o/ mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje chos dag mnyes la rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o/ thal ba dang lhan cig mig la bsku par bye ste/ rdo rje
mig gis gang bltas pa bde/ gal te pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyag mi 'bab nas de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma lcags te/ bdag gis sangs rgyas com ldan 'das rnams bkrongs pa lags so
de nas gzhan yang sbyor par 'gyur ba/ byis pa so med pa'i lces blangs la sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas bung ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang / ba glang gi gi wang lhan
cig byas pas dpral bar thig le yongs su bzung ste gang bltas pa de dbang du byed do/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ lto ba'i srin bu la gzungs bdun
mngon bar bsngags pa bya ste/ /rdo rje dang lhan cig byas pas dpral bar so rtsis byas la byin te sbyor ba mchog zos pa na mi spong ba dang / gzhan du mi dga' ba dang / gzhan du mi 'gro ba
dang | rang gi bdag po yang spong ngo / /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ mar khu chen pos nye bar byugs la sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas la de bsgom par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i mthar sA
lu btags pas 'dag gu'i dri ma la khu ba byas te gang la byin pa de lnga bor yang mi spong ngo / /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ zla ba la nye bar chags pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i
gzungs zlos shing bsnyen pa byas la de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te dung gi thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rab tu dregs ma nyid la sbyin te/ ji srid du sngar yang rjes su
'brang po/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis ma da na phal la lan brgyad yongs su bzlas te 'dod pa'i 'bras bu des rta mgrin dang lhan cig pas
bskus nad bang du 'gyur ro/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu ka s+ya ban+d+ha naM mu kaM ku ru maH swAhA/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di arka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du bcug par bris la ne'u
le'i khung bur sbas na/ bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /gang gis bsgoms ba tsam gyis
phas kyis rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma/ /sku mdog dkar ba yid 'phrog ma/ /skra phyed du li ba/ chu skyes shin tu dkar pa la yang
dag par gnas ma/ lag pa gnyis par pad+ma mdog dkar ba yang dag par bsgoms shing / g.yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje skyil krung du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis
rnam par brgyan pa lte pa'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o/ /oM las skyes ma/ mchog tu dga' bar byed ma/ dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par
bya zhing rnal 'byor zla ba drug tu goms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bdun du sbyor bas bstan bcos thams cad shes par byed do/ /'bum bzlas pa'i

sbyor bas nyi ma re re la tshigs bcad brgya brgya byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu 'bad pa med par gzhung brgya yang 'dzin par byed do/ /de la sngags kyi rkang bar gyur pa/ oM pi tsu bi tsu pra dz+nyA wa r+d+ha

ni| dz+wA la dz+wA la me d+hA wa r+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+d+hi wa r+d+ha ni swA hA/ khwa me zer ba na sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par bsngags par byas te/ /ma bslangs pa'i sings po skyur po la lan bdun du sngags
kyis gdab par bya zhing ji srid zla ba drug tu gang 'thungs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad pa/
de yis nye bar bsten pa'i sngags/ /sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub/ /dal zhing zab mo chos dang ldan/ /thams cad rig par mkhas dang bcas/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngags
shes shing / /rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son/ /de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig/ nyan thos spyod pa srung ba po/ /sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang / /gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba
dang / /dkyil 'khor 'bri zhing bzlas par ldan/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'joms pa po/ /sngags dang lus skyob sbyor ba yis/ /'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed/ /de ldan bla mar
bcas nas ni/ /gang zhig bla ma smod byed cing / /skye bo bla ma smod pa gang / /dmyal ba chen por 'tshed bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar rdo rje 'jig rten rgyal ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis dang por
mchod| |rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis/ /de ltar bla ma'i nan tan bya/ /bla ma'i grib ma bud med dang / /lham dang stan dang mal stan rnams/ /rmongs chen gang zhig 'gong byed na//
skyes pa de ni spu gri 'dzin/ /legs par dbang bskur slob ma gang / /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' byed pa/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'on par 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol dmyal bar
gnas/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi sbyor ba yis/ /rdzun gyis mi nus smra ba las/ /khong skam mdze nad chen po can/ /dmyal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar shes pa'i slob ma yis/ /bla ma'i bsnyen
bkur pha rol phyin/ /bla ma'i bka' ni rab bsrungs na/ /dngos grub rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi zas ni rtag tu bya/ /zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul/ /snga bar dge 'dun chos ston
bya| |bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing / /de yi rjes su tshogs kun la'o/ /bdag gi las ni brtsams nas ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya/ /yan lag rgyan rnams
kun gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma gtang / /me tog bdug spos mar me dang / /de bzhin dri yi dung sogs g.yas/ /g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon
snod| |mdun du snod ni gzhag par bya/ /zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis/ /me tog spos sogs rim pa bzhin/ /lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa yis/ /mchod par byas na bzang por sbyin/ /me
tog bsgyur ba'i tshul gyis dang / /dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul las dang / /sdong pos mar me'i mchod pa dang / /byugs pa'i lus kyis rjes su dris/ /lA s+ye'i lag pa lA s+ye ste/ /'phreng bas phreng ba'i
mkha' 'gro ma/ /glu yis hUM gi dam tshig glu/ /brla bskums bas ni gar nyid de/ /mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod
pas mchod/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur/ /bzlas dang sgom pa mngon dga' zhing / /rtag tu 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' ji
bzhin| |'di rnams bla med mchod pa'o/ /me tog spos sogs mngon sum du/ /'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis/ sna tshogs mchod pa mchog nyid min/ /de nyid byang chub yan
lag min/ /dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod/ /ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs la/ /dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste/ /tha ma'i las la nag po'o/ /zhi ba la ni me tog dkar/ /ser po
rgyas pa'i rdo rje la/ /me tog nag po tham la/ /dbang dang dgug la dmar po bzang / /rnal 'byor pa gang dbang bskur med/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang / /gang zhig rab gnas
ma mthod dang / /gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /de yi dngos grub mchog nyid med/ /gang gis slob dpon gsol ma btab/ /'dir ni rigs su
skye ba med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya/ /gang gis byang chub ma thob na/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnas su de'i/ /skye zhing skye par 'gyur pa'o/ /yang nas yi bdag
po nyid| |dag pa'i gnas su mngon par 'gro/ bde ba can dang mkha' 'gro dang / /dga' ldan du ni blo ldan skye/ /'jig rten 'dir ni gang 'grub pa/ /sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig
smros| |khams gsum bdag po chen po 'di/ /'chi med rgas pas khyab pa med/ /tshangs pa brgya byin de bzhin drag /sgra gcan me dang rlung dang ni/ /'dod pa'i lha dang thong ldan nyid/ /'di
rnams de yi 'khor du 'gyur/ /lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha ma yin dang mi/ /mi'am ci dang mkha' spyod gang / /de rnams 'khor 'gyur the tshom med/ /'di ni rang byung bcom
ldan 'das/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rigs dang byang chub byad pa dang / /de bzhin du ni lhar gshegs dang / /khyim nas 'byung ba byed pa dang / /rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang /
skye ba yongs su len pa dang / /yongs su mya ngan 'das pha ston/ /'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni/ /'di ni gzugs ni du ma byed/ /sangs rgyas sems can bskyab bzhed pas/ /sangs
rgyas gar ni rol pa mdzad/ /ri bong stag dang seng+ge dang / /glang po rnams kyi rigs su yang / /snying rjes phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /phyag rgyas grub pa skye bar 'gyur/ /bud med sgyu ma'i
spros pa yis/ /'dod chags can la chos gsung ngo / /bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid/ /sgyu ma thams cad sel bar byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gzugs su/ bud med rtag tu yang
dag gnas/ /sgyu ma chen mo gnas 'dug nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster/ /g.yo zhing dang che ngo tsha med/ /rtag tu 'dod chags pha rol 'gro/ /dngos grub kyang ni rab tu ster//
gzugs dang yon tan nor la yang / /'dod pa gang yang ba tsun mo med/ /rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod pas/ /rang gi bde ba myang bar ldan/ /skyes bu
tshul khrims ldan pa dang / /bder gshegs bka' las mi 'da' zhing / /bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje can/ /kye yi rdo rje rab phye ba'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma gtso
mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ zhes sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ser sna rdo rjes
bdag la skyobs/ /'dod chags rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /yid dang phrag dog chen po dang / /rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig mgon/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje can kun
dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas te dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ thig skud gsar pa mdzes par ldan/ /shin tu
tshad ma gtsang ma yis/ /he zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /de la 'di ni/ slob ma chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i dam tshig go /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad zhi/ /de bzhin gshegs ba kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje
la gsol ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ nga ni snying rje stobs dpal ldan/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba bo/ /rdo rje yis ni gsal ba'i lus/ /sku gsung las ni
skyes ba spro/ /gal te la la 'da' byed na/ /'jig ste 'di la the tshom med/ /lus srul bo dang kha cig gang / /bde chen ye shes 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes/ /gzur
cig bgegs ni chen po rnams/ /'khor lo yi ni brgyad nyid kyi/ /cha yis sgor ni rab tu grags/ /stong khang lha yi snam bu ni/ /sgo yi tshad kyi tshad du bya/ /sgo yi phyed kyi cha ru ni/ /ya phubs
dang ni 'gram nyid do/ /rig byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya/ /da ba'i snam bu rig byed byed/ /dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni/ /gnyis par mtshams kyi thig dang yang / /gsum par ngos ni
bzhi yi bzhi/ /thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/ /tshangs thig cha gnyis bor nas ni/ /cha drug tu ni gdab par bya/ /de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas/ /dgu yi char ni rab tu gdab/ /de la 'di

ni| sa sbyang ba'i dam tshig go /oM khaM hUM b+hUM/ de la 'di ni/ ye shes spyan drang ba ste/ oM me di ni badzrI b+ha ba badzra ba n+d+ha hUM/ de la 'di ni/ /thig gdab pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM sa ma ya sU tra
ma ti kra ma hUM/ de la 'di ni/ rdul tshon bri ba'i dam tshig ste/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni thar par byed/ /kye yi rdo rje rgyal po ches/ /dkyil 'khor dam
pa bzhengs par bya/ /dbang ldan du ni sha ra b+ha/ /me yi mtshams su dge slong bri/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bden bral du/ /rlung du rdo rje bri bar bya/ /lcags kyu shar
du bri bar bya/ /lho yi sgor ni zhags pa nyid/ /nub sgor de bzhin lcags sgrog ste/ /byang du rdo rje dril bu 'o/ /dbus su thod pa dkar po ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri/ /de nas rdo rjes
'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin sreg gi grong khyer rab tu phye ba/ rdo rje thab khung sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i bsreg rdzas sbyor ba las/ /zlum bor zhi bar byed par brjod/ /rgyas par ba'i rdzing bu'i
gzugs/ /dbang ni zla ba phyed pa 'dra/ /dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs/ /bsad dang zhe sdang las la ni/ /nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de bzhin skrod byed skal ngan
byung | |yan lag nyams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /tsan+dan a ga ru shing dang / /gzhan yang dri yi rkang 'thung gis/ /sbyin sreg yan lag me sbar nas/ /phyis ni yang ni dgug par bya//
o e h+ye hi mahA b+hu ta de ba r-i Shi dwi dza sat+ta ma gri hI twA A hu ti mA hA r-i asmin+sa n+ni hi to b+ha ba/ lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug par bya/ /zhags pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing / /lcags sgrog
gis ni zhags dag bcing / /dril bu 'khrol bas dbang du byas/ /lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa brgyad/ /mchod yon cho ga byas nas ni/ /mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las/ /yang

ni me ni mnyes par bya/ /de la 'di ni/ rdo rje mchod yon gyi dam tshig ste/ oM pra wa ra sat+kA ra pra tI ts+tsha swAhA/ de la 'di ni/ zhabs bsil gyi dam tshig ste/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya swatwa s+ya

sarba pA paM da ha swAhA/ de la 'di ni/ bsreg rdzas thams cad 'chu ba'i dam tshig gi sngags gi sngags te/ oM badzra na la mahA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya/ sarba b+ha smi ku ru sarba du ShaT na hUM phaT/ dri Sh+ya dzaH hUM baM hoH

sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ phyi nas rang 'dod pa'i lha spyan drang ba ste/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn+ni ha b+hak+Sha Na sa ma ye na tsa a r+g+ha n+tu saM pra tIts+tsha pU dza dz+nyA dA pra sid+d+ha me/ /de la 'di ni/ dgyes pa'i dam tshig ste/

oM kri to baH sarba sa twAR+thaH sid+d+hi rdat+tA ya thA nu ga gats+tsha d+hAM bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM bu na rA ga ma nA ya muH bzhengs pa dang / las sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba dang / /sbyin sreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab gnas ni/ /'jig rten tha snyad la gnas te/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya/ /dang po re zhig rig ma 'dzin/ /dril bu 'khrol bar
'dod pa dang / /rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba las/ /g.yas par rdo rje gsor ba dang / /srong thun skad ni chag pa ni/ /gos kyis mgrin pa bcings pa dang / /rin chen sman gyis yongs

gang ba'i/ /bum pa sta go na gnas par bya/ /oM de wa po tsu badzra d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM mo ha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM dwe Sha ra ti ad+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM rA ga ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM
badzra gau rI A kaR+Sha ya dzaHoM badzra tsau rI pra pe sha ya hUM/ oM badzra pe tA lI ban+d+ha ya baM/ oM badzra g+hasma rI wa sh+yaM ku ru ho/ /'di ni/ ye shes dgug pa'i cho ga'o/ /
shun pa lnga dang ba spu lnga/ /khyad par du yang dri lnga dang / /lus bshul la ni blugs par bya/ /mchod yon la sogs sngar bzhin bya/ /yang na de nyid sbyor bar bya/ /snga bar blugs shing byin gyis
brlab/ /mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyis/ /mchod pa la sogs rim pas brtsam/ /rang gi snying nas ye
shes bsam/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs par gsang gtor bya/ /ye shes rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo spro/ /byang chub sems mchog bsams nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bstod
pa yang dag brtsam/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /stong pa snying rje tha dad med/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs yongs su bskor/ /khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyi mchog mnyes pa/ /khyod kyi
rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun bsgrubs shing / /snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sang mdzad pa/ /sgyu ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phel mdzad pa/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje yid kyis dgyes/ /rdo rje se
gol sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sgom pa bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje yi ge blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje phung po rnam par bsgom/ /

de nas rdo rje mchod pa bsam/ /rdo rje lce yi sbyor ba las/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rjes bcug nyid/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis bsang gtor bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i rdo rje de
skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par/ /rtse mo lnga pa bris pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /stobs kyis sangs rgyas phur bus gdab/ /chos 'byung

grong khyer yid 'ong bar/ /rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba las/ /gal te dngos grub mi ster na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gsad par bya/ /oM du ru du ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hUM hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phur bus gdab
pa chen po rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya/ /dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje chos/ /phyag rgya chen por brjod pa las/ /pad+ma
dmar po spyi bor 'dzin/ /sku mdog dmar po stobs po che/ /gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba'i las/ /bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /g.yon pa zla mdzes
dri ma med/ /dang po dmar por shes par bya/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /rdo rje chos ni gzi brjid che/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas/ /
bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa'o/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam/ /sku mdog dkar po gzi brjid che/ /phyag ni bcu
drug zhal brgyad pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo spyi bor 'dzin/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pa/ /spyan dang gnyis med sbyor
yis| |'jigs pa 'di ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /dang po'i zhal ni dkar po ste/ /nag po dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lhag pa'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus
gnas par/ /rdo rje nyi ma rnam par bsgom/ /cod pan rin chen 'dzin par bsam/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che/ /phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa bo/
sems kyi rin chen spyi bo 'dzin/ /btso ma gser ltar gzi brjid che/ /dang po'i zhal ni ser po ste/ /g.yas pa sngon po 'dra ba'o/ /g.yon pa zla 'od bzang po ste/ /lhag ma'i zhal na bung ba
mtshungs/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rta mchog rnam par bsgom par bya/ /dbu rgyan ral gri 'dzin par bsam/ /margad ut+pal mtshungs pa'o/ /zhal brgyad pa la
zhabs bzhi pa/ /bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni sngo bsangs te/ /rta yi gzugs te 'jigs pa bo/ /g.yas pa kha dog nag po ste/ /g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma
med/ /ral gri dngos grub spyi bor 'dzin/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /rdo rje nyi ma rta nyid kyis/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sgrol ma'i gzugs/ /lha mo rnams kyi phyag gnyis brjod/ /
gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /kye yi rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog /ral gri dag ni rtag pa nyid/ /phan par me long de bzhin no/ /rta mgrin la ni gos bzang ste/ /rdo rje nyi ma la ni gser/ /rta mchog
la ni 'gro mgyogs te/ /mchog tu phan pa nyid kyi yon/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /bla ma la rtag rgyun tu dbul/ /skal bzang rdo rje sems dpa' bdag /skal bzang thub pa rnam
snang mdzad/ /skal bzang dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang / /skal bzang nyi ma bdun rgyal po/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa pos mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin

pa'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ marda marda/ badzra d+h+r-i ka phaT swAhA/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa na/ /rdo rje skye ba'i snying rje tshe/ /'jigs shing skrag
par gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rta mgrin gyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra d+har+m+ma
sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hu lu hu lu/ oM A ro li ka phaT swAhA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam na/ /rdo rje chos kyi grags chen po/ /'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni/ /chos kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te phan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM swA shwa taM pa raM swa shwa ta e h+ye hi dzi na dzi ka phaT/
swAhA/ /de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs/ /brgyal zhing 'jigs par gyur nas ni/ /de nas sangs rgyas dngos
grub stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra sU R+ya ta mo bi d+ha ma na sa ma
ya s+t+waM a haM rat+na d+h+r-i ka phaT swAhA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che/ /'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te rta mchog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /phuHphuH phuH hi hi hi pra dz+nyA d+h+r-i ka phaT swAhA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis/ /rdo rje
don yod rigs byung ba/ /'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /de rnams don yod dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor de nyid de/ /rdo rje can gyi zla phyed mtshungs/ /rdo rje chos
kyi pad+ma 'dra/ /nyi ma'i yid bzhin nor bu sbyin/ /rta mchog ces bya de yi ni/ /thams cad du ni gru gsum mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che/ /phan pa'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni/ /rdo rjes
chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /rin chen tog gi 'od byed ma/ /don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya che/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par ldan/ /stag gi bags pa bsnams pa dang / /dbu skra thod pa
byad pa ste/ /mchod par brtson pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /chags pa mig dmar mthong nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i
le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis/ /spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsams/ /me tog
'bras sogs kyis brgyan pa/ /nags chen po yi mtha' nyid du/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro bar bya/ /nags tshal du ni slong mo rgyu/ /zas ni bzang po brgyan pa nyid/ /de rnams 'jigs shing
skrag nas ster/ /nags tshal bdag po'i rigs kun ni/ /rdo rje can de 'khor du 'gyur/ /skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun/ /skye bo gang zhig skye 'gyur ba/ /gti mug rdo rje'i sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje'i mig
gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar/ /sgra ni gang zhig rab grags pa/ /rna ba'i drung du gnas pa bzhin/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i sbyor ba las/ /drang srong mngon par
shes pas thos/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /mtshon ka lta bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje'i sems kyis shes par 'gyur/ /skye ba bye ba stong
khrag tu/ /rang gi rigs ni stong phrag gcig /rdo rje sbyor bas dran 'gyur te/ /nyi ma gsum bzhin dran par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba du ma yis/ /'dis ni snang bar byed par 'gyur/ /mngon
shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje skye mched rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //phan pa nyid
kyi zhi ba ste/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgyas pa'o/ /rdo rje chos kyis dbang zhes bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsad par bya/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste/ /dbang ni yang dag brtsam par bya/ /rgyas pa'i sems
kyis rgyas pa ste/ /rin chen char sprin rab bsgom bya/ /rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bu mo bkug nas bza' bar bya/ /me yi char sprin 'bab pa dang / /gdug pa'i sems kyis gsad
par bya/ /'phrog pa las ni dkar mo ste/ /skye gnyis pa las tshangs pa nyid/ /dpal ni sred med bu las kyang / /ma bcag pa las raM b+ha nyid/ /dga' ma chu srin rgyal mtshan las/ /phyag
rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams thams cad nye bar bza'/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyi rtse/ /'dod pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar ni swAhAs zhi ba ste/ /rgyas pa'i dus su po ShaT//
mthar ni hUM phaT gsad pa la/ /dbang dang dgug la dzaH dang hrIH/ /las thams cad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /mkha' 'gro
ma ni rdo rje gur/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub phyir/ /thub pas tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ /me tog 'bras bus brgyan byas pa'i/ /ri khrod dang ni sman ljongs su/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas
ni| |bla ma sangs rgyas mchod par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis
gzung / /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni
bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer/ /byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /tshangs pa'i gnas
ni bzhi po yis/ /sems kyi ngal ni bso bar bya/ /phyi nas byang chub sems gnas te/ /rdo rje srung ba'i dam tshig go/ bden dang rdzun par spyad pa yis/ /brtag pas nye bar mi gos te/ /ma skyes

pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /skye ba 'dir ni rab tu brjod/ /oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /hUM ni bcu yi sbyor
pa yis/ /khro bo bcu ni rim pas dgod/ /gshin rje mthar byed shes rab mthar/ /pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/ /Tak+ki khro bo dbyug pa sngon/ /mi g.yo ba dang stobs chen dang / /
gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang / /rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa dang / /bdud rtsi zhabs 'og gnas pa ni/ /bdud rtsi sbyor bas thams cad du/ /khro bo'i sgom pas bsgom par bya/ /dpag
tshad brgyar ni khyab pa ru/ /bsams nas bgegs ni bskrad par bya/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor
bsgom par bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yang na chu ni bsgom par bya/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /brtul zhugs can gyis dbang chen bsgom/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor
steng du ni/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /brum las gnas ni bsams nas su/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor de brtag bya/ /rnam pa lnga ni rab brtag bya/ /ye shes lnga las byung ba yis/ /sems dpa'i

gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya/ /oM d+hArma d+hA tu badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ rdo rje bzhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mkha' spyod ma/ /gsung gi rdo rjes spyod ma/ /sku la zhabs 'og gnas ma ste/ /hUM AHoM las
byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi snying por bya/ /rdo rje dkar mo chu bdag ma/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag med ma/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i gnas mnan cing / /dkyil 'khor snying por bsgom par bya/ /
dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI ni sgo srung ma/ /buk+ka sI dang ri khrod ma/ /gdol ba g.yung mo mtshams su dgod/ /steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad/ /'og
tu de bzhin sa spyod ma/ /dbus su bdag med mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod pa che stsal pa/ /bdag kyang rab tu
bskyab pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba stsol
bar mdzad/ /ye shes kyi dbang la gsol ba gdab ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rig ma'i skyes bu dbang chen la/ /cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha/ /des ni dkyil 'khor dbang
dang ni/ /bstod dang mchod pa la sogs bya/ /ye shes gzhug pa de bzhin yang / /lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi myang / /nang du brjod pa'i sbyor ba las/ /brtul zhugs can gyi sngags bzlas
kyang / /rnal 'byor ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang rang gi rnam par
rtog pa skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ches spyad par bgyi/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /rnal 'byor ma
zhes mngon par brjod/ /phyag rgya chen po rab sbyor las/ /gang phyir de nyid bstan pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ces bshad/ /pha rol phyin pa kun gyi thabs
bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /dga' mdzes mkha' 'gro ma yi mtsho/ /mkha' dang gser gyi char ba dang / /dga' chen ma dang g+hasma rI/ /shin tu dgyes
rol gsang yig 'phrog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro pan rgyud brgyad/ /kyai yi rdo rje sangs rgyas kun/ /gsang mdzod rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang / /'khor lo sdom pa gur dang 'byung gnas ni/ /rnal 'byor
ma rgyud du ni rab tu grags/ /skyes bu rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni yang dag bshad/ /btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud bshad do/ /dman
pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/ /bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /sems can mchog la rnal 'byor mchog /rnal 'byor gong med de ltag la/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ re zhig bdag cag gi yul rnams ni/ 'tshal na/ /sems can gzhan rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal ba lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa snying rje tha dad med/ /gang du sems ni rab bsgoms pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o/ /mu stegs
can sun dbyung ba dang / rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / rang gi sde'i gzhung brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bdag gi byang chub thob bya'i phyir/ /gang phyir gzhan dag
bsgral ba'i phyir/ /des na sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o/ /bdag 'dzin zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /chos dbyings bdag nyid sgrub thabs ni/ /thabs dang shes rab
'dus pa yis/ /des ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rgyal ba'i sras po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di thos nas dga' bar gyur te tshig 'di
skad smras pa/ e ma kun tu bzang po yi/ bstan pa nam mkha' las byung ba/ /nam mkha'i dbus su sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho nyan par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /bde ba
chen po rnam 'phel bas/ /dam tshig thams cad bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /bde dang rangs shing gar dang ni/ /glu gar rol mo sgra byed pas/ /dri dang phreng ba byug pa
yis| |rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu 'grub/ /ji ltar bde ba bde bzung nas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa spyad par bya/ /ji ltar gnas su gnas nas kyang / /yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /bza' dang
btung ba'i sbyor ba dang / /bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis/ /nyi ma gcig tu bskul ba yis/ /dam pa de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig myang / /rtag tu de bzhin
gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /ji ltar mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje 'dzin sbyin bla ma nyid/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rgya mtsho che/ /ji
ltar thub pa rdo rje chos/ /ji ltar mgon po bdun rgyal po/ /de ltar rdo rje slob dpon brjod/ /des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che/ /dge ba
mchog tu gsal ba po/ /rnam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje sdom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po rdo rje gser bar
bzhad pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro bdag med mas 'khyud pas/ /bzang po spyod pa dbye bar bya/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas ni/ /ji ltar 'dod par 'dod pa yis/ /rig 'dzin 'khor los
bsgyur ba nyid/ /dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dri lnga yang dag blangs nas su/ /rdzas lnga dang ni bsre bar bya/ /lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni/ /ril bu'i rig pa 'dzin par
'gyur/ /gur gum a ga ru ldan pa/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /ril bu kha ru bcug byas nas/ /nyi ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sha lnga dang ni ldan pa ru/ /lcags gsum
gyis ni dkris nas ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma rab sbyor bas/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dmar po kha che dang / /dga' ba sbas par sbyar ba ni/ /lcags gsum gyis ni dkris
byas pa/ /rta yi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po rnam bsgoms nas/ /tsa ni'i rus pa'i tshad tsam las/ /gu gul lcags kyis dkris pa ni/ /mgon po'i rig pa
'dzin par 'gyur/ /ril bu sgrub thabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /klu yi rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas/ /rang byung khrag gis bsgo bar bya/ /rdo rje phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mig sman rig
'dzin par 'gyur/ /bla ma'i sa bon ldan pa dang / /stag gi bags pa'i tshil bu mnye/ /sku yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rkang ba'i byug pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /yan lag med pa'i dkyil 'khor
dbus/ /dbang po'i brag phug 'gram du ni/ /rdo rje rkang 'og rnal 'byor gyis/ /lha yi bu mo rab bsgrub bya/ /o Da'i yul du nye ba na/ /a mra 'bras chen po yi ni/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes sbyor ba
yis| |rkang 'og rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /yang nas yang du bskul bar bya/ /de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs/ /rdo
rje gnod mdzes sku chen po/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa can/ /sdigs mdzub klu yi zhags pa dang / /kha dog nag por bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad blangs nas ni/ /rnam pa thams
cad bsgom par bya/ /mi bskyod pa yis yang dag mnan/ /phuH zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do/ /rab tu byug pa dang mig sman rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas dga' zhing mgu ba skyes par gyur te tshig 'di skad smras so/ /e ma ho rdo rje e ma rdo rje/ /e ma rdo rje'i bstan pa ni/ /chos rnams thams cad stong
pa la| |gang phyir dngos grub rab gnas pa/ /snying po med pa'i chu shing la/ /ji ltar snying po'i 'bras zhim pa/ /de ltar snying po med lus la/ /dngos grub 'bras
zhim de bzhin no/ /nam mkha' 'byung po thams cad dang / /chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te/ /sems ni nam mkha' lta bur dag /dge ba'i sems ni mchog tu bde/ /don dam dbang
po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sems las phyi rol 'gyur ba med/ /gzugs sogs so sor 'dod pa yi/ /sems nyid du ni 'dod par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar sems stong la/ sems las phyi rol gyi don sems mi stong pa rab tu 'byung zhes bgyi/
de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ thog med srid pa'i bag chags kyis/ /phyi rol don ni rnam par brtags/ /sems kyis thams cad rnam par brtags/ sems ni kun
tu 'gro bar brjod/ /byang chub sems rab tu 'byung ba bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /shin tu bzhin mdzes mig yangs ma/ /si h+la ga pur 'byung ba'i gnas/ /dbang du
gzhug par byas nas ni/ /skra nas bzung bar yang dag brtsam/ /rdo rje'o yis 'o byas shing / /rdo rje nyed pas mnye bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khyud pas yang dag blang / /rdo rje ma mchu rab btsir bya//

rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gnas ni rab bskul bya/ /rdo rje sems ni phyung ba yis/ /rdo rje lce yis yang dag bza'/ /phyi nas de yi bde can du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje la 'chi
ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la/ /sems ni brtul zhugs can gyis dbrog /pad+ma me tog ldan pa yis/ /pad+ma dmar pos mchod par
bya| |pad+mas mnyes pa'i rdo rje can/ /pad+ma dmar pos khyad par du'o/ /dri nga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /rgyal mtshan ga bur mchod pa ni/ /'di ni brtson 'grub bde chen dang / /stobs dang rgyus
par 'gyur ba dang / /mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis/ /'jig rten 'di ni dbang du byed/ /gang gis dkon mchog gsum bsad dang / /gang gis sems can bsad byas dang / /gang
gis slob dpon smod pa dang / /sangs rgyas lam la 'phya ba rnams/ /lcags kyu yis ni yang dag dgug /lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcing / /zhags pas mgrin pa dam par bcing / /
rdo rje bdag gis dgug par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bsams nas ni/ /de rnams dbang por gsol bar bya/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bkrongs pa ste//
'di ste sdig pa chen po ste/ /mnar med 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de/ /'di ni dmyal ba chen por ltung / /de ltar bsams nas gsad par bya/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsams nas su/ /nam
mkha'i dbyings ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dbyug pas brdungs byas nas/ /rdo rje can gyi gnas su skye/ /lcags kyu la sogs mi nus na/ /zan gyis kyang ni 'du bya zhing /
de nyid kyis ni gzugs bsams nas/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor nyid du gzhag /Tak+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste/ /dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming / /stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa/ /mi g.yo gri rtse'i
dkyil 'khor can/ /rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis/ /thams cad dbugs dbyung rab gsol bas/ /dam tshig rdo rje bsrung
don du| |sbas pa'i spyod yul 'di gsungs pa/ /rdo rje khro bo'i skyes bu che/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /snying gar g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub/ /g.yas na rang gi mtshon
cha 'phyar| |gshin rje gsod pa'i dbyig to can/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje dbyig/ rta mgrin la ni dbang mchog dmar/ /mi phyed bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor las/ /Tak+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste//
dbyig sngon can la rang gi ming / /stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa/ /mi g.yo yi ge'i dkyil 'khor rtse/ /tshad skyob rgyal po rgyal po la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /gtun
shing rdo rje rkang 'og la/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o/ /dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar/ /mthar byed rnam par bsgom par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje ni/ /'jigs byed zla

ba'i nor bu 'dra/ /pad+ma'i khro bo dmar po che/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid nag /mtshams kyi khro bo cher nag cing / /spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pas mtshan/ /gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis te/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' dbyig pa can/ /pad+ma'i khro bo rnams gzigs rjes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyor ba/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya/ /'og tu pad+ma'i gdan bsams
nas/ /khro bo bcu rnams rab bsgom bya/ /ye shes rdo rje rang dngos su/ /bcu phyed dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de/ /bdud rnams zhabs kyi 'og bsams nas/ /dkyil 'khor lnga po bsgom par bya/ /
srung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste/ /'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar/ /dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam mo/ /srung ba'i dam tshig stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i
rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan dpa' chen po/ /rang gi byin rlabs rim gnas te/ /rang gi byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis/ /de nyid las ni bshad par bya/ /snying gi
dbus su zla bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan zla bar ma bcom pa/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab/ /de las rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje bdag med mkha' 'gro ma/ /cho gas bskul bas bsgom
par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sna yi mthar gnas pa/ /yungs kar tsam du rnam par bsgom/ /yungs kar la ni 'gro ba kun/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /da ltar sgom par byed pa yi/ /rang gi
byin rlabs rab tu 'grub/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang reg bya mngon 'dod pa/ /der ni rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni/ /mi 'dzin de phyir bdag gzhan med/ /
ji ltar rdor bad las byung ba/ /zhi ba'i bde ba'i rnam par 'dod/ /rba rlabs med cing snang ba med/ /rnam rtog med cing yi ge med/ /myos byed cung zad rab 'thungs pa'i/ /bdag gi bdag
nyid mi rig go/ dga' bral dga' ba dag gi mthar/ /rtog pa'i dra ba rnam par spangs/ /'gyur med 'khrul pa las 'das shing / /kye yi rdo rje rnam par gsal/ /bem min rnam pa he ru ka/
rnam pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /rang nyid mgon po he ru ka /de yis bdag nyid mi rig cing / /de yi dus na thams cad rig /'byung po 'gro dang 'ong ba ni/ /rang gis kun mkhyen
lta bur gzigs/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras po dang / /yan lag kun dang bug kun/ /mgon po dra ba'i skud par bcos/ /lus ni yod min ltar gzigs shing / /skad cig kye'i
rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mi gzigs shing / /mtshan ma med cing ma byung dang / /gos pa med cing 'khrul pa med/ /sgrib pa lnga ni rnam par spangs/ /ji ltar me
long gzugs brnyan ni/ /rtogs nas bde ba rnam spangs pa/ /de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka'i/ /rnam pa lta bur gsal bar mthong / /de nyid don dang dbang po dang / /phung po nam
mkha' lta bur yod/ /lus ni bde ba nyid brjod cing / /'du byed rnams kyis zil mi gnon/ /gzugs ni mig gis mi 'dzin te/ /sgra ni thos pa po yis min/ /lce yis ro ni mi tshor te/ /dri ni
sna yis kyang ma yin/ /reg bya lus kyi gong bus min/ /'on kyang bde chen tshul las ni/ /pud med bzang mo mthong bas bde/ /rna bas glu yi bde bas bzang / /snom pas dri yi bde ba che/ /
skye gnas reg pa'i bde chen dang / /ro yis btung ba'i sbyor ba las/ /gang gis bde ba 'gog par byed/ /bde ba chen pos 'gro ba khyab/ /bde ba ma rtogs mi shes so/ /sangs rgyas byang
chub sems dpa' la/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang btsun mo bzang / /sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni/ /bde bar phyin cing rnam par sad/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom
ldan 'das kyi bde ba chen po'i tshig 'di skad smras pa/ phal pa'i rnam rtog gzhom pa'i phyir/ /sgom pa yang dag rab tu grags/ /phal ba'i gnas skabs gzhom pa'i phyir/ /sgom pa
yang ni sgom pa min/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin te/ /'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i tshad mnyam par sbyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bsgom
par bya'o/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ /lus can sgom pa'i thabs kyi dgos pa nyid ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ dgos
pa yod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /ming ci lags/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas nyid do/ /sangs rgyas nyid ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de ci lags/ lus can 'di ni/ bden pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga ni/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe
byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi 'dra ba'i phyir sgrub pa yin no/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das bem po lags sam/ rdo rje 'dzin
pas bka' stsal pa/ nga nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes de ci lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ bden pa ma yin pa dang / rdzun pa ma yin pa
dang / rgyu ma yin pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa ste/ de ltar nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nga nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / nga nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / /
de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa dang bral ba'i byang chub de skad ma smra zhig/ nga nyid dngos dang dngos med nga //
dang po'i de bzhin gshegs par brjod/ /gzugs dang gzugs med ldan pa'i mchog /zab mo zhi ba'i chos dang ldan/ sems dpa' chen po he ru ka/ /bdag med lhan cig
mnyam sbyor nga / /bde chen las ni bem min nga / /'jig rten kun rdzob bem po nga / /skyes pa bud med ma ning dang / /'gro ba nga yis yang dag khyab/ /de phyir 'dus pa zhes bya nyid/ /rgyal ba rgya
mtsho bdag gis bshad/ /rdo rje can dang byang sems rnams/ /ma ning gnas su yang dag grub/ /gang zhig lha mo bdag med de/ /rang bzhin gyi ni btsun mo yin/ /sangs rgyas he ru ka nga
yin| |de nyid phyir na ma ning ste/ /'gro ba'i dngos po gnyis mthong nas/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid nga / /shin tu mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis/ /mi bskyod med cing bdag mnga' med//
dam pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin tu dga'
pa chen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ phyag drug pa dang sgeg par bcas/ /zhal gcig ral pa 'dzin pa dang / /brgyad gnyis lo lon ser mo ni/ /rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub//
dpa' bo'i g.yas par mda' nyid de/ /lag pa gnyis par ral gri nyid/ /gsum par me long rig par bya/ /lag pa g.yon par gzhu nyid de/ /gnyis pa la ni dbang mchog nyid//
kaM ke l+la yi yal ga ste/ /phyag drug nyid du bsgom par bya/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang pas gnas par ni/ /bu mo'i snying gar bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje btsun mo 'grub par 'gyur/ /mda'
yis 'o ma 'dzin pa 'bigs/ /a sho ka yis snying gar brab/ /ral gris skyes ma bsdig par bya/ /de nas me long bstan par bya/ /gzhu yis rkang pa bcings
nas ni/ /ut+pal zhags pas dgug par bya/ /skra grol 'ong bar 'dod pa dang / /snyan pa'i skad ni rab tu smra/ /ha dang si ni byed pa mo/ /rangs shing yan lag tshad mas brgyan/ /kha ni
so rtsis gang ba dang / /'dod pa stobs dang bral ba bsam/ /rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi 'gyur sems kyis rjes chags bya/ /'dod pa'i sngags ni ma bcos pas/ /de yi snying ni
bskul bar bya/ /oM a mu kI mA+e kAR+Sha ya many+dzu g+ho Sha hrIHdzaHde ltar bsgoms par byas pa yis/ /'jam pa'i mgon po'i btsun mo ni/ /sgrub pa po la 'dod pa dang / dbang du byed cing
'ong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bzlas pa khri yi sbyor ba las/ /g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma/ /shin tu dag pa'i sems kyis bsgrub/ /haM gi sa bon las skyes pa/ /thams
cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /chang gis btung ba'i rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje yan lag med pa sgrub/ /ma bcos mchog gi sa bon ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin can/ /bde ba
chen po mchog tu zhi/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /'di ni srog ni chen po ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba mdzes ma nyid/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rtag tu de'i/ /dran pa de ltar
rab tu grags/ /mya ngan 'dod chags de bzhin gdungs/ /dga' dang dga' bral de bzhin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /de nyid dbyangs yig drug par brjod/ /zla ba phyed pas yang dag
ldan| |thig les ma go bo nyid du mchod/ /sems can gyi ni kun gzhi ste/ /rgyud rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan
'das kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po'i rdo rje sa bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems sgrub pa gsal ba nye bar gyur nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems dpa' med cing sgom pa ste/ /sngags med lha
